text.11179: [03] tattha ^a^M2.0466^ea^ ^b^kadaa nuha^eb^nti kadaa nu aha.m.  ^b^pabbatakandaraasuu^eb^ti pabbatesu ca kandaresu ca, pabbatassa ^a^V2.0393^ea^ vaa  kandaraasu. ^b^ekaakiyo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0151^ea^ ekako.  ^b^addutiyo^eb^ti nitta.nho. ta.nhaa hi purisassa dutiyaa naama.  ^b^vihassa^eb^nti viharissaami. ^b^aniccato sabbabhava.m  vipassa^eb^nti kaamabhavaadibheda.m sabbampi bhava.m ``hutvaa abhaava.t.thena  anicca''nti vipassanto kadaa nu viharissanti yojanaa.  nidassanamatta~nceta.m, ``yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m, ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa''ti  vacanato (sa.m0 ni0  3.15) itarampi lakkha.nadvaya.m vuttamevaati  da.t.thabba.m. ^b^ta.m me ida.m ta.m nu kadaa bhavissatii^eb^ti ta.m ida.m me  parivitakkita.m kadaa nu bhavissati, kadaa nu kho matthaka.m  paapu.nissatiiti attho. ^b^ta.m nuu^eb^ti cettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m.  aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- kadaa nu kho aha.m mahaagajo viya  sa"nkhalikabandhana.m, gihibandhana.m chinditvaa pabbajitvaa kaayaviveka.m  paribruuhayanto ekaakii pabbatakandaraasu adutiyo sabbattha nirapekkho  sabbasa"nkhaaragata.m aniccaadito vipassanto viharissaamiiti.
text.11180: [03] ^b^bhinnapa.tandharo^eb^ti bhinnavatthadharo, gaathaasukhattha.m nakaaraagama.m  katvaa vutta.m. satthakacchinnaagghaphassava.n.nabhinna.m pa.taciivara.m dhaarentoti  attho. ^b^munii^eb^ti pabbajito. ^b^amamo^eb^ti kule vaa ga.ne  vaa mamattaabhaavena amamo. katthacipi aaramma.ne aasiisanaaya abhaavena  ^b^niraaso. hantvaa sukhii pavanagato vihassa^eb^nti raagaadike  kilese ariyamaggena samucchinditvaa maggasukhena phalasukhena sukhii  mahaavanagato kadaa nu kho aha.m viharissaami.
text.11181: [03] ^b^vadharoganii.la^eb^nti mara.nassa ca rogassa ca kulaavakabhuuta.m.  ^b^kaaya.m ima^eb^nti ima.m khandhapa~ncakasa"nkhaata.m kaaya.m. khandhapa~ncakopi  hi ``avijjaagatassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa ta.nhaanugatassa  ayameva kaayo bahiddhaa naamaruupa''ntiaadiisu kaayo vuccati.  ^b^maccujaraayupadduta^eb^nti mara.nena ceva jaraaya ca pii.lita.m,  vipassamaano aha.m bhayahetupahaanena ^b^viitabhayo,^eb^ ta.m nu kadaa  bhavissatiiti attho.
text.11182: [03] ^b^bhayajanani^eb^nti pa~ncaviisatiyaa mahaabhayaana.m uppaadakaara.nabhuuta.m  kaayikassa ca cetasikassa ca sakalassapi va.t.tadukkhassa aavahanato  ^b^dukhaavaha.m. ta.nhaalata.m bahuvidhaanuvattani^eb^nti bahuvidha~nca aaramma.na.m  bhavameva vaa anuvattati ^a^M2.0467^ea^ santanotiiti bahuvidhaanuvattani.m,  ta.nhaasa"nkhaatalata.m. ^b^pa~n~naamaya^eb^nti maggapa~n~naamaya.m sunisita.m  asikhagga.m viiriyapaggahitena saddhaahatthena gahetvaa samucchinditvaa  ``kadaa nuha.m vase''ti ya.m parivitakkita.m, tampi kadaa bhavissatiiti  yojanaa.
text.11183: [03] ^b^uggateja^eb^nti samathavipassanaavasena nisitataaya tikkhateja.m.  ^b^sattha.m isiina^eb^nti buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasaavakaisiina.m ^a^V2.0394^ea^ satthabhuuta.m  ^a^P3.0152^ea^. ^b^maara.m sasena.m sahasaa bha~njissa^eb^nti  kilesasenaaya sasena.m abhisa"nkhaaraadimaara.m sahasaa siighameva  bha~njissaami. ^b^siihaasane^eb^ti thiraasane, aparaajitapalla"nketi attho.
text.11184: [03] ^b^sabbhi samaagamesu di.t.tho bhave^eb^ti dhammagaaravayuttataaya  ^b^dhammagaruuhi^eb^ taadilakkha.nappattiyaa ^b^taadiihi^eb^  avipariitadassitaaya ^b^yaathaavadassiihi^eb^ ariyamaggeneva  paapajitindriyataaya ^b^jitindriyehi^eb^ buddhaadiihi saadhuuhi samaagamesu  ``kadaa nu aha.m padhaaniyoti di.t.tho bhaveyya''nti ya.m me parivitakkita.m,  ta.m nu kadaa bhavissatiiti yojanaa. iminaa nayena sabbattha  padayojanaa veditabbaa, padatthamattameva va.n.nayissaama.
text.11185: [03] ^b^tandii^eb^ti aalasiya.m. ^b^khudaa^eb^ti jighacchaa.  ^b^kii.tasariisapaa^eb^ti kii.ta~nceva sariisapaa ca. ^b^na  baadhayissantii^eb^ti ma.m na byaadhayissanti  sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassaana.m jhaanehi pa.tibaahitattaati adhippaayo.  ^b^giribbaje^eb^ti pabbatakandaraaya. ^b^atthatthiya^eb^nti  sadatthasa"nkhaatena atthena atthika.m.
text.11186: [03] ^b^ya.m vidita.m mahesinaa^eb^ti ya.m catusacca.m mahesinaa  sammaasambuddhena sayambhuu~naa.nena ~naata.m pa.tividdha.m, taani cattaari saccaani  anupacitakusalasambhaarehi su.t.thu duddasaani maggasamaadhinaa  ^b^samaahitatto,^eb^ sammaasatiyaa ^b^satimaa,^eb^ ariyamaggapa~n~naaya aha.m  ^b^agaccha.m^eb^ pa.tivijjhissa.m adhigamissanti attho.
text.11187: [03] ^b^ruupe^eb^ti cakkhuvi~n~neyyaruupe. ^b^amite^eb^ti ~naa.nena  amite, aparicchinne apari~n~naateti attho. ^b^phusitabbe^eb^ti,  pho.t.thabbe. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti manovi~n~neyyadhamme. ^b^amite^eb^ti vaa  aparimaa.ne niilaadivasena anekabhedabhinne ruupe bherisaddaadivasena,  muularasaadivasena, kakkha.lamudutaadivasena, sukhadukkhaadivasena ca,  anekabhedasaddaadike caati attho. ^b^aadittato^eb^ti ekaadasahi  aggiihi aadittabhaavato. ^b^samathehi yutto^eb^ti  jhaanavipassanaamaggasamaadhiihi ^a^M2.0468^ea^ samannaagato. ^b^pa~n~naaya daccha^eb^nti  vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya dakkhissa.m.
text.11188: [03] ^b^dubbacanena vutto^eb^ti duruttavacanena gha.t.tito. ^b^tato  nimitta^eb^nti pharusavaacaahetu. ^b^vimano na hessa^eb^nti  domanassito na bhaveyya.m. ^b^atho^eb^ti atha. ^b^pasattho^eb^ti  kenaci pasa.msito.
text.11189: [03] ^b^ka.t.the^eb^ti daarukkhandhe. ^b^ti.ne^eb^ti ti.naana.m khandhe.  ^b^ime^eb^ti ime mama santatipariyaapanne pa~nca khandhe ^a^V2.0395^ea^. ^b^amite ca  dhamme^eb^ti tato a~n~nena indriyakkhandhena amite ruupadhamme. tenaaha  -- ``ajjhattikaaneva ca baahiraani caa''ti. ^b^sama.m tuleyya^eb^nti  aniccaadivasena ceva asaaraadiupamaavasena ca sabba.m samameva katvaa  tiireyya.m.
text.11190: [03] ^b^isippayaatamhi^eb^ ^a^P3.0153^ea^ ^b^pathe vajanta^eb^nti  buddhaadiihi mahesiihi sammadeva payaate samathavipassanaamagge vajanta.m  pa.tipajjanta.m. paavusasamaye kaalamegho ^b^navena toyena^eb^ vassodakena  saciivara.m pavane kadaa nu ovassati, temetiiti attano  abbhokaasikabhaavaparivitakkita.m dasseti.
text.11191: [03] ^b^mayuurassa sikha.n.dino vane dijassaa^eb^ti maatukucchito  a.n.dakosato caati dvikkhattu.m jaayanavasena dijassa, sikhaasambhavena  sikha.n.dino ca mayuurassa vane kadaa pana girigabbhare ^b^ruta.m^eb^  kekaarava.m sutvaa vela.m sallakkhitvaa sayanato vu.t.thahitvaa ^b^amatassa  pattiyaa^eb^ nibbaanaadhigamaaya. ^b^sa.mcintaye^eb^ti vuccamaane bhave  aniccaadito manasi kareyya.m vipasseyyanti attho.
text.11192: [03] ^b^ga"nga.m yamuna.m sarassati^eb^nti etaa mahaanadiyo asajjamaano  bhaavanaamayaaya ^b^iddhiyaa^eb^ kadaa nu patareyyanti yojanaa.  ^b^paataalakhitta.m ba.lavaamukha~ncaa^eb^ti paataaya ala.m pariyattanti paataala.m,  tadeva khitta.m, pathaviyaa sa.n.thahanakaale tathaa .thitanti paataalakhitta.m.  yojanasatikaadibhedaani samuddassa antopathaviyaa tiira.t.thaanaani, yesu  kaanici naagaadiina.m vasana.t.thaanaani honti, kaanici su~n~naaniyeva hutvaa  ti.t.thanti. ba.lavaamukhanti mahaasamudde mahanta.m aava.t.tamukha.m.  mahaanirayadvaarassa hi viva.takaale mahaaaggikkhandho tato nikkhanto  tadabhimukha.m anekayojanasataayaamavitthaara.m he.t.thaa samuddapadesa.m .dahati,  tasmi.m da.d.dhe upari udaka.m aava.t.taakaarena ^a^M2.0469^ea^ paribbhamanta.m mahataa saddena he.t.thaa  nipatati. tattha ba.lavaamukhasama~n~naa, iti ta~nca paataalakhitta.m  ba.lavaamukha~nca ^b^vibhi.msana.m^eb^ bhayaanaka.m asajjamaano iddhiyaa kadaa nu  patareyyanti ya.m parivitakkita.m, ta.m kadaa nu bhavissati, bhaavanaamaya.m  iddhi.m nibbattetvaa kadaa nu eva.m iddhi.m va.la~njissaamiiti attho.
text.11193: [03] ^b^naagova asa"ngacaarii padaalaye^eb^ti yathaa mattavaara.no  da.lhathambha.m bhinditvaa ayasa"nkhalika.m viddha.msetvaa asa"ngacaarii vana.m  pavisitvaa eko adutiyo hutvaa attano rucivasena carati, evamaha.m  kadaa nu sabbasubha.m nimitta.m ^b^nibbajjaya.m^eb^ niravasesato vajjayanto  kaamacchandavaso ahutvaa jhaane ^b^yuto^eb^ payutto kaamagu.nesu chanda.m  sammadeva padaaleyya.m chindeyya.m pajaheyyanti ya.m parivitakkita.m, ta.m nu  kadaa bhavissati.
text.11194: [03] ^b^i.na.t.tova^eb^ ^a^V2.0396^ea^ ^b^daliddako nidhi.m aaraadhayitvaa^eb^ti yathaa koci  daliddo jiivikapakato i.na.m gahetvaa ta.m sodhetu.m asakkonto i.na.t.to  i.nena a.t.tito dhanikehi pii.lito nidhi.m aaraadhayitvaa adhigantvaa  i.na~nca sodhetvaa sukhena ca jiivanto tu.t.tho bhaveyya, eva.m ahampi kadaa  nu i.nasadisa.m kaamacchanda.m pahaaya ^b^mahesino^eb^ ariyadhanasampu.n.nataaya  ma.nikanakaadiratanasampu.n.nanidhisadisa.m ^a^P3.0154^ea^ buddhassa  ^b^saasana.m^eb^ adhigantvaa tu.t.tho bhaveyyanti ya.m parivitakkita.m, ta.m kadaa  nu bhavissatiiti.
text.11195: [03] eva.m pabbajjato pubbe nekkhammavitakkavasena pavatta.m attano  vitakkapavatti.m dassetvaa idaani pabbajitvaa yehaakaarehi attaana.m  ovaditvaa adhigacchi, te dassento ^b^``bahuuni  vassaanii''^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^bahuuni vassaani  tayaamhi yaacito, agaaravaasena ala.m nu te ida^eb^nti  anekasa.mvaccharaani vividhadukkhaanubandhena agaaramajjhe vaasena ala.m  pariyattameva teti, ambho citta, ida.m tayaa anekaani sa.mvaccharaani aha.m  amhi nanu yaacito. ^b^ta.m daani ma.m pabbajita.m samaana^eb^nti ta.m ma.m  tayaa tathaa ussaahanena pabbajita.m samaana.m kena kaara.nena citta tuva.m na  yu~njasi, samathavipassana.m cha.d.detvaa nihiine aalasiye niyojesiiti  attho.
text.11196: [03] ^b^nanu^eb^ ^a^M2.0470^ea^ aha.m, citta, tayaamhi yaacitob^ti, ambho citta, aha.m  tayaa nanu yaacito amhi aayaacito ma~n~ne. yadi yaacito, kasmaa  idaani tadanuruupa.m na pa.tipajjasiiti adhippaayo.  ^b^``giribbaje''^eb^tiaadinaa yaacitaakaara.m dasseti. ^b^citrachadaa  viha"ngamaa^eb^ vicitrapekhu.napakkhino, mayuuraati attho.  ^b^mahindaghosatthanitaabhigajjino^eb^ti jalaghosatthanitena hetunaa su.t.thu  gajjanasiilaa. ^b^te ta.m ramessanti vanamhi jhaayina^eb^nti te mayuuraa  ta.m vane jhaanapasuta.m ramessantiiti nanu tayaa yaacitoti dasseti.
text.11197: [03] ^b^kulamhii^eb^ti kulapariva.t.te. ^b^imamajjhupaagato^eb^ti ima.m  ara~n~na.t.thaana.m pabbajja.m vaa ajjhupaagato. ^b^athopi tva.m, citta, na  mayha tussasii^eb^ti tva.m anuvattitvaa .thitampi ma.m naaraadhessasiiti attho.
text.11198: [03] ^b^mameva eta.m na hi tva.m paresa^eb^nti eta.m, citta, mameva tasmaa  tva.m paresa.m na hosi. tva.m pana a~n~nesa.m viya katvaa ^b^sannaahakaale^eb^  kilesamaare yujjhitu.m bhaavanaasannaahakaale nati vatvaa paridevitena  ^b^ki.m^eb^ payojana.m, idaani ta.m a~n~nathaa vattitu.m na dassaamiiti  adhippaayo. ^b^sabba.m ida.m calamiti pekkhamaano^eb^ti yasmaa ``ida.m  citta.m a~n~na~nca sabba.m tebhuumakasa"nkhaara.m cala.m anava.t.thita''nti  pa~n~naacakkhunaa ^a^V2.0397^ea^ olokento gehato kaamehi ca abhinikkhami.m  ^b^amatapada.m^eb^ nibbaana.m ^b^jigiisa.m^eb^ pariyesanto, tasmaa, citta,  ananuvattanto nibbaana.m pariyesanameva karomiiti adhippaayo.
text.11199: [03] aviitaraagena sudunnivaaraya.m citta.m cala.m ^b^makka.tasannibha.m^eb^  vanamakka.tasadisa.m iti ^b^suyuttavaadii^eb^ subhaasitavaadii dvipadaanamuttamo  mahaabhisakko naradammasaarathiiti yojanaa.
text.11200: [03] ^b^aviddasuu yattha sitaa puthujjanaa^eb^ti yattha yesu vatthukaamesu  kilesakaamesu ca sitaa pa.tibaddhaa te andhaputhujjanaa tena ^a^P3.0155^ea^  kaamaraagena punabbhavesino ekanteneva dukkhamicchanti.  icchantaa ca ^b^cittena niitaa niraye niraakataa^eb^ti cittavasikaa  nirayasa.mvattanika.m kamma.m karontaa hitasukhato niraakataa hutvaa attano  citteneva niraye niitaa na a~n~nathaati cittasseva niggahetabbata.m dasseti.
text.11201: [03] punapi ^a^M2.0471^ea^ citta.myeva niggahetu.m mantento  ^b^``mayuurako~ncaabhirutamhii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha  ^b^mayuurako~ncaabhirutamhii^eb^ti sikhiihi saarasehi ca abhikuujite.  ^b^diipiihi byagghehi purakkhato vasa^eb^nti mettaavihaaritaaya evaruupehi  tiracchaanagatehi purakkhato parivaarito hutvaa vane vasanto, etena  su~n~nabhaavaparibruuhanamaaha. ^b^kaaye apekkha.m jahaa^eb^ti sabbaso kaaye  nirapekkho jaha, etena pahitattata.m vadati. ^b^maa viraadhayaa^eb^ti  ima.m sudullabha.m navama.m kha.na.m maa viraadhehi. ^b^itissu ma.m, citta, pure  niyu~njasii^eb^ti eva~nhi tva.m, citta, ma.m pabbajjato pubbe sammaapa.tipattiya.m  uyyojesiiti attho.
text.11202: [03] ^b^bhaavehii^eb^ti uppaadehi va.d.dhehi ca. ^b^jhaanaanii^eb^ti  pa.thamaadiini cattaari jhaanaani. ^b^indriyaanii^eb^ti saddhaadiini  pa~ncindriyaani. ^b^balaanii^eb^ti taaniyeva pa~nca balaani.  ^b^bojjha"ngasamaadhibhaavanaa^eb^ti satta bojjha"nge catasso samaadhibhaavanaa  ca. ^b^tisso ca vijjaa^eb^ti pubbenivaasa~naa.naadikaa tisso vijjaa  ca. ^b^phusa^eb^ paapu.naahi ^b^buddhasaasane^eb^ sammaasambuddhaovaade .thito.
text.11203: [03] ^b^niyyaanika^eb^nti va.t.tadukkhato niyhaanavaha.m.  ^b^sabbadukkhakkhayogadha^eb^nti amatogadha.m nibbaanapati.t.tha.m  nibbaanaaramma.na.m. ^b^sabbakilesasodhana^eb^nti  anavasesakilesamalavisodhana.m.
text.11204: [03] ^b^khandhe^eb^ti upaadaanakkhandhe. ^b^pa.tipassa yoniso^eb^ti  rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhatoti ^a^V2.0398^ea^ evamaadiihi vividhehi  pakaarehi vipassanaa~naa.nena sammaa upaayena nayena passa. ^b^ta.m  jahaa^eb^ti ta.m dukkhassa samudaya.m ta.nha.m pajaha, samucchinda.  ^b^idhevaa^eb^ti imasmi.myeva attabhaave.
text.11205: [03] ^b^anicca^eb^ntiaadi antavantato aniccantikato  taavakaalikato niccapa.tikkhepato ca aniccanti vaa passa.  ^b^dukkha^eb^nti te udayabbayapa.tipii.lanato sappa.tibhayato dukkhamato  sukhapa.tikkhepato dukkhanti vaa passa. ^b^su~n~na^eb^nti avasavattanato  asaamikato asaarato attapa.tikkhepato ca su~n~na.m, tato eva  ^b^anattaa^eb^ti. vigarahitabbato ava.d.dhiaabaadhanato ca  ^b^agha^eb^nti ca ^b^vadha^eb^nti ca vipassa yonisoti yojanaa.  ^b^manovicaare^eb^ ^a^M2.0472^ea^ ^b^uparundha cetaso^eb^ti manovicaarasa~n~nino  gehasitasomanassupavicaaraadike a.t.thaarasa cetaso uparundha vaarehi  nirodhehi.
text.11206: [03] ^b^mu.n.do^eb^ti mu.n.dabhaava.m upagato, ohaaritakesamassuko.  ^b^viruupo^eb^ti tena mu.n.dabhaavena paruu.lhalomataaya chinnabhinnakaasaaya  vatthataaya viruupo ^a^P3.0156^ea^ veva.n.niya.m upagato.  ^b^abhisaapamaagato^eb^ti ``pi.n.dolo vicarati pattapaa.nii''ti ariyehi  kaatabba.m abhisaapa.m upagato. vutta~nheta.m -- ``abhisaapoya.m, bhikkhave,  lokasmi.m pi.n.dolo vicarasi pattapaa.nii''ti (sa.m0 ni0  3.80).  tenaaha ^b^``kapaalahatthova kulesu bhikkhasuu''^eb^ti. ^b^yu~njassu  satthuvacane^eb^ti sammaasambuddhassa ovaade yoga.m karohi anuyu~njassu.
text.11207: [03] ^b^susa.mvutatto^eb^ti su.t.thu kaayavaacaacittehi sammadeva sa.mvuto.  ^b^visikhantare cara^eb^nti bhikkhaacariyaaya icchaavisesesu caranto.  ^b^cando yathaa dosinapu.n.namaasiyaa^eb^ti vigatadosaaya pu.n.namaaya  kulesu niccanavasaaya paasaadikataaya candimaa viya caraati yojanaa.
text.11208: [03] ^b^sadaa dhute rato^eb^ti sabbakaala~nca dhutagu.ne abhirato.  ^b^tathuupama.m cittamida.m karosii^eb^ti yathaa koci puriso phalaani  icchanto phalarukkhe ropetvaa tato aladdhaphalova te muulato chinditu.m  icchati, citta, tva.m tathuupama.m tappa.tibhaaga.m ida.m karosi. ^b^ya.m ma.m  aniccamhi cale niyu~njasii^eb^ti ya.m ma.m pabbajjaaya niyojetvaa  pabbajitvaa addhaagata.m pabbajjaaphala.m aniccamhi cale sa.msaaramukhe  niyu~njasi niyojanavasena pavattesi.
text.11209: [03] ruupaabhaavato ^b^aruupaa^eb^. cittassa hi taadisa.m sa.n.thaana.m  niilaadiva.n.nabhedo vaa natthi, tasmaa vutta.m aruupaati.  duura.t.thaanappavattiyaa ^b^duura"ngama^eb^. yadipi cittassa makka.tasuttamattampi  puratthimaadidisaabhaagena ^a^V2.0399^ea^ gamana.m naama natthi, duure santa.m pana aaramma.na.m  sampa.ticchatiiti duura"ngama. ekoyeva hutvaa cara.navasena pavattanato  ^b^ekacaari,^eb^ antamaso dve tii.nipi cittaani ekato uppajjitu.m  samatthaani naama natthi, ekameva pana citta.m ekasmi.m santaane uppajjati.  tasmi.m niruddhe aparampi ekameva uppajjati, tasmaa ekacaari.  ^b^na te karissa.m vacana.m idaaniha^eb^nti yadipi pubbe tava vase  anuvatti.m, idaani pana satthu ovaada.m laddhakaalato ^a^M2.0473^ea^ pa.t.thaaya cittavasiko  na bhavissaami. kasmaati ce? ^b^dukkhaa hi kaamaa ka.tukaa  mahabbhayaa^eb^ kaamaa naamete atiitepi dukkhaa, aayatimpi ka.tukaphalaa,  attaanuvaadaadibhedena mahataa bhayena anubandhantaa mahabbhayaa.  ^b^nibbaanamevaabhimano carissa.m^eb^ tasmaa nibbaanameva uddissa  abhimukhacitto viharissa.m.
text.1121: [03] ya.m panattha.m a"nkusa.m katvaa aya.m thero arahatta.m patto, tamevattha.m  hadaye .thapetvaa arahatta.m pattopi ^b^``naanaajanapada.m yanti''^eb^ti idameva  gaatha.m abhaasi. tasmaa tadevassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.
text.11210: [03] tameva nibbaanaabhimukhabhaava.m dassento ^b^``naaha.m  alakkhyaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^naaha.m alakkhyaa^eb^ti  alakkhikataaya nissiriikataaya naaha.m gehato nikkhaminti yojanaa.
text.11211: [03] ^b^ahirikkataayaa^eb^ti yathaavajja.m ke.li.m karonto viya  nillajjataaya. ^b^cittahetuu^eb^ti ekadaa ^a^P3.0157^ea^ niga.n.tho,  ekadaa paribbaajakaadiko honto anava.t.thitacitto puriso viya  cittavasiko hutvaa. ^b^duurakantanaa^eb^ti raajaadiihi metta.m katvaa tesu  dubbhitvaa dubbhibhaavena. ^b^aajiivahetuu^eb^ti aajiivakaara.naa  jiivikaapakato hutvaa aajiivikaabhayena aha.m ^b^na nikkhami.m^eb^ na  pabbaji.m. ^b^kato ca te, citta, pa.tissavo mayaa^eb^ti,  ``pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya na tava vase vattaami, mameva pana vase  vattaamii''ti, citta, mayaa nanu pa.ti~n~naa kataati dasseti.
text.11212: [03] ^b^appicchataa sappurisehi va.n.nitaa^eb^ti ``paccayesu sabbaso  appicchaa naama saadhuu''ti buddhaadiihi pasa.t.thaa, tathaa ^b^makkhappahaana.m^eb^  paresa.m gu.ne makkhanassa pahaana.m vuupasamo sabbassa dukkhassa  ^b^vuupasamo^eb^ nibbaapana.m sappurisehi va.n.nita.m. ^b^itissu ma.m,  citta, tadaa niyu~njasi,^eb^ ``samma, tayaa tesu gu.nesu  pati.t.thaatabba''nti, citta, tva.m eva.m tadaa niyu~njasi. ^b^idaani tva.m  gacchasi pubbaci.n.na.m^eb^ idaani ma.m tva.m pahaaya attano purimaaci.n.na.m  mahicchataadi.m pa.tipajjasi, ki.m naametanti adhippaayo.
text.11213: [03] yamattha.m sandhaaya ``gacchasi pubbaci.n.na''nti vutta.m. ta.m dassetu.m  ^b^``ta.nhaa avijjaa caa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^ta.nhaa^eb^ti  paccayesu ta.nhaa, ^b^avijjaa^eb^ti tattheva aadiinavapa.ticchaadikaa  avijjaa. ^b^piyaapiya^eb^nti puttadaaraadiisu pemasa"nkhaato piyabhaavo  ceva pantasenaasanesu adhikusaladhammesu ^a^V2.0400^ea^ anabhiratisa"nkhaato  appiyabhaavo ca ubhayattha anurodhapa.tivirodho. ^b^subhaani  ruupaanii^eb^ti ajjhatta.m bahiddhaa ca subharuupaani. ^b^sukhaa vedanaa^eb^ti  i.t.thaaramma.ne pa.ticca uppajjanasukhavedanaa. ^b^manaapiyaa kaamagu.naa^eb^ti  vuttaavasesaa manoramaa ^a^M2.0474^ea^ kaamako.t.thaasaa. ^b^vantaa^eb^ti niruupato  ta.mnissitassa chandaraagassa vikkhambhanapahaanena cha.d.ditataaya  pariccattataaya ca vantaa. ^b^vante aha.m aavamitu.m na ussahe^eb^ti eva.m  te cha.d.dite puna paccaavamitu.m aha.m na sakkomi, pariccattaa eva hontiiti  vadati.
text.11214: [03] ^b^sabbatthaa^eb^ti sabbesu bhavesu sabbaasu yoniisu sabbaasu  gatiisu vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiisu ca. ^b^vaco kata.m mayaa^eb^ti, ambho citta,  tava vacana.m mayaa kata.m. karonto ca ^b^bahuusu jaatiisu na mesi  kopito^eb^ti anekaasu jaatiisu pana mayaa na kopito asi. mayaa  neva paribhavito. tathaapi ^b^ajjhattasambhavo^eb^ attani sambhuuto  hutvaapi tava akata~n~nutaaya ^b^dukkhe ciira.m sa.msarita.m tayaa kate^eb^ti  tayaa nibbattite anaadimati sa.msaaradukkhe sucirakaala.m mayaa sa.msarita.m  paribbhamita.m.
text.11215: [03] idaani ``dukkhe cira.m sa.msarita.m tayaa kate''ti sa"nkhepato  vuttamattha.m uppattibhedena gatibhedena ca vitthaarato dassento  ^b^``tva~n~nevaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^raajadasii^eb^ti raajaa asi,  dakaaro padasandhikaro, vessaa ca suddaa ca bhavaama ekadaa taveva  vaahasaati yojanaa ^a^P3.0158^ea^. ^b^devattana.m vaapii^eb^ti  devabhaava.m vaapi tva.myeva ^b^no^eb^ amhaaka.m, citta, karosiiti yojanaa.  ^b^vaahasaa^eb^ti kaara.nabhaavena.
text.11217: [03] ^b^nanu dubbhissasi ma.m punappuna^eb^nti punappuna.m dubbhissasi  nuna, yathaa pubbe tva.m anantaasu jaatiisu, citta, mittapa.tiruupako  sapatto hutvaa mayha.m punappuna.m dubbhi, idaani tathaa dubbhissasi ma~n~ne,  pubbe viya caaretu.m na dassaamiiti adhippaayo. ^b^muhu.m muhu.m  caara.nika.mva dassaya^eb^nti abhi.nhato cara.naaraha.m viya mano dassento  cara.naaraha.m purisa.m va~ncetvaa caragopaka.m nipphaadento viya punappuna.m ta.m ta.m  bhava.m dassento. ^b^ummattakeneva mayaa palobhasii^eb^ti  ummattakapurisena viya mayaa saddhi.m kii.lanto ta.m ta.m palobhaniiya.m  dassetvaa palobhasi. ^b^ki~ncaapi te, citta, viraadhita.m mayaa^eb^ti,  ambho citta, ki.m naama te mayaa viraddha.m, ta.m kathehiiti adhippaayo.
text.11218: [03] ^b^ida.m pure citta^eb^nti ida.m citta.m naama ito pubbe ruupaadiisu  aaramma.nesu rajjanaadinaa, yena aakaarena icchati, yattheva cassa kaamo  uppajjati, tassa ^a^M2.0475^ea^ vasena yatthakaama.m yathaa vicarantassa  sukha.m ^a^V2.0401^ea^ hoti,  tatheva ca caranto yathaasukha.m diigharatta.m caarika.m acari. ajjaaha.m  pabhinnamada.m mattahatthi.m hatthaacariyasa"nkhaato cheko a"nkusaggaho a"nkusena  viya yonisomanasikaarena na.m niggahessaami, nassa viitikkamitu.m  dassaamiiti.
text.11219: [03] ^b^satthaa ca me lokamima.m adhi.t.thahii^eb^ti mama satthaa  sammaasambuddho ima.m anavasesakhandhaloka.m ~naa.nena adhi.t.thahi. kinti?  hutvaa abhaava.t.thena ^b^aniccato,^eb^ kassacipi dhuvassa thaavarassa  abhaavato ^b^addhuvato^eb^ sukhasaaraadiina.m abhaavato ^b^asaarato^eb^.  ^b^pakkhanda ma.m, citta, jinassa saasane^eb^ti tasmaa yaathaavato  pa.tipajjitu.m, citta, ma.m jinassa bhagavato saasane pakkhandehi  anuppavesehi. ``pakkhandima''ntipi paa.li, jinassa saasane ima.m  loka.m ~naa.nena pakkhanda, yaathaavato taarehi, pakkhandanto ca  vipassanaa~naa.namaggena yaapento suduttarato mahantato sa.msaaramahoghato ma.m  taarehi.
text.11220: [03] ^b^na te ida.m, citta, yathaa puraa.naka^eb^nti, ambho citta, ida.m  attabhaavageha.m poraa.naka.m viya tava na hotiiti attho. kasmaa?  ^b^naaha.m ala.m tuyha vase nivattitu^eb^nti idaanaaha.m tava vase nivattitu.m  na yutto. yasmaa ^b^mahesino^eb^ bhagavato ^b^pabbajitomhi^eb^  saasane. pabbajitakaalato ca pa.t.thaaya ^a^P3.0159^ea^ sama.naa naama  maadisaava na honti vinaasadhaarino, eka.msato sama.naayeva hontiiti  attho.
text.11221: [03] ^b^nagaa^eb^ti sineruhimavantaadayo sabbe pabbataa.  ^b^samuddaa^eb^ti puratthimasamuddaadayo siitasamuddaadayo, na sabbe samuddaa.  ^b^saritaa^eb^ti ga"ngaadayo sabbaa nadiyo ca. ^b^vasundharaa^eb^ti  pathavii. ^b^disaa catasso^eb^ti puratthimaadibhedaa catasso disaa.  ^b^vidisaa^eb^ti puratthimadakkhi.naadayo catasso anudisaa.  ^b^adho^eb^ti he.t.thaa yaava udakasandhaarakavaayukhandhaa. ^b^divaa^eb^ti  devalokaa. divaaggaha.nena cettha tattha gate sattasa"nkhaare vadati.  ^b^sabbe aniccaa tibhavaa upaddutaa^eb^ti sabbe kaamabhavaadayo tayo bhavaa  aniccaa ceva jaatiaadiihi raagaadiihi kilesehi upaddutaa pii.litaa ca,  na ettha ki~nci khema.t.thaana.m naama atthi, tadabhaavato kuhi.m gato, citta,  sukha.m ramissasi, tasmaa tato nissara.na~ncettha pariyesaahiiti  adhippaayo.
text.11222: [03] ^b^dhitippara^eb^nti ^a^M2.0476^ea^ dhitiparaaya.na.m parama.m thirabhaave .thita.m mama.m,  citta, ki.m kaahisi, tato iisakampi ma.m caaletu.m naasakkhissasiiti  attho. tenaaha ^b^``na te ala.m, citta, vasaanuvattako''^eb^ti.  idaani tamevattha.m paaka.tatara.m katvaa dassento ^b``na jaatu bhasta.m  ubhatomukha.m chupe ^a^V2.0402^ea^, dhiratthu puura.m navasotasandani''b^nti aaha. tattha  ^b^bhasta^eb^nti rutti.m. ^b^ubhatomukha^eb^nti puto.liyaa ubhatomukha.m.  ^b^na jaatu chupe^eb^ti eka.mseneva paadenaapi na chupeyya, tathaa  ^b^dhiratthu puura.m navasotasandani^eb^nti naanappakaarassa asucino puura.m  navahi sotehi va.namukhehi asucisandani.m savati.m. taaya vaccaku.tiyaa  dhii atthu, tassaa garahaa hotu.
text.11223: [03] eva.m a.t.thaviisatiyaa gaathaahi nigga.nhanavasena citta.m ovaditvaa  idaani viveka.t.thaanaacikkha.naadinaa sampaha.msento  ^b^``varaahae.neyyavigaa.lhasevite''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha  ^b^varaahae.neyyavigaa.lhasevite^eb^ti varaahehi ceva e.neyyehi ca  ogaahetvaa sevite. ^b^pabbhaaraku.t.te^eb^ti pabbhaara.t.thaane ceva pabbatasikhare  ca. ^b^pakateva sundare^eb^ti pakatiyaa eva sundare atittimanohare.  ``pakativasundhare''ti vaa paa.tho, paakatike bhuumipadeseti attho.  ^b^navambunaa paavusasittakaanane^eb^ti paavusavasena vu.t.thena meghodakena  upasittavasse sutheve vane. ^b^tahi.m guhaagehagato ramissasii^eb^ti  tasmi.m pabbatakaanane guhaasa"nkhaata.m geha.m upagato bhaavanaaratiyaa  abhiramissasi.
text.11224: [03] ^b^te ta.m ramessantii^eb^ti te mayuuraadayo vanasa~n~na.m uppaadentaa ta.m  ramessantiiti attho.
text.11225: [03] ^b^vu.t.thamhi deve^eb^ti meghe adhippavu.t.the. ^b^catura"ngule  ti.ne^eb^ti teneva gassodakapaatena tattha tattha ti.ne  surattava.n.nakambalasadise catura"ngule ^a^P3.0160^ea^ jaate.  ^b^sa.mpupphite meghanibhamhi kaanane^eb^ti paavusameghasa"nkaase kaanane  sammadeva pupphite. ^b^nagantare^eb^ti pabbatantare. ^b^vi.tapisamo  sayissa^eb^nti tarusadiso apariggaho hutvaa nipajjissa.m. ^b^ta.m me  muduu hehiti tuulasannibha^eb^nti ta.m ti.napaccatthara.na.m mudu sukhasamphassa.m  tuulasannibha.m tuulikasadisa.m sayana.m me bhavissati.
text.11226: [03] ^b^tathaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0477^ea^ ^b^tu kassaami yathaapi issaro^eb^ti  yathaa koci  issarapuriso attano vacanakaradaasaadi.m vase vatteti, ahampi, citta,  ta.m tathaa karissaami, mayha.m vase vattemiyeva. katha.m? ^b^ya.m labbhati  tenapi hotu me ala^eb^nti catuusu paccayesu ya.m yaadisa.m vaa taadisa.m vaa  labbhati, tena ca mayha.m ala.m pariyatta.m hotu. etena ida.m dasseti --  yasmaa idhekacce sattaa ta.nhuppaadahetu cittassa vase anuvattanti, aha.m  pana ta.nhuppaada.m duurato vajjento citta.m daasa.m viya karonto attano vase  vattemiiti. ^b^na taaha.m kassaami yathaa atandito, bi.laarabhasta.mva  yathaa sumaddita^eb^nti citta ta.nhuppaadaparivajjanahetu, puna tanti citta.m  aamasati, yathaa a~n~nopi koci sammappadhaanayogena bhaavanaaya  atandito attano citta.m kammakkhama.m, kammayogga.m karoti, tathaa  ahampi, citta, ta.m kammakkhama.m, kammayogga.m mayha.m vase vatta.m karissaami ^a^V2.0403^ea^.  yathaa ki.m? ^b^bi.laarabhasta.mva yathaa sumaddita.m, na^eb^iti nipaatamatta.m.  yathaa su.t.thu maddita.m bi.laarabhasta.m kammakkhama.m, kammayogga.m sukhena  parihara.niiya~nca hoti, tathaaha.m ta.m karissaami.
text.11227: [03] ^b^viiriyena ta.m mayha vasaanayissa^eb^nti, ambho citta, ta.m  attano viiriyena bhaavanaabala.m uppaadetvaa tena mayha.m vasa.m aanayissa.m.  ^b^gaja.mva matta.m kusala"nkusaggaho^eb^ti yathaa kusalo cheko a"nkusaggaho  hatthaacariyo attano sikkhaabalena mattahatthi.m attano vasa.m aaneti,  tathevaati attho.
text.11228: [03] ^b^tayaa sudantena ava.t.thitena hii^eb^ti ^b^hii^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m,  citta, samathavipassanaabhaavanaahi su.t.thu dantena tato eva sammadeva  vipassanaaviithi.m pa.tipannattaa ava.t.thitena tayaa. ^b^hayena  yoggaacariyova ujjunaa^eb^ti yathaa sudantena sudantattaa eva ujunaa  ava"nkagatinaa assaajaaniiyena yoggaacariyo assadammasaarathi  akhema.t.thaanato khemantabhuumi.m pa.tipajjitu.m sakkoti, eva.m ^b^pahomi magga.m  pa.tipajjitu.m siva^eb^nti asivabhaavakaraana.m kilesaana.m abhaavena siva.m.  ^b^cittaanurakkhiihii^eb^ti attano citta.m anurakkha.nasiilehi buddhaadiihi  sabbakaala.m sevita.m ariyamagga.m aha.m pa.tipajjitu.m adhigantu.m pahomi  sakkomiiti.
text.11229: [03] ^b^aaramma.ne^eb^ ^a^M2.0478^ea^ ^b^ta.m balasaa nibandhisa.m, naaga.mva  thambhamhi da.lhaaya^eb^  ^a^P3.0161^ea^ ^b^rajjuyaa^eb^ti yathaa hatthaacariyo mahaahatthi.m  aa.laanathambhe da.lhaaya thiraaya rajjuyaa nibandhati, evamaha.m, citta,  kamma.t.thaanaaramma.ne bhaavanaabalena nibandhissa.m. ^b^ta.m me sugutta.m satiyaa  subhaavita^eb^nti ta.m tva.m, citta, mama satiyaa sugutta.m subhaavita~nca hutvaa.  ^b^anissita.m sabbabhavesu hehisii^eb^ti ariyamaggabhaavanaadibalena  kaamabhavaadiisu sabbesupi bhavesu ta.nhaadinissayehi anissita.m  bhavissasi.
text.11230: [03] ^b^pa~n~naaya chetvaa vipathaanusaarina^eb^nti uppathagaamina.m  aayatanasamudaya.m yaathaavato disvaa yena samudayena uppathagaamii, tassa  kilesavissandana.m kilesavipphandita.m indriyasa.mvaruupanissayaaya  pa.tisa"nkhaanapa~n~naaya chinditvaa sotavicchedanavasena aavara.na.m katvaa.  ^b^yogena niggayhaa^eb^ti vipassanaabhaavanaasa"nkhaatena yogena  saamatthiyavidhamanena niggahetvaa. ^b^pathe nivesiyaa^eb^ti  vipassanaaviithiya.m nivesetvaa, pati.t.thapetvaa. yadaa pana vipassanaa  ussukkaapitaa maggena gha.t.teti, tadaa maggapa~n~naaya ``ya.mki~nci  samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti (mahaava0 16; sa.m0 ni0   5.1081) nidassanena sabbaso aayatanasamudayassa vibhava.m  sambhava~nca asammohato disvaa sadevake loke ^b^aggavaadino^eb^  sammaasambuddhassa ^b^daayaado^eb^ orasaputto ^b^hehisi^eb^ bhavissasiiti  attho.
text.11231: [03] ^b^catubbipallaasavasa.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0404^ea^ ^b^adhi.t.thita^eb^nti anicce niccanti, asubhe  subhanti, dukkhe sukhanti, anattani attaati imesa.m catunna.m vipallaasaana.m  vasa.m adhi.t.thita.m anuvattanta.m. ^b^gaama.n.dala.mva parinesi, citta,  ma^eb^nti, ambho citta, ma.m gaamadaaraka.m viya parika.d.dhasi, ito cito  parika.d.dhasi. ^b^nanu sa.myojanabandhanacchida^eb^nti  sa.myojanasa"nkhaataana.m dasanna.m bandhanaana.m chedaka.m ^b^kaaru.nika.m mahaamuni.m^eb^  sammaasambuddha.m sa.msevasi nanu, ``tathaaruupe mahaanubhaave duuratova vajjesi,  maadise pana tapassine yathaaruci parinesii''ti appasaadalesena satthaara.m  pasa.msati.
text.11232: [03] ^b^migo yathaa^eb^ti yathaa migo rukkhagacchalataadiihi su.t.thu  cittavicitte anaakule kaanane ^b^seri^eb^ saya.mvasii ramati. ^b^ramma.m  giri.m paavusaabbhamaalini^eb^nti eva.m paavusakaale samantato  sumaaliniihi thalajajalajamaalaahi samannaagatattaa ^a^M2.0479^ea^ abbhamaalini.m  janavivittataaya manoramataaya ca ramma.m pabbata.m labhitvaa tattha nage  ramissa.m, ^b^asa.msaya.m^eb^ eka.mseneva tva.m, citta, paraabhavissasi,  sa.msaarabyasanehi .thassasiiti attho.
text.11233: [03] ^b^ye tuyha chandena vasena vattino^eb^ti sabbe puthujjane  cittasaama~n~nena gahetvaa vadati. tassattho -- ^b^ye^eb^ naranaariyo,  ambho ^a^P3.0162^ea^ citta, tuyha.m ^b^chandena vasena^eb^ ruciyaa  .thitaa ^b^ya.m^eb^ gehanissita.m ^b^sukha.m anubhonti^eb^ anubhavissanti, te  ^b^aviddasuu^eb^ andhabaalaa, ^b^maaravasaanuvattino^eb^ kilesamaaraadiina.m  vase anuvattanasiilaa, ^b^bhavaabhinandii^eb^ kaamaadibhavameva  abhinandanato, tava saavakaa anusi.t.thikaraa. maya.m pana  sammaasambuddhassa saavakaa, na tuyha.m vase anuvattaamaati.
text.11234: [03] eva.m thero pubbe attano uppanna.m yonisomanasikaara.m cittassa  nigga.nhanavasena pavatta.m naanappakaarato vibhajitvaa samiipe .thitaana.m  bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanavasena dhamma.m kathesi. ya.m panettha antarantaraa  atthato na vibhatta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanatthamevaati.
text.11239: [03] sa.t.thinipaate ^a^M2.0480^ea^ ^a^V2.0405^ea^ ^b^aara~n~nikaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  mahaamoggallaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? tassa vatthu  dhammasenaapativatthumhi vuttameva. thero hi pabbajitadivasato sattame  divase magadhara.t.the kallavaalagaamaka.m upanissaaya sama.nadhamma.m karonto  thinamiddhe okkante satthaaraa -- ``moggallaana, moggallaana, maa,  braahma.na, ariya.m tu.nhiibhaava.m pamaado''tiaadinaa (sa.m0 ni0   2.235) sa.mvejito thinamiddha.m vinodetvaa bhagavataa vuccamaana.m  dhaatukamma.t.thaana.m su.nanto eva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa  uparimaggattaya.m upagantvaa aggaphalakkha.ne saavakapaaramii~naa.nassa matthaka.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.375-397) --
text.1124: [03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^M1.0129^ea^ ^b^iddhiyaa sarabhu^eb^nti aayasmato gavampatittherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro ito ekati.mse  kappe sikhi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa pasannamaanaso pupphehi puuja.m akaasi.  so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke uppanno aparaapara.m pu~n~naani karonto  ko.naagamanassa bhagavato cetiye chatta~nca vedika~nca kaaresi.  kassapassa pana bhagavato kaale a~n~natarasmi.m kulagehe nibbatto.  tasmi~nca kule bahu.m goma.n.dala.m ahosi. ta.m gopaalakaa rakkhanti.  aya.m tattha antarantaraa yuttappayutta.m vicaarento vicarati. so eka.m  khii.naasavatthera.m gaame pi.n.daaya caritvaa bahigaame devasika.m ekasmi.m  padese bhattakicca.m karonta.m disvaa ``ayyo suuriyaatapena  kilamissatii''ti cintetvaa cattaaro siriisada.n.de ussaapetvaa tesa.m  upari siriisasaakhaayo .thapetvaa saakhaama.n.dapa.m katvaa adaasi.  ``ma.n.dapassa samiipe siriisarukkha.m ropesii''ti ca vadanti. tassa  anukampaaya devasika.m thero tattha nisiidi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  tato cavitvaa caatumahaaraajikesu nibbatti. tassa purimakammasa.msuucaka.m  vimaanadvaare mahanta.m siriisavana.m nibbatti va.n.nagandhasampannehi a~n~nehi  pupphehi sabbakaale upasobhayamaana.m, tena ta.m vimaana.m ``seriisaka''nti  pa~n~naayittha. so devaputto eka.m buddhantara.m devesu ca manussesu ca  sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade yasattherassa catuusu ^a^P1.0110^ea^  gihisahaayesu ^b^gavampati^eb^ naama hutvaa aayasmato yasassa  pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa attano sahaayehi saddhi.m bhagavato santika.m  agamaasi ^a^V1.0109^ea^. satthaa tassa dhamma.m desesi. so desanaavasaane sahaayehi  saddhi.m arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.53.42-47) --
text.11251: [22] obhaasento disaa sabbaa, bhavana.m me upaagami..
text.11263: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.11280: [21] ``asmimaana.m ^a^M2.0482^ea^ na passaami, maano mayha.m na vijjati.
text.11285: [03] atha na.m satthaa aparabhaage jetavanamahaavihaare ariyaga.namajjhe  nisinno tena tena gu.nena attano saavake etadagge .thapento  ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m iddhimantaana.m yadida.m  mahaamoggallaano''ti (a0 ni0  1.188, 190) iddhimantataaya  etadagge .thapesi. tena eva.m satthaaraa etadagge .thapitena  saavakapaaramiyaa matthaka.m pattena mahaatherena ta.m ta.m nimitta.m aagamma tattha  tattha bhaasitaa gaathaa, taa sa"ngiitikaale dhammasa"ngaahakehi --

text.11510: [03] ^b^upasanta.m uparata^eb^ntiaadikaa pa~nca gaathaa raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya  pavisanta.m mahaakassapatthera.m disvaa ``kaa.laka.n.nii mayaa di.t.thaa''ti  oloketvaa .thita.m saariputtattherassa bhaagineyya.m micchaadi.t.thibraahma.na.m  disvaa tassa anukampaaya ``aya.m braahma.no maa nassii''ti  ariyuupavaadapa.tighaatattha.m ``thera.m vandaahii''ti ta.m uyyojentena vuttaa.  tattha ^b^jaatisata.m gacche^eb^ti jaatiina.m sata.m upagaccheyya.  ^b^sottiyo^eb^ti sottiyajaatiko. ^b^vedasampanno^eb^ti ~naa.nasampanno.  ^b^etassaa^eb^ti therassa. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- ^b^yo^eb^  puggalo uditoditaa asambhinnaa satabraahma.najaatiyo anupa.tipaa.tiyaa  uppajjanavasena upagaccheyya, tattha ca braahma.naana.m vijjaasu nipphatti.m gato  ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu siyaa braahma.navatta~nca puurento, tasseta.m  vijjaadianu.t.thaana.m etassa mahaakassapattherassa vandanaaya  vandanaamayapu~n~nassa so.lasi.m kala.m naagghati, vandanaamayapu~n~nameva tato  mahantataranti.
text.11511: [03] ^b^a.t.tha^eb^ ^a^V2.0415^ea^ ^b^vimokkhaanii^eb^ti ruupajjhaanaadike a.t.tha vimokkhe.  bhaavanaavasena hi laddhaani ruupajjhaanaani paccaniikadhammehi su.t.thu vimuttata.m  abhirativasena aaramma.ne niraasa"nga~nca pavatti.m upaadaaya  ``vimokkhaanii''ti vuccanti. nirodhasamaapatti pana paccaniikadhammehi  vimuttattaa eva. idha pana jhaanameva veditabba.m.  ^b^anuloma.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0492^ea^ ^b^pa.tiloma^eb^nti pa.thamajjhaanato pa.t.thaaya  yaava nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaa  anuloma.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanato pa.t.thaaya yaava pa.thamajjhaanaa  pa.tiloma.m. ^b^purebhatta^eb^nti bhattakiccato pureyeva.  ^b^aphassayii^eb^ti anekaakaaravokaaraa samaapattiyo samaapajji.  ^b^tato pi.n.daaya gacchatii^eb^ti tato samaapattito vu.t.thaaya, tato vaa  samaapattisamaapajjitato pacchaa idaani pi.n.daaya gacchatiiti tadahu pavatta.m  therassa pa.tipatti.m sandhaaya vadati. thero pana divase divase tatheva  pa.tipajjati.

text.11513: [03] ^b^neso passatii^eb^tiaadikaa dve gaathaa po.t.thila.m naama bhikkhu.m  sammaa apa.tipajjanta.m micchaajiivakata.m disvaa codanaavasena vuttaa.  tattha ^b^neso passati saddhamma^eb^nti eso po.t.thilo bhikkhu sata.m  buddhaadiina.m dhamma.m maggaphalanibbaana.m na passati. kasmaa?  ^b^sa.msaarena purakkhato^eb^ sa.msaarabandhanaavijjaadinaa purakkhato apaayesu  nibbattanato ^b^adhogama.m^eb^ he.t.thaagaami.m maayaasaa.theyyaanugatattaa  ^b^jimhapatha.m^eb^ micchaamaggabhaavato ^b^kummagga^eb^bhuuta.m micchaajiiva.m  ^b^anudhaavati^eb^ anuparivattati.
text.11514: [03] ^b^kimiiva mii.lhasallitto^eb^ti guuthakimii viya mii.lhena  samantato litto kilesaasucivimissite ^b^sa"nkhaare adhimucchito^eb^  ajjhaapanno. ^b^pagaa.lho laabhasakkaare^eb^ti laabhe ca sakkaare ca  ta.nhaavasena pakaarato gaa.lho ogaa.lho. ^b^tuccho gacchati  po.t.thilo^eb^ti adhisiilasikkhaabhaavato tuccho asaaro hutvaa po.t.thilo  bhikkhu gacchati pavattati.
text.11515: [03] ^b^ima~nca^eb^ ^a^M2.0493^ea^ ^a^V2.0416^ea^ ^b^passaa^eb^tiaadikaa dve  gaathaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m  pasa.msantena vuttaa. tattha ^b^ima~nca passaa^eb^ti aayasmanta.m  saariputtatthera.m disvaa pasannamaanaso attano citta.m aalapati.  ^b^sudassana^eb^nti asekkhaana.m siilakkhandhaana~nceva paaripuuriyaa  saavakapaaramii~naa.nassa ca paaripuuriyaa sundaradassana.m. ^b^vimutta.m  ubhatobhaage^eb^ti ubhatobhaagato vimuttattaa ubhatobhaagavimutta.m ubhatobhaageti  aruupasamaapattiyaa ruupakaayato, maggena naamakaayato, yathaaraha.m tehiyeva  vikkhambhanasamucchedabhaagehi vimuttanti attho. sabbaso raagasallaadiina.m  abhaavena ^b^visalla.m^eb^ kaamaadiyogaana.m sammadeva khii.nattaa  ^b^khii.nasa.myoga.m^eb^ suparisuddhassa vijjaattayassa adhigatattaa  ^b^tevijja.m^eb^ maccuraajassa bha~njitattaa ^b^maccuhaayina.m^eb^ passaati  yojanaa.
text.11516: [03] ^b^ete sambahulaa^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa aayasmataa saariputtattherena  mahaamoggallaanatthera.m pasa.msantena vuttaa. tattha ^b^puujito naradevenaa^eb^ti  narehi ca devehi ca paramaaya puujaaya ^a^P3.0171^ea^ puujito.  ^b^uppanno mara.naabhibhuu^eb^ti loke uppanno hutvaa mara.na.m abhibhavitvaa  .thito. atha vaa ^b^puujito naradevena^eb^ sammaasambuddhena kaara.nabhuutena  ariyaaya jaatiyaa uppanno. sammaasambuddho hi pa.thama.m kammunaa naro  manusso hutvaa pacchaapi ariyaaya jaatiyaa uttamo devo devaatidevo  ahosi, tasmaa ``naradevo''ti vuccati. puujito naradevena bhagavataa  pasa.msaavasena uppanno mara.naabhibhuute loke uppanno hutvaa mara.naabhibhuu  maccuhaayii. ^b^pu.n.dariika.mva toyena^eb^ udakena pu.n.dariika.m viya  sa"nkhaaragate ta.nhaadi.t.thilepena na upalimpati, katthacipi anissitoti  attho.
text.11517: [03] ^b^yassaa^eb^ti yena. ^b^muhutte^eb^ti kha.namatte kaale.  ^b^sahassadhaa^eb^ti sahassapakaaro. ^b^loko^eb^ti okaasaloko.  aya~nhettha attho -- yena mahiddhikena aayasmataa mahaamoggallaanena  sahassilokadhaatu kha.neneva sammadeva vidito, paccakkhato ~naato  ^b^sabrahmakappo^eb^ mahaabrahmasadiso aavajjanaadivasiibhaavappattiyaa  iddhisampadaaya cutuupapaate ca vasii. ^b^kaale passatii^eb^ti tadanuruupe  kaale dibbena cakkhunaa devataa passatiiti.
text.11518: [03] ^b^saariputtovaa^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa aayasmataa mahaamoggallaanena  attano gu.ne pakaasentena vuttaa. tattha ^b^saariputtovaa^eb^ti gaathaaya  ^a^M2.0494^ea^ aya.m sa"nkhepattho -- ^b^pa~n~naaya^eb^ pa~n~naasampadaaya, ^b^siilena^eb^  siilasampattiyaa, ^b^upasamena^eb^ kilesavuupasamena, yo bhikkhu  ^b^paara"ngato^eb^ paara.m pariyanta.m ukka.msa.m gato so saariputto saavakehi  pa~n~naadiihi gu.nehi paramukka.msagato. pa~n~naaya siilena hi paramukka.msagato.  ^b^etaavaparamo siyaa^eb^ etaparamo eva, natthi tato uttariiti.  ima.m pana thero yathaa saariputto pa~n~naaya uttamo, tathaa aha.m samaadhinaa  uttamoti diipetu.m avoca. tenevaaha  ^b^``ko.tisatasahassassaa^eb^''tiaadi.
text.11519: [03] tattha ^a^V2.0417^ea^ ^b^kha.nena nimmine^eb^ti kha.neneva  ko.tisatasahassaattabhaava.m nimmineyya nimmitu.m samattho. tassa  nimminane na mayha.m bhaaro atthi. ^b^vikubbanaasu kusalo,  vasiibhuutomhi iddhiyaa^eb^ti na kevala.m manomayavikubbanaasu eva,  sabbaayapi iddhiyaa vasiibhaavappatto amhi.
text.1152: [03] ^b^sattiyaa^eb^ ^a^M1.0133^ea^ ^a^P1.0113^ea^ ^b^viya oma.t.tho^eb^ti  aayasmato va.d.dhamaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi kira  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro ito dvenavute kappe tissassa bhagavato kaale  kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto tissa.m bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m  disvaa pasannamaanaso suparipakkaani va.n.tato muttaani ambaphalaani  adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m  pu~n~nakammaani upacinanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m  licchaviraajakule nibbatti, ^b^va.d.dhamaano^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi.  so vayappatto saddho pasanno daayako daanarato kaarako sa"nghupa.t.thaako  hutvaa tathaaruupe aparaadhe satthaaraa pattanikkujjanakamme kaaraapite aggi.m  akkanto viya sa"ngha.m khamaapetvaa kamma.m pa.tippassambhetvaa sa~njaatasa.mvego  pabbaji, pabbajitvaa pana ^a^V1.0112^ea^ thinamiddhaabhibhuuto vihaasi. ta.m satthaa  sa.mvejento ^b^``sattiyaa viya oma.t.tho''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.
text.11520: [03] ^b^samaadhivijjaavasipaaramiigato^eb^ti  savitakkasavicaaraadisamaadhiisu ceva pubbenivaasa~naa.naadivijjaasu ca  vasiibhaavena paarami.m ko.ti.m patto asi. tassa  ta.nhaanissayaadirahitassa satthu saasane yathaavuttehi gu.nehi ukka.msagato.  dhitisampannataaya ^b^dhiiro, moggallaanagotto^eb^ moggallaano, su.t.thu  .thapitaindriyataaya ^b^samaahitindriyo,^eb^ yathaa hatthinaago  puutilataabandhana.m sukheneva chindati, eva.m sakala.m kilesabandhana.m  samucchindi evaati.
text.11521: [03] ^b^kiidiso^eb^ ^a^P3.0172^ea^ ^b^nirayo  aasii^eb^tiaadayo gaathaa ko.t.tha.m anupavisitvaa nikkhamitvaa .thitamaara.m  tajjentena therena vuttaa. tattha ^b^kiidiso^eb^ti ki.mpakaaro.  ^b^yattha dussii^eb^ti yasmi.m niraye ``dussii''ti eva.mnaamo maaro.  ^b^apaccathaa^eb^ti nirayagginaa apacci. ^b^vidhura.m saavaka^eb^nti  vidhura.m naama kakusandhassa bhagavato aggasaavaka.m. ^b^aasajjaa^eb^ti  gha.t.tayitvaa baadhitvaa. ^b^kakusandha~nca braahma.na^eb^nti kakusandha~nca  sammaasambuddha.m aasajjaati attho. bhagavanta.m uddissa kumaara.m  aavisitvaa maarena khittaa sakkharaa therassa siise pati.
text.11522: [03] ^b^sata.m aasi ayosa"nkuu^eb^ti tasmi.m kira niraye upapannaana.m  tigaavuto attabhaavo hoti, dussiimaarassaapi taadisova ahosi.  atha nirayapaalaa taalakkhandhappamaa.naana.m ayosuulaana.m aadittaana.m  sampajjalitaana.m sajotibhuutaana.m satameva gahetvaa ``imasmi.mva te .thaane  .thitena ^a^M2.0495^ea^ hadayena cintetvaa paapa.m kata''nti sudhaado.niya.m sudha.m ko.t.tentaa  viya hadayamajjha.m ko.t.tetvaa pa.n.naasa janaa paadaabhimukhaa, pa.n.naasa janaa  siisaabhimukhaa ko.t.tentaa gacchanti, eva.m gacchantaa ca pa~ncahi  vassasatehi ubho ante patvaa puna nivattamaanaa pa~ncahi vassasatehi  hadayamajjha.m upagacchanti, ta.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``sata.m aasi ayosa"nkuu''ti.  ^b^sabbe paccattavedanaa^eb^ti sayameva paa.tiyekkavedanaajanakaa. saa  kira vedanaa mahaanirayavedanaato dukkhataraa hoti, yathaa hi  sinehapaanasattaahato parihaarasattaaha.m dukkhatara.m, eva.m mahaanirayadukkhato  ussade vu.t.thaanavedanaa dukkhataraa. ^b^iidiso nirayo aasii^eb^ti  imasmi.m .thaane devaduutasuttena (a0 ni0  3.36; ma0 ni0  3.261) nirayo diipetabbo.
text.11523: [03] ^b^yo etamabhijaanaatii^eb^ti yo mahaabhi~n~no eta.m kammaphala~nca  hatthatale .thapitaaamalaka.m viya abhimukha.m ^a^V2.0418^ea^ katvaa paccakkhato jaanaati.  ^b^bhikkhu buddhassa saavako^eb^ti bhinnakileso bhikkhu  sammaasambuddhassa saavako. ^b^ka.nha, dukkha.m nigacchasii^eb^ti  ekantakaa.lakehi paapadhammehi samannaagatattaa, ka.nha maara, dukkha.m  vindissasi.
text.11524: [03] ^b^majjhesarasmi^eb^nti mahaasamuddassa majjhe kira udaka.m vatthu.m  katvaa nibbattavimaanaani kappa.t.thitikaani honti. tenaaha  ^b^``vimaanaa kappa.thaayino''^eb^ti. tesa.m ve.luriyassa viya va.n.no  hoti, pabbatamatthake jalitana.laggikhandho viya ca etesa.m acciyo  jotanti, tena te ativiya pabhassaraa pabhaasampannaa honti. tenaaha  ^b^``ve.luriyava.n.naa ruciraa, accimanto pabhassaraa''^eb^ti. ^b^puthu^eb^  ^a^P3.0173^ea^ ^b^naanattava.n.niyo^eb^ti niilaadivasena  naanattava.n.naa bahuu accharaa ^b^tattha^eb^ tesu vimaanesu naccanti.
text.11525: [03] ^b^yo etamabhijaanaatii^eb^ti yo eta.m vimaana.m vatthu.m paccakkha.m  katvaa jaanaati. aya~nhi attho vimaanapetavatthuuhi diipetabbo.
text.11526: [03] ^b^buddhena codito^eb^ti sammaasambuddhena codito uyyojito.  ^b^bhikkhusa"nghassa pekkhato^eb^ti mahato bhikkhusa"nghassa passantassa.  ^b^migaaramaatupaasaada.m paada"ngu.t.thena kampayii^eb^ti (ma0 ni0 1.513)  pubbaaraame visaakhaaya mahaaupaasikaaya kaarita.m sahassagabbhapa.tima.n.dita.m  mahaapaasaada.m attano paada"ngu.t.thena kampesi.m. ekasmi~nhi samaye pubbaaraame  yathaavuttapaasaade bhagavati ^a^M2.0496^ea^ viharante sambahulaa navakataraa bhikkhuu  uparipaasaade nisinnaa satthaarampi acintetvaa tiracchaanakatha.m  kathetumaaraddhaa, ta.m sutvaa bhagavaa te sa.mvejetvaa attano dhammadesanaaya  bhaajanabhuute kaatukaamo aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaanatthera.m aamantesi --  ``passasi tva.m, moggallaana, nave bhikkhuu tiracchaanakathamanuyutte''ti.  ta.m sutvaa thero satthu ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa abhi~n~naapaadaka.m  aapokasi.naaramma.na.m catutthajjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa vu.t.thaaya ``paasaadassa  pati.t.thitokaasa.m udaka.m hotuu''ti adhi.t.thaaya paasaadamatthake thuupika.m  paada"ngu.t.thena pahari, paasaado onamitvaa ekena passena a.t.thaasi. punapi  pahari, aparena passena a.t.thaasi. te bhikkhuu bhiitaa sa.mviggaa  paasaadassa patanabhayena tato nikkhamitvaa bhagavato samiipe a.t.tha.msu.  satthaa tesa.m ajjhaasaya.m oloketvaa dhamma.m deseti. ta.m sutvaa tesu  keci sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.msu, keci sakadaagaamiphale, keci  anaagaamiphale, keci arahattaphale pati.t.thahi.msu. svaayamattho  paasaadakampanasuttena diipetabbo.
text.11527: [03] ^b^vejayantapaasaada^eb^nti so vejayantapaasaado taavati.msabhavane  yojanasahassubbedho anekasahassaniyyuuhakuu.taagaarapa.tima.n.dito  devaasurasa"ngaame asure jinitvaa sakke devaanaminde nagaramajjhe ^a^V2.0419^ea^ .thite  u.t.thito vijayantena nibbattattaa ``vejayanto''ti laddhanaamo paasaado,  ta.m sandhaayaaha ``vejayantapaasaada''nti. tampi hi aya.m thero  paada"ngu.t.thena kampesi. ekasmi~nhi samaye bhagavanta.m pubbaaraame viharanta.m  sakko devaraajaa upasa"nkamitvaa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m pucchi. tassa  bhagavaa vissajjeti. so ta.m sutvaa attamano pamudito abhivaadetvaa  padakkhi.na.m katvaa attano devalokameva gato. athaayasmaa  mahaamoggallaano eva.m cintesi -- ``aya.m sakko bhagavanta.m  upasa"nkamitvaa evaruupa.m gambhiira.m nibbaanapa.tisa.myutta.m pa~nha.m pucchi,  bhagavataa ca pa~nho vissajjito, kinnu kho jaanitvaa gato, udaahu  ajaanitvaa? ya.mnuunaaha.m ^a^P3.0174^ea^ devaloka.m gantvaa tamattha.m  jaaneyya''nti. so taavadeva taavati.msabhavana.m gantvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m  tamattha.m pucchi. sakko dibbasampattiyaa pamatto hutvaa vikkhepa.m  akaasi. thero tassa sa.mvegajananattha.m vejayantapaasaada.m paada"ngu.t.thena  kampesi. tena vutta.m --
text.1153: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^bhavaraagappahaanaayaa^eb^ti bhavaraagassa  ruuparaagassa aruuparaagassa ca pajahanatthaaya. yadipi  ajjhattasa.myojanaani appahaaya bahiddhasa.myojanaana.m pahaana.m naama natthi,  naanantarikabhaavato pana uddhambhaagiyasa.myojanappahaanavacanena  orambhaagiyasa.myojanappahaanampi vuttameva hoti. yasmaa vaa  samucchinnorambhaagiyasa.myojanaanampi kesa~nci ariyaana.m  uddhambhaagiyasa.myojanaani duppaheyyaani honti, tasmaa suppaheyyato  duppaheyyameva dassento bhagavaa bhavaraagappahaanasiisena sabbassaapi  uddhambhaagiyasa.myojanassa pahaanamaaha. therassa eva vaa  ajjhaasayavaseneva.m vutta.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva.
text.11530: [03] aya.m panattho cuu.lata.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttisuttena (ma0 ni0  1.390 aadayo) diipetabbo. kampitaakaaro he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.
text.11531: [03] ^b^sakka.m so paripucchatii^eb^ti yathaavuttameva therassa  ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttipuccha.m sandhaaya vutta.m. tenaaha ^b^``api,  aavuso, jaanaasi, ta.nhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^''ti. ^b^tassa sakko  viyaakaasii^eb^ti ida.m therena paasaadakampane kate sa.mviggahadayena pamaada.m  pahaaya yoniso manasi karitvaa pa~nhassa byaakatabhaava.m sandhaaya vutta.m.  satthaaraa desitaniyaameneva hi so tadaa kathesi. tenaaha ``pa~nha.m  pu.t.tho yathaatatha''nti. tattha ^b^sakka.m so paripucchatii^eb^ti sakka.m  devaraaja.m so moggallaanatthero satthaaraa desitaaya  ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttiyaa sammadeva gahitabhaava.m pucchi. atiitatthe hi  ida.m vattamaanavacana.m. ^b^api, aavuso, jaanaasii^eb^ti, aavuso, api  jaanaasi, ki.m jaanaasi? ^b^ta.nhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^ti yathaa  ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttiyo satthaaraa tuyha.m desitaa, tathaa ki.m jaanaasiiti  pucchi. ^b^ta.nhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^ti vaa ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttisuttassa  desana.m pucchati.
text.11532: [03] ^b^brahmaana^eb^nti mahaabrahmaana.m. ^b^sudhammaaya.m .thito sabha^eb^nti  sudhammaaya sabhaaya. aya.m pana brahmaloke sudhammasabhaava, na  taavati.msabhavane, sudhammasabhaavirahito devaloko naama natthi.  ^b^ajjaapi tyaavuso, saa di.t.thi, yaa te di.t.thi pure ahuu^eb^ti ima.m  brahmaloka.m upagantu.m samattho natthi koci ^a^V2.0420^ea^ sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa,  satthu idhaagamanato pubbe yaa tuyha.m di.t.thi ahosi, ki.m ajjaapi  idaanipi saa di.t.thi na vigataati? ^b^passasi viitivattanta.m,  brahmaloke pabhassara^eb^nti brahmaloke viitipatanta.m  mahaakappinamahaakassapaadiihi saavakehi parivaaritassa tejodhaatu.m  samaapajjitvaa nisinnassa sasaavakassa bhagavato obhaasa.m passasiiti  attho. ekasmi~nhi samaye bhagavaa brahmaloke sudhammaaya sabhaaya  sannipatitvaa sannisinnassa -- ``atthi nu kho koci sama.no vaa  braahma.no vaa eva.mmahiddhiko, yo idha aagantu.m sakku.neyyaa''ti  cintentassa brahmuno ^a^M2.0498^ea^ cittama~n~naaya tattha gantvaa brahmuno matthake aakaase  nisinno tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa obhaasa.m mu~ncanto  mahaamoggallaanaadiina.m aagamana.m cintesi. saha cintanena tepi tattha  gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa satthu ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa tejodhaatu.m ^a^P3.0175^ea^  samaapajjitvaa paccekadisaasu nisiiditvaa obhaasa.m  vissajjitvaa sakalabrahmaloko ekobhaaso ahosi. satthaa brahmuno  kallacittata.m ~natvaa catusaccapakaasana.m dhamma.m desesi. desanaapariyosaane  anekaani brahmasahassaani maggaphalesu pati.t.thahi.msu, ta.m sandhaaya codento  ^b^``ajjaapi tyaavuso, saa di.t.thii''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. aya.m panattho  bakabrahmasuttena diipetabbo. vutta~nheta.m (sa.m0 ni0  1.176) --
text.11533: [02] ``eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane  anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa  brahmuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- `natthi so sama.no  vaa braahma.no vaa, yo idha aagaccheyyaa'ti. atha kho bhagavaa tassa  brahmuno cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso  sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva  jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho bhagavaa  tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa.
text.11534: [02] ``atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi  -- `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa  mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m  tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso  sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva  jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa  mahaamoggallaano puratthima.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno ^a^M2.0499^ea^ uparivehaasa.m  palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.
text.11535: [02] ``atha ^a^V2.0421^ea^ kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa etadahosi --  `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa  mahaakassapo bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m.  disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane  antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa  mahaakassapo dakkhi.na.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m  palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.
text.11536: [02] ``atha kho aayasmato mahaakappinassa etadahosi --  `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa  mahaakappino bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m.  disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane  antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa  mahaakappino pacchima.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno. uparivehaasa.m  palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.
text.11537: [02] ``atha kho aayasmato anuruddhassa etadahosi --  `kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii'ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa  anuruddho bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena  tassa brahmuno uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m.  disvaana seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane  antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi ^a^P3.0176^ea^. atha  kho aayasmaa anuruddho uttara.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno  uparivehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m  bhagavato. atha ^a^M2.0500^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m brahmaana.m gaathaaya  ajjhabhaasi --
text.11538: [21] ``ajjaapi te aavuso saa di.t.thi, yaa te di.t.thi pure  ahu.
text.11540: [21] ``na me maarisa saa di.t.thi, yaa me di.t.thi pure ahu.
text.11542: [22] svaaha.m ajja katha.m vajja.m, aha.m niccomhi sassato''ti..
text.11543: [02] ``atha kho bhagavaa ta.m brahmaana.m sa.mvejetvaa seyyathaapi  naama balavaa puriso...pe0... ^a^V2.0422^ea^ evameva tasmi.m brahmaloke antarahito  jetavane paaturahosi. atha kho so brahmaa a~n~natara.m brahmapaarisajja.m  aamantesi -- `ehi tva.m, maarisa, yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano  tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m eva.m vadehi  `atthi nu kho maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa bhagavato saavakaa  eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa seyyathaapi bhava.m moggallaano, kassapo,  kappino, anuruddho'''ti. ``eva.m, maarisaa''ti kho so  brahmapaarisajjo tassa brahmuno pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano  tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca --  ``atthi nu kho, maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa bhagavato saavakaa  eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa seyyathaapi bhava.m moggallaano, kassapo,  kappino, anuruddho''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m  brahmapaarisajja.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
text.11546: [02] ``atha kho so brahmapaarisajjo aayasmato  mahaamoggallaanassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa yena so brahmaa  tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m brahmaana.m etadavoca -- aayasmaa,  maarisa mahaamoggallaano evamaaha --
text.11549: [02] ``idamavoca so brahmapaarisajjo. attamano ca so  brahmaa tassa brahmapaarisajjassa bhaasita.m abhinandii''ti.
text.11550: [03] ida.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``aya.m panattho bakabrahmasuttena diipetabbo''ti.
text.11551: [03] ^b^mahaaneruno kuu.ta^eb^nti kuu.tasiisena sakalameva  sinerupabbataraaja.m vadati. ^b^vimokkhena aphassayii^eb^ti  jhaanavimokkhanissayena abhi~n~naa.nena phassayiiti adhippaayo.  ^b^vana^eb^nti jambudiipa.m. so hi vanabahulataaya ``vana''nti vutto.  tenaaha ``jambusa.n.dassa issaro''ti. ^b^pubbavidehaana^eb^nti  pubbavideha.t.thaana.m, pubbavidehanti attho. ^b^ye ca bhuumisayaa naraa^eb^ti  bhuumisayaa naraa naama ^a^P3.0177^ea^ aparagoyaanakaa ca  uttarakurukaa ca manussaa. te hi gehaabhaavato ``bhuumisayaa''ti vuttaa.  tepi sabbe aphassayiiti sambandho. aya.m panattho  nandopanandadamanena (visuddhi0 2.396 nandopanandanaagadamanakathaa)  diipetabbo --
text.11552: [03] ``ekasmi.m ^a^V2.0423^ea^ kira samaye anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavato  dhammadesana.m sutvaa `sve, bhante, pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m mayha.m gehe  bhikkha.m ga.nhathaa'ti nimantetvaa pakkaami. ta.mdivasa~nca bhagavato  paccuusasamaye dasasahassilokadhaatu.m olokentassa ^b^nandopanando^eb^  naama naagaraajaa ~naa.namukhe aapaatha.m aagacchi. bhagavaa `aya.m naagaraajaa  mayha.m ~naa.namukhe aapaatha.m aagacchati, ki.m nu kho bhavissatii'ti  aavajjento sara.nagamanassa upanissaya.m disvaa `aya.m micchaadi.t.thiko  tiisu ratanesu appasanno, ko nu kho ima.m micchaadi.t.thito  vimoceyyaa'ti aavajjento mahaamoggallaanatthera.m addasa.
text.11553: [03] ``tato pabhaataaya rattiyaa sariirapa.tijaggana.m katvaa aayasmanta.m  aananda.m aamantesi -- `aananda, pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m aarocehi  tathaagato devacaarika.m gacchatii'ti. ta.mdivasa~nca nandopanandassa  aapaanabhuumi.m sajjayi.msu. so dibbaratanapalla"nke dibbena setacchattena  dhaariyamaano tividhanaa.takehi ceva naagaparisaaya ca parivuto  dibbabhaajanesu upa.t.thaapita.m annapaanavidhi.m ^a^M2.0502^ea^ olokayamaano nisinno hoti.  atha kho bhagavaa yathaa naagaraajaa passati, tathaa katvaa tassa  vimaanamatthakeneva pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m  taavati.msadevalokaabhimukho paayaasi.
text.11554: [03] ``tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa naagaraajassa evaruupa.m  paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- `ime hi naama mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa  amhaaka.m uparibhavanena devaana.m taavati.msaana.m bhavana.m pavisantipi  nikkhamantipi, na idaani ito pa.t.thaaya imesa.m amhaaka.m matthake paadapa.msu.m  okirantaana.m gantu.m dassaamii'ti u.t.thaaya sinerupaada.m gantvaa ta.m attabhaava.m  vijahitvaa sineru.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa upari pha.na.m  katvaa taavati.msabhavana.m avakujjena pha.nena pa.tiggahetvaa adassana.m gamesi.
text.11555: [03] ``atha kho aayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `pubbe,  bhante, imasmi.m padese .thito sineru.m passaami, sineruparibha.n.da.m  passaami, taavati.msa.m passaami, vejayanta.m passaami, vejayantassa  paasaadassa upari dhaja.m passaami. ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko  paccayo, ya.m etarahi neva sineru.m passaami...pe0... na vejayantassa  paasaadassa upari dhaja.m passaamii'ti? aya.m, ra.t.thapaala, nandopanando  naama naagaraajaa tumhaaka.m kupito sineru.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi  parikkhipitvaa upari pha.nena pa.ticchaadetvaa andhakaara.m katvaa .thitoti.  `damemi ^a^P3.0178^ea^ na.m, bhante'ti. na bhagavaa na.m  anujaani. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddiyo aayasmaa raahuloti anukkamena  sabbepi bhikkhuu u.t.thahi.msu. na bhagavaa anujaani.
text.11556: [03] ``avasaane ^a^V2.0424^ea^ mahaamoggallaanatthero `aha.m, bhante, damemi na'nti  aaha. `damehi, moggallaanaa'ti bhagavaa anujaani. thero attabhaava.m  vijahitvaa mahanta.m naagaraajava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa nandopananda.m  cuddasakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa tassa pha.nassa matthake attano  pha.na.m .thapetvaa sinerunaa saddhi.m abhinippii.lesi. naagaraajaa dhuumaayi.  thero `na tuyha.myeva sariire dhuumo atthi, mayhampi atthii'ti dhuumaayi.  naagaraajassa dhuumo thera.m na baadhati. therassa pana dhuumo naagaraaja.m  baadhati. tato naagaraajaa pajjali. theropi `na tuyha.myeva sariire  aggi atthi, mayhampi atthii'ti pajjali. naagaraajassa tejo thera.m  na baadhati, therassa pana tejo naagaraaja.m baadhati. naagaraajaa `aya.m  ma.m sinerunaa abhinippii.letvaa dhuumaayati ceva ^a^M2.0503^ea^ pajjalati caa'ti  cintetvaa, `bho, tuva.m kosii'ti pa.tipucchi. aha.m kho, nanda,  moggallaanoti. bhante, attano bhikkhubhaavena ti.t.thaahii''ti.
text.11557: [03] ``thero ta.m attabhaava.m vijahitvaa tassa dakkhi.naka.n.nasotena  pavisitvaa vaamaka.n.nasotena nikkhami, vaamaka.n.nasotena pavisitvaa  dakkhi.naka.n.nasotena nikkhami. tathaa dakkhi.nanaasasotena  pavisitvaa vaamanaasasotena nikkhami, vaamanaasasotena pavisitvaa  dakkhi.nanaasasotena nikkhami. tato naagaraajaa mukha.m vivari.  thero mukhena pavisitvaa antokucchiya.m paaciinena ca pacchimena ca  ca"nkamati. bhagavaa `moggallaana, manasi karohi mahiddhiko naago'ti  aaha. thero `mayha.m kho, bhante, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa  bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa,  ti.t.thatu, bhante, nandopanando, aha.m nandopanandasadisaana.m naagaraajaana.m  satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya'nti aaha.
text.11558: [03] ``naagaraajaa cintesi -- `pavisanto taava me na di.t.tho,  nikkhamanakaale daani na.m daa.thaantare pakkhipitvaa sa"nkhaadissaamii'ti  cintetvaa `nikkhamatha, bhante, maa ma.m antokucchiya.m aparaapara.m  ca"nkamanto baadhayitthaa'ti aaha. thero nikkhamitvaa bahi a.t.thaasi.  naagaraajaa `aya.m so'ti disvaa naasavaata.m vissajji. thero  catutthajjhaana.m samaapajji, lomakuupampissa vaato caaletu.m naasakkhi.  `avasesaa bhikkhuu kira aadito pa.t.thaaya sabbapaa.tihaariyaani kaatu.m  sakku.neyyu.m, ima.m pana .thaana.m patvaa eva.m khippanisantino hutvaa  samaapajjitu.m naasakkhissantii'ti nesa.m bhagavaa naagaraajadamana.m naanujaani.
text.11559: [03] ``naagaraajaa ^a^P3.0179^ea^ `aha.m imassa sama.nassa  naasavaatena lomakuupampi caaletu.m naasakkhi.m, mahiddhiko so sama.no'ti  cintesi. thero attabhaava.m vijahitvaa supa.n.naruupa.m nimminitvaa  supa.n.navaata.m ^a^V2.0425^ea^ dassento naagaraajaana.m anubandhi, naagaraajaa ta.m attabhaava.m  vijahitvaa maa.navakava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa, `bhante, tumhaaka.m sara.na.m  gacchaamii'ti vadanto therassa paade vandi. thero `satthaa, nando  aagato, ehi tva.m, gamissaamaa'ti naagaraajaana.m dametvaa nibbisa.m  katvaa, gahetvaa bhagavato ^a^M2.0504^ea^ santika.m agamaasi. naagaraajaa bhagavanta.m  vanditvaa `bhante, tumhaaka.m sara.na.m gacchaamii'ti aaha. bhagavaa `sukhii  hohi, naagaraajaa'ti vatvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto anaathapi.n.dikassa  nivesana.m agamaasi.
text.11560: [03] ``anaathapi.n.diko `ki.m, bhante, atidivaa aagatatthaa'ti aaha.  moggallaanassa ca nandopanandassa ca sa"ngaamo ahosiiti. kassa  pana, bhante, jayo, kassa paraajayoti? moggallaanassa jayo,  nandassa paraajayoti. anaathapi.n.diko `adhivaasetu me, bhante,  bhagavaa sattaaha.m ekapa.tipaa.tiyaa bhatta.m, sattaaha.m therassa sakkaara.m  karissaamii'ti vatvaa sattaaha.m buddhappamukhaana.m pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m  mahaasakkaara.m akaasi. tena vutta.m -- `nandopanandadamanena  diipetabbo'''ti.
text.11561: [03] ^b^yo etamabhijaanaatii^eb^ti eta.m yathaavutta.m vimokkha.m  phusanakara.navasena jaanaati.
text.11562: [03] ^b^na ve aggi cetayati, aha.m baala.m .dahaamii^eb^ti eva.m na aggi  abhisa.mceteti, naapi .dahanaaya payoga.m parakkama.m karoti, baalo eva pana  ``aya.m mandaagatii''ti anijalanta.m viya jalita.m aggi.m aasajja na.m  pa.dayhati, evameva, maara, na maya.m .dahitukaamaa, baadhetukaamaa, tva~n~neva  pana tathaa aagamanaadiatthena tathaagata.m aggikhandhasadisa.m ariyasaavaka.m  aasajja attaana.m .dahissasi, .dahadukkhato na mu~ncissasi.
text.11563: [03] ^b^apu~n~na.m pasavii^eb^ti apu~n~na.m pa.tilabhati. ^b^na me paapa.m  vipaccatii^eb^ti mama paapa.m na vipaccati, ki.m nu, maara, eva.m ma~n~nasi  nayidamatthi.
text.11564: [03] ^b^karoto te ciiyate paapa^eb^nti eka.msena karontassa te paapa.m  cirarattaaya cirakaala.m anatthaaya dukkhaaya upaciiyati. ^b^maara,  nibbinda buddhamhaa^eb^ti catusaccabuddhato buddhasaavakato nibbinda  nibbijja parato kamma.m. ^b^aasa.m maakaasi bhikkhusuu^eb^ti ``bhikkhuu  virodhemi vihesemii''ti eta.m aasa.m maakaasi.
text.11565: [03] ^b^itii^eb^ti eva.m. ^b^maara.m atajjesii^eb^ti, ``maara,  nibbinda...pe0... bhikkhusuu''ti aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano.  ^b^bhesaka.laavane^eb^ti ^a^P3.0180^ea^ eva.mnaamake ara~n~ne.  ^b^tato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0505^ea^ tajjanahetu. ^b^so dummano yakkho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0426^ea^ so maaro  domanassiko hutvaa tattheva tasmi.myeva .thaane antaradhaayi, adassana.m  agamaasi. aya~nca gaathaa dhammasa"ngaayanakaale .thapitaa. ya.m panettha  antarantaraa atthato na vibhatta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanameva.
text.11566: [03] evamaya.m mahaathero maara.m tajjetvaa devacaarikaanarakacaarikaadivasena  a~n~nehi saavakehi asaadhaara.na.m sattuupakaara.m katvaa aayupariyosaane  parinibbaayi. parinibbaayanto ca anomadassissa bhagavato paadamuule  pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tato pa.t.thaaya tattha tattha bhave u.laaraani pu~n~naani  katvaa saavakapaaramiyaa matthake .thitopi antaraa katassa paapakammassa  vasena u.t.thitaaya kammapilotikaaya titthiyehi uyyojitehi corehi  baadhito anappaka.m sariirakheda.m katvaa parinibbaayi. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.375, 380-397) --
text.1158: [03] ^b^vivaramanupatanti^eb^ ^a^M1.0134^ea^ ^a^V1.0113^ea^ ^a^P1.0114^ea^ ^b^vijjutaa^eb^ti  aayasmato siriva.d.dhattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? sopi  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m  upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vipassi.m bhagavanta.m passitvaa  ki"nka.nipupphehi puuja.m katvaa tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto  aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  raajagahe vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa gehe nibbatti,  ^b^siriva.d.dho^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto  bimbisaarasamaagame satthari saddhamme ca uppannappasaado hetusampannataaya  pabbaji. pabbajitvaa ca katapubbakicco vebhaarapa.n.davapabbataana.m aviduure  a~n~natarasmi.m ara~n~naayatane pabbataguhaaya.m kamma.t.thaanamanuyutto viharati.  tasmi~nca samaye mahaa akaalamegho u.t.thahi. vijjullataa pabbatavivara.m  pavisantiyo viya vicaranti. therassa ghammapari.laahaabhibhuutassa  saaragabbhehi meghavaatehi ghammapari.laaho vuupasami. utusappaayalaabhena  citta.m ekagga.m ahosi. samaahitacitto vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa  arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.21.10-14) --
text.11588: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.116: [22] maa kho visuddha.m duusesi, nikkhamassu vanaa tuva.m..
text.11605: [21] ``asmimaana.m ^a^M2.0507^ea^ na passaami, maano mayha.m na vijjati.
text.11614: [03] sattatinipaate ^a^M2.0508^ea^ ^a^V2.0428^ea^ ^b^nikkhanta.m vata ma.m santa^eb^ntiaadikaa  aayasmato va"ngiisattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira  padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto, purimanayeneva  vihaara.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.tibhaanavantaana.m  agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa -- ``ahampi  anaagate pa.tibhaanavantaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m katvaa, satthaaraa  byaakato yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m  buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^va"ngiiso^eb^ti  laddhanaamo tayo bede ugga.nhanto aacariya.m aaraadhetvaa, chavasiisamanta.m  naama sikkhitvaa chavasiisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa ``aya.m satto  asukayoniya.m nibbatto''ti jaanaati.
text.11615: [03] braahma.naa ``aya.m amhaaka.m jiivitamaggo''ti ~natvaa va"ngiisa.m  gahetvaa pa.ticchannayaane nisiidaapetvaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniyo vicaranti.  va"ngiisopi tivassamatthake mataanampi siisa.m aaharaapetvaa nakhena  aako.tetvaa ``aya.m ^a^P3.0181^ea^ satto asukayoniya.m  nibbatto''ti vatvaa mahaajanassa ka"nkhacchedanattha.m te te jane aavaahetvaa  attano attano gati.m kathaapeti. tena tasmi.m mahaajano abhippasiidati.  so ta.m nissaaya mahaajanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhatiiti.  braahma.naa va"ngiisamaadaaya yathaaruci.m vicaritvaa puna saavatthi.m agama.msu.  va"ngiiso satthu gu.ne sutvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitukaamo ahosi.  braahma.naa ``sama.no gotamo maayaaya ta.m aava.t.tessatii''ti pa.tikkhipi.msu.  va"ngiiso tesa.m vacana.m anaadiyitvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa  madhurapa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.
text.11616: [03] ta.m satthaa pucchi -- ``va"ngiisa, ki~nci sippa.m jaanaasii''ti?  ``aama, bho gotama, chavasiisamanta.m naama jaanaami. tena  tivassamatthake mataanampi siisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa nibbatta.t.thaana.m  jaanaamii''ti. satthaa tassa eka.m niraye nibbattassa ^a^M2.0509^ea^ siisa.m dassesi,  eka.m manussesu ^a^V2.0429^ea^, eka.m devesu, eka.m parinibbutassa siisa.m dassesi.  so pa.thama.m siisa.m aako.tetvaa, ``bho gotama, aya.m satto niraye  nibbatto''ti aaha. ``saadhu, va"ngiisa, su.t.thu tayaa di.t.tha.m. aya.m satto  kuhi.m nibbatto''ti pucchi. ``manussaloke''ti. ``aya.m  kuhi''nti? ``devaloke''ti ti.n.nannampi nibbatta.t.thaana.m kathesi.  parinibbutassa pana siisa.m nakhena aako.tento neva anta.m na ko.ti.m  passi. atha na.m satthaa ``na sakkosi va"ngiisaa''ti pucchi.  ``upaparikkhaami taavaa''ti punappuna.m parivattetvaa aako.tentopi  baahirakamantena khii.naasavassa gati.m katha.m jaanissati, athassa  matthakato sedo mucci. so lajjitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto a.t.thaasi. atha na.m  satthaa -- ``kilamasi, va"ngiisaa''ti aaha. ``aama, bho gotama,  imassa uppanna.t.thaana.m jaanitu.m na sakkomi, sace tumhe jaanaatha,  kathethaa''ti. ``va"ngiisa, aha.m etampi jaanaami, ito uttaritarampi  jaanaamii''ti vatvaa --
