text.2851: [03] ^b^chaphassaayatane^eb^ ^a^M1.0291^ea^ ^b^hitvaa^eb^ti aayasmato paaraapariyattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto piyadassissa bhagavato kaale nesaadayoniya.m  nibbattitvaa tassa vi~n~nuta.m pattassa vicara.na.t.thaane a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de  piyadassii bhagavaa ta.m anugga.nhitu.m nirodhasamaapatti.m samaapajjitvaa  nisiidi. so ca mige pariyesanto ta.m .thaana.m gato satthaara.m disvaa  pasannamaanaso bhagavanta.m anto katvaa kata.m saakhaama.n.dapa.m padumapupphehi  kuu.taagaaraakaarena sa~nchaadetvaa u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedento  sattaaha.m namassamaano a.t.thaasi. divase divase ca milaatamilaataani  apanetvaa abhinavehi chaadesi. satthaa sattaahassa accayena nirodhato  vu.t.thahitvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m anussari. taavadeva asiitisahassamattaa  bhikkhuu satthaara.m parivaaresu.m. ``madhuradhammakatha.m su.nissaamaa''ti  devataa sannipati.msu, mahaa samaagamo ahosi. satthaa anumodana.m  karonto tassa devamanussesu bhaavini.m sampatti.m imasmi.m buddhuppaade  saavakabodhi~nca byaakaritvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.nakule  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa ^a^P1.0242^ea^  paraaparagottataaya ^b^paaraapariyo^eb^ti laddhasama~n~no bahuu  braahma.ne mante vaacento satthu raajagahagamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva  arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.40.353-385) --

text.2917: [03] tattha ^b^chaphassaayatane hitvaa^eb^ti cakkhusamphassaadiina.m channa.m  samphassaana.m uppatti.t.thaanataaya ``phassaayatanaanii''ti laddhanaamaani  cakkhaadiini cha ajjhattikaayatanaani tappa.tibaddhasa.mkilesappahaanavasena  pahaaya. ^b^guttadvaaro susa.mvuto^eb^ti tato eva cakkhudvaaraadiina.m  guttattaa, tattha pavattanakaana.m abhijjhaadiina.m paapadhammaana.m pavesananivaara.nena  satikavaa.tena su.t.tu pihitattaa guttadvaaro susa.mvuto. atha vaa manaccha.t.thaana.m  channa.m dvaaraana.m vuttanayena rakkhitattaa guttadvaaro, kaayaadiihi su.t.thu  sa~n~natattaa susa.mvutoti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^aghamuula.m  vamitvaanaa^eb^ti aghassa va.t.tadukkhassa muulabhuuta.m avijjaabhavata.nhaasa"nkhaata.m  dosa.m, sabba.m vaa kilesadosa.m ariyamaggasa"nkhaatavamanayogapaanena  uggiritvaa santaanato bahi katvaa, bahikara.nahetu vaa. ^b^patto me  aasavakkhayo^eb^ti kaamaasavaadayo aasavaa ettha khiiyanti, tesa.m vaa  khayena pattabboti aasavakkhayo, nibbaana.m arahatta~nca. so  aasavakkhayo patto adhigatoti udaanavasena a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

text.2985: [03] tattha ^b^abhisattovaa^eb^ti ``tva.m siigha.m gaccha maa ti.t.thaa''ti  devehi anusi.t.tho aa.natto viya. ``abhisa.t.tho ^a^V1.0256^ea^ vaa''tipi paa.tho,  ``tva.m lahu.m gacchaa''ti kenaci abhilaasaapito viyaati attho.  ^b^nipatatii^eb^ti atipatati abhidhaavati na ti.t.thati, kha.ne kha.ne  khayavaya.m paapu.naatiiti attho. ^b^vayo^eb^ti baalyayobbanaadiko  sariirassa avatthaaviseso. idha panassa yobba~n~na.m adhippeta.m, ta.m  hissa abhipatanta.m khiiyanta.m hutvaa upa.t.thita.m. ^b^ruupa^eb^nti  ruupasampadaati vadati. ^b^ruupa^eb^nti pana sariira.m ``a.t.thi~nca pa.ticca  nhaaru~nca pa.ticca ma.msa~nca pa.ticca aakaaso parivaarito ruupa.mtveva sa"nkha.m  gacchatii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.306) viya. ^b^a~n~namiva  tatheva santa^eb^nti ida.m ruupa.m yaadisa.m, saya.m tatheva tenevaakaarena santa.m  vijjamaana.m a~n~na.m viya mayha.m upa.t.thaatiiti adhippaayo. ``tadeva  santa''nti ca keci pa.thanti. ^b^tasseva sato^eb^ti tasseva me  ana~n~nassa sato samaanassa. ^b^avippavasato^eb^ti na  vippavasantassa, ciravippavaasena hi sato ana~n~nampi a~n~na.m viya  upa.t.thaati idampi idha natthiiti adhippaayo. ^b^a~n~nasseva saraami  attaana^eb^nti ima.m mama attabhaava.m a~n~nassa sattassa viya saraami  upadhaaremi sa~njaanaamiiti attho. tasseva.m aniccata.m manasi  karontassa da.lhataro sa.mvego udapaadi, so sa.mvegajaato satthaara.m  upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m  pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.56.42-48) --

text.2998: [03] ^b^rukkhamuulagahana.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0257^ea^ ^a^P1.0246^ea^ ^b^pasakkiyaa^eb^ti  aayasmato vajjiputtattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m  upacinanto ito catunavute kappe eka.m paccekasambuddha.m bhikkhaaya gacchanta.m  disvaa pasannamaanaso kadaliphalaani adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m licchaviraajaputto hutvaa nibbatti,  vajjiraajaputtattaa ^b^vajjiputto^eb^tveva cassa sama~n~naa ahosi. so  daharo hutvaa hatthisikkhaadisikkhanakaalepi hetusampannataaya  nissara.najjhaasayova hutvaa vicaranto satthu dhammadesanaakaale vihaara.m  gantvaa parisapariyante nisinno dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho satthu  santike pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.51.57-62) --

text.3011: [01] tattha ^b^rukkhamuulagahana^eb^nti rukkhamuulabhuuta.m gahana.m,  gahana~nhi atthi, na ^a^P1.0247^ea^ rukkhamuula.m, rukkhamuula~nca  ^a^V1.0258^ea^   atthi, na gahana.m, tesu rukkhamuulaggaha.nena .thaanassa chaayaasampannataaya  vaataatapaparissayaabhaava.m dasseti. gahanaggaha.nena nivaatabhaavena  vaataparissayaabhaava.m janasambaadhaabhaava~nca dasseti, tadubhayena ca  bhaavanaayogyata.m. ^b^pasakkiyaa^eb^ti upagantvaa. ^b^nibbaana.m  hadayasmi.m opiyaa^eb^ti ``eva.m mayaa pa.tipajjitvaa nibbaana.m  adhigantabba''nti nibbuti.m hadaye .thapetvaa citte karitvaa.  ^b^jhaayaa^eb^ti lakkha.nuupanijjhaanena jhaaya, vipassanaabhaavanaasahita.m  maggabhaavana.m bhaavehi. ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti dhammabha.n.daagaarika.m gottena  aalapati. ^b^maa ca pamaado^eb^ti adhikusalesu dhammesu maa pamaada.m  aapajji. idaani yaadiso therassa pamaado, ta.m pa.tikkhepavasena  dassento ^b^``ki.m te bi.libi.likaa karissatii''^eb^ti aaha. tattha  ^b^bi.libi.likaa^eb^ti vi.livi.likiriyaa, bi.libi.liiti saddapavatti  yathaa niratthakaa, eva.m bi.libi.likaasadisaa janapa~n~natti ^b^ki.m te  karissati^eb^ kiidisa.m attha.m tuyha.m saadheti, tasmaa janapa~n~natti.m pahaaya  sadatthapasuto hohiiti ovaada.m adaasi.

text.3024: [22] dukkhakkhayo anuppatto, patto me aasavakkhayo''ti..  -- gaatha.m abhaasi.
text.3025: [03] tattha ^b^pa~ncakkhandhaa pari~n~naataa^eb^ti pa~ncapi me  upaadaanakkhandhaa vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya ``ida.m dukkha.m,  ettaka.m dukkha.m, na ito bhiyyo''ti sabbaso paricchijja ~naataa, na  tesu ki~ncipi pari~n~naatabba.m atthiiti ^a^P1.0249^ea^ adhippaayo.  ^b^ti.t.thanti chinnamuulakaa^eb^ti sabbaso pari~n~naatattaa eva tesa.m  avijjaata.nhaadikassa muulassa samucchinnattaa ariyamaggena pahiinattaa  yaavacarimacittanirodhaa te ti.t.thanti. ^b^dukkhakkhayo anuppatto^eb^ti  chinnamuulakattaayeva ca nesa.m va.t.tadukkhassa khayo parikkhayo anuppatto,  nibbaana.m adhigata.m. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti kaamaasavaadiina.m  sabbesa.m aasavaana.m khayante abhigantabbataaya ``aasavakkhayo''ti  laddhanaama.m arahatta.m patta.m pa.tiladdhanti attho. keci pana antimaaya.m  samussayo''ti pa.thanti. nibbaanassa adhigatattaayeva aya.m mama  samussayo attabhaavo antimo sabbapacchimako, natthi daani  punabbhavoti attho. ya.m pana tattha tattha avutta.m, ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa  uttaana.myevaati.
text.303: [03] tattha ^b^upasanto^eb^ti manaccha.t.thaana.m indriyaana.m upasamanena  nibbisevanabhaavakara.nena upasanto. ^b^uparato^eb^ti sabbasmaa  paapakara.nato orato virato. ^b^mantabhaa.nii^eb^ti mantaa vuccati  pa~n~naa, taaya pana upaparikkhitvaa bha.natiiti mantabhaa.nii,  kaalavaadiiaadibhaava.m avissajjentoyeva bha.natiiti attho.  mantabha.nanavasena vaa bha.natiiti mantabhaa.nii, dubbhaasitato vinaa attano  bhaasanavasena catura"ngasamannaagata.m subhaasita.myeva bha.natiiti attho.  jaatiaadivasena attano anukka.msanato na uddhatoti ^b^anuddhato^eb^ atha  vaa ti.n.na.m kaayaduccaritaana.m vuupasamanena tato pa.tiviratiyaa upasanto,  ti.n.na.m manoduccaritaana.m uparama.nena pajahanena uparato, catunna.m  vaciiduccaritaana.m appavattiyaa parimitabhaa.nitaaya mantabhaa.nii,  tividhaduccaritanimittauppajjanakassa uddhaccassa abhaavato anuddhato.  eva.m pana tividhaduccaritappahaanena suddhe siile pati.t.thito, uddhaccappahaanena  samaahito, tameva samaadhi.m pada.t.thaana.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa  maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa ^b^dhunaati paapake dhamme^eb^ laamaka.t.thena paapake sabbepi  sa.mkilesadhamme niddhunaati, samucchedavasena pajahati ^a^V1.0032^ea^. yathaa ki.m?  ^b^dumapatta.mva maaluto,^eb^ yathaa naama dumassa rukkhassa patta.m pa.n.dupalaasa.m  maaluto vaato dhunaati, bandhanato viyojento niiharati, eva.m  yathaavuttapa.tipattiya.m .thito paapadhamme attano santaanato niiharati,  evamaya.m therassa a~n~naapadesena a~n~naabyaakara.nagaathaapi hotiiti  veditabbaa.
text.3034: [03] dukanipaate ^a^M1.0304^ea^ ^a^V1.0260^ea^ ^a^P2.0001^ea^ ^b^natthi koci bhavo  nicco^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato uttarattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti?  ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m  pu~n~na.m upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale vijjaadharo hutvaa aakaasena  vicarati. tena ca samayena satthaa tassa anugga.nhanattha.m vanantare  a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi chabba.n.nabuddhara.msiyo vissajjento.  so antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto aakaasato  oruyha suvisuddhehi vipulehi ka.nikaarapupphehi bhagavanta.m puujesi,  pupphaani buddhaanubhaavena satthu upari chattaakaarena a.t.tha.msu, so tena  bhiyyosomattaaya pasannacitto hutvaa aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.mse  nibbattitvaa u.laara.m dibbasampatti.m anubhavanto yaavataayuka.m tattha .thatvaa  tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe  braahma.namahaasaalaputto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^uttaro^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi.  so vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m gantvaa jaatiyaa ruupena  vijjaaya vayena siilaacaarena ca lokassa sambhaavaniiyo jaato. tassa  ta.m sampatti.m disvaa vassakaaro magadhamahaamatto attano dhiitara.m daatukaamo  hutvaa attano adhippaaya.m pavedesi. so nissara.najjhaasayataaya ta.m  pa.tikkhipitvaa kaalena kaala.m dhammasenaapati.m payirupaasanto tassa  santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vattasampanno hutvaa thera.m  upa.t.thahati.
text.3035: [03] tena ca samayena therassa a~n~nataro aabaadho uppanno, tassa  bhesajjatthaaya uttaro saama.nero paatova pattaciivaramaadaaya vihaarato  nikkhanto antaraamagge ta.laakassa tiire patta.m .thapetvaa udakasamiipa.m  gantvaa mukha.m dhovati. atha a~n~nataro uma"ngacoro aarakkhapurisehi ^a^M1.0305^ea^  anubaddho aggadvaareneva nagarato nikkhamitvaa palaayanto attanaa gahita.m  ratanabha.n.dika.m saama.nerassa patte pakkhipitvaa palaayi. saama.nero  pattasamiipa.m ^a^P2.0002^ea^ upagato. cora.m anubandhantaa raajapurisaa  ^a^V1.0261^ea^   saama.nerassa patte bha.n.dika.m disvaa, ``aya.m coro, iminaa coriya.m  kata''nti saama.nera.m pacchaabaaha.m bandhitvaa vassakaarassa braahma.nassa  dassesu.m. vassakaaro ca tadaa ra~n~no vinicchaye niyutto hutvaa  chejjabhejja.m anusaasati. so ``pubbe mama vacana.m naadiyi,  suddhapaasa.n.diyesu pabbajii''ti ca baddhaaghaatattaa kamma.m asodhetvaava  jiivantameva ta.m suule uttaasesi.
text.3036: [03] athassa bhagavaa ~naa.naparipaaka.m oloketvaa ta.m .thaana.m gantvaa  vipphurantahatthanakhama.nimayuukhasambhinnasitaabhataaya  paggharantajaatihi"ngulakasuva.n.narasadhaara.m viya  jaalaagu.n.thitamudutalunadiigha"ngulihattha.m uttarassa siise .thapetvaa, ``uttara,  ida.m te purimakammassa phala.m uppanna.m, tattha tayaa paccavekkha.nabalena  adhivaasanaa kaatabbaa''ti vatvaa ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m dhamma.m desesi.  uttaro amataabhisekasadisena satthu hatthasamphassena  sa~njaatappasaadasomanassataaya u.laara.m piitipaamojja.m pa.tilabhitvaa  yathaaparicita.m vipassanaamagga.m samaaruu.lho ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa  satthu ca desanaavilaasena taavadeva maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa sabbakilese  khepetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.56.55-92) --
text.304: [03] ettha ^a^M1.0039^ea^ ca kaayavaciiduccaritappahaanavacanena payogasuddhi.m dasseti,  manoduccaritappahaanavacanena aasayasuddhi.m. eva.m payogaasayasuddhassa  ``anuddhato''ti ^a^P1.0034^ea^ iminaa uddhaccaabhaavavacanena  tadeka.t.thataaya niivara.nappahaana.m dasseti. tesu payogasuddhiyaa  siilasampatti vibhaavitaa, aasayasuddhiyaa samathabhaavanaaya  upakaarakadhammapariggaho, niivara.nappahaanena samaadhibhaavanaa, ``dhunaati  paapake dhamme''ti iminaa pa~n~naabhaavanaa vibhaavitaa hoti. eva.m  adhisiilasikkhaadayo tisso sikkhaa, tividhakalyaa.na.m saasana.m,  tada"ngappahaanaadiini tii.ni pahaanaani, antadvayaparivajjanena saddhi.m  majjhimaaya pa.tipattiyaa pa.tipajjana.m, apaayabhavaadiina.m samatikkamanuupaayo  ca yathaaraha.m niddhaaretvaa yojetabbaa. iminaa nayena sesagaathaasupi  yathaaraha.m atthayojanaa veditabbaa. atthamattameva pana tattha tattha apubba.m  va.n.nayissaama. ``ittha.m suda.m aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko''ti ida.m  puujaavacana.m, yathaa ta.m mahaamoggallaanoti.
text.3042: [22] tisuula.m sugata.m gayha, gacchaami ambare tadaa..
text.3069: [21] ``tattha bhutvaa pivitvaa ca, modaami tidase tadaa.
text.307: [03] ^b^pa~n~na.m ima.m passaa^eb^ti aayasmato ka"nkhaarevatassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi thero padumuttarabhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare  braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbatto. ekadivasa.m buddhaana.m dhammadesanaakaale  he.t.thaa vuttanayena mahaajanena saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa parisapariyante .thito  dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m jhaanaabhirataana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m  disvaa ``mayaapi anaagate evaruupena bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa  desanaavasaane satthaara.m nimantetvaa he.t.thaa vuttanayena mahaasakkaara.m katvaa  bhagavanta.m aaha -- ``bhante, aha.m iminaa adhikaarakammena a~n~na.m  sampatti.m na patthemi, yathaa pana so bhikkhu tumhehi ito  sattamadivasamatthake jhaayiina.m agga.t.thaane .thapito, eva.m ahampi anaagate  ekassa buddhassa saasane jhaayiina.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthanamakaasi.  satthaa anaagata.m oloketvaa nipphajjanabhaava.m disvaa ``anaagate  kappasatasahassaavasaane gotamo ^a^M1.0040^ea^ naama ^a^V1.0033^ea^ buddho ^a^P1.0035^ea^  uppajjissati, tassa saasane tva.m jhaayiina.m aggo bhavissasii''ti  byaakaritvaa pakkaami.
text.3075: [22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
text.3077: [22] a~n~na.m gati.m na jaanaami, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
text.3079: [22] niice kule na jaanaami, buddhapuujaayida.m phala.m..
text.308: [03] so yaavajiiva.m kalyaa.nakamma.m katvaa kappasatasahassa.m devamanussesu  sa.msaritvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale saavatthinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto  pacchaabhatta.m dhammassavanattha.m gacchantena mahaajanena saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa  parisapariyante .thito dasabalassa dhammakatha.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho  pabbajitvaa upasampada.m labhitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m kathaapetvaa jhaanaparikamma.m  karonto jhaanalaabhii hutvaa jhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. so  yebhuyyena dasabalena samaapajjitabbasamaapatti.m samaapajjanto ahoratta.m  jhaanesu ci.n.navasii ahosi. atha na.m satthaa ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave,  mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m jhaayiina.m yadida.m ka"nkhaarevato''ti (a0 ni0   1.198, 204) jhaayiina.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. vuttampi ceta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.55.34-53) --
text.3088: [21] ``ima.m khaada ima.m bhu~nja, imamhi sayane saya.
text.3093: [21] ``siita.m u.nha.m na jaanaami, pari.laaho na vijjati.
text.3094: [22] atho cetasika.m dukkha.m, hadaye me na vijjati..
text.3110: [03] cha.labhi~n~no puna hutvaa suulato u.t.thahitvaa paraanuddayaaya aakaase  .thatvaa paa.tihaariya.m dassesi. mahaajano acchariyabbhutacittajaato  ahosi. taavadevassa va.no sa.mruu.lhi, so bhikkhuuhi, ``aavuso,  taadisa.m dukkha.m anubhavanto katha.m tva.m vipassana.m anuyu~njitu.m  asakkhii''ti pu.t.tho, ``pageva me, aavuso, sa.msaare aadiinavo,  sa"nkhaaraana~nca sabhaavo sudi.t.tho, evaaha.m ^a^V1.0264^ea^ taadisa.m dukkha.m anubhavantopi  asakkhi.m vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa visesa.m adhigantu''nti dassento --
text.3112: [21] ``natthi koci bhavo nicco, sa"nkhaaraa vaapi sassataa.
text.3113: [22] uppajjanti ca te khandhaa, cavanti aparaapara.m..
text.3118: [03] tattha ^a^M1.0309^ea^ ^a^P2.0003^ea^ ^b^natthi koci bhavo nicco^eb^ti  kammabhavo upapattibhavo kaamabhavo ruupabhavo aruupabhavo sa~n~niibhavo  asa~n~niibhavo nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niibhavo ekavokaarabhavo catuvokaarabhavo  pa~ncavokaarabhavoti eva.mbhedo, tatthaapi hiino majjhimo ukka.t.tho  diighaayuko sukhabahulo vomissasukhadukkhoti eva.mvibhaago yokoci  nicco dhuvo thiro apalokiyadhammo natthi ta.m ta.m kaara.na.m pa.ticca  samuppannattaa. yasmaa ca etadeva.m, tasmaa ^b^sa"nkhaaraa vaapi  sassataa^eb^ natthiiti yojanaa. paccayehi sa"nkhatattaa ``sa"nkhaaraa''ti  laddhanaame hi pa~ncakkhandhe upaadaaya bhavasama~n~naaya sa"nkhaaraava hutvaa  sambhuutaa jaraamara.nena ca vipari.namantiiti asassataa vipari.naamadhammaa.  tathaa hi te ``sa"nkhaaraa''ti vuccanti. tenaaha ^b^uppajjanti ca  te khandhaa, cavanti aparaapara^eb^nti. te bhavapariyaayena  sa"nkhaarapariyaayena ca vuttaa pa~ncakkhandhaa yathaapaccaya.m aparaapara.m  uppajjanti, uppannaa ca jaraaya paripii.litaa hutvaa cavanti  paribhijjantiiti attho. etena ``bhavo, sa"nkhaaraa''ti ca  laddhavohaaraa pa~ncakkhandhaa udayabbayasabhaavaati dasseti. yasmaa  tilakkha.na.m aaropetvaa sa"nkhaare sammasantassa tayopi bhavaa aaditta.m  viya sa"nkhate ^b^aadiinava.m^eb^ dosa.m pageva vipassanaapa~n~naaya jaanitvaa  aniccalakkha.nehi di.t.thaa sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaanattaa vibhuutataraa upa.t.thahanti,  tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m, ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa''ti  (sa.m0 ni0  3.15).
text.3119: [03] yasmaa tilakkha.na.m aaropetvaa sa"nkhaare sammasantassa tayopi  bhavaa aaditta.m viya agaara.m sappa.tibhayaa upa.t.thahanti, tasmaa aaha  ^b^``bhavenamhi anatthiko''^eb^ti. eva.m pana sabbaso bhavehi  vinivattiyamaanassa kaamesu apekkhaaya lesopi na sambhavatiyeva,  tenaaha ^b^``nissa.to sabbakaamehii''^eb^ti, amhiiti yojanaa.  maanusehi viya dibbehipi kaamehi nivattitacittosmiiti attho.  ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti yasmaa eva.m suparimajjitasa"nkhaaro  bhavesu suparidi.t.thaadiinavo kaamesu ^a^V1.0265^ea^ ca anaasattamaanaso tasmaa suulamatthake  nisinnenaapi me mayaa patto adhigato ^a^M1.0310^ea^ aasavakkhayo nibbaana.m  arahatta~ncaati. a~n~nehi ca sabrahmacaariihi appattamaanasehi  tadadhigamaaya ussaaho kara.niiyoti bhikkhuuna.m ovaadamadaasi.
text.3122: [03] ^b^nayida.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0004^ea^ ^b^anayenaa^eb^tiaadikaa  aayasmato pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira  padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale siihayoniya.m nibbattitvaa pabbataguhaaya.m  viharati. bhagavaa tassa anuggaha.m kaatu.m gocaraaya pakkantakaale  sayanaguha.m pavisitvaa nirodha.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. siiho gocara.m  gahetvaa nivatto guhaadvaare bhagavanta.m disvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho jalajathalajapupphehi  puuja.m katvaa citta.m pasaadento bhagavato aarakkhatthaaya ara~n~ne vaa.lamige  apanetu.m tiisu velaasu siihanaada.m nadanto buddhagataaya satiyaa a.t.thaasi.  yathaa pa.thamadivasa.m, eva.m sattaaha.m puujesi. bhagavaa sattaahaccayena nirodhaa  vu.t.thahitvaa ``vattissati imassa ettako upanissayo''ti tassa  passantasseva aakaasa.m pakkhanditvaa vihaarameva gato. siiho  paalileyyakahatthii viya buddhaviyogadukkha.m adhivaasetu.m asakkonto kaala.m  katvaa ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto nagaravaasiihi  saddhi.m vihaara.m gato dhammadesana.m sutvaa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa  yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m  bhagavato kaale kosambiya.m ra~n~no utenassa purohitaputto hutvaa  nibbatti ^b^bhaaradvaajo^eb^ naama naamena. so vayappatto tayo vede  uggahetvaa pa~nca maa.navakasataani mante vaacento mahagghasabhaavena  ananuruupaacaarattaa tehi pariccajjanto raajagaha.m gantvaa bhagavato  bhikkhusa"nghassa ca laabhasakkaara.m disvaa saasane pabbajitvaa bhojane  amatta~n~nuu hutvaa vicaranto satthaaraa upaayena ^a^M1.0311^ea^ matta~n~nutaaya pati.t.thaapito  vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.104-109) --
text.3127: [21] ``ekati.mse ^a^V1.0266^ea^ ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
text.3130: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa ``bhagavato sammukhaa ya.m saavakehi  pattabba.m, ta.m mayaa patta''nti, bhikkhusa"nghe ca ``yassa magge vaa phale  vaa ka"nkhaa atthi, so ma.m pucchatuu''ti siihanaada.m nadi. tena ta.m  bhagavaa, ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m siihanaadikaana.m  yadida.m pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo''ti (a0 ni0  1.188, 195) etadagge  .thapesi. so ^a^P2.0005^ea^ ekadivasa.m attano santika.m upagata.m  gihikaale sahaayabhuuta.m macchari.m micchaadi.t.thibraahma.na.m anukampamaano tassa  daanakatha.m kathetvaa tena ca ``aya.m mama dhana.m vinaasetukaamo''ti bhaku.ti.m  katvaapi ``tuyha.m ekabhatta.m demii''ti vutte, ``ta.m sa"nghassa dehi maa  mayha''nti sa"nghassa pari.naamesi. puna braahma.nena ``aya.m ma.m bahuuna.m  daapetukaamo''ti appaccaye pakaasite dutiyadivasa.m dhammasenaapatinaa  sa"nghagataaya dakkhi.naaya mahapphalabhaavappakaasanena ta.m pasaadetvaa, ``aya.m  braahma.no `aahaaragedhena ma.m daane niiyojesii'ti ma~n~nati, aahaarassa  pana mayaa sabbaso pari~n~naatabhaava.m na jaanaati, handa na.m jaanaapemii''ti  --
text.3133: [22] aahaara.t.thitiko samussayo, iti disvaana caraami esana.m..
text.3136: [21] ``pa"nkoti ^a^M1.0312^ea^ hi na.m avedayu.m, yaaya.m vandanapuujanaa kulesu.
text.3137: [22] sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m, sakkaaro kaapurisena dujjaho''ti..  --
text.3139: [03] tattha ^b^nayida.m anayena jiivita^eb^nti ida.m mama jiivita.m  anayena a~naayena ve.ludaanapupphadaanaadianesanaaya na hoti  jiivitanikantiyaa abhaavato. ^b^naahaaro hadayassa santiko^eb^ti  aahaaro ca aahariyamaano maggaphala~naa.na.m viya hadayassa cittassa  santikaro na hoti, kevala.m pana sajjuka.m khudaapa.tighaatamatta.m karotiiti  adhippaayo. atha vaa ^b^naahaaro hadayassa santiko^eb^ti aahaaro  rasata.nhaavatthu me hadayassa santiko aasatto na hoti rasata.nhaaya eva  abhaavato. ``santike''tipi pa.thanti. yo hi aahaaragiddho  laabhasakkaarappasuto vicarati, tassa aahaaro hadayassa santike naama  abhi.nha.m manasikaatabbato. yo pana pari~n~naataahaaro, so tattha  pahiinacchandaraago, na tassaahaaro hadayassa ^a^V1.0267^ea^ santike naama -- ``katha.m  nu kho labheyya''ntiaadimanasikara.nasseva abhaavato. yadi hi  jiivitanikanti aahaararasata.nhaa ca natthi, atha kasmaa pi.n.daaya  carasiiti anuyoga.m manasi katvaa aaha ^b^``aahaara.t.thitiko  samussayo, iti disvaana caraami esana''^eb^nti. aahaaro bhojana.m  .thiti .thaana.m paccayo etassaati aahaara.t.thitiko.  ``aahaarapa.tibaddhavuttiko samussayo kaayo''iti disvaana eva.m ~natvaa  imamattha.m buddhiya.m ^a^P2.0006^ea^ .thapetvaa caraami esana.m,  bhikkhaapariyesana.m karomiiti attho.
text.3140: [03] paccayanimitta.m kulaani upasa"nkamanto tattha vandanapuujanaahi  laabhasakkaarehi ca bajjhatiiti eva.m maadisesu na cintetabbanti  dassento ^b^``pa"nko''^eb^tigaatha.m abhaasi. tassattho -- ^b^yaa  aya.m^eb^ paccayanimitta.m upagataana.m pabbajitaana.m ^b^kulesu^eb^ gehavaasiisu  pavattissati gu.nasambhaavanaa ^b^puujanaa^eb^ ca, yasmaa ta.m abhaavitattaana.m  osiidaapana.t.thena maliinabhaavakara.nena ca ^b^pa"nko^eb^ kaddamoti buddhaadayo  ^b^avedayu.m^eb^ abbha~n~naasu.m pavedesu.m vaa, tasmaa saa sappurisaana.m ^a^M1.0313^ea^ bandhaaya  na hoti sakkaaraasaaya pageva pahiinattaa. asappurisassa pana sakkaaraasaa  duvi~n~neyyasabhaavataaya pii.laajananato anto tudanato uddharitu.m  asakku.neyyato ca ^b^sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m^eb^. tato eva tena  ^b^sakkaaro kaapurisena dujjaho^eb^ durubbaheyyo tassa pahaanapa.tipattiyaa  appa.tipajjanato, sakkaaraasaapahaanena pahiino hotiiti. ta.m sutvaa  braahma.no there abhippasanno ahosi.
text.3143: [03] ^b^makka.to pa~ncadvaaraaya^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato valliyattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m kenacideva kara.niiyena ara~n~na.m gato tattha  naarada.m naama paccekasambuddha.m rukkhamuule vasanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  na.lehi saala.m katvaa ti.nehi chaadetvaa adaasi. ca"nkamana.t.thaana~ncassa  sodhetvaa vaalukaa okiritvaa adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m  braahma.namahaasaalassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^valliyo^eb^tissa naama.m  ahosi. so vayappatto yobbanamanuppatto indriyavasiko hutvaa  vicaranto kalyaa.namittasa.msaggena bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ^a^V1.0268^ea^ vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.93-103) --
text.3145: [22] sayambhuu naarado naama, rukkhamuule vasii tadaa..
text.3161: [03] arahatta.m ^a^P2.0007^ea^ pana patvaa puthujjanakaale attano  cittassa ruupaadiaaramma.nesu yathaakaamappavattiyaa, idaani ariyamaggena  niggahitabhaavassa ca vibhaavanena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
text.3166: [21] ``ti.t.tha makka.ta maa dhaavi, na hi te ta.m yathaa pure.
text.3167: [22] niggahiitosi pa~n~naaya, neva duura.m gamissasii''ti.. --  gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3168: [03] tattha ^a^V1.0269^ea^ ^b^gha.t.tayanto^eb^ti attano lolabhaavena rukkhassa a~n~na.m  saakha.m mu~ncitvaa a~n~nassa gaha.nena anekavaara.m tattha rukkha.m caalento  phaluupabhogamakka.to viya tena tena cakkhaadidvaarena ruupaadiaaramma.nesu  a~n~na.m mu~ncitvaa a~n~na.m ga.nhanto cittasantaanassa samaadaanavasena  niccala.m .thaatu.m ^a^M1.0315^ea^ appadaanena abhikkha.na.m gha.t.tayanto caalento tasmi.myeva  ruupaadiaaramma.ne anuparivattati yathaakaama.m vicarati.  vattamaanasamiipataaya cettha vattamaanavacana.m. eva.m anupariyanto ca  ^b^ti.t.tha, makka.ta, maa dhaavi^eb^ tva.m, cittamakka.ta, idaani ti.t.tha maa  dhaavi, ito pa.t.thaaya te dhaavitu.m na sakkaa, tasmaa ^b^na hi te ta.m yathaa  puure^eb^ yasmaa ta.m attabhaavageha.m pubbe viya na te sevita.m  pihitadvaarabhaavato, ki~nca ^b^niggahiitosi pa~n~naaya^eb^ saya~nca idaani  maggapa~n~naaya kilesaabhisa"nkhaarasa"nkhaataana.m paadaana.m chedanena accantika.m  niggaha.m pattosi, tasmaa ^b^neva duura.m gamissasi^eb^ ito attabhaavato  duura.m dutiyaadiattabhaava.m neva gamissasi yaavacarimakacitta.m eva te  gamananti dasseti. ``neto duura''ntipi paa.tho, so evattho.
text.3171: [03] ^b^ti.n.na.m me taalapattaana^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato  ga"ngaatiiriyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa  bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto saasane abhippasanno  hutvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa paaniiyamadaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa gahapatissa putto hutvaa  nibbatti, ``datto''tissa naama.m ahosi. so ^a^P2.0008^ea^  vayappatto gharaavaasa.m vasanto agamaniiya.t.thaanabhaava.m ajaanitvaa viitikkama.m  katvaa puna agamaniiya.t.thaanabhaava.m ~natvaa sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa ta.m kamma.m  jigucchitvaa luukhapa.tipatti.m anuti.t.thanto pa.msukuulaciivara.m chavasittasadisa.m  mattikaapatta~nca gahetvaa ga"ngaatiire tiihi taalapattehi ku.tika.m katvaa  vihaasi, tenevassa ^b^ga"ngaatiiriyo^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi. so  ``arahatta.m appatvaa na kenaci sallapissaamii''ti citta.m adhi.t.thaaya  pa.thama.m sa.mvacchara.m tu.nhiibhuuto vaciibheda.m akarontova vihaasi. dutiye  sa.mvacchare gocaragaame a~n~nataraaya itthiyaa ``muugo nu kho no''ti  viima.msitukaamaaya patte khiira.m aasi~ncantiyaa ^a^M1.0316^ea^ hatthavihaare katepi  okirite, ``ala.m, bhaginii''ti vaaca.m nicchari. tatiye pana  sa.mvacchare antaravasseva gha.tayanto vaayamanto arahatta.m paapu.ni, tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.51-56) --
text.3179: [03] arahaa pana hutvaa attano pubbabhaagapa.tipattiyaa vibhaavanamukhena  a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
text.3185: [22] tatiye antaravassamhi, tamokhandho padaalito''ti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3186: [03] tattha ^b^ti.n.na.m me taalapattaana.m, ga"ngaatiire ku.tii kataa^eb^ti  taalarukkhato pahitehi tiihi taalapa.n.nehi mayha.m vassanaparihara.nattha.m  ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire ku.tikaa kataa. tena attano senaasanasantosa.m  dasseti. vutta~nhi dhammasenaapatinaa --
text.3188: [22] ala.m phaasuvihaaraaya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno''ti..  (theragaa0 985; mi0 pa0 6.1.1).
text.3189: [03] ``taalapattiina''ntipi paa.tho, so evattho. ^b^chavasittova me  patto^eb^ti mayha.m patto chavasittasadiso, mataana.m  khiirasecanaku.n.dasadisoti attho ^a^M1.0317^ea^. ^b^pa.msukuula~nca ciivara^eb^nti  ciivara~nca me antaramaggasusaanaadiisu cha.d.ditanantakehi kata.m pa.msukuula.m.  padadvayena parikkhaarasantosa.m dasseti.
text.3190: [03] ^b^dvinna.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0009^ea^ ^b^antaravassaana^eb^nti dviisu  antaravassesu pabbajitato arahattamappattasa.mvaccharesu. ^b^ekaa vaacaa  me bhaasitaa^eb^ti ekaa, ``ala.m, bhaginii''ti khiirapa.tikkhepavaacaa eva  mayaa vuttaa, a~n~no tattha vaciibhedo naahosi. tena ukka.msagata.m  kaayavaciisa.myama.m dasseti. ^b^tatiye antaravassamhii^eb^ti  ^a^V1.0271^ea^ tatiyassa  sa.mvaccharassa abbhantare, tasmi.m aparipu.n.neyeva. ^b^tamokhandho  padaalito^eb^ti aggamaggena tamokhandho bhinno, avijjaanusayo  samucchinnoti attho. tena tadeka.t.thataaya sabbakilesaana.m  anavasesappahaana.m vadati.
text.3193: [03] ^b^api ce hoti tevijjo^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  ajinattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto buddhasu~n~ne loke  kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto kenacideva kara.niiyena ara~n~na.m gato  tattha sucintita.m naama paccekasambuddha.m aabaadhena pii.lita.m nisinna.m disvaa  upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa bhesajjatthaaya pasannamaanaso ghatama.n.da.m adaasi.  so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa  sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m a~n~natarassa  daliddabraahma.nassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. ta.m vijaayanakaale  ajinacammena sampa.ticchi.msu. tenassa ^b^ajino^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu.  so bhogasa.mvattaniyassa kammassa akatattaa daliddakule nibbatto  vayappattopi appannapaanabhojano hutvaa vicaranto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne  buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m  karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.43.78-87) --
text.3197: [22] katattaa aacitattaa ca, ga"ngaa bhaagiirathii aya.m..
text.32: [03] kaa panetaa ^b^theragaathaa theriigaathaa^eb^ ca, katha~nca pavattaati,  kaama~ncaayamattho gaathaasu vuttoyeva paaka.takara.nattha.m pana punapi vuccate --  tattha theragaathaa taava subhuutittheraadiihi bhaasitaa. yaa hi te attanaa  yathaadhigata.m maggaphalasukha.m paccavekkhitvaa kaaci udaanavasena, kaaci  attano samaapattivihaarapaccavekkha.navasena, kaaci pucchaavasena, kaaci  parinibbaanasamaye saasanassa niyyaanikabhaavavibhaavanavasena abhaasi.msu,  taa sabbaa sa"ngiitikaale ekajjha.m katvaa ``theragaathaa''icceva  dhammasa"ngaahakehi sa"ngiitaa. theriigaathaa pana theriyo uddissa desitaa.
text.3209: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaapi purimakammanissandena appalaabhii  appa~n~naatova ahosi. uddesabhattasalaakabhattaanipi laamakaaneva  paapu.nanti. kammaphaleneva ca na.m puthujjanaa bhikkhuu saama.neraa ca  ``appa~n~naato''ti avama~n~nanti. thero te bhikkhuu sa.mvejento --
text.3214: [21] ``yo ^a^M1.0319^ea^ ^a^P2.0010^ea^ ca kho annapaanassa, laabhii  hotiidha puggalo.
text.3215: [22] paapadhammopi ce hoti, so nesa.m hoti sakkato''ti..  --
text.3217: [03] tattha ^b^apii^eb^ti sambhaavane nipaato. ^b^ce^eb^ti parikappane.  ^b^hotii^eb^ti bhavati. tisso vijjaa etassaati ^b^tevijjo^eb^.  maccu.m pajahatiiti ^b^maccuhaayii^eb^. kaamaasavaadiina.m abhaavena  ^b^anaasavo^eb^. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- dibbacakkhu~naa.na.m  pubbenivaasa~naa.na.m aasavakkhaya~naa.nanti imaasa.m tissanna.m vijjaana.m  adhigatattaa ^b^tevijjo^eb^ tato eva sabbaso kaamaasavaadiina.m  parikkhii.nattaa ^b^anaasavo^eb^ aayati.m punabbhavassa aggaha.nato  mara.naabhaavena ^b^maccuhaayii^eb^ yadipi hoti, eva.m santepi  ^b^appa~n~naatoti na.m baalaa avajaananti^eb^ yassatthaaya kulaputtaa  sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, ta.m sadattha.m anupaapu.nitvaa  .thitampi na.m uttama.m purisa.m ``dhutavaado bahussuto dhammakathiko''ti  uppannalaabhassa abhaavato ``na pa~n~naato na paaka.to''ti baalaa  dummedhapuggalaa avajaananti, kasmaa? ^b^ajaanataa^eb^ ajaananakaara.naa  gu.naana.m ajaananameva tattha kaara.nanti dasseti.
text.3218: [03] yathaa ca gu.naana.m ajaananato baalaa laabhagarutaaya sambhaavaniiyampi  avajaananti, eva.m gu.naana.m ajaananato laabhagarutaaya eva.m  avajaanitabbampi sambhaaventiiti dassento dutiya.m gaatha.m aaha. tattha  ^b^yo^eb^ti aniyamavacana.m. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireke, tena  yathaavuttapuggalato imassa puggalassa vuccamaana.myeva visesa.m janeti.  ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhaara.ne. ^b^annapaanassaa^eb^ti nidassanamatta.m.  ^b^laabhii^eb^ti laabhavaa. ^b^idhaa^eb^ti imasmi.m loke. jaraamara.nehi  tassa tassa sattaavaasassa puura.nato galanato ^a^V1.0273^ea^ ca ^b^puggalo.  paapadhammo^eb^ti laamakadhammo. aya~nhettha attho -- yo pana puggalo  ciivaraadipaccayamattasseva laabhii hoti, na jhaanaadiina.m, so paapicchataaya  dussiilabhaavena hiinadhammopi samaano idha imasmi.m loke baalaana.m  laabhagarutaaya sakkato garukato hotiiti.
text.322: [22] mudito hohi tva.m brahme, lacchase ta.m manoratha.m..
text.3221: [03] ^b^yadaaha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0320^ea^ ^b^dhammamassosi^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato  me.lajinattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato  kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m ^a^P2.0011^ea^ patto ekadivasa.m  bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso madhura.m aamodaphala.m  adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m  buddhuppaade baaraa.nasiya.m khattiyakule nibbattitvaa ^b^me.lajino^eb^ti  laddhanaamo vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato pa.n.dito byatto disaasu  paaka.to ahosi. so bhagavati baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane viharante  vihaara.m gantvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho  pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa tadaheva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.57-62) --
text.3229: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa aparabhaage bhikkhuuhi, ``aavuso, ki.m tayaa  uttarimanussadhammo adhigato''ti pu.t.tho siihanaada.m nadanto --
text.3235: [22] magge pa.tipadaaya.m vaa, ka"nkhaa mayha.m na vijjatii''ti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3236: [03] tattha ^a^M1.0321^ea^ ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m kaale. ^b^aha^eb^nti attaana.m  niddisati. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhamma.m. ^b^assosi^eb^nti  su.ni.m. ^b^satthuno^eb^ti di.t.thadhammikaadiatthehi veneyyaana.m saasana.t.thena  satthuno. ^b^ka"nkha^eb^nti sa.msaya.m. sa"nkhatamasa"nkhata~nca  anavasesato jaanana.t.thena ^b^sabba~n~nuu^eb^. kutocipi paraajitaa bhaavena  ^b^aparaajite^eb^. veneyyasattaana.m sa.msaarakantaarato nibbaana.m  pa.tivaahana.t.thena ^b^satthavaahe^eb^. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yato pabhuti aha.m  satthuno dhamma.m desentassa catusacca^b^dhamma.m assosi.m^eb^  sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaaresi.m upalabhi.m, tato pa.t.thaaya  anavasesasa"nkhataasa"nkhatasammutidhammaana.m sayambhuu~naa.nena jaananato  ^b^sabba~n~nuu^eb^ anaavara.nadassaavimhi, pa~ncannampi maaraana.m abhibhavanato  tehi aparaajitattaa sadevake loke appa.tihatadhammacakkattaa ca  ^b^aparaajite,^eb^ veneyyasattaana.m lobhakantaaraadito vaahana.t.thena  ^b^satthavaahe,^eb^ mahaavikkantataaya ^b^mahaaviire,^eb^ a~n~nehi duddamaana.m  purisadammaana.m sara.nato accantikena damathena damanato ^b^saarathiina.m^eb^  pavarabhuute ^b^uttame^eb^ sammaasambuddhe ^a^P2.0012^ea^, ``buddho nu  kho no nu kho''ti ^b^ka"nkha.m naabhijaanaami^eb^ aparappaccayabhaavato.  tathaaruupe desite ariya^b^magge^eb^ tadupaadaayabhuutaaya ca  siilaadi^b^pa.tipadaaya^eb^ ``niyyaaniko nu kho na nu kho''ti  ^b^ka"nkhaa^eb^ vicikicchaa ^b^na vijjati^eb^ natthiiti. ettha ca  ariyadhamme sa.msayaabhaavakathanena ariyasa"nghepi sa.msayaabhaavo  kathitoyevaati da.t.thabba.m tattha pati.t.thitassa ana~n~nathaabhaavatoti.
text.3239: [03] ^b^yathaa agaara.m ducchanna^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato raadhattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale  ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vihaara.m gantvaa  satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno satthaaraa eka.m  bhikkhu.m pa.tibhaaneyyakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m disvaa saya.m ta.m .thaanantara.m  patthetvaa mahaadaana.m ^a^M1.0322^ea^ pavattesi. satthu u.laara~nca puuja.m akaasi. so  eva.m katapa.nidhaano tato cuto tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto  vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya gacchanta.m ^a^V1.0275^ea^ disvaa pasannamaanaso madhuraani  ambaphalaanii adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa  aparaapara.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato  kaale raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^raadho^eb^ti laddhanaamo  vayappatto hutvaa gharaavaasa.m vasanto mahallakakaale puttadaarehi apasaadito,  ``ki.m me gharaavaasena, pabbajissaamii''ti vihaara.m gantvaa there bhikkhuu  upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaacitvaa tehi ``aya.m braahma.no ji.n.no na  sakkoti vattapa.tivatta.m puuretu''nti pa.tikkhitto satthu santika.m gantvaa  attano ajjhaasaya.m pavedetvaa satthaaraa upanissayasampatti.m oloketvaa  aa.nattena dhammasenaapatinaa pabbaajito vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva  arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.51.63-67) --

text.3245: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa satthu santikaavacaro hutvaa vicaranto satthu  dhammadesanaapa.tibhaanassa paccayabhuutaana.m pa.tibhaanajaananakaana.m aggo jaato.  therassa hi di.t.thisamudaacaara~nca aagamma dasabalassa ^a^P2.0013^ea^  navanavaa dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati. tenaaha bhagavaa --  ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tibhaaneyyakaana.m  yadida.m raadho''ti (a0 ni0  1.219, 233). so ekadivasa.m  ``ime sattaa abhaavanaaya raagena abhibhuyyanti, bhaavanaaya sati ta.m  natthii''ti bhaavana.m thomento ^b^``yathaa agaara''^eb^ntiaadinaa  gaathaadvayamaaha.

text.3261: [03] ^b^sukha.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0277^ea^ ^b^supantii^eb^ti aayasmato gotamattherassa  gaathaa. kaa  uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  aamodaphalamadaasi. tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m  pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe  braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^gotamo^eb^ti laddhanaamo sattavassikakaale  upanayana.m katvaa ratanabhikkha.m caritvaa sahassa.m labhitvaa ta.m taadise  .thaane .thapetvaa vata.m caranto so.lasasattarasavassuddesikakaale  akalyaa.namittehi kaamesu pariniiyamaano ekissaa ruupuupajiiviniyaa ta.m  sahassabha.n.dika.m datvaa brahmacariyavinaasa.m patvaa taaya cassa brahmacaariruupa.m  disvaa virattaakaare dassite ekarattivaaseneva nibbinnaruupo attano  brahmacariyanivaasa.m dhanajaani~nca saritvaa ``ayutta.m mayaa kata''nti  vippa.tisaarii ahosi. satthaa tassa hetusampatti.m cittaacaara~nca ~natvaa  ^a^P2.0015^ea^ tassa aasanna.t.thaane ^a^M1.0325^ea^ attaana.m dassesi. so satthaara.m  disvaa pasannamaanaso upasa"nkami, tassa bhagavaa dhamma.m desesi. so  dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajanto khuraggeyeva arahatta.m paapu.ni.  tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.80-84) --
text.3267: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa jhaanasukhena phalasukhena viitinaamenta.m eko  gihisahaayo upagantvaa, ``aavuso, tayaa ratanabhikkhaaya laddha.m  pabbajanto ki.m akaasii''ti pucchi. ta.m sutvaa thero ``ida.m naama  kata''nti anaacikkhitvaa maatugaame dosa.m pakaasetvaa attano  viitaraagabhaavena a~n~na.m byaakaronto ^b^``sukha.m supantii''^eb^tiaadinaa  gaathaadvayamaaha.
text.3268: [03] 137^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sukha.m supanti munayo, ye itthiisu na  bajjhare^eb^ti ye itthiisu visayabhuutaasu nimittabhuutaasu vaa raagabandhanena  na bajjhanti, te munayo tapassino sa.myatindriyaa sukha.m supanti sukha.m  viharanti, natthi tesa.m dukkhanti adhippaayo. ``supantii''ti hi  nidassanamattameta.m. ^b^sadaa ve^eb^ ^a^V1.0278^ea^ ^b^rakkhitabbaasuu^eb^ti eka.msena  sabbakaala.m rakkhitabbaasu. itthiyo hi sattabhuumike nippurise paasaade  uparibhuumiya.m vasaapetvaapi, kucchiya.m pakkhipitvaapi na sakkaa rakkhitu.m,  tasmaa taa ki.t.thaadigaaviyo viya sabbakaala.m rakkha.niiyaa honti.  bahucittataaya vaa saamikena vatthaala"nkaaraanuppadaanaadinaa citta~n~nathattato  sabbakaala.m rakkhitabbaa. sariirasabhaava.m vaa maalaagandhaadiihi  pa.ticchaadanavasena rakkhitabbacittataaya rakkhitabbaati. ^b^yaasu  sacca.m sudullabha^eb^nti yaasu saccavacana.m laddhu.m na sakkaa, itthiyo hi  aggimpi pavisanti, visampi khaadanti, satthampi aaharanti,  ubbandhitvaapi kaala.m karonti, na pana sacce .thaatu.m sakkonti. tasmaa  evaruupaa itthiyo vajjetvaa .thitaa munayo sukhitaa vataati dasseti.
text.3269: [03] 138^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M1.0326^ea^ yassa appahiinattaa evaruupaasu itthiisupi  bajjhanti, tassa kaamassa attano suppahiinata.m accantani.t.thitata~nca  dassento dutiya.m gaathamaaha. ^b^vadha.m carimha te kaamaa^eb^ti ambho  kaama, ^a^P2.0016^ea^ tava vadha.m accantasamuccheda.m ariyamaggena  carimha, ``vadha.m carimhase''tipi paa.tho, vadhaaya pahaanaaya  maggabrahmacariya.m acarimhaati attho. ^b^ana.naa daani te maya^eb^nti  idaani aggamaggapattito pa.t.thaaya i.nabhaavakaraaya pahiinattaa kaama te  ana.naa maya.m, na tuyha.m i.na.m dhaarema. aviitaraago hi raagassa vase  vattanato tassa i.na.m dhaarento viya hoti, viitaraago pana ta.m  atikkamitvaa paramena cittissariyena samannaagato. ana.nattaa eva  ^b^gacchaama daani nibbaana.m, yattha gantvaa na socati^eb^ yasmi.m  nibbaane gamanahetu sabbaso sokahetuuna.m abhaavato na socati, ta.m  anupaadisesanibbaanameva idaani gacchaama anupaapu.naamaati attho.
text.3272: [03] ^b^pubbe hanati attaana^eb^nti aayasmato vasabhattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto buddhasu~n~ne loke braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa  vayappatto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gantvaa  nekkhammajjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  cuddasasahassataapasaparivaaro himavantassa aviduure samagge naama pabbate  assama.m kaaretvaa vasanto jhaanaabhi~n~naayo nibbattetvaa taapasaana.m  ovaadaanusaasaniyo dento ekadivasa.m eva.m cintesi -- ``aha.m kho  daani imehi taapasehi sakkato garukato puujito viharaami, mayaa pana  puujetabbo na upalabbhati, dukkho kho panaaya.m ^a^V1.0279^ea^ loke yadida.m  agaruvaaso''ti. eva.m pana cintetvaa purimabuddhesu kataadhikaarataaya  purimabuddhaana.m cetiye attanaa kata.m puujaasakkaara.m anussaritvaa ``ya.mnuunaaha.m  purimabuddhe uddissa pulinacetiya.m katvaa puuja.m kareyya''nti ha.t.thatu.t.tho  ^a^M1.0327^ea^ iddhiyaa pulinathuupa.m suva.n.namaya.m maapetvaa suva.n.namayaadiihi  tisahassamattehi pupphehi devasika.m puuja.m karonto yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani  katvaa aparihiinajjhaano kaala.m katvaa brahmaloke nibbatto. tatthapi  yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto taavati.mse nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m licchaviraajakule  nibbattitvaa ^b^vasabho^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto bhagavato  vesaaligamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m  pa.t.thapetvaa ^a^P2.0017^ea^ nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.50.57-92) --

text.3347: [03] tattha ^b^pubbe hanati attaana^eb^nti kuhakapuggalo attano  kuhakavuttiyaa loka.m va~ncento paapicchataadiihi paapadhammehi pa.thamameva  attaana.m hanati, attano kusalako.t.thaasa.m vinaaseti. ^b^pacchaa hanati  so pare^eb^ti so kuhako pa.thama.m taava vuttanayena attaana.m hantvaa pacchaa  pare yehi ``aya.m ^a^V1.0282^ea^ bhikkhu pesalo ariyo''ti vaa sambhaaventehi kaaraa  kataa, te hanati tesa.m kaaraani attani kataani amahapphalaani katvaa  paccayavinaasanena vinaaseti. satipi kuhakassa ubhayahanane attahanane  pana aya.m visesoti dassento aaha ^b^suhata.m hanti attaana^eb^nti.  so kuhako attaana.m hananto suhata.m katvaa hanti vinaaseti, yathaa ki.m?  ^b^viita.mseneva pakkhimaa^eb^ti, ^b^viita.mso^eb^ti diipakasaku.no, tena.  ^b^pakkhimaa^eb^ti saaku.niko. yathaa tena viita.msasaku.nena a~n~ne  saku.ne va~ncetvaa hananto attaana.m idha lokepi hanati  vi~n~nugarahasaavajjasabhaavaadinaa, samparaaya.m pana duggatiparikkilesena  hanatiyeva, na pana te saku.ne pacchaa hantu.m sakkoti, eva.m kuhakopi  koha~n~nena loka.m va~ncetvaa idha lokepi ^a^P2.0018^ea^ attaana.m  hanati vippa.tisaaravi~n~nugarahaadiihi, paralokepi duggatiparikkilesehi,  na pana te paccayadaayake apaayadukkha.m paapeti. apica kuhako  dakkhi.naaya amahapphalabhaavakara.neneva ^a^M1.0331^ea^ daayaka.m hanatiiti vutto, na  nipphalabhaavakara.nena. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``dussiilassa  manussabhuutassa daana.m datvaa sahassagu.naa dakkhi.naa paa.tika"nkhitabbaa''ti  (ma0 ni0 3.379). tenaaha ^b^``suhata.m hanti attaana''^eb^nti.
text.3348: [03] eva.m baahiraparimajjanamatte .thitaa puggalaa suddhaa naama na honti,  abbhantarasuddhiyaa eva pana suddhaa hontiiti dassento ^b^``na  braahma.no''^eb^ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tassattho --  iriyaapathasa.n.thapanaadibahisampattimattena braahma.no na hoti.  sampattiattho hi idha ^b^va.n.na^eb^-saddo. abbhantare pana  siilaadisampattiyaa braahma.no hoti, ``baahitapaapo ^b^braahma.no''^eb^ti  katvaa. tasmaa ^b^``yasmi.m paapaani^eb^ laamakaani ^b^kammaani^eb^  sa.mvijjanti, eka.msena so ^b^ka.nho^eb^ nihiinapuggalo''ti  ^b^sujampati,^eb^ devaanaminda, jaanaahi. ta.m sutvaa sakko kuhakabhikkhu.m  tajjetvaa ``dhamme vattaahii''ti ovaditvaa saka.t.thaanameva gato.

text.3381: [01] tattha ^b^sussuusaa^eb^ti sotabbayuttassa sabbasutassa  sotumicchaa, garusannivaasopi. di.t.thadhammikaadibheda~nhi attha.m  sotumicchantena kalyaa.namitte upasa"nkamitvaa vattakara.nena payirupaasitvaa  yadaa te payirupaasanaaya aaraadhitacittaa ka~nci upanisiiditukaamaa  honti, atha ne upanisiiditvaa adhigataaya sotumicchaaya  ohitasotena sotabba.m hotiiti garusannivaasopi sussuusaahetutaaya  ``sussuusaa''ti vuccati. saa panaaya.m sussuusaa  saccapa.ticcasamuppaadaadipa.tisa.myutta.m suta.m ta.msama"ngino puggalassa va.d.dheti  bruuhetiiti ^b^sutavaddhanii,^eb^ baahusaccakaariiti attho. ^b^suta.m pa~n~naaya  vaddhana^eb^nti ya.m ta.m ``sutadharo sutasannicayo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.339;  a0 ni0  4.22) ``idhekaccassa bahuka.m suta.m hoti sutta.m geyya.m  veyyaakara.na''nti (a0 ni0  4.6) ca evamaadinaa nayena vutta.m  baahusacca.m, ta.m akusalappahaanakusalaadhigamanahetubhuuta.m pa~n~na.m vaddhetiiti suta.m  pa~n~naaya vaddhana.m, vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --

text.3387: [03] .thitaaya bhaavanaapa~n~naaya sutamatteneva na sijjhatiiti tassaa  pa.tipajjanavidhi.m dassento ^b^``sevetha...pe0...vippamokkha''^eb^nti  aaha. tattha ^b^sevetha pantaani senaasanaanii^eb^ti kaayavivekamaaha.  tena sa.myojanappahaanassa ca vakkhamaanattaa vivekaarahasseva  vivekavaasoti siilasa.mvaraadayo idha avuttasiddhaa veditabbaa.  ^b^careyya sa.myojanavippamokkha^eb^nti yathaa sa.myojanehi citta.m  vippamuccati, tathaa vipassanaabhaavana.m maggabhaavana~nca careyya  pa.tipajjeyyaati attho. ^b^sace rati.m naadhigaccheyya tatthaa^eb^ti tesu  pantasenaasanesu yathaaladdhesu adhikusaladhammesu ca rati.m pubbenaapara.m  visesassa alaabhato abhirati.m na labheyya, ^b^sa"nghe^eb^ bhikkhusamuuhe  ^b^rakkhitatto^eb^ kamma.t.thaanapariga.nhanato rakkhitacitto chasu dvaaresu  satiaarakkhaaya upa.t.thapanena ^b^satimaa vaseyya^eb^ vihareyya, eva.m  viharantassa ca api naama sa.myojanavippamokkho bhaveyyaati adhippaayo.
text.339: [21] ``satasahasse kata.m kamma.m, phala.m dassesi me idha.
text.3390: [03] ^b^ye kho te^eb^ti aayasmato jotidaasattherassa gaathaa. kaa  uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani  upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  ^a^V1.0286^ea^ vi~n~nuta.m  patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya gacchanta.m disvaa pasannacitto  kaasumaarikaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu  sa.msaranto imasmi.m ^a^M1.0335^ea^ buddhuppaade paadiyatthajanapade vibhavasampannassa  braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^jotidaaso^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi.  so vi~n~nuta.m patvaa gharamaavasanto ekadivasa.m mahaakassapatthera.m attano  gaame pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannacitto bhojetvaa therassa santike  dhamma.m sutvaa attano gaamasamiipe pabbate mahanta.m vihaara.m kaaretvaa thera.m  tattha vaasetvaa catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahanto therassa dhammadesanaaya  pa.tiladdhasa.mvego pabbajitvaa ^a^P2.0021^ea^ vipassanaaya kamma.m  karonto nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.51.51-56) --
text.3395: [21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
text.3398: [01] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa tii.ni pi.takaani uggahetvaa  visesato vinayapi.take sukusalabhaava.m patvaa dasavassiko parisupa.t.thaako  ca hutvaa bahuuhi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m bhagavanta.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m gacchanto  antaraamagge addhaanaparissamavinodanattha.m titthiyaana.m aaraama.m pavisitvaa  ekamanta.m nisinno eka.m pa~ncatapa.m tapanta.m braahma.na.m disvaa, ``ki.m,  braahma.na, a~n~nasmi.m tapaniiye a~n~na.m tapatii''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa  braahma.no kupito, ``bho, mu.n.daka, ki.m a~n~na.m tapaniiya''nti aaha.  thero tassa --
text.3399: [21] ``kopo ca issaa parahe.thanaa ca, maano ca saarambhamado  pamaado.
text.3400: [22] ta.nhaa avijjaa bhavasa"ngatii ca, te tappaniiyaa na hi  ruupakhandho''ti.. --
text.3401: [25] gaathaaya dhamma.m desesi. ta.m sutvaa so braahma.no tasmi.m  titthiyaaraame sabbe a~n~natitthiyaa ca therassa santike pabbaji.msu.  thero tehi ^a^M1.0336^ea^ saddhi.m saavatthi.m gantvaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa katipaaha.m tattha  vasitvaa attano jaatibhuumi.myeva gato dassanattha.m upagatesu ~naatakesu  naanaaladdhike ya~n~nasuddhike ovadanto --
text.3403: [21] ``ye ^a^V1.0287^ea^ kho te ve.thamissena, naanattena ca kammunaa.
text.3405: [22] tepi tattheva kiiranti, na hi kamma.m panassati..
text.3407: [21] ``ya.m karoti naro kamma.m, kalyaa.na.m yadi paapaka.m.
text.3408: [22] tassa tasseva daayaado, ya.m ya.m kamma.m pakubbatii''ti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3409: [03] tattha ^b^ye^eb^ti aniyamuddeso. ^b^te^eb^ti aniyamato eva  pa.tiniddeso. padadvayassaapi ``janaa''ti iminaa sambandho.  ^b^kho^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^ve.thamissenaa^eb^ti varattakha.n.daadinaa  siisaadiisu ve.thadaanena. ``vedhamissenaa''tipi paa.li, so evattho.  ^b^naanattena ca kammunaa^eb^ti hananaghaatanahatthapaadaadicchedanena  khuddakase.ladaanaadinaa ^a^P2.0022^ea^ ca naanaavidhena  paruupaghaatakammena. ^b^manusse^eb^ti nidassanamatta.m, tasmaa ye keci  satteti adhippaayo. ^b^uparundhantii^eb^ti vibaadhenti.  ^b^pharusuupakkamaa^eb^ti daaru.napayogaa, kuruurakammantaati attho.  ^b^janaa^eb^ti sattaa. ^b^tepi tattheva kiirantii^eb^ti te vuttappakaaraa  puggalaa yaahi kammakaara.naahi a~n~ne baadhi.msu. ^b^tattheva^eb^ taasuyeva  kaara.naasu sayampi kiiranti pakkhipiiyanti, tathaaruupa.myeva dukkha.m  anubhavantiiti attho. ``tatheva kiirantii''ti ca paa.tho, yathaa saya.m  a~n~nesa.m dukkha.m aka.msu, tatheva a~n~nehi kariiyanti, dukkha.m paapiiyantiiti  attho, kasmaa? ^b^na hi kamma.m panassati^eb^ kamma~nhi ekanta.m  upacita.m vipaaka.m adatvaa na vigacchati, avasesapaccayasamavaaye  vipaccatevaati adhippaayo.
text.3410: [03] idaani ``na hi kamma.m panassatii''ti sa"nkhepato vuttamattha.m  vibhajitvaa sattaana.m kammassakata.m vibhaavetu.m ^b^``ya.m karotii''^eb^ti  gaatha.m abhaasi. tassattho ^b^ya.m kamma.m kalyaa.na.m^eb^ kusala.m, ^b^yadi^eb^  vaa ^b^paapaka.m^eb^ akusala.m satto ^a^M1.0337^ea^ ^b^karoti,^eb^ karonto ca tattha  ^b^ya.m kamma.m^eb^ yathaa phaladaanasamattha.m hoti, tathaa ^b^pakubbati^eb^  upacinoti. ^b^tassa tasseva daayaado^eb^ti tassa tasseva  kammaphalassa ga.nhanato tena tena kammena daatabbavipaakassa bhaagii  hotiiti attho. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``kammassakaa, maa.nava, sattaa  kammadaayaadaa''tiaadi (ma0 ni0 3.289). imaa gaathaa sutvaa  therassa ~naatakaa kammassakataaya.m pati.t.thahi.msuuti.
text.3413: [03] ^b^accayanti^eb^ ^a^V1.0288^ea^ ^b^ahorattaa^eb^ti aayasmato hera~n~nakaanittherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale  ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto paresa.m bhatako hutvaa  jiivanto ekadivasa.m sujaatassa naama satthusaavakassa pa.msukuula.m  pariyesantassa upa.d.dhadussa.m pariccaji. so tena pu~n~nakammena  taavati.msesu nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m  buddhuppaade kosalara~n~no gaamabhojakassa coravosaasakassa putto hutvaa  ^a^P2.0023^ea^ nibbatti, ^b^hera~n~nakaanii^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi.  so vayappatto pitu accayena ra~n~naa tasmi.myeva gaamabhojaka.t.thaane .thapito  jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho attano kani.t.thassa  ta.m .thaanantara.m daapetvaa raajaana.m aapucchitvaa pabbajitvaa vipassana.m  pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.50.31-40) --
text.3429: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano kani.t.thabhaatara.m tato kammato  nivattetukaamo tasmi.myeva kamme abhirata.m disvaa ta.m codento --
text.3434: [21] ``atha paapaani kammaani, kara.m baalo na bujjhati.
text.3435: [22] pacchaassa ka.tuka.m hoti, vipaako hissa paapako''ti.. --
text.3437: [03] tattha ^b^accayantii^eb^ti atikkamanti, lahu.m lahu.m apagacchantiiti  attho. ^b^ahorattaa^eb^ti rattindivaa. ^b^jiivita.m uparujjhatii^eb^ti  jiivitindriya~nca kha.nikanirodhavasena nirujjhati. vutta~nhi ``kha.ne  kha.ne, tva.m bhikkhu, jaayasi ca jiyyasi ca miyyasi ca cavasi ca  upapajjasi caa''ti. ^b^aayu khiiyati maccaana^eb^nti  maritabbasabhaavattaa ^b^maccaa^eb^ti laddhanaamaana.m imesa.m sattaana.m ^b^aayu^eb^  ``yo cira.m jiivati, so vassasata.m appa.m vaa bhiyyo''ti (dii0 ni0  2.91; sa.m0 ni0  2.143; a0 ni0  7.74) eva.m  paricchinnakaalaparamaayu ^b^khiiyati^eb^ khaya~nca sambheda~nca gacchati,  yathaa ki.m? ^b^kunnadiina.mva odaka.m^eb^ yathaa naama kunnadiina.m pabbateyyaana.m  khuddakanadiina.m udaka.m cira.m na ti.t.thati, lahutara.m khiiyati, aagatamatta.myeva  vigacchati, eva.m sattaana.m aayu lahutara.m khiiyati khaya.m gacchati. ettha  ca udakameva ``odaka''nti vutta.m, yathaa manoyeva maanasanti.
text.3438: [03] ^b^atha^eb^ ^a^M1.0339^ea^ ^b^paapaani kammaani, kara.m baalo na bujjhatii^eb^ti eva.m  sa.msaare aniccepi samaane baalo lobhavasena vaa kodhavasena vaa paapaani  kammaani karoti, karontopi na bujjhati, paapa.m karonto ca ``paapa.m  karomii''ti abujjhanako naama natthi, ``imassa kammassa evaruupo  dukkho vipaako''ti pana ajaananato ``na bujjhatii''ti vutta.m.  ^b^pacchaassa ka.tuka.m hotii^eb^ti yadipi paapassa kammassa  aayuuhanakkha.ne ``imassa kammassa evaruupo vipaako''ti na bujjhati,  tato pacchaa pana nirayaadiisu nibbattassa ^a^P2.0024^ea^ assa  baalassa ka.tuka.m ani.t.tha.m dukkhameva hoti. ^b^vipaako hissa  paapako^eb^ yasmaa assa paapakammassa naama vipaako paapako nihiino  ani.t.tho evaati. ima.m pana ovaada.m sutvaa therassa kani.t.thabhaataa raajaana.m  aapucchitvaa pabbajitvaa nacirasseva sadattha.m nipphaadesi.
text.3441: [01] ^b^paritta.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0290^ea^ ^b^daaru^eb^nti aayasmato somamittattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto buddhagu.ne sutvaa pasannamaanaso ekadivasa.m ki.msukarukkha.m  pupphita.m disvaa pupphaani gahetvaa satthaara.m uddissa aakaase khipitvaa  puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m  buddhuppaade baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^somamitto^eb^ti  laddhanaamo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa vimalena naama therena  kataparicayattaa abhi.nha.m tassa santika.m gacchanto dhamma.m sutvaa saasane  laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado vattapa.tivatta.m puurento vicarati.  vimalatthero pana kusiito middhabahulo rattindiva.m viitinaameti.  somamitto ``kusiita.m naama nissaaya ko gu.no''ti ta.m pahaaya  mahaakassapatthera.m upasa"nkamitvaa tassa ovaade .thatvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa  nacirasseva arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.50.25-30) --

text.3460: [03] tattha ^a^V1.0291^ea^ ^b^paritta.m daarumaaruyha, yathaa siide maha.n.nave^eb^ti  pesalopi kulaputto kusiita.m alasapuggala.m nissaaya siidati sa.msaare  patati, na tassa paara.m nibbaana.m gacchati. yasmaa ^a^P2.0025^ea^  etadeva.m, ^b^tasmaa ta.m^eb^ adhikusaladhammavasena siisa.m anukkhipitvaa  kucchita.m siidanato ^b^kusiita.m^eb^ viiriyaarambhaabhaavato ^b^hiinaviiriya.m^eb^  puggala.m sabbathaa vajjeyya, na tassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyaati attho.
text.3461: [03] eva.m puggalaadhi.t.thaanaaya gaathaaya kosajje aadiinava.m dassetvaa  idaani viiriyaarambhe aanisa.mse dassetu.m ^b^``pavivittehii''^eb^tiaadi  vutta.m. tassattho ^a^M1.0341^ea^ -- ye pana kaayavivekasambhavena ^b^pavivittaa,^eb^  tato eva kilesehi aarakattaa ^b^ariyaa,^eb^ nibbaana.m  patipesitattataaya ^b^pahitattaa^eb^ aaramma.nuupanijjhaanavasena  lakkha.nuupanijjhaanavasena ca ^b^jhaayino,^eb^ sabbakaala.m  paggahitaviiriyataaya ^b^aaraddhaviiriyaa,^eb^ lokiyalokuttarabhedaaya  pa~n~naaya samannaagatattaa ^b^pa.n.ditaa,^eb^ tehiyeva ^b^saha^eb^ aavaseyya  sadattha.m nipphaadetukaamo sa.mvaseyyaati. ta.m sutvaa vimalatthero  sa.mviggamaanaso vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa sadattha.m aaraadhesi. svaayamattho  parato aagamissati.
text.3464: [03] ^b^jano janamhi sambaddho^eb^ti aayasmato sabbamittattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito dvaanavute kappe tissassa bhagavato  kaale nesaadakule nibbattitvaa vanacaariko hutvaa vane mige vadhitvaa  ma.msa.m khaadanto jiivati. athassa bhagavaa anugga.nhanattha.m  vasana.t.thaanasamiipe tii.ni padacetiyaani dassetvaa pakkaami. so  atiitakaale sammaasambuddhesu kataparicayattaa cakka"nkitaani disvaa  pasannamaanaso kora.n.dapupphehi puuja.m katvaa tena pu~n~nakammena  taavati.msabhavane nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m  buddhuppaade saavatthinagare braahma.nakule nibbatti, ^b^sabbamitto^eb^tissa  naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto jetavanapa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m  disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto  vassa.m upagantvaa vu.t.thavasso bhagavanta.m vanditu.m saavatthi.m gacchanto  antaraamagge maagavikehi o.d.dite paase migapotaka.m baddha.m addasa. maataa  panassa migii paasa.m appavi.t.thaapi puttasinehena duura.m na gacchati,  mara.nabhayena paasasamiipampi na upagacchati migapotako ca bhiito ito  cito ca parivattento karu.na.m vilapati, ta.m disvaa thero ^a^V1.0292^ea^, ``aho  sattaana.m snehahetuka.m dukkha''nti gacchanto tato para.m sambahule core eka.m  ^a^M1.0342^ea^ purisa.m jiivagaaha.m gahetvaa ^a^P2.0026^ea^ palaalave.niyaa sariira.m  ve.thetvaa jhaapente, ta~nca mahaavirava.m viravanta.m disvaa tadubhaya.m nissaaya  sa~njaatasa.mvego tesa.m coraana.m su.nantaana.myeva --
text.3467: [22] jano janena he.thiiyati, he.theti ca jano jana.m..
text.3469: [21] ``ko hi tassa janenattho, janena janitena vaa.
text.3470: [22] jana.m ohaaya gaccha.m ta.m, he.thayitvaa bahu.m jana''nti.. --  gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3471: [03] tattha ^b^jano^eb^ti andhabaalajano. ^b^janamhii^eb^ti a~n~ne  jane. ^b^sambaddho^eb^ti ta.nhaabandhanena baddho. ``aya.m me putto,  maataa''tiaadinaa pa.tibaddho. ayameva vaa paa.tho, ``ime ma.m posenti,  aha.m ime nissaaya jiivaamii''ti pa.tibaddhacittoti attho.  ^b^janamevassito jano^eb^ti ``aya.m me putto, dhiitaa''tiaadinaa  a~n~nameva jana.m a~n~no jano assito ta.nhaaya alliino pariggayha  .thito. ^b^jano janena he.thiiyati, he.theti ca jano jana^eb^nti  kammassakataaya yathaabhuutaavabodhassa ca abhaavato ajjhupekkhana.m akatvaa  lobhavasena yathaa jano jana.m assito, eva.m dosavasena jano janena  he.thiiyati vibaadhiiyati. ``tayida.m mayha.mva upari he.thanaphalavasena  paripatissatii''ti ajaananto he.theti ca jano jana.m.
text.3472: [03] ^b^ko hi tassa janenattho^eb^ti tassa a~n~najanassa a~n~nena  janena ta.nhaavasena assitena dosavasena he.thitena vaa ko attho.  ^b^janena janitena vaa^eb^ti maataapitaa hutvaa tena a~n~nena janena  janitena vaa ko attho. ^b^jana.m ohaaya gaccha.m ta.m, he.thayitvaa bahu.m  jana^eb^nti yasmaa sa.msaare carato janassa ayamevaanuruupaa pa.tipatti,  tasmaa ta.m jana.m, tassa ca baadhikaa yaa saa ta.nhaa ca, yo ca so  doso eva bahu.m jana.m baadhayitvaa .thito, ta~nca ohaaya sabbaso pahaaya  pariccajitvaa ^a^M1.0343^ea^ gaccha.m, tehi anupadduta.m .thaana.m gaccheyya.m paapu.neyyanti attho.  eva.m ^a^P2.0027^ea^ pana vatvaa thero taavadeva vipassana.m  ussukkaapetvaa arahattamapaapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.50.15-24) --

text.3488: [03] te pana coraa therassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa sa.mvegajaataa  pabbajitvaa dhammaanudhamma.m pa.tipajji.msuuti.
text.349: [03] tathaa katakicco panaaya.m mahaathero pubbe diigharatta.m attano  ka"nkhaapakatacittata.m idaani sabbaso vigataka"nkhata~nca paccavekkhitvaa  ``aho nuuna mayha.m satthuno desanaanubhaavo, tenetarahi eva.m  vigataka"nkho ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto jaato''ti sa~njaatabahumaano  bhagavato pa~n~na.m pasa.msanto ^b^``pa~n~na.m ima.m passaa''^eb^ti ima.m gaathamaaha.
text.3491: [03] ^b^kaa.lii^eb^ ^a^M1.0344^ea^ ^b^itthii^eb^ti aayasmato mahaakaa.lattherassa  gaathaa. kaa  uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani  upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  kenacideva kara.niiyena ara~n~na.m gato tattha a~n~natarassa rukkhassa  saakhaaya olambamaana.m pa.msukuulaciivara.m disvaa ``ariyaddhajo  olambatii''ti pasannacitto ki"nka.nipupphaani gahetvaa pa.msukuula.m puujesi.  so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  setabyanagare satthavaahakule nibbattitvaa ^b^mahaakaa.lo^eb^ti laddhanaamo  vi~n~nuta.m patvaa gharaavaasa.m vasanto pa~ncahi saka.tasatehi bha.n.da.m gahetvaa  vaa.nijjavasena saavatthi.m gato ekamanta.m saka.tasattha.m nivesetvaa  addhaanaparissama.m vinodetvaa attano parisaaya saddhi.m nisinno  saayanhasamaya.m gandhamaalaadihatthe upaasake jetavana.m gacchante disvaa  sayampi tehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sosaanika"nga.m adhi.t.thaaya susaane vasati.  athekadivasa.m ^b^kaa.lii^eb^ naama ekaa itthii chava.daahikaa therassa  kamma.t.thaanatthaaya aciramatasariira.m ubho satthii ^a^V1.0294^ea^ bhinditvaa ubho ca baahuu  bhinditvaa siisa~nca dadhithaalaka.m viya bhinditvaa sabba.m a"ngapacca"nga.m  sambandhameva katvaa therassa oloketu.m yogya.t.thaane .thapetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. thero ta.m disvaa attaana.m ovadanto --
