text.350: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^pa~n~na^eb^nti pakaare jaanaati, pakaarehi  ~naapetiiti ca pa~n~naa. veneyyaana.m  aasayaanusayacariyaadhimuttiaadippakaare dhammaana.m kusalaadike khandhaadike  ca desetabbappakaare jaanaati, yathaasabhaavato pa.tivijjhati, tehi ca  pakaarehi ~naapetiiti attho. satthu desanaa~naa.na~nhi idhaadhippeta.m, tenaaha  ^b^``ima''^eb^nti. ta~nhi attani siddhena desanaabalena nayaggaahato ^a^V1.0035^ea^   paccakkha.m viya upa.t.thita.m gahetvaa ^b^``ima''^eb^nti vutta.m. yadaggena vaa  satthu desanaa~naa.na.m saavakehi nayato gayhati, tadaggena attano visaye  pa.tivedha~naa.nampi nayato gayhateva. tenaaha ^a^P1.0036^ea^ aayasmaa  dhammasenaapati -- ``apica me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito''ti (dii0  ni0 2.146; 3.143). ^b^passaa^eb^ti vimhayappatto aniyamato  aalapati attanoyeva vaa citta.m, yathaaha bhagavaa udaanento --  ``lokamima.m passa; puthuu avijjaaya pareta.m bhuuta.m bhuutarata.m bhavaa  aparimutta''nti (udaa0 30). ^b^tathaagataana^eb^nti tathaa  aagamanaadiatthena tathaagataana.m. tathaa aagatoti hi tathaagato, tathaa  gatoti tathaagato, tathalakkha.na.m aagatoti tathaagato, tathadhamme  yaathaavato abhisambuddhoti tathaagato, tathadassitaaya tathaagato,  tathavaaditaaya tathaagato, tathaakaaritaaya tathaagato, abhibhavana.t.thena  tathaagatoti eva.m a.t.thahi kaara.nehi bhagavaa tathaagato. tathaaya aagatoti  tathaagato, tathaaya gatoti tathaagato, tathalakkha.na.m gatoti tathaagato,  tathaani aagatoti tathaagato, tathaavidhoti tathaagato, tathaa pavattitoti  tathaagato, tathehi aagatoti tathaagato ^a^M1.0043^ea^, tathaa gatabhaavena tathaagatoti  evampi a.t.thahi kaara.nehi bhagavaa tathaagatoti ayamettha sa"nkhepo.  vitthaaro pana paramatthadiipaniyaa udaana.t.thakathaaya (udaa0 a.t.tha0 18)  itivuttaka.t.thakathaaya (itivu0 a.t.tha0 38) ca vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
text.3500: [03] tattha ^b^kaa.lii^eb^ti tassaa naama.m, kaa.lava.n.nattaa vaa eva.m vutta.m.  ^b^brahatii^eb^ti mahaasariiraa aarohapari.naahavatii. ^b^dha"nkaruupaa^eb^ti  kaa.lava.n.nattaa eva kaakasadisaruupaa. ^b^satthi~nca bhetvaa^eb^ti  matasariirassa satthi.m ja.n.nubhedanena bha~njitvaa. ^b^apara~nca  satthi^eb^nti itara~nca satthi.m bha~njitvaa. ^b^baaha~nca bhetvaa^eb^ti  baaha.t.thi~nca aggabaaha.t.thaaneyeva bha~njitvaa. ^b^siisa~nca bhetvaa  dadhithaalaka.mvaa^eb^ti matasariirassa siisa.m bhinditvaa bhinnattaa eva  le.d.duda.n.daadiihi paggharanta.m dadhithaalaka.m viya, paggharanta.m matthalu"nga.m  katvaati attho. ^b^esaa nisinnaa abhisandahitvaa^eb^ti  chinnabhinnaavayava.m matasariira.m te avayave yathaa.thaaneyeva .thapanena sandahitvaa  sahita.m katvaa ma.msaapa.na.m pasaarentii viya esaa nisinnaa.
text.3501: [03] ^b^yo ve avidvaa upadhi.m karotii^eb^ti yo imaaya upa.t.thaapita.m  kamma.t.thaana.m disvaapi avidvaa akusalo kamma.t.thaana.m cha.d.detvaa  ayonisomanasikaarena kilesuupadhi.m uppaadeti, so ^b^mando^eb^  mandapa~n~no sa.msaarassa anativattanato ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ aparaapara.m  nirayaadiisu ^b^dukkha.m upeti^eb^. ^b^tasmaa pajaana.m upadhi.m na  kayiraa^eb^ti ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa cetadeva.m, tasmaa. ^b^pajaana.m  upadhi^eb^nti ``idha ya.m dukkha.m sambhotii''ti pajaananto yoniso  manasikaronto kilesuupadhi.m na kayiraa na uppaadeyya. kasmaa?  ^b^maaha.m puna bhinnasiro sayissa^eb^nti yathayida.m matasariira.m bhinnasariira.m  sayati, eva.m kilesuupadhiihi sa.msaare punappuna.m uppattiyaa ka.tasiva.d.dhako  hutvaa bhinnasiro aha.m maa sayissanti. eva.m vadanto eva thero  vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.50.8-14) --
text.351: [03] idaani tassaa pa~n~naaya asaadhaara.navisesa.m dassetu.m ^b^``aggi  yathaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. ^b^yathaa aggii^eb^ti upamaavacana.m.  ^b^yathaa^eb^ti tassa upamaabhaavadassana.m. ^b^pajjalito^eb^ti upameyyena  sambandhadassana.m. ^b^nisiithe^eb^ti kiccakara.nakaaladassana.m. aya~nhettha  attho -- yathaa naama nisiithe rattiya.m catura"ngasamannaagate andhakaare  vattamaane unnate .thaane pajjalito aggi tasmi.m padese tayagata.m vidhamanta.m  ti.t.thati, evameva tathaagataana.m ima.m desanaa~naa.nasa"nkhaata.m sabbaso  veneyyaana.m sa.msayatama.m vidhamanta.m pa~n~na.m passaati. yato desanaavilaasena  sattaana.m ~naa.namaya.m aaloka.m dentiiti ^b^aalokadaa^eb^. pa~n~naamayameva  cakkhu.m dadantiiti ^b^cakkhudadaa^eb^. tadubhayampi  ka"nkhaavinayapada.t.thaanameva katvaa ^a^P1.0037^ea^ dassento ^b^``ye  aagataana.m vinayanti ka"nkha''^eb^nti aaha, ^b^ye^eb^ tathaagataa attano  santika.m ^b^aagataana.m^eb^ upagataana.m veneyyaana.m ``ahosi.m nu kho  ahamatiitamaddhaana''ntiaadinayappavatta.m (ma0 ni0 1.18; sa.m0 ni0   2.20) so.lasavatthuka.m, ``buddhe ka"nkhati dhamme  ka"nkhatii''tiaadinayappavatta.m (dha0 sa0 1008) a.t.thavatthuka~nca  ^b^ka"nkha.m^eb^ vicikiccha.m ^b^vinayanti^eb^ desanaanubhaavena anavasesato  vidhamanti viddha.msenti. vinayakukkuccasa"nkhaataa pana ka"nkhaa  tabbinayeneva viniitaa hontiiti.
text.3513: [03] ^b^bahuu^eb^ ^a^P2.0029^ea^ ^b^sapatte labhatii^eb^ti aayasmato  tissattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto  piyadassissa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  sippesu nipphatti.m gantvaa kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa gharaavaasa.m pahaaya  taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane saalavane assama.m kaaretvaa  vasati. bhagavaa tassa anugga.nhanattha.m assamassa aviduure saalavane  nirodha.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. so assamato nikkhamitvaa  phalaaphalatthaaya gacchanto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso cattaaro da.n.de  .thapetvaa bhagavato upari pupphitaahi saalasaakhaahi saakhaama.n.dapa.m katvaa  sattaaha.m navanavehi saalapupphehi bhagavanta.m puujento a.t.thaasi buddhaaramma.na.m  piiti.m avijahanto. satthaa sattaahassa accayena nirodhato vu.t.thahitvaa  bhikkhusa"ngha.m cintesi. taavadeva satasahassamattaa khii.naasavaa satthaara.m  parivaaresu.m. bhagavaa tassa bhaavini.m sampatti.m vibhaavento anumodana.m  vatvaa pakkaami. so tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbattitvaa aparaapara.m  sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade ^a^M1.0347^ea^ raajagahe braahma.nakule  nibbattitvaa ^b^tisso^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu  hutvaa pa~ncamattaani maa.navakasataani mante vaacento laabhaggayasaggappatto  hutvaa satthu raajagahagamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa  vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.190-220) --
text.352: [03] aparo nayo -- yathaa aggi nisiithe rattibhaage pajjalito  pa.tutarajaalo samujjala.m uccaasane ^a^V1.0036^ea^ .thitaana.m obhaasadaanamattena andhakaara.m  vidhamitvaa samavisama.m vibhaavento aalokadado hoti. accaasanne pana  .thitaana.m ta.m supaaka.ta.m karonto cakkhukiccakara.nato cakkhudado naama  hoti, evameva tathaagato attano dhammakaayassa duure .thitaana.m  akataadhikaaraana.m pa~n~naapajjotena mohandhakaara.m vidhamitvaa  kaayavisamaadisamavisama.m vibhaavento aalokadaa bhavanti, aasanne  .thitaana.m pana kataadhikaaraana.m dhammacakkhu.m uppaadento cakkhudadaa bhavanti.  ye eva.mbhuutaa ^a^M1.0044^ea^ attano vaciigocara.m aagataana.m maadisaanampi  ka"nkhaabahulaana.m ka"nkha.m vinayanti ariyamaggasamuppaadanena vidhamanti,  tesa.m tathaagataana.m pa~n~na.m ~naa.naatisaya.m passaati yojanaa. evamaya.m  therassa attano ka"nkhaavitara.nappakaasanena a~n~naabyaakara.nagaathaapi hoti.  aya~nhi thero puthujjanakaale kappiyepi kukkuccako hutvaa  ka"nkhaabahulataaya ``ka"nkhaarevato''ti pa~n~naato, pacchaa  khii.naasavakaalepi tatheva voharayittha. tenaaha -- ``ittha.m suda.m  aayasmaa ka"nkhaarevato gaatha.m abhaasitthaa''ti. ta.m vuttatthameva.
text.3534: [21] ``ko nu kho bhagavaa hetu, sitakammassa satthuno.
text.3537: [22] tassa kamma.m saritvaana, sita.m paatukari.m aha.m..
text.3539: [22] devaloke manusse vaa, okaasova na sammati..
text.355: [03] ^b^sabbhireva^eb^ ^a^P1.0038^ea^ ^b^samaasethaa^eb^ti aayasmato  pu.n.nattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa  dasabalassa uppattito puretarameva ha.msavatiinagare braahma.namahaasaalakule  nibbatto anukkamena vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari loke uppajjante ekadivasa.m  buddhaana.m dhammadesanaakaale he.t.thaa vuttanayena mahaajanena saddhi.m vihaara.m  gantvaa parisapariyante nisiiditvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m  dhammakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ``mayaapi anaagate evaruupena  bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa desanaavasaane vu.t.thitaaya parisaaya satthaara.m  upasa"nkamitvaa nimantetvaa he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva mahaasakkaara.m katvaa bhagavanta.m  evamaaha -- ``bhante, aha.m iminaa adhikaarakammena naa~n~na.m sampatti.m  patthemi. yathaa pana so bhikkhu ito sattamadivasamatthake  dhammakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapito, eva.m ahampi anaagate ekassa  buddhassa saasane dhammakathikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m  akaasi. satthaa anaagata.m oloketvaa tassa patthanaaya samijjhanabhaava.m  disvaa ``anaagate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo naama buddho  uppajjissati, tassa saasane tva.m pabbajitvaa dhammakathikaana.m aggo  bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi.
text.3553: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.356: [03] so ^a^M1.0045^ea^ tattha yaavajiiva.m kalyaa.nadhamma.m katvaa tato cuto  kappasatasahassa.m pu~n~na~naa.nasambhaara.m sambharanto devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa  amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale kapilavatthunagarassa aviduure do.navatthunaamake ^a^V1.0037^ea^  braahma.nagaame braahma.namahaasaalakule a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~nattherassa bhaagineyyo  hutvaa nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase ``pu.n.no''ti naama.m aka.msu.  so satthari abhisambodhi.m patvaa pavattavaradhammacakke anupubbena  raajagaha.m gantvaa ta.m upanissaaya viharante a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~nattherassa  santike pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado sabba.m pubbakicca.m katvaa  padhaanamanuyu~njanto pabbajitakicca.m matthaka.m paapetvaava ``dasabalassa  ^a^P1.0039^ea^ santika.m gamissaamii''ti maatulattherena saddhi.m satthu  santika.m agantvaa kapilavatthusaamantaayeva ohiiyitvaa  yonisomanasikaare kamma.m karonto nacirasseva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa  arahatta.m paapu.ni. vuttampi ceta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.1.434-440) --
text.3571: [03] so arahatta.m pana patvaa visesato laabhaggayasaggappatto ahosi.  tattha keci puthujjanabhikkhuu therassa laabhasakkaara.m disvaa baalabhaavena  asahanaakaara.m pavedesu.m. thero ta.m ~natvaa laabhasakkaare aadiinava.m tattha  attano alaggabhaava~nca pakaasento --
text.3574: [22] laabhii annassa paanassa, vatthassa sayanassa ca..
text.3579: [03] tassattho ^a^P2.0030^ea^ -- sikhampi asesetvaa  mu.n.ditakesataaya ^b^mu.n.do,^eb^ chinditvaa sa"nghaa.titakaasaavadhaaritaaya  ^b^sa"nghaa.tipaaruto,^eb^ eva.m veva.n.niya.m ajjhupagato paraayattavuttiko  pabbajito sace annapaanaadiina.m ^b^laabhii^eb^ hoti, sopi ^b^bahuu  sapatte labhati,^eb^ tassa usuuyantaa bahuu sambhavanti. tasmaa ^b^eta.m^eb^  evaruupa.m laabha^b^sakkaaresu^eb^ ^b^mahabbhaya.m^eb^ vipulabhaya.m ^b^aadiinava.m^eb^  dosa.m viditvaa appicchata.m santosa~nca hadaye .thapetvaa  anavajjuppaadassaapi uppannassa laabhassa parivajjanena ^b^appalaabho,^eb^  tato eva tattha ta.nhaavassutaabhaavena ^b^anavassuto,^eb^ sa.msaare bhayassa  ikkhanato bhinnakilesataaya vaa ^b^bhikkhu^eb^ santu.t.thi.t.thaaniiyassa  satisampaja~n~nassa ^a^M1.0350^ea^ vasena ^b^sato^eb^ hutvaa ^b^paribbaje^eb^ careyya  vihareyyaati. ta.m sutvaa te bhikkhuu taavadeva thera.m khamaapesu.m.
text.3582: [03] ^b^paaciinava.msadaayamhii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato kimilattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? tassa pubbayogo sa.mveguppatti pabbajjaa ca  ekakanipaate ``abhisatto''ti gaathaaya sa.mva.n.nanaaya.m vuttaayeva. taaya  ca gaathaaya therena attano visesaadhigamassa kaara.na.m dassita.m. idha  pana adhigatavisesassa attano aayasmataa ca anuruddhena aayasmataa ca  nandiyena saha samaggavaaso dassitoti veditabba.m. samaggavaasa.m pana  vasantaa te yathaa ca vasi.msu, ta.m dassento --
text.3588: [22] ramanti dhammaratiyaa, hitvaana lokiya.m rati''nti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3589: [03] tattha ^b^paaciinava.msadaayamhii^eb^ti paaciinava.msanaamake  rakkhitagopite sahaparicchede vane. ta~nhi vana.m ^a^V1.0299^ea^ gaamassa  paaciinadisaaya.m .thitattaa va.msagumbaparikkhittattaa ca  ``paaciinava.msadaayo''ti vutto, va.msavanabhaavena vaati.  ^b^sakyaputtaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0031^ea^ anuruddhattheraadayo  sakyaraajakumaaraa. ^b^sahaayakaa^eb^ti  sa.mveguppattipabbajjaasama.nadhammakara.nasa.mvaasehi saha ayanato pavattanato  sahaayakaa. ^b^pahaayaanappake bhoge^eb^ti u.laarena pu~n~naanubhaavena  adhigate kulaparamparaagate ca mahante bhogakkhandhe cha.d.detvaa.  ``sahaayaanappake''tipi paa.li. ^b^u~nche pattaagate rataa^eb^ti  u~nchaacariyaaya aabhatattaa ^a^M1.0351^ea^ u~nche patte aagatattaa pattaagate pattapariyaapanne  rataa abhirataa, sa"nghabhattaadiatirekalaabha.m pa.tikkhipitvaa ja"nghabala.m  nissaaya bhikkhaacariyaaya laddhena missakabhatteneva santu.t.thaati attho.
text.3590: [03] ^b^aaraddhaviiriyaa^eb^ti uttamatthassa adhigamaaya aaditova pageva  sampaaditaviiriyaa. ^b^pahitattaa^eb^ti ninnapo.napabbhaarabhaavena kaalena  kaala.m samaapajjanena ca nibbaana.m patipesitacittaa. ^b^nicca.m  da.lhaparakkamaa^eb^ti vattapa.tipattiisu di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraanuyogena  sabbakaala.m asithilaparakkamaa. ^b^ramanti dhammaratiyaa, hitvaana  lokiya.m rati^eb^nti loke viditataaya lokapariyaapannataaya ca lokiya.m  ruupaaramma.naadirati.m pahaaya maggapa~n~naaya pajahitvaa lokuttaradhammaratiyaa  aggaphalanibbaanaabhiratiyaa ca ramanti abhiramantiiti.
text.3593: [03] ^b^ayoniso manasikaaraa^eb^ti aayasmato nandattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare  kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavato santike dhamma.m su.nanto  satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa  sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca  puujaasakkaarabahula.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa, ``ahampi anaagate tumhaadisassa  buddhassa evaruupo saavako bhaveyya''nti pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tato pa.t.thaaya  devamanussesu sa.msaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale vinataaya naama  nadiyaa mahanto kacchapo hutvaa nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m nadiyaa  paara.m gantu.m tiire .thita.m disvaa saya.m bhagavanta.m taaretukaamo satthu paadamuule  nipajji ^a^P2.0032^ea^. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m oloketvaa  pi.t.thi.m abhiruhi. so ha.t.thatu.t.tho vegena sota.m chindanto siighatara.m  paratiirameva paapesi. bhagavaa tassa anumodana.m vadanto bhaavini.m  sampatti.m kathetvaa pakkaami.
text.3594: [03] so ^a^M1.0352^ea^ ^a^V1.0300^ea^ tena pu~n~nakammena sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade  kapilavatthusmi.m suddhodanamahaaraajassa putto hutvaa mahaapajaapatiyaa  gotamiyaa kucchimhi nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase ~naatisa"ngha.m  nandento jaatoti ^b^nando^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. tassa vayappattakaale  satthaa pavattavaradhammacakko lokaanuggaha.m karonto kapilavatthu.m gantvaa  ~naatisamaagame pokkharavassa.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa ^b^vessantarajaataka.m^eb^  (jaa0 2.22.1655 aadayo) kathetvaa dutiyadivase pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho  ``utti.t.the nappamajjeyyaa''ti (dha0 pa0 168) gaathaaya pitara.m  sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa nivesana.m gantvaa ``dhamma.m care  sucarita''nti (dha0 pa0 169) gaathaaya mahaapajaapati.m sotaapattiphale  raajaana.m sakadaagaamiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa tatiye divase nandakumaarassa  abhisekanivesanappavesanavivaahama"ngalesu vattamaanesu pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa  nandakumaarassa hatthe patta.m datvaa ma"ngala.m vatvaa tassa hatthato patta.m  agahetvaava vihaara.m gato ta.m pattahattha.m vihaara.m aagata.m anicchamaana.myeva  pabbaajetvaa tathaa pabbajitattaayeva anabhiratiyaa pii.lita.m ~natvaa upaayena  tassa ta.m anabhirati.m vinodesi. so yoniso pa.tisa"nkhaaya  vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.148-163) --
text.36: [03] eva.m dhammabha.n.daagaarikena pa.ti~n~naatesu caturaasiitiyaa  dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasa"ngaha.m gataa.
text.3604: [22] sukha.m me taadisa.m natthi, phu.t.the paadatale yathaa..
text.3608: [22] aya~nca kacchapo raajaa, taaresi mama pa~n~navaa..
text.3622: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukha.m anubhavanto ``aho satthu  upaayakosalla.m, yenaaha.m bhavapa"nkato uddharitvaa nibbaanathale  pati.t.thaapito''ti attano pahiinasa.mkilesa.m pa.tiladdha~nca sukha.m  paccavekkhitvaa sa~njaatasomanasso udaanavasena --
text.3628: [22] yoniso pa.tipajjitvaa, bhave citta.m udabbahi''nti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3629: [03] tattha ^a^P2.0033^ea^ ^b^ayoniso manasikaaraa^eb^ti  anupaayamanasikaarato asubha.m kaaya.m subhato manasi karitvaa subhato  manasikaarahetu, asubha.m ^a^M1.0354^ea^ kaaya.m subhasa~n~naayaati attho. ^b^ma.n.dana^eb^nti  hatthuupagaadiaabhara.nehi ceva maalaagandhaadiihi ca attabhaavassa ala"nkara.na.m.  ^b^anuyu~njisa^eb^nti anuyu~nji.m, sariirassa vibhuusanappasuto  ahosinti attho. ^b^uddhato^eb^ti jaatigottaruupayobbanamadaadiihi  uddhato avuupasantacitto. ^b^capalo^eb^ti vanamakka.to viya  anava.t.thitacittataaya lolo, kaayama.n.danavatthama.n.danaadicaapalye yuttataaya  vaa capalo ^b^ca. aasi^eb^nti ahosi.m. ^b^kaamaraagenaa^eb^ti  vatthukaamesu chandaraagena ^b^a.t.tito^eb^ pii.lito vibaadhito aasinti  yojanaa.
text.3630: [03] ^b^upaayakusalenaa^eb^ti ^a^V1.0302^ea^ vineyyaana.m damanuupaayacchekena kovidena  ^b^buddhena^eb^ bhagavataa hetubhuutena. hetuatthe hi eta.m kara.navacana.m.  palu.t.thamakka.tiidevaccharaadassanena hi upakkitavaadacodanaaya attano  kaamaraagaapanayana.m sandhaaya vadati. bhagavaa hi aayasmanta.m nandatthera.m  pa.thama.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m upaadaaya ``yathaaya.m makka.tii, eva.m  kaku.tapaadiniyo upaadaaya janapadakalyaa.nii''ti mahatiyaa aa.niyaa  khuddaka.m aa.ni.m niiharanto cha.d.dako viya, sinehapaanena sariira.m kiledetvaa  vamanavirecanehi dosa.m niiharanto bhisakko viya ca  kaku.tapaadinidassanena janapadakalyaa.niya.m virattacitta.m kaaretvaa puna  upakkitavaadena kaku.tapaadiniisupi citta.m viraajetvaa sammadeva  samathavipassanaanuyogena ariyamagge pati.t.thaapesi. tena vutta.m  ^b^``yoniso pa.tipajjitvaa, bhave citta.m udabbahi''^eb^nti. upaayena  ~naayena sammadeva samathavipassanaaya visuddhipa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitvaa bhave  sa.msaarapa"nke nimugga~nca me citta.m ariyamaggena hatthena uttaari.m,  nibbaanathale pati.t.thaapesinti attho.
text.3631: [03] ima.m udaana.m udaanetvaa thero punadivase bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa  evamaaha -- ``ya.m me, bhante, bhagavaa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m  pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadaana.m, mu~ncaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m etasmaa  pa.tissavaa''ti (udaa0 22). bhagavaapi, ``yadeva kho te, nanda,  anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, athaaha.m mutto etasmaa  pa.tissavaa''ti (udaa0 22) aaha. athassa ^a^P2.0034^ea^  bhagavaa savisesa.m ^a^M1.0355^ea^ indriyesu guttadvaarata.m ~natvaa ta.m gu.na.m vibhaavento,  ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m  yadida.m nando''ti (a0 ni0  1.219, 230) indriyesu  guttadvaarabhaavena agga.t.thaane .thapesi. thero hi ``yamevaaha.m indriyaana.m  asa.mvara.m nissaaya ima.m vippakaara.m patto, tamevaaha.m su.t.thu  niggahessaamii''ti ussaahajaato balavahirottappo tattha ca  kataadhikaarattaa indriyasa.mvare ukka.msapaarami.m agamaasiiti.
text.3634: [03] ^b^pare ca na.m pasa.msantii^eb^ti aayasmato sirimattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato paaramiyo puuretvaa  tusitabhavane .thitakaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ti.n.na.m  vedaana.m ^a^V1.0303^ea^ paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m sakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m  padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo  nekkhammajjhaasayataaya kaame pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  caturaasiitisahassaparimaa.nena taapasaga.nena parivuto himavantappadese  devataabhinimmite assame jhaanaabhi~n~naayo nibbattetvaa vasanto  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaarataaya lakkha.namantesu aagataniyaamena ca  buddhagu.ne anussaritvaa atiite buddhe uddissa a~n~natarasmi.m nadiinivattane  pulinacetiya.m katvaa puujaasakkaaraabhirato ahosi. ta.m disvaa taapasaa,  ``ka.m uddissa aya.m puujaasakkaaro kariiyatii''ti pucchi.msu. so tesa.m  lakkha.namante aaharitvaa tattha aagataani mahaapurisalakkha.naani  vibhajitvaa tadanusaarena attano bale .thatvaa buddhagu.ne kittesi. ta.m  sutvaa tepi taapasaa pasannamaanasaa tato pa.t.thaaya sammaasambuddha.m uddissa  thuupapuuja.m karontaa viharanti.
text.3635: [03] tena ca samayena padumuttarabodhisatto tusitakaayaa cavitvaa  maatukucchi.m okkanto hoti. carimabhave dvatti.msa pubbanimittaani  paaturahesu.m ^a^M1.0356^ea^, sabbe ca acchariyabbhuutadhammaa. taapaso taani  antevaasikaana.m dassetvaa bhiyyosomattaaya sammaasambuddhesu tesa.m pasaada.m  va.d.dhetvaa kaala.m katvaa brahmaloke nibbattitvaa tehi attano sariirassa  puujaaya kariiyamaanaaya dissamaanaruupo aagantvaa, ``aha.m tumhaaka.m  aacariyo brahmaloke nibbatto, tumhe appamattaa  pulinacetiyapuujamanuyu~njatha, bhaavanaaya ^a^P2.0035^ea^ ca yuttappayuttaa  hothaa''ti vatvaa brahmalokameva gato.
text.3636: [03] eva.m so devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m  gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa jaatadivasato pa.t.thaaya tasmi.m kule  sirisampattiyaa va.d.dhamaanattaa ^b^sirimaa^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. tassa  padasaa gamanakaale kani.t.thabhaataa nibbatti, tassa ``aya.m siri.m  va.d.dhento jaato''ti ^b^siriva.d.dho^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. te ubhopi  jetavanappa.tiggaha.ne buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddhaa pabbaji.msu. tesu  siriva.d.dho na taava uttarimanussadhammassa laabhii ahosi, catunna.m  paccayaana.m laabhii, gaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m sakkato garukato, sirimatthero pana  pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya taadisena kammacchiddena appalaabhii ahosi  bahujanaasambhaavito, samathavipassanaasu kamma.m karonto nacirasseva  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.49.111-147) --

text.37: [03] tattha ^a^P1.0003^ea^ theragaathaa taava nipaatato ekanipaato  ekuttaravasena yaava cuddasanipaataati cuddasanipaato so.lasanipaato  viisatinipaato ti.msanipaato cattaaliisanipaato pa~n~naasanipaato  sa.t.thinipaato sattatinipaatoti ekaviisatinipaatasa"ngahaa. nipaatana.m  nikkhipananti nipaato. eko ekeko gaathaana.m nipaato nikkhepo  etthaati ekanipaato. iminaa nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo.
text.3706: [03] cha.labhi~n~na~nhi samaana.m aayasmanta.m sirimatthera.m ``ariyo''ti  ajaanantaa puthujjanaa bhikkhuu saama.neraa ca appalaabhitaaya lokassa  anabhigatabhaavena asambhaaventaa ya.mki~nci kathetvaa garahanti.  siriva.d.dhatthera.m pana paccayaana.m laabhibhaavena lokassa sakkatagarukatabhaavato  sambhaaventaa pasa.msanti. thero ``ava.n.naarahassa naama va.n.nabha.nana.m,  va.n.naarahassa ca ava.n.nabha.nana.m assa puthujjanabhaavassa doso''ti  puthujjanabhaava~nca garahanto --
text.3708: [21] ``pare ca na.m pasa.msanti, attaa ce asamaahito.
text.3709: [22] mogha.m pare pasa.msanti, attaa hi asamaahito..
text.3711: [21] ``pare ca na.m garahanti, attaa ce susamaahito.
text.3712: [22] mogha.m pare garahanti, attaa hi susamaahito''ti..
text.3714: [03] tattha ^b^pare^eb^ti attato a~n~ne pare naama, idha pana pa.n.ditehi  a~n~ne baalaa pareti adhippetaa. tesa~nhi ajaanitvaa apariyogaahetvaa  bhaasanato garahaa viya pasa.msaapi appamaa.nabhuutaa. ^b^na^eb^nti na.m  puggala.m. ^b^pasa.msantii^eb^ti aviddasubhaavena ta.nhaavipannataaya vaa, atha  vaa abhuuta.myeva ^a^P2.0036^ea^ puggala.m ``asuko bhikkhu jhaanalaabhii,  ariyo''ti vaa abhuutagu.naropanena kittenti abhitthavanti. yo panettha  ^b^ca^eb^-saddo, so ^a^M1.0360^ea^ attuupanayattho. tena pare na.m puggala.m pasa.msanti ca,  ta~nca kho tesa.m pasa.msanamatta.m, na pana tasmi.m pasa.msaaya vatthu atthiiti  imamattha.m dasseti. ^b^attaa ce asamaahito^eb^ti ya.m puggala.m pare  pasa.msanti, so ce saya.m asamaahito maggasamaadhinaa phalasamaadhinaa  upacaarappanaasamaadhimatteneva vaa na samaahito, samaadhaanassa  pa.tipakkhabhuutaana.m kilesaana.m appahiinattaa vikkhitto vibbhantacitto  hoti ceti attho. ``asamaahito''ti ca etena samaadhinimittaana.m  gu.naana.m abhaava.m dasseti. ^b^mogha^eb^nti bhaavanapu.msakaniddeso  ``visama.m candimasuuriyaa parivattantii''tiaadiisu viya. ^b^pare  pasa.msantii^eb^ti ye ta.m asamaahita.m puggala.m pasa.msanti, te mogha.m mudhaa  amuulaka.m pasa.msanti. kasmaa? ^b^attaa hi asamaahito^eb^ yasmaa  tassa puggalassa citta.m asamaahita.m, tasmaati attho.
text.3715: [03] dutiyagaathaaya.m ^b^garahantii^eb^ti attano aviddasubhaavena  dosantaraaya vaa ariya.m jhaanalaabhi~nca samaana.m ^a^V1.0307^ea^ ``asuko bhikkhu  jaagariya.m naanuyu~njati antamaso goduhanamattampi kaala.m kevala.m  kaayada.lhibahulo niddaaraamo bhassaaraamo sa"nga.nikaaraamo  viharatii''tiaadinaa appa.tipajjamaanataavibhaavanena vaa gu.naparidha.msanena  vaa garahanti nindanti, upakkosanti vaati attho. sesa.m pa.thamagaathaaya  vuttapariyaayena veditabba.m. eva.m therena imaahi gaathaahi attano  nikkilesabhaave siriva.d.dhassa ca sakilesabhaave pakaasite ta.m sutvaa  siriva.d.dho sa.mvegajaato vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva sadattha.m  paripuuresi, garahakapuggalaa ca thera.m khamaapesu.m.
text.372: [03] tassa pana pu.n.nattherassa santike pabbajitaa kulaputtaa pa~ncasataa  ahesu.m. thero saya.m dasakathaavatthulaabhitaaya tepi dasahi kathaavatthuuhi  ovadi. te tassa ovaade .thatvaa sabbeva arahatta.m pattaa. te attano  pabbajitakicca.m matthakappatta.m ~natvaa upajjhaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaha.msu --  ``bhante, amhaaka.m kicca.m matthakappatta.m, dasanna~ncamha kathaavatthuuna.m  laabhino, samayo, daani no dasabala.m passitu''nti. thero tesa.m  vacana.m sutvaa cintesi -- ``mama dasakathaavatthulaabhita.m ^a^V1.0038^ea^ satthaa jaanaati  aha.m dhamma.m desento dasa kathaavatthuuni amu~ncitvaava desemi, mayi  gacchante sabbepime bhikkhuu ma.m parivaaretvaa gacchissanti, eva.m  ga.nasa"nga.nikaaya gantvaa pana ayutta.m mayha.m dasabala.m passitu.m, ime taava  gantvaa passantuu''ti te bhikkhuu aaha -- ``aavuso, tumhe purato  gantvaa tathaagata.m passatha, mama vacanena cassa paade vandatha, ahampi  tumhaaka.m gatamaggenaagamissaamii''ti. te theraa sabbepi dasabalassa  jaatibhuumira.t.thavaasino sabbe khii.naasavaa sabbe dasakathaavatthulaabhino  attano upajjhaayassa ovaada.m sampa.ticchitvaa thera.m vanditvaa anupubbena  caarika.m carantaa sa.t.thiyojanamagga.m atikkamma raajagahe ve.luvanamahaavihaara.m  gantvaa dasabalassa paade vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.
text.3720: [03] ^b^khandhaa^eb^ ^a^M1.0361^ea^ ^a^V1.0308^ea^ ^b^mayaa pari~n~naataa^eb^ti aayasmato uttarattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa  bhagavato ^a^P2.0037^ea^ kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  saasane laddhappasaado hutvaa upaasakatta.m pa.tivedesi. so satthari  parinibbute attano ~naatake sannipaatetvaa bahu.m puujaasakkaara.m sambharitvaa  dhaatupuuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade saakete braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^uttaro^eb^ti  laddhanaamo vayappatto kenacideva kara.niiyena saavatthi.m gato ka.n.dambamuule  kata.m yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pasiiditvaa puna  ^b^kaa.lakaaraamasutta^eb^desanaaya (a0 ni0  4.24)  abhiva.d.dhamaanasaddho pabbajitvaa satthaaraa saddhi.m raajagaha.m gantvaa  upasampajjitvaa tattheva vasanto vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.49.106-110) --
text.3726: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa satthari saavatthiya.m viharante  buddhupa.t.thaanattha.m raajagahato saavatthi.m upagato bhikkhuuhi ``ki.m, aavuso,  pabbajjaakicca.m tayaa matthaka.m paapita''nti pu.t.tho a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
text.3729: [22] bhaavitaa mama bojjha"ngaa, patto me aasavakkhayo..
text.373: [03] aaci.n.na.m kho paneta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m aagantukehi bhikkhuuhi  saddhi.m pa.tisammoditunti bhagavaa tehi saddhi.m -- ``kacci, bhikkhave,  khamaniiya''ntiaadinaa nayena madhurapa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ``kuto ca  tumhe, bhikkhave, aagacchathaa''ti pucchi ^a^P1.0040^ea^. atha tehi  ``jaatibhuumito''ti vutte ``ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jaatibhuumiya.m  jaatibhuumakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m eva.m sambhaavito `attanaa ca  appiccho appicchakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa'''ti (ma0 ni0 1.252)  dasakathaavatthulaabhi.m bhikkhu.m pucchi. tepi ``pu.n.no naama, bhante,  aayasmaa mantaa.niputto''ti aarocayi.msu. ta.m katha.m sutvaa aayasmaa  saariputto therassa dassanakaamo ahosi. atha satthaa raajagahato  saavatthi.m agamaasi ^a^M1.0047^ea^. pu.n.nattheropi dasabalassa tattha aagatabhaava.m sutvaa  -- ``satthaara.m passissaamii''ti gantvaa antogandhaku.tiya.myeva tathaagata.m  sampaapu.ni. satthaa tassa dhamma.m desesi. thero dhamma.m sutvaa dasabala.m  vanditvaa pa.tisallaanatthaaya andhavana.m gantvaa a~n~nataramhi rukkhamuule  divaavihaara.m nisiidi.
text.3732: [22] bhaavayitvaana bojjha"nge, nibbaayissa.m anaasavo''ti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3733: [03] tattha ^b^khandhaa^eb^ti pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. ^b^pari~n~naataa^eb^ti  ``ida.m dukkha.m, na ito bhiyyo''ti paricchijja ~naataa bhaavitaa. tena  dukkhassa ariyasaccassa pari~n~naabhisamayamaaha. ^b^ta.nhaa^eb^ti tasati  paritasatiiti ta.nhaa. ^b^susamuuhataa^eb^ti samugghaa.titaa. etena  samudayasaccassa pahaanaabhisamaya.m vadati. ^b^bhaavitaa mama  bojjha"ngaa^eb^ti bodhisa"nkhaataaya satiaadidhammasaamaggiyaa, ta.msama"ngino  vaa bodhisa"nkhaatassa ariyapuggalassa a"ngaati bojjha"ngaa.  satidhammavicayaviiriyapiitipassaddhisamaadhiupekkhaasa"nkhaataa  maggapariyaapannaa dhammaa mayaa bhaavitaa uppaaditaa va.d.dhitaa.  bojjha"ngaggaha.neneva cettha ta.msahacaritataaya sabbe maggadhammaa, sabbe ca  bodhipakkhiyadhammaa gahitaati da.t.thabbaa. eteneva maggasaccassa  bhaavanaabhisamaya.m dasseti. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti  kaamaasavaadayo aasavaa khiiyanti etthaati aasavakkhayoti laddhanaamo  asa"nkhatadhammo mayaa ^a^P2.0038^ea^ patto adhigato. etena  nirodhasaccassa sacchikiriyaabhisamaya.m katheti. ettaavataa attano  saupaadisesanibbaanasampatti.m dasseti.
text.3734: [03] idaani pana anupaadisesanibbaanasampatti.m dassento  ^b^``soha''^eb^ntiaadinaa dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tassattho -- soha.m eva.m  vuttanayena ^b^khandhe pari~n~naaya^eb^ parijaanitvaa, tathaa parijaananto eva  sakaattabhaavaparaattabhaavesu ajjhattikabaahiraayatanesu atiitaadibhedabhinnesu  sa.msibbanaakaara.m punappuna.m pavattisa"nkhaata.m jaala.m etassa atthiiti  ^b^jaalinii^eb^ti laddhanaama.m ta.nha.m ^b^abbahitvaana^eb^ mama  cittasantaanato uddharitvaa, tathaa na.m uddharantoyeva vuttappabhede  ^b^bojjha"nge bhaavayitvaana^eb^ te bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m paapetvaa tato eva  ^b^anaasavo^eb^ hutvaa .thito idaani carimakacittanirodhena anupaadaano  viya jaatavedo ^b^nibbaayissa.m^eb^ parinibbaayissaamiiti.
text.3737: [03] ^b^panaado^eb^ ^a^M1.0363^ea^ ^b^naama so raajaa^eb^ti aayasmato  bhaddajittherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale  braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu paara.m  gantvaa kaame pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane assama.m  kaaretvaa vasanto ekadivasa.m ^a^V1.0310^ea^ satthaara.m aakaasena gacchanta.m disvaa  pasannamaanaso a~njali.m paggayha a.t.thaasi. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m  ~natvaa aakaasato otari. oti.n.nassa pana bhagavato madhu~nca  bhisamu.laala~nca sappi~nca khiira~nca upanaamesi, tassa ta.m bhagavaa  anukampa.m upaadaaya pa.tiggahetvaa anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. so tena  pu~n~nakammena tusite nibbatto tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato aparaapara.m  sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto vipassissa bhagavato kaale mahaddhano se.t.thi  hutvaa a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusahassa.m bhojetvaa ticiivarena acchaadesi.
text.3738: [03] eva.m bahu.m kusala.m katvaa devaloke nibbattitvaa tattha yaavataayuka.m  .thatvaa tato cavitvaa manussesu uppanno buddhasu~n~ne loke pa~nca  paccekabuddhasataani catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahitvaa tato cuto raajakule  nibbattitvaa rajja.m anusaasanto putta.m paccekabodhi.m adhigantvaa .thita.m  upa.t.thahitvaa tassa parinibbutassa dhaatuyo gahetvaa cetiya.m katvaa puujesi.  eva.m tattha tattha taani pu~n~naani katvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade  bhaddiyanagare asiitiko.tivibhavassa bhaddiyase.t.thissa ekaputtako hutvaa  nibbatti, ^b^bhaddajii^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. tassa kira  issariyabhogaparivaaraadisampatti carimabhave ^a^P2.0039^ea^  bodhisattassa viya ahosi.
text.3739: [03] tadaa satthaa saavatthiya.m vassa.m vasitvaa bhaddajikumaara.m sa"nga.nhitu.m  mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m bhaddiyanagara.m gantvaa jaatiyaavane vasi  tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamayamaano. sopi upari paasaade nisinno  siihapa~njara.m vivaritvaa olokento bhagavato santike dhamma.m sotu.m  gacchanta.m mahaajana.m disvaa ``katthaaya.m mahaajano gacchatii''ti pucchitvaa  ta.m kaara.na.m sutvaa sayampi mahataa parivaarena satthu santika.m gantvaa  dhamma.m su.nanto ^a^M1.0364^ea^ sabbaabhara.napa.tima.n.ditova sabbakilese khepetvaa arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.98-116) --
text.374: [03] saariputtattheropi tassaagamana.m sutvaa siisaanulokiko gantvaa  okaasa.m sallakkhetvaa ta.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m upasa"nkamitvaa therena saddhi.m  sammoditvaa, ta.m sattavisuddhikkama.m pucchi. theropissa pucchitapucchita.m  byaakaronto rathaviniituupamaaya citta.m aaraadhesi, te a~n~nama~n~nassa  subhaasita.m samanumodi.msu. atha satthaa aparabhaage bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe  nisinno thera.m ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m  dhammakathikaana.m yadida.m pu.n.no''ti (a0 ni0  1.188, 196)  dhammakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so ekadivasa.m attano  vimuttisampatti.m paccavekkhitvaa ``satthaara.m nissaaya aha~nceva a~n~ne ca  bahuu sattaa sa.msaaradukkhato vippamuttaa, bahuupakaaraa vata  sappurisasa.msevaa''ti piitisomanassajaato udaanavasena piitivegavissa.t.tha.m  ^b^``sabbhireva samaasethaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.
text.3741: [22] uddharaami bhisa.m tattha, ghaasahetu aha.m tadaa..
text.3747: [22] madhu.m bhisehi sahita.m, khiira.m sappi.m mu.laalika.m..
text.375: [03] 4^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V1.0039^ea^ ^b^sabbhirevaa^eb^ti sappurisehi eva.  santoti panettha buddhaadayo ariyaa adhippetaa. te hi anavasesato  asata.m dhamma.m pahaaya saddhamme ukka.msagatattaa saatisaya.m pasa.msiyattaa ca  visesato ``santo sappurisaa''ti ca vuccanti. ^b^samaasethaa^eb^ti  sama.m aasetha saha vaseyya. te payirupaasanto tesa.m sussuusanto  di.t.thaanugati~nca ^a^P1.0041^ea^ aapajjanto samaanavaaso bhaveyyaati  attho. ^b^pa.n.ditehatthadassibhii^eb^ti tesa.m thomanaa. ^b^pa.n.daa^eb^  vuccati pa~n~naa, saa imesa.m sa~njaataati ^b^pa.n.ditaa^eb^. tato eva  attatthaadibheda.m attha.m avipariitato passantiiti ^b^atthadassino^eb^.  tehi pa.n.ditehi atthadassiibhi samaasetha. kasmaati ce? yasmaa te  santo pa.n.ditaa, te vaa sammaa sevantaa ekantahitabhaavato  magga~naa.naadiiheva ara.niiyato ^b^attha.m,^eb^ mahaagu.nataaya santataaya ca  ^b^mahanta.m,^eb^ agaadhabhaavato gambhiira~naa.nagocarato ca ^b^gambhiira.m,^eb^  hiinacchandaadiihi da.t.thu.m asakku.neyyattaa itarehi ca kicchena da.t.thabbattaa  ^b^duddasa.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0048^ea^, duddasattaa sa.nhanipu.nasabhaavattaa nipu.na~naa.nagocarato ca  ^b^nipu.na.m,^eb^ nipu.nattaa eva.m sukhumasabhaavataaya ^b^a.nu.m^eb^ nibbaana.m,  avipariita.t.thena vaa paramatthasabhaavattaa ^b^attha.m,^eb^ ariyabhaavakarattaa  mahattanimittataaya ^b^mahanta.m,^eb^ anuttaanasabhaavataaya ^b^gambhiira.m,^eb^  dukkhena da.t.thabba.m na sukhena da.t.thu.m sakkaati ^b^duddasa.m,^eb^ gambhiirattaa  duddasa.m, duddasattaa ^b^gambhiira^eb^nti catusacca.m, visesato ^b^nipu.na.m  a.nu.m,^eb^ nirodhasaccanti evameta.m catusacca.m ^b^dhiiraa samadhigacchanti^eb^  dhitisampannataaya dhiiraa catusaccakamma.t.thaanabhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa sammadeva  adhigacchanti. ^b^appamattaa^eb^ti sabbattha satiavippavaasena  appamaadapa.tipatti.m puurentaa. ^b^vicakkha.naa^eb^ti vipassanaabhaavanaaya  chekaa kusalaa. tasmaa sabbhireva samaasethaati yojanaa.  pa.n.ditehatthadassibhiiti vaa eta.m nissakkavacana.m. yasmaa pa.n.ditehi  atthadassiibhi samudaayabhuutehi dhiiraa appamattaa vicakkha.naa  mahantaadivisesavanta.m attha.m samadhigacchanti, tasmaa taadisehi sabbhireva  samaasethaati sambandho. evamesaa therassa pa.tivedhadiipanena  a~n~naabyaakara.nagaathaapi ahosiiti.

text.3759: [22] aakaaso abhinaadittha, asanii ca phalii tadaa..
text.3761: [22] soha.m nisinnako santo, tattha kaala"nkato aha.m..

text.3773: [03] arahatte pana tena adhigate satthaa bhaddiyase.t.thi.m aamantesi --  ``tava putto ala"nkatapa.tiyatto dhamma.m su.nanto arahatte pati.t.thaasi,  tenassa idaaneva pabbajitu.m yutta.m, no ce pabbajati,  parinibbaayissatii''ti. se.t.thi ``na mayha.m puttassa daharasseva sato  parinibbaanena kicca.m atthi, pabbaajetha na''nti aaha. ta.m satthaa  pabbaajetvaa upasampaadetvaa tattha sattaaha.m vasitvaa ko.tigaama.m paapu.ni,  so ca gaamo ga"ngaatiire. ko.tigaamavaasino buddhappamukhassa  bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m pavattesu.m. bhaddajitthero satthaaraa  anumodanaaya aaraddhamattaaya bahigaama.m gantvaa ^a^V1.0312^ea^ ``ga"ngaatiire maggasamiipe  satthu aagatakaale vu.t.thahissaamii''ti samaapatti.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi.  mahaatheresu aagacchantesupi avu.t.thahitvaa satthu aagatakaaleyeva vu.t.thahi.  puthujjanabhikkhuu, ``aya.m adhunaa pabbajito mahaatheresu aagacchantesu  maanatthaddho hutvaa na vu.t.thaasii''ti ujjhaayi.msu. ko.tigaamavaasino  satthu bhikkhusa"nghassa ca bahuu naavaasa"nghaa.te bandhi.msu, satthaa  ``handassa aanubhaava.m pakaasemii''ti naavaasa"nghaa.te .thatvaa, ``kaha.m,  bhaddajii''ti pucchi. bhaddajitthero ``esoha.m, bhante''ti satthaara.m  upasa"nkamitvaa a~njali.m katvaa a.t.thaasi. satthaa, ``ehi, bhaddaji,  amhehi saddhi.m ekanaava.m abhiruhaa''ti. so uppatitvaa satthu  .thitanaavaaya.m a.t.thaasi. satthaa ga"ngaamajjha.m gatakaale, ``bhaddaji, tayaa  mahaapanaadaraajakaale ajjhaavu.t.tharatanapaasaado kaha''nti aaha.  ``imasmi.m .thaane nimuggo''ti. ``tena hi, bhaddaji, sabrahmacaariina.m  ka"nkha.m chindaa''ti. tasmi.m kha.ne thero ^a^M1.0366^ea^ satthaara.m vanditvaa iddhibalena  gantvaa paasaadathuupika.m paada"ngulantarena sannirumbhitvaa pa~ncaviisatiyojana.m  paasaada.m ^a^P2.0040^ea^ gahetvaa aakaase uppati, uppatanto ca  pa~n~naasa yojanaani paasaada.m udakato ukkhipi. athassa purimabhave  ~naatakaa paasaadagatena lobhena macchakacchapama.n.duukaa hutvaa tasmi.m paasaade  u.t.thahante parivattitvaa udake pati.msu. satthaa te patante disvaa  ``~naatakaa te, bhaddaji, kilamantii''ti aaha. thero satthu vacanena  paasaada.m vissajjesi. paasaado yathaa.thaane eva pati.t.thahi. satthaa  paara"ngato bhikkhuuhi ``kadaa, bhante, bhaddajittherena aya.m paasaado  ajjhaavu.t.tho''ti pu.t.tho ^b^mahaapanaadajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.3.40-41)  kathetvaa mahaajana.m dhammaamata.m paayesi. thero pana attano ajjhaavu.t.thapubba.m  suva.n.napaasaada.m dassetvaa --
text.3775: [21] ``panaado naama so raajaa, yassa yuupo suva.n.nayo.
text.3779: [22] anaccu.m tattha gandhabbaa, cha sahassaani sattadhaa''ti..  --
text.378: [03] ^b^yo duddamiyo^eb^ti ^a^P1.0042^ea^ aayasmato  dabbattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarabuddhakaale  ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva  dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m  agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa  satthaaraa byaakato yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa  kassapadasabalassa saasanosakkanakaale pabbaji. tadaa tena saddhi.m apare  cha janaati satta bhikkhuu ^a^V1.0040^ea^ ekacittaa hutvaa a~n~ne saasane agaarava.m  karonte disvaa -- ``idha ki.m karoma ekamante sama.nadhamma.m katvaa  dukkhassanta.m karissaamaa''ti nisse.ni.m bandhitvaa ucca.m pabbatasikhara.m  aaruhitvaa, ``attano cittabala.m jaanantaa nisse.ni.m nipaatentu,  jiivite saalayaa otarantu, maa pacchaanutappino ahuvatthaa''ti  ^a^M1.0049^ea^ vatvaa  sabbe ekacittaa hutvaa nisse.ni.m paatetvaa -- ``appamattaa hotha,  aavuso''ti a~n~nama~n~na.m ovaditvaa cittarucikesu .thaanesu nisiiditvaa  sama.nadhamma.m kaatu.m aarabhi.msu.
text.3781: [03] tattha ^b^panaado naama so raajaa^eb^ti atiite panaado naama so  raajaa ahosiiti attabhaavaantarahitataaya attaana.m para.m viya niddisati.  so eva hi rajje .thitakaalato pa.t.thaaya sadaa ussaahasampattiaadinaa  mahataa raajaanubhaavena mahataa ca kittisaddena samannaagatattaa ``raajaa  mahaapanaado''ti pa~n~naayittha. ^b^yassa yuupo suva.n.nayo^eb^ti yassa  ra~n~no aya.m yuupo paasaado suva.n.namayo. ^b^tiriya.m so.lasubbedho^eb^ti  vitthaarato so.lasaka.n.dapaatappamaa.no. so pana a.d.dhayojanamatto ^a^V1.0313^ea^ hoti.  ^b^ubbhaamaahu sahassadhaa^eb^ti ubbha.m ucca.m evamassa paasaadassa  sahassadhaa sahassaka.n.dappamaa.namaahu. so pana ^a^M1.0367^ea^ yojanato  pa~ncaviisatiyojanappamaa.no hoti. keci panettha gaathaasukhattha.m  ``aahuu''ti diigha.m kata.m. aahu ahosiiti attha.m vadanti.
text.3782: [03] ^b^sahassaka.n.do^eb^ti sahassabhuumiko. ^b^satage.n.duu^eb^ti  anekasataniyyuuhako. ^b^dhajaaluu^eb^ti tattha tattha niyyuuhasikharaadiisu  pati.t.thaapitehi ya.t.thidhajapa.taakadhajaadidhajehi sampanno.  ^b^haritaamayo^eb^ti caamiikarasuva.n.namayo. keci pana  ``haritajaatima.nisarikkhako''ti vadanti ^a^P2.0041^ea^.  ^b^gandhabbaa^eb^ti na.taa. ^b^cha sahassaani sattadhaa^eb^ti chamattaani  gandhabbasahassaani sattadhaa tassa paasaadassa sattasu .thaanesu ra~n~no  abhiramaapanattha.m nacci.msuuti attho. te eva.m naccantaapi raajaana.m haasetu.m  naasakkhi.msu. atha sakko devaraajaa devana.te pesetvaa samajja.m kaaresi,  tadaa raajaa hasiiti.
text.3785: [03] ^b^satimaa pa~n~navaa^eb^ti aayasmato sobhitattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vayappatto satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m  pubbenivaasa~naa.nalaabhiina.m bhikkhuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m  .thaanantara.m uddissa patthana.m katvaa pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto  sumedhassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gantvaa nekkhammaadhimutto gharaavaasa.m  pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa himavantassa samiipe ara~n~naayatane  assama.m kaaretvaa vanamuulaphalaaphalena yaapento buddhuppaada.m sutvaa sabbattha  ekarattivaaseneva bhaddavatiinagare satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pasannamaanaso  ``tuva.m satthaa ca ketu caa''tiaadiihi chahi gaathaahi abhitthavi  ^a^M1.0368^ea^, satthaa cassa bhaavini.m sampatti.m pakaasesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule  nibbatti. ^b^sobhito^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. so aparena samayena  satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. pubbenivaasa~naa.ne ci.n.navasii ca ahosi. tena  vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.46-74) --
text.379: [01] tatreko thero pa~ncame divase arahatta.m patvaa, ``mama  kicca.m nipphanna.m, aha.m imasmi.m .thaane ki.m karissaami''ti iddhiyaa  uttarakuruto pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa, ``aavuso, ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m  paribhu~njatha, bhikkhaacaarakicca.m mamaayatta.m hotu, tumhe attano kamma.m  karothaa''ti aaha. ``ki.m nu kho maya.m, aavuso, nisse.ni.m paatentaa  eva.m avocumha -- `yo pa.thama.m dhamma.m sacchikaroti, so bhikkha.m  aaharatu, tenaabhata.m sesaa paribhu~njitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karissantii'''ti.  ``natthi, aavuso''ti. tumhe attano pubbahetunaa labhittha, mayampi  sakkontaa va.t.tassanta.m karissaama, gacchatha tumheti. thero te sa~n~naapetu.m  asakkonto phaasuka.t.thaane pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa gato ^a^P1.0043^ea^.  aparo thero sattame divase anaagaamiphala.m patvaa tato cuto  suddhaavaasabrahmaloke nibbatto. itare theraa tato cutaa eka.m buddhantara.m  devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa tesu tesu kulesu nibbattaa. eko gandhaarara.t.the  takkasilaanagare raajagehe nibbatto, eko majjhantikara.t.the paribbaajikaaya  kucchimhi nibbatto, eko baahiyara.t.the ku.tumbiyagehe nibbatto, eko  bhikkhunupassaye jaato.

text.3799: [22] uddharanto bahuu satte, deseti amata.m pada.m..
text.38: [03] tattha ekanipaate dvaadasa vaggaa. ekekasmi.m vagge dasa dasa  katvaa viisuttarasata.m theraa, tattikaa eva gaathaa. vutta~nhi --
text.380: [03] aya.m pana dabbatthero mallara.t.the anupiyanagare ekassa mallara~n~no  gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tassa maataa upavija~n~naa kaalamakaasi,  matasariira.m susaana.m netvaa daarucitaka.m aaropetvaa aggi.m ada.msu. tassaa  aggivegasantatta.m udarapa.tala.m dvedhaa ahosi. daarako attano pu~n~nabalena  uppatitvaa ekasmi.m dabbatthambhe nipati. ta.m daaraka.m gahetvaa ayyikaaya  ada.msu. saa tassa naama.m ga.nhantii dabbatthambhe patitvaa laddhajiivitattaa  ``dabbo''tissa naama.m akaasi. tassa ca sattavassikakaale satthaa  bhikkhusa"nghaparivaaro mallara.t.the caarika.m caramaano anupiyambavane  viharati. dabbakumaaro satthaara.m disvaa dassaneneva ^a^M1.0050^ea^ pasiiditvaa  pabbajitukaamo hutvaa ``aha.m dasabalassa santike pabbajissaamii''ti  ayyika.m aapucchi. saa ``saadhu, taataa''ti dabbakumaara.m aadaaya satthu  santika.m gantvaa, ``bhante, ima.m kumaara.m pabbaajethaa''ti aaha. satthaa  a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno sa~n~na.m adaasi -- ``bhikkhu ima.m daaraka.m  pabbaajehii''ti. so thero satthu vacana.m sutvaa ^a^V1.0041^ea^ dabbakumaara.m pabbaajento  tacapa~ncakakamma.t.thaana.m aacikkhi. pubbahetusampanno kataabhiniihaaro satto  pa.thamakesava.t.tiyaa voropanakkha.ne sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi, dutiyaaya  kesava.t.tiyaa oropiyamaanaaya sakadaagaamiphale, tatiyaaya anaagaamiphale,  sabbakesaana.m pana oropana~nca arahattaphalasacchikiriyaa ca apacchaa  apure ahosi. satthaa mallara.t.the yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa ^a^P1.0044^ea^  raajagaha.m gantvaa ve.luvane vaasa.m kappesi.
text.3802: [21] ``tuva.m satthaa ca ketu ca, dhajo yuupo ca paa.nina.m.
text.3803: [22] paraayano pati.t.thaa ca, diipo ca dvipaduttamo..
text.3807: [22] na tveva tava sabba~n~nu, ~naa.na.m sakkaa pametave..
text.381: [03] tatraayasmaa dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphatti.m  oloketvaa sa"nghassa veyyaavaccakara.ne kaaya.m yojetukaamo cintesi --  ``ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~naapeyya.m bhattaani ca  uddiseyya''nti. so satthu santika.m gantvaa attano parivitakka.m  aarocesi. satthaa tassa saadhukaara.m datvaa senaasanapa~n~naapakatta~nca  bhattuddesakatta~nca sampa.ticchi. atha na.m ``aya.m dabbo daharova samaano  mahante .thaane .thito''ti sattavassikakaaleyeva upasampaadesi. thero  upasampannakaalato pa.t.thaaya raajagaha.m upanissaaya viharantaana.m  sabbabhikkhuuna.m senaasanaani ca pa~n~naapeti, bhikkha~nca uddisati.  tassa senaasanapa~n~naapakabhaavo sabbadisaasu paaka.to ahosi --  ``dabbo kira mallaputto sabhaagasabhaagaana.m bhikkhuuna.m eka.t.thaane  senaasanaani pa~n~naapeti, aasannepi duurepi senaasana.m pa~n~naapeti, gantu.m  asakkonte iddhiyaa netii''ti.
text.3811: [22] natveva tava sabba~n~nu, siila.m sakkaa pametave..
text.382: [01] atha na.m bhikkhuu kaalepi vikaalepi -- ``amhaaka.m,  aavuso, jiivakambavane senaasana.m pa~n~naapehi, amhaaka.m maddakucchismi.m  migadaaye''ti eva.m senaasana.m uddisaapetvaa tassa iddhi.m passantaa  gacchanti. sopi iddhiyaa manomaye kaaye abhisa"nkharitvaa ekekassa  therassa ekeka.m attanaa sadisa.m bhikkhu.m datvaa a"nguliyaa jalamaanaaya  purato gantvaa ``aya.m ma~nco ida.m pii.tha''ntiaadiini vatvaa senaasana.m  pa~n~naapetvaa puna attano vasana.t.thaanameva aagacchati ^a^M1.0051^ea^. ayamettha  sa"nkhepo, vitthaarato panida.m vatthu paa.liya.m aagatameva. satthaa idameva  kaara.na.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m  senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama  saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m yadida.m dabbo mallaputto''ti  (a0 ni0  1.209; 214). vuttampi ceta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0  thera 2.54, 108-149) --
text.3827: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.3833: [22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, phala.m ~naa.nassa thomane..
text.3839: [03] so arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pubbenivaasa.m anupa.tipaa.tiyaa  anussaranto yaava asa~n~nabhave acittakapa.tisandhi, taava addasa. tato  pa~nca kappasataani cittappavatti.m adisvaa avasaaneva disvaa  ``kimeta''nti ^a^P2.0042^ea^ aavajjento nayavasena  ``asa~n~nabhavo bhavissatii''ti ni.t.tha.m agamaasi. tenaaha bhagavaa --  ``atthi, bhikkhave, asa~n~nasattaa naama diighaayukaa devaa, tato cuto  sobhito idhuupapanno, so eta.m bhava.m jaanaati, sobhito anussaratii''ti  (paaraa0 232 atthato samaana.m). eva.m nayavasena anussarantassa  anussara.nakosalla.m disvaa satthaa thera.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarantaana.m  agga.t.thaane .thapesi. tato eva caaya.m aayasmaa savisesa.m attano  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m ^a^V1.0316^ea^ tassa ca paccayabhuuta.m pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa  somanassajaato tadatthadiipana.m udaana.m udaanento --
text.3845: [22] pa~nca kappasataanaaha.m, ekaratti.m anussari''nti.. --  gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3846: [03] tattha ^b^satimaa^eb^ti saya.m samudaagamanasampannaaya  satipa.t.thaanabhaavanaapaaripuuriyaa sativepullappattiyaa ca satimaa.  ^b^pa~n~navaa^eb^ti cha.labhi~n~naapaaripuuriyaa pa~n~naavepullappattiyaa ca pa~n~navaa.  bhinnakilesataaya ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. saddhaadibalaana~nceva ^a^M1.0371^ea^  catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyassa ca sa.msiddhipaaripuuriyaa  ^b^aaraddhabalaviiriyo^eb^. saddhaadiina~nhettha balaggaha.nena gaha.na.m satipi  satiaadiina.m balabhaave, yathaa ``gobalibaddhaa pu~n~na~naa.nasambhaaraa''ti.  ^b^pa~nca kappasataanaaha.m, ekaratti.m anussari^eb^nti ekaratti.m viya  anussari.m. viya-saddo hi idha luttaniddi.t.tho, etena  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.ne attano ~naa.navasiibhaava.m diipeti.
text.3847: [03] idaani yaaya pa.tipattiyaa attano satimantaadibhaavo saatisaya.m  pubbenivaasa~naa.na~nca siddha.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``cattaaro''^eb^tiaadinaa  dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^cattaaro satipa.t.thaane^eb^ti  kaayaanupassanaadike attano visayabhedena catubbidhe  lokiyalokuttaramissake satisa"nkhaate satipa.t.thaane. ^b^sattaa^eb^ti  satta bojjha"nge. ^b^a.t.thaa^eb^ti a.t.tha magga"ngaani. satipa.t.thaanesu hi  suppati.t.thitacittassa satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gataa eva honti,  tathaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. tenaaha dhammasenaapati -- ``catuusu  satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m  bhaavetvaa''tiaadiihi (dii0 ni0 3.143) sattako.t.thaasikesu  sattati.msaaya ^a^P2.0043^ea^ bodhipakkhiyadhammesu ekasmi.m ko.t.thaase  bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchante itare agacchantaa naama natthiiti.  ^b^bhaavaya^eb^nti bhaavanaahetu. sesa.m vuttanayameva.
text.3850: [03] ^b^ya.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0317^ea^ ^b^kicca.m da.lhaviiriyenaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  valliyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato  kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m  gato asiitiko.tivibhava.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa pabbatapaade  ara~n~naayatane ekissaa nadiyaa tiire assama.m kaaretvaa viharanto  attano anugga.nhanattha.m upagata.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  ajinacamma.m pattharitvaa adaasi ^a^M1.0372^ea^. tattha nisinna.m bhagavanta.m pupphehi ca  candanena ca puujetvaa ambaphalaani datvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vandi. tassa  bhagavaa nisinnaasanasampatti.m pakaasento anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. so  tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m  braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ``ka.nhamitto''ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu  vesaaligamane buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho mahaakaccaanattherassa  santike pabbaji. so mandapa~n~no dandhaparakkamo ca hutvaa cira.m kaala.m  vi~n~nu.m sabrahmacaari.m nissaayeva vasati. bhikkhuu ``yathaa naama valli  rukkhaadiisu ki~nci anissaaya va.d.dhitu.m na sakkoti, evamayampi  ka~nci pa.n.dita.m anissaaya va.d.dhitu.m na sakkotii''ti ^b^valliyo^eb^tveva  samudaacari.msu. aparabhaage pana ve.nudattatthera.m upasa"nkamitvaa tassa  ovaade .thatvaa sato sampajaano hutvaa viharanto ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m  gatattaa pa.tipattikkama.m thera.m pucchanto --
text.3856: [22] aha.m monena monissa.m, ga"ngaasotova saagara''nti.. --  gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3857: [03] tattha ^a^P2.0044^ea^ ^b^ya.m kicca.m da.lhaviiriyenaa^eb^ti  da.lhena viiriyena thirena parakkamena, da.lhaviiriyena vaa purisadhorayhena  ya.m kicca.m kaatabba.m pa.tipajjitabba.m. ^b^ya.m kicca.m boddhumicchataa^eb^ti  cattaari ariyasaccaani nibbaanameva vaa boddhu.m bujjhitu.m icchantena  pa.tivijjhitukaamena ya.m kicca.m kara.niiya.m. ^b^karissa.m  naavarajjhissa^eb^nti tamaha.m daani karissa.m na viraadhessa.m, yathaanusi.t.tha.m  pa.tipajjissaami. ^b^passa viiriya.m parakkama^eb^nti yathaa pa.tipajjamaane  dhamme vidhinaa iira.nato ^b^``viiriya.m'',^eb^ para.m para.m .thaana.m akkamanato  ^b^``parakkamo''^eb^ti ca laddhanaama.m sammaavaayaama.m passa na saddhamevaati  attano kattukaamata.m dasseti.
text.3858: [03] ^b^tva~ncaa^eb^ti ^a^M1.0373^ea^ ^a^V1.0318^ea^ kamma.t.thaanadaayaka.m kalyaa.namitta.m aalapati.  ^b^me^eb^ti mayha.m. ^b^maggamakkhaahii^eb^ti ariyamagga.m kathehi,  lokuttaramaggasampaapaka.m catusaccakamma.t.thaana.m kathehiiti attho.  ^b^a~njasa^eb^nti ujuka.m majjhimapa.tipadaabhaavena antadvayassa  anupagamanato. amate nibbaane sampaapakabhaavena pati.t.thitattaa  ^b^amatogadha.m. monenaa^eb^ti ~naa.nena maggapa~n~naaya.  ^b^monissa^eb^nti jaanissa.m nibbaana.m pa.tivijjhissa.m paapu.nissa.m.  ^b^ga"ngaasotova saagara^eb^nti yathaa ga"ngaaya soto saagara.m samudda.m  avirajjhanto eka.msato ogaahati, eva.m ``aha.m kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto  magga~naa.nena nibbaana.m adhigamissaami, tasmaa ta.m kamma.t.thaana.m me  aacikkhathaa''ti thera.m kamma.t.thaana.m yaaci.
text.3859: [03] ta.m sutvaa ve.nudattatthero tassa kamma.t.thaana.m adaasi. sopi  kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto nacirasseva vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.75-105) --

text.3871: [22] ko vaa tva.m kassa vaa putto, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya.m..
text.3873: [22] namhi devaa na gandhabbo, namhi sakko purindado..

text.3907: [22] bhoge me uunataa natthi, yamhi gabbhe vasaamaha.m..
text.3919: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto thero imaayeva gaathaa  abhaasiiti.
text.3922: [03] ^b^kese me olikhissantii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  viitasokattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa  bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.naana.m ^a^P2.0045^ea^  vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato kaame pahaaya ^a^M1.0376^ea^ isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  mahataa isiga.nena parivuto ara~n~ne vasanto buddhuppaada.m sutvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho  ``udumbarapupphasadisaa dullabhadassanaa buddhaa bhagavanto, idaaneva  upagantabbaa''ti mahatiyaa parisaaya saddhi.m satthaara.m da.t.thu.m gacchanto  diya.d.dhayojane sese byaadhiko hutvaa buddhagataaya sa~n~naaya kaala"nkato  devesu uppajjitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  a.t.thaarasavassaadhikaana.m dvinna.m vassasataana.m matthake dhammaasokara~n~no  kani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti, tassa ^b^viitasoko^eb^ti naama ahosi.  so vayappatto khattiyakumaarehi sikkhitabbavijjaasippesu nipphatti.m  gato giridattatthera.m nissaaya gihibhuuto suttantapi.take abhidhammapi.take  ca visaarado hutvaa ekadivasa.m massukammasamaye kappakassa hatthato  aadaasa.m gahetvaa kaaya.m olokento valitapalitaadiini disvaa  sa~njaatasa.mvego vipassanaaya citta.m otaaretvaa bhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa  tasmi.myeva aasane sotaapanno hutvaa giridattattherassa santike  pabbajitvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.49.9-26) --
text.3929: [21] ``mama a~n~nataro sisso, sissaana.m so kathesi me.
text.3930: [22] sutvaana te etamattha.m, aarocesu.m mama.m tadaa..
text.3932: [22] tassaanuvattati jano, laabho amha.m na vijjati..
text.394: [22] taavataa ti.t.thamaano so, taaresi janata.m bahu.m..
text.3941: [21] ``buddho loke samuppanno, cakkhu.m lacchaama no bhava.m.
text.3960: [22] sabbe co.laa samucchinnaa, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.3961: [03] tattha ^a^M1.0378^ea^ ^b^kese me olikhissanti, kappako upasa"nkamii^eb^ti  gihikaale massukammasamaye ``mama kese olikhissa.m kappemii''ti  kesaadiina.m chedanaadivasena kappanato kappako nhaapito ma.m upagacchi.  ^b^tato^eb^ti kappakato. ^b^sariira.m paccavekkhisa^eb^nti sabbakaayike  aadaase palitavalitamukhanimittaadidassanamukhena ``abhibhuuto vata  jaraaya me kaayo''ti jaraabhibhuuta.m attano sariira.m paccavekkhi.m. eva.m  paccavekkhato ca ^b^tuccho kaayo adissittha^eb^  niccadhuvasukhasabhaavaadiihi ritto hutvaa me kaayo adissatha pa~n~naayi.  kasmaa? ^b^andhakaare tamo byagaa^eb^ yena  ayonisomanasikaarasa"nkhaatena ^a^P2.0046^ea^ tamasaa attano  kaaye andhagataa vijjamaanampi asubhaadisabhaava.m apassantaa avijjamaana.m  subhaadiaakaara.m ga.nhanti, tasmi.m andhakaare andhakara.na.t.thaane kaaye  yonisomanasikaarasa"nkhaatena ~naa.naalokena avijjaatamo vigato, tato  eva ^b^sabbe co.laa samucchinnaa^eb^ coraa viya kusalabha.n.dacchedanato,  saadhuuhi alaatabbato asa"ngahetabbato sa"nkaarakuu.taadiisu  cha.d.ditapilotikakha.n.da.m viya issarajanena ariyajanena  jigucchitabbataaya co.laa viyaati vaa ``co.laa''ti laddhanaamaa kilesaa  samucchinnaa. aggamaggena samugghaa.titattaa eva ca nesa.m ^b^natthi  daani punabbhavo^eb^ aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti natthiiti.
text.3964: [03] ^b^pa~nca niivara.ne hitvaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  pu.n.namaasattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto tissassa bhagavato  kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthari ara~n~ne  viharante pa.msukuulaciivara.m dumasaakhaaya laggetvaa gandhaku.ti.m pavi.t.the  dhanuhattho gahana.m pavi.t.tho satthu pa.msukuula.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ^a^V1.0323^ea^ dhanu.m  nikkhipitvaa buddhagu.ne anussaritvaa ^a^M1.0379^ea^ pa.msukuula.m vandi. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m  ku.tumbiyakule nibbatti. tassa kira jaatadivase tasmi.m gehe  sabbabhaajanaani suva.n.naratanamayehi maasehi paripu.n.naaneva ahesu.m.  tenassa ^b^pu.n.namaaso^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto  daarapariggaha.m katvaa ekasmi.m putte uppanne gharaavaasa.m pahaaya pabbajitvaa  gaamakaavaase vasanto gha.tento vaayamanto cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena  vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.1-8) --
text.3970: [22] caapa.m tattheva nikkhippa, sire katvaana a~njali.m..
text.3976: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa saavatthi.m upagantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa  susaane vasati, tassa ca aciraagatasseva sato putto kaalamakaasi.  daarakamaataa therassa aagatabhaava.m sutvaa, ``maa ida.m aputtaka.m saapateyya.m  raajaano hareyyu''nti ta.m uppabbaajetukaamaa mahataa parivaarena ^a^P2.0047^ea^  therassa santika.m gantvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa palobhetu.m aarabhi.  thero attano viitaraagabhaavajaanaapanattha.m aakaase .thatvaa attano  pa.tipattikittanamukhena tassaa dhamma.m desento --
text.3982: [22] ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca, tuccho kaayo adissathaa''ti..  --
text.3984: [03] tattha ^a^V1.0324^ea^ ^b^pa~nca niivara.ne hitvaa^eb^ti kaamacchandaadike pa~nca  niivara.ne pahaaya jhaanaadhigamena viddha.msetvaa. ^b^yogakkhemassa  pattiyaa^eb^ti kaamayogaadiihi catuuhi yogehi khemassa anupaddutassa  nibbaanassa adhigamaaya. ^b^dhammaadaasa^eb^nti dhammabhuuta.m aadaasa.m.  yathaa hi aadaaso olokentassa ruupakaaye gu.naagu.na.m aada.mseti, eva.m  vipassanaasa"nkhaato dhammaana.m saama~n~navisesaavabodhanato ~naa.nadassanabhuuto  dhammaadaaso vipassantassa vodaanasa.mkilesadhammavibhaavanena  tappahaanasaadhanena ca visesato naamakaaye gu.na.m aada.mseti. tenaaha --
text.3987: [03] ima.m kaaya.m dhammasamuuha.m mama attabhaava.m  ajjhattikabaahiraayatanabhaavato santarabaahira.m sabba.m anavasesa.m dhammaadaasa.m  gahetvaa ``anicca''ntipi ``dukkha''ntipi ``anattaa''tipi  patiavekkhi.m ~naa.nacakkhunaa passi.m. eva.m passataa ca mayaa  ^b^ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa caa^eb^ti attano santaane parasantaane ca  ^b^tuccho kaayo adissatha^eb^ niccasaaraadivirahito tuccho  khandhapa~ncakasa"nkhaato attabhaavakaayo ~naa.nacakkhunaa yaathaavato  apassittha. sakalampi hi khandhapa~ncaka.m ``avijjaanivutassa,  bhikkhave, baalassa ta.nhaasa.myuttassa evamaya.m kaayo  samudaagato''tiaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0  2.19) ``kaayo''ti vuccati.  ``adissathaa''ti ca iminaa yadeva kaaye da.t.thabba.m, ta.m di.t.tha.m, na  daanissa ki~nci mayaa passitabba.m atthiiti katakiccata.m dassento  a~n~na.m byaakaasi. eva.m thero imaahi gaathaahi puraa.nadutiyikaaya dhamma.m  desetvaa ta.m sara.nesu ca siilesu ca sampati.t.thaapetvaa uyyojesi.
text.3990: [03] ^b^yathaapi^eb^ ^a^M1.0381^ea^ ^b^bhaddo aaja~n~no^eb^ti aayasmato nandakattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani karonto sikhissa bhagavato kaale paccantadese uppajjitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto ^a^P2.0048^ea^ vanacaariko hutvaa vicaranto  ekadivasa.m satthu ca"nkamana.t.thaana.m disvaa pasannacitto vaalukaa okiri.  so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  campaaya.m gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa ^b^nandako^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu.  je.t.thakabhaataa panassa bharato naama. tassa pubbayogo anantaravatthusmi.m  aavibhavissati. te ubhopi ^a^V1.0325^ea^ vi~n~nuta.m patvaa aayasmanta.m so.na.m  ko.livisa.m pabbajita.m sutvaa ``so.nopi naama tathaasukhumaalo pabbaji,  kima"nga.m pana maya''nti pabbaji.msu. tesu bharato nacirasseva vipassana.m  va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. nandako pana kilesaana.m balavabhaavena  taava vipassana.m ussukkaapetu.m naasakkhi, vipassanaaya kamma.m karoti eva.  athassa bharatatthero aasaya.m ~natvaa avassayo bhavitukaamo ta.m  pacchaasama.na.m katvaa vihaarato nikkhamitvaa maggasamiipe nisinno  vipassanaakatha.m kathesi.
text.3991: [03] tena ca samayena saka.tasatthe gacchante eko saka.te yutto go.no  cikkhalla.t.thaane saka.ta.m uddharitu.m asakkonto paripati. tato na.m  satthavaaho saka.taa mocetvaa ti.na~nca paaniiya~nca datvaa parissama.m  apanetvaa puna dhure yojesi. tato go.no vuupasantaparissamo  laddhabalo ta.m saka.ta.m cikkhalla.t.thaanato uddharitvaa thale pati.t.thaapesi.  atha bharatatthero nandakassa ``passasi no tva.m, aavuso nandaka,  imassa kamma''nti ta.m nidassetvaa tena ``passaamii''ti vutte  ``imamattha.m su.t.thu upadhaarehii''ti aaha. itaro ``yathaaya.m go.no  vuupasantaparissamo pa"nka.t.thaanato bhaara.m ubbahati, eva.m mayaapi  sa.msaarapa"nkato attaa uddharitabbo''ti tamevaaramma.na.m katvaa vipassanaaya  kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.48.90-95) --
text.3999: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano je.t.thabhaatikassa bharatattherassa santike  a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
text.4002: [22] bhiyyo laddhaana sa.mvega.m, adiino vahate dhura.m..
text.4005: [22] aajaaniiya.m ma.m dhaaretha, putta.m buddhassa orasa''nti.. --  gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.4006: [03] tattha ^a^V1.0326^ea^ ^a^P2.0049^ea^ ^b^bhiyyo laddhaana sa.mvega.m, adiino  vahate dhura^eb^nti ``mayha.m jaatibalaviiriyaana.m ananucchavikameta.m yadida.m  aagatassa bhaarassa avahana''nti sa.mvega.m labhitvaa adiino adiinamaanaso  aliinacitto. ``aliino''ti vaa paa.tho, so eva attho. bhiyyo  punappuna.m bhiyyosomattaaya attano dhura.m bhaara.m vahate ubbahati. sesa.m  he.t.thaa rama.niiyavihaarittherassa gaathaava.n.nanaaya.m vuttanayameva.
text.4009: [03] ^b^ehi^eb^ ^a^M1.0383^ea^, ^b^nandaka, gacchaamaa^eb^ti aayasmato  bharatattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? aya.m kira anomadassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m manu~n~nadassana.m mudusukhasamphassa.m  upaahanadvaya.m gahetvaa gacchanto satthaara.m ca"nkamanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  upaahanaa upanaametvaa, ``abhiruhatu bhagavaa upaahanaa, ya.m mama assa  diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti aaha. abhiruhi bhagavaa tassa  anugga.nhanattha.m upaahanaa. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu  sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade campaanagare gahapatikule nibbatti,  ^b^bharato^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto so.nattherassa  pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa ``sopi naama pabbajii''ti sa~njaatasa.mvego  pabbajitvaa katapubbakicco vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.48.71-89) --
text.4017: [22] ito phala.m labhissaami, so me attho samijjhatu..
text.4020: [21] ``yo ^a^V1.0327^ea^ paanadhi.m me adaasi, pasanno sehi paa.nibhi.
text.4029: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.4039: [22] datvaana paanadhi.m eka.m, pattomhi acala.m pada.m..
text.4043: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa attano kani.t.thabhaatikena nandakattherena  he.t.thaa vuttanayena a~n~naabyaakara.ne kate ``idaani nandakopi arahaa  jaato, handa maya.m ubhopi satthu santika.m gantvaa vusitabrahmacariyata.m  nivedessaamaati uppanna.m parivitakka.m nandakattherassa kathento --
text.4049: [22] so no attho anuppatto, sabbasa.myojanakkhayo''ti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.4050: [03] tattha ^a^V1.0328^ea^ ^a^P2.0050^ea^ ^b^nandakaa^eb^ti aalapana.m.  ^b^ehii^eb^ti tassa attano santikakara.na.m. ^b^gacchaamaa^eb^ti tena  attanaa ca ekajjha.m kaatabbakiriyaavacana.m, ^b^upajjhaayassaa^eb^ti  sammaasambuddhassa, sammaasambuddho hi samantacakkhunaa buddhacakkhunaa ca  sattaana.m aasayaanusayacaritaadiina.m yathaabhuutavilokanena sadevakassa  lokassa vajjaavajja.m upanijjhaayatiiti visesato upajjhaayoti vattabbata.m  arahati. yadattha.m gamana.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``siihanaada.m nadissaama,  buddhase.t.thassa sammukhaa''^eb^ti aaha. yathaabhuccagu.naabhibyaahaarataaya  abhiitanaadabhaavato siihanaada.m buddhassa sammaasambuddhassa tato eva  sabbasattuttamataaya se.t.thassa, buddhaana.m vaa saavakabuddhaadiina.m se.t.thassa  sammukhaa purato nadissaamaati attho.
text.4051: [03] yathaa pana siihanaada.m naditukaamo, ta.m dassento  ^b^``yaayaa''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^yaayaa^eb^ti yadattha.m, yaaya  yadatthaanuppattiyaati attho. ^b^no^eb^ti amhaaka.m.  ^b^anukampaayaa^eb^ti anugga.nhanena amhe dvepi ^b^pabbaajayi^eb^  pabbaajesi. ^b^munii^eb^ti bhagavaa. ^b^so no attho  anuppatto^eb^ti so attho sabbesa.m sa.myojanaana.m khayabhuuta.m arahattaphala.m no  amhehi anuppatto, adhigatoti attho.
text.4054: [03] ^b^nadanti eva.m sappa~n~naa^eb^ti aayasmato bhaaradvaajattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m sumana.m naama paccekabuddha.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m  disvaa pasannamaanaso ^a^M1.0386^ea^ paripakka.m vallikaaraphala.m adaasi. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe  braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa gottanaamena ^b^bhaaradvaajo^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha.  so vayappatto gharaavaasa.m vasanto ekaputta.m labhi. tassa  ``ka.nhadinno''ti naama.m akaasi. tassa vi~n~nuta.m pattakaale ``taata,  asukassa naama aacariyassa santike sippa.m sikkhitvaa ehii''ti ta.m  takkasila.m pesesi. so gacchanto antaraamagge satthu saavaka.m a~n~natara.m  mahaathera.m kalyaa.namitta.m labhitvaa tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa katapubbakicco vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto  nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.48.66-70) --
text.4057: [21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
text.406: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.4060: [03] athassa ^a^P2.0051^ea^ pitaa bhaaradvaajo ve.luvane viharanta.m  bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajitvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m  sacchaakaasi. atha putto satthaara.m vanditu.m raajagaha.m aagato satthu  santike nisinna.m pitara.m disvaa tu.t.thacitto ``pitaapi kho me  pabbajito, ki.m nu kho tena pabbajjaakicca.m matthaka.m paapita''nti  viima.msanto khii.naasavabhaava.m ~natvaa ta.m siihanaada.m nadaapetukaamo, ``saadhu,  kho tumhehi kata.m pabbajantehi, pabbajjaakicca.m pana matthaka.m paapita''nti  pucchi. bhaaradvaajo puttassa adhigama.m diipento --
text.4065: [21] ``satthaa ca parici.n.no me, dhammo sa"ngho ca puujito.
text.4066: [22] aha~nca vitto sumano, putta.m disvaa anaasava''nti..  -- gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.4067: [03] tattha ^a^M1.0387^ea^ ^b^nadantii^eb^ti yathaabhuccagu.naabhibyaahaaravasena abhiitanaada.m  nadanti gajjanti. ^b^eva^eb^nti idaani vattabbaakaaradassana.m.  ^b^sappa~n~naa^eb^ti aggamaggapa~n~naadhigamena sabbapa~n~naadhigamena  sabbapa~n~naavepullappattaa. ^b^viiraa^eb^ti  catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyasampannataaya viiraa, tato eva  anavasesasa.mkilesapakkhanimmathanena ^b^savaahana.m^eb^ kilesa^b^maara.m^eb^  abhisa"nkhaara^b^maara.m^eb^ devaputta^b^maara~nca jetvaa^eb^ sabbaso  ^b^vijitasa"ngaamaa^eb^ nadanti sappa~n~naati sambandho.
text.4068: [03] eva.m vijetabbavijayena siihanaada.m dassetvaa idaani  aaraadhetabbasamaaraadhanena icchitabbasiddhiyaa ca ta.m dassetu.m,  ^b^``satthaa ca parici.n.no me''^eb^ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha  ^b^satthaa ca parici.n.no me^eb^ti mama satthaa sammaasambuddho  yathaanusi.t.tha.m ovaadaanusaasaniikara.nena mayaa parici.n.no upaasito, na  dhammaadhikara.na.m visositoti adhippaayo. ^b^dhammo sa"ngho ca  puujito^eb^ti navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo,  yathaapa.tipattiyaagatamaggaanuppattiyaa siiladi.t.thisaama~n~nagamanena  ariyasa"ngho ca mayaa puujito maanito. ^b^aha~nca vitto sumano,  putta.m disvaa anaasava^eb^nti mama putta.m ^a^V1.0330^ea^ anaasava.m sabbaso khii.naasava.m  disvaa dassanahetu ahampi vitto niraamisaaya piitiyaa tu.t.tho, tatoyeva  niraamisena somanassena sumano jaatoti attho.
text.4071: [03] ^b^upaasitaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0052^ea^ ^b^sappurisaa^eb^ti  aayasmato ka.nhadinnattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito  catunavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m sobhita.m  naama paccekabuddha.m disvaa pasannacitto punnaagapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so  tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe  braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^ka.nhadinno^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto  upanissayasampattiyaa codiyamaano dhammasenaapati.m upasa"nkamitvaa  ^a^M1.0388^ea^ dhamma.m  sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.  tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.61-65) --
text.4082: [21] ``bhavaraagahatassa me sato, bhavaraago puna me na  vijjati.
text.4083: [22] na caahu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi  vijjatii''ti.. --
text.4085: [03] tattha ^b^upaasitaa^eb^ti paricaritaa pa.tipattipayirupaasanaaya  payirupaasitaa. ^b^sappurisaa^eb^ti santehi ^a^V1.0331^ea^ siilaadigu.nehi samannaagataa  purisaa, ariyapuggalaa saariputtattheraadayo. etena  purimacakkadvayasampattimattano dasseti. na hi patiruupadesavaasena vinaa  sappurisuupanissayo sambhavati. ^b^sutaa dhammaa^eb^ti  saccapa.ticcasamuppaadaadipa.tisa.myuttadhammaa sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaaritaa.  etena attano baahusacca.m dassento pacchimacakkadvayasampatti.m dasseti.  ^b^abhi.nhaso^eb^ti bahuso na kaalena kaala.m. ida~nca pada.m  ``upaasitaa sappurisaa''ti etthaapi yojetabba.m. ^b^sutvaana  pa.tipajjissa.m, a~njasa.m amatogadha^eb^nti te dhamme sutvaa tattha  vuttaruupaaruupadhamme salakkha.naadito pariggahetvaa anukkamena vipassana.m  va.d.dhetvaa amatogadha.m nibbaanapati.t.tha.m ta.msampaapaka.m a~njasa.m ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m  magga.m pa.tipajji.m paapu.ni.m.
text.4086: [03] ^b^bhavaraagahatassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0389^ea^ ^b^me sato^eb^ti bhavaraagena bhavata.nhaaya  anaadimati ^a^P2.0053^ea^ sa.msaare hatassa upaddutassa mama sato  samaanassa, aggamaggena vaa hatabhavaraagassa. ^b^bhavaraago puna me na  vijjatii^eb^ti tato eva puna idaani bhavaraago me natthi. ^b^na caahu  na me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatii^eb^ti yadipi pubbe  puthujjanakaale sekkhakaale ca me bhavaraago ahosi, aggamaggappattito  pana pa.t.thaaya na caahu na ca ahosi, aayatimpi na me bhavissati,  etarahi adhunaapi na ca me vijjati na ca upalabbhati, pahiinoti  attho. bhavaraagavacaneneva cettha tadeka.t.thataaya maanaadiinampi abhaavo  vuttoti sabbaso parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanata.m dasseti.
text.4091: [01] ^b^yato^eb^ ^a^V1.0332^ea^ ^b^aha.m pabbajito^eb^ti aayasmato  migasirattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato  kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m  disvaa pasannacitto kusa.t.thaka.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule  pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa migasiranakkhattena jaatattaa ^b^migasiro^eb^ti  laddhanaamo vayappatto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato  chavasiisamanta.m naama sikkhi, ya.m parijappetvaa tivassamatthake  mataanampi siisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa ``aya.m satto asuka.t.thaane  nibbatto''ti jaanaati.
text.4092: [03] so gharaavaasa.m anicchanto paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ta.m  vijja.m nissaaya lokena sakkato garukato laabhii hutvaa vicaranto  saavatthi.m upagato ^a^M1.0390^ea^ satthu santika.m gantvaa attano aanubhaava.m pakaasento  -- ``aha.m, bho gotama, mataana.m nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanaamii''ti vatvaa,  ``katha.m pana tva.m jaanaasii''ti vutte, ``chavasiisaani aaharaapetvaa manta.m  parijappetvaa nakhena siisa.m aako.tento nirayaadika.m tehi tehi  nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanaamii''ti kathesi. athassa bhagavaa parinibbutassa  bhikkhuno siisakapaala.m aaharaapetvaa, ``kathehi taava tassa gati.m,  yassida.m siisakapaala''nti aaha. so ta.m kapaala.m manta.m parijappetvaa  nakhena aako.tetvaa neva anta.m na ko.ti.m passati. atha satthaaraa,  ``na sakkosi paribbaajakaa''ti vutte ^a^P2.0054^ea^,  ``upaparikkhissaami taavaa''ti vatvaa punappuna.m parivattentopi na  passateva. baahirakamantena hi khii.naasavassa gati.m katha.m jaanissati,  athassa matthakato kacchehi ca sedo mucci. so lajjitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto  a.t.thaasi. satthaa ``kilamasi paribbaajakaa''ti aaha. so  ``aama, kilamaami, na imassa gati.m jaanaami, tumhe pana  jaanaathaa''ti. ``aha.m eta.m jaanaami, ito uttaritarampi jaanaamii''ti  vatvaa ``nibbaana.m gato so''ti aaha. paribbaajako ``ima.m vijja.m  mayha.m dethaa''ti aaha. ``tena hi pabbajaa''ti vatvaa ta.m pabbaajetvaa  pa.thama.m samathakamma.t.thaane niyojetvaa ^a^V1.0333^ea^ jhaanaabhi~n~naasu pati.t.thitassa  vipassanaaya kamma.m upadisi. so vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto  nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.48.56-60) --
text.41: [03] dukanipaate ekuunapa~n~naasa theraa, a.t.thanavuti gaathaa; tikanipaate  so.lasa theraa, a.t.thacattaaliisa gaathaa; catukkanipaate terasa theraa,  dvepa~n~naasa gaathaa; pa~ncakanipaate dvaadasa theraa, sa.t.thi gaathaa; chakkanipaate  cuddasa theraa, caturaasiiti gaathaa; sattakanipaate pa~nca theraa, pa~ncati.msa  gaathaa; a.t.thakanipaate tayo theraa, catuviisati gaathaa; navakanipaate eko  thero, nava gaathaa; dasanipaate satta theraa, sattati gaathaa;  ekaadasanipaate eko thero, ekaadasa gaathaa; dvaadasanipaate dve theraa,  catuviisati gaathaa; terasanipaate eko thero, terasa gaathaa; cuddasanipaate  dve theraa, a.t.thaviisati gaathaa; pannarasanipaato natthi, so.lasanipaate dve  theraa, dvatti.msa gaathaa; viisatinipaate dasa theraa, pa~ncacattaaliisaadhikaani  dve gaathaasataani; ti.msanipaate tayo theraa, sata.m pa~nca ^a^V1.0004^ea^ ca gaathaa;  cattaaliisanipaate eko ^a^M1.0004^ea^ thero, dvecattaaliisa gaathaa; pa~n~naasanipaate eko  thero, pa~ncapa~n~naasa gaathaa; sa.t.thinipaate eko thero, a.t.thasa.t.thi gaathaa;  sattatinipaate eko thero, ekasattati gaathaa. sampi.n.detvaa pana  dvesataani catusa.t.thi ca theraa, sahassa.m tii.ni sataani sa.t.thi ca gaathaati.  vuttampi ceta.m --

text.4308: [03] ^b^na taava supitu.m hotii^eb^ti aayasmato so.nassa  po.tiriyaputtassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro sikhissa bhagavato kaale vanacaro hutvaa jiivanto  ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto kura~njiyaphala.m ^a^P2.0062^ea^  satthuno adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m po.tiriyassa naama gaamabhojakassa  putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^so.no^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so  vayappatto bhaddiyassa saakiyara~n~no senaapati ahosi. atha  bhaddiyaraaje he.t.thaa vuttanayena pabbajite, senaapati ^a^M1.0405^ea^ ``raajaapi naama  pabbaji, ki.m mayha.m gharaavaasenaa''ti pabbaji? pabbajitvaa pana  niddaaraamo viharati, na bhaavanamanuyu~njati. ta.m bhagavaa anupiyaaya.m  ambavane viharanto attano obhaasa.m pharaapetvaa tenassa sati.m janetvaa  imaaya gaathaaya ta.m ovadanto --

text.4315: [03] tattha ^b^na taava supitu.m hoti, ratti nakkhattamaalinii^eb^ti  a.t.thahi akkha.nehi vajjita.m navama.m kha.na.m labhitvaa .thitassa  vi~n~nujaatikassa yaava na arahatta.m hatthagata.m hoti, taava aya.m  nakkhattamaalinii ratti supitu.m niddaayitu.m na hoti, supanassa kaalo na  hoti. apica kho ^b^pa.tijaggitumevesaa, ratti hoti vijaanataa^eb^ti  esaa ratti naama manussaana.m migapakkhiina~nca nidduupagamanena visesato  nissaddavelaabhuutaa pa.tipatti.m attani sa~njaggitu.m  jaagariyaanuyogamanuyu~njitumeva vijaanataa vi~n~nunaa icchitaa hotiiti.
text.4316: [03] ta.m sutvaa so.no sa.mviggataramaanaso hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thapetvaa  abbhokaasika"nga.m adhi.t.thaaya vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto  ^b^``hatthikkhandhova patita''^eb^nti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha  ^b^avapatita^eb^nti avamukha.m patita.m uddha.mpaada.m adhomukha.m patita.m.  ^b^ku~njaro ce anukkame^eb^ti ku~njaro anukkameyya ce. ida.m vutta.m hoti  -- yadaaha.m hatthimaaruhitvaa sa"ngaama.m pavi.t.tho hatthikkhandhato patito,  tadaaha.m ^b^sa"ngaame^eb^ tena hatthinaa maddito mato ahosi.m ce, ta.m  ^b^me^eb^ mara.na.m ^b^seyyo, ya~nce^eb^ idaani kilesehi ^b^paraajito^eb^  jiiveyya.m, ta.m na seyyoti. ima.m gaatha.m vadantoyeva vipassana.m  ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.52.1-6) --
text.4321: [21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
