text.4327: [03] ^b^pa~nca^eb^ ^a^V1.0346^ea^ ^b^kaamagu.ne hitvaa^eb^ti aayasmato  nisabhattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannacitto  kapitthaphalamadaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade koliyajanapade kulagehe nibbattitvaa  ^b^nisabho^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto saakiyakoliyaana.m sa"ngaame  buddhaanubhaava.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa tadaheva arahatta.m paapu.ni.  tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.7-11) --
text.4333: [03] so ^a^M1.0407^ea^ arahatta.m pana patvaa attano sahaayabhikkhuu pamaadavihaarena  kaala.m viitinaamente disvaa te ovadanto --
text.4338: [03] tassattho -- baalaputhujjanassa piyaayitabbasabhaavataaya  ^b^piyaruupe^eb^ manu~n~nasabhaavataaya ^b^manorame^eb^ ruupaadike ^b^pa~nca  kaamagu.ne^eb^ kaamako.t.thaase ^b^hitvaa^eb^ pahaaya pariccajitvaa  kammaphala^b^saddhaaya^eb^ ratanattaya^b^saddhaaya^eb^ ca vasena ^b^gharaa^eb^  gharabandhanato ^b^nikkhamma^eb^ nikkhamitvaa pabbajja.m upagato  vi~n~nujaatiko pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya gha.tento vaayamanto  va.t.ta^b^dukkhassa antakaro bhave^eb^ bhaveyyaati. eva.m te bhikkhuu  ovaditvaa ``aya.m pare eva sa~n~naapento viharati, ``saya.m ^a^P2.0064^ea^  pana akaarako'ti maa cintayitthaa''ti tesa.m attano  pa.tipannabhaava.m pakaasento --
text.434: [22] sadhuumaa jaalava.t.taa ca, ravi.msu karu.na.m migaa..
text.4342: [25] dutiyagaathaaya a~n~na.m byaakaasi. tattha  ^b^naabhinandaami mara.na^eb^nti mara.na.m na abhika"nkhaami.  ^b^naabhinandaami jiivita^eb^nti ida.m pana tassa kaara.navacana.m, yasmaa  naabhinandaami jiivita.m, tasmaa naabhinandaami mara.nanti. yo hi  aayati.m jaatijaraamara.naaya kilesaabhisa"nkhaare aacinoti upacinoti,  so punabbhavaabhinibbatti.m abhinandanto naantariyakataaya attano  mara.nampi abhinandati naama kaara.nassa appahiinattaa, khii.naasavo pana  sabbaso aacayagaamidhamme pahaaya apacayagaamidhamme pati.t.thito  pari~n~naatavatthuko sabbaso jiivita.m anabhinandanto mara.nampi  anabhinandati naama kaara.nassa eva suppahiinattaa. tenaaha --  ``naabhinandaami mara.na.m, naabhinandaami jiivita''nti. yadi eva.m  khii.naasavassa parinibbaanaabhika"nkhaa, yaava parinibbaanaa ava.t.thaana~nca  kathanti aaha ^b^``kaala~nca pa.tika"nkhaami, sampajaano  patissato''^eb^ti, kilesaparinibbaane siddhe satipa~n~naavepullappattiyaa  sato sampajaano kevala.m ^a^M1.0408^ea^ khandhaparinibbaanakaala.m pa.tika"nkhaami, ta.m  udikkhamaano aagamayamaano viharaami, na pana me mara.ne jiivite vaa  abhinandanaa atthi arahattamaggeneva tassa samugghaa.titattaati.
text.4345: [03] ^b^ambapallavasa"nkaasa^eb^nti aayasmato usabhattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani karonto sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  kosambaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m saakiyaraajakule nibbattitvaa  ^b^usabho^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu ~naatisamaagame buddhaanubhaava.m  disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so pabbajitakaalato ^a^P2.0065^ea^  pa.t.thaaya sama.nadhamma.m akatvaa divaa sa"nga.nikaaraamo sakalaratti.m  niddaayamaano viitinaameti. so ekadivasa.m mu.t.thassati asampajaano  nidda.m okkanto supine kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa ambapallavava.n.na.m ciivara.m  paarupitvaa hatthigiivaaya.m nisiiditvaa nagara.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tha.m tattheva  manusse sampatte disvaa lajjaaya hatthikkhandhato oruyha attaana.m disvaa  pa.tibuddho, ``iidisa.m naama supina.m mu.t.thassatinaa asampajaanena  ^a^V1.0348^ea^  niddaayamaanena mayaa di.t.tha''nti uppannasa.mvego vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa  nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.52.12-16) --
text.4348: [21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
text.4351: [03] atha ^a^M1.0409^ea^ thero yathaadi.t.tha.m supina.m a"nkusa.m katvaa arahattassa  adhigatattaa tasseva supinassa kittanavasena a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
text.4357: [22] soha.m ditto tadaa santo, patto me aasavakkhayo''ti..  -- gaathaadvayamaaha.
text.4358: [03] tattha ^b^ambapallavasa"nkaasa.m, a.mse katvaana ciivara^eb^nti  ambapallavaakaara.m pavaa.lava.n.na.m ciivara.m khandhe karitvaa uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa.  ^b^gaama^eb^nti attano raajadhaani.m hatthikkhandhe ^b^nisinno  pi.n.daaya paavisi.m,^eb^ pavi.t.thamattova mahaajanena olokiyamaano  ^b^hatthikkhandhato oruyha^eb^ .thito pa.tibujjhi.m, pabuddhova ^b^sa.mvega.m  alabhi.m tadaa^eb^ ``mu.t.thassati asampajaano hutvaa niddaayokkamanena eta.m  jaata''nti. apare pana ``raajaava hutvaa rattibhaage evaruupa.m supina.m  disvaa vibhaataaya rattiyaa hatthikkhandha.m aaruyha nagaraviithiya.m caranto  ta.m supina.m saritvaa hatthikkhandhato oruyha sa.mvega.m labhitvaa satthu  santike pabbajitvaa arahatta.m patvaa udaana.m udaanento imaa gaathaa  abhaasii''ti vadanti. ^b^ditto^eb^ti tasmi.m raajakaale  jaatimadabhogamadaadiparidappito samaano sa.mvegamalabhinti yojanaa.
text.436: [22] sa.mviggaa bhikkhavo satta, cintayimha maya.m tadaa..
text.4361: [03] ^b^ayamiti^eb^ ^a^V1.0349^ea^ ^a^P2.0066^ea^ ^b^kappa.to^eb^ti aayasmato  kappa.takurattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti. ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa  bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m bhagavanta.m  vinataaya naama nadiyaa tiire a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m disvaa  pasannamaanaso ketakapupphehi puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade ^a^M1.0410^ea^ saavatthiya.m duggatakule  nibbattitvaa yaava vayappatti, taava a~n~na.m upaaya.m ajaananto  kappa.takha.n.danivaasano saraavahattho tattha tattha kura.m pariyesanto vicari,  tena ^b^kappa.takuro^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha. so vayappatto ti.na.m  vikki.nitvaa jiivika.m kappento ekadivasa.m ti.nalaavanattha.m ara~n~na.m gato  tattha a~n~natara.m khii.naasavatthera.m disvaa ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa  nisiidi. tassa thero dhamma.m kathesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho ``ki.m me imaaya kicchajiivikaayaa''ti pabbajitvaa  attano nivatthakappa.taco.la.m ekasmi.m .thaane nikkhipi. yadaa cassa  anabhirati uppajjati, tadaa ta.m kappa.ta.m olokentassa anabhirati  vigacchati, sa.mvega.m pa.tilabhi. eva.m karonto sattakkhattu.m uppabbaji.  tassa ta.m kaara.na.m bhikkhuu bhagavato aarocesu.m. athekadivasa.m kappa.takuro  bhikkhu dhammasabhaaya.m parisapariyante nisinno niddaayati, ta.m bhagavaa  codento --
text.4367: [21] ``maa kho tva.m kappa.ta pacaalesi, maa tva.m upaka.n.namhi  taa.lessa.m.
text.4368: [22] na hi tva.m kappa.ta mattama~n~naasi, sa"nghamajjhamhi  pacalaayamaano''ti.. --
text.4370: [03] tattha ^b^ayamiti kappa.to kappa.takuro^eb^ti kappa.takuro bhikkhu  ``aya.m mama kappa.to, ima.m paridahitvaa yathaa tathaa jiivaamii''ti eva.m  uppannamicchaavitakko ^b^acchaaya atibharitaaya amatagha.tikaaya.m^eb^ mama  amatagha.te taha.m taha.m vassante ``amatamadhigata.m ahamanusaasaami, aha.m  ^a^P2.0067^ea^ dhamma.m desemi'' (mahaava0 12; ma0 ni0 1.286;  2.342). ``andhiibhuutasmi.m lokasmi.m, aaha~ncha.m  amatadundubhi''ntiaadinaa (mahaava0 11; ma0 ni0 1.285;  2.341) ghosetvaa ^a^M1.0411^ea^ mayaa dhammaamate pavassiyamaane ^b^katapada.m  jhaanaani ocetu.m^eb^ lokiyalokuttarajjhaanaani upacetu.m bhaavetu.m katapada.m  ka.tamaggavihitabhaavanaamagga.m ida.m mama saasana.m, tathaapi  ^b^dhammaka.tamatto^eb^ mama saasanadhammato ^a^V1.0350^ea^ ukka.n.thacitto apagatamaanaso  kappa.takuroti ta.m codetvaa punapissa saho.d.dha.m cora.m ga.nhanto viya  pamaadavihaara.m dassento ^b^``maa kho tva.m, kappa.ta, pacaalesii''^eb^ti  gaathamaaha.
text.4371: [03] tattha ^b^maa kho tva.m, kappa.ta, pacaalesii^eb^ti tva.m, kappa.takura,  ``mama dhamma.m su.nissaamii''ti nisiiditvaa maa kho pacaalesi maa  pacalaahi maa nidda.m upagacchi. ^b^maa tva.m upaka.n.namhi taa.lessa^eb^nti  ta.m niddaayamaana.m upaka.n.namhi ka.n.nasamiipe desanaahatthena aha.m maa  pataa.lessa.m. yathaa ito para.m kilesappahaanaaya aha.m ta.m na ovadeyya.m,  tathaa pa.tipajjaahiiti attho. ^b^na hi tva.m, kappa.ta,  mattama~n~naasii^eb^ti tva.m, kappa.ta, ^b^sa"nghamajjhamhi pacalaayamaano^eb^ matta.m  pamaa.na.m na vaa ma~n~nasi, ``ayamatidullabho kha.no pa.tiladdho, so maa  upajjhagaa''ti ettakampi na jaanaasi, passa yaava ca te aparaddhanti  codesi.
text.4372: [03] eva.m bhagavataa dviihi gaathaahi gaa.lha.m ta.m niggayha codanaaya  kataaya a.t.thivedhaviddho viya ca.n.dagajo magga.m otaranto viya ca  sa~njaatasa.mvego vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena  vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.17-22) --
text.4380: [03] arahatta.m ^a^M1.0412^ea^ pana patvaa satthaaraa vuttagaathaadvayameva attano  arahattaadhigamanassa a"nkusabhuutanti paccudaahaasi. tenassa tadeva  a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.
text.4385: [03] ^b^aho^eb^ ^a^V1.0351^ea^ ^a^P2.0068^ea^ ^b^buddhaa aho dhammaa^eb^ti  aayasmato kumaarakassapattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto  padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m paapu.ni.  ``kulagehe''ti pana a"nguttara.t.thakathaaya.m (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0  1.1.217) vutta.m. so satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto  satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m cittakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi  ta.m .thaanantara.m aaka"nkhanto pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tadanuruupaani pu~n~naani  karonto kassapassa bhagavato kaale sama.nadhamma.m katvaa sugatiisuyeva  sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe se.t.thidhiitaaya kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m  ga.nhi. saa kira kumaarikaakaaleyeva pabbajitukaamaa hutvaa  maataapitaro yaacitvaa pabbajja.m alabhamaanaa kulaghara.m gataapi  gabbhasa.n.thitampi ajaanantii saamika.m aaraadhetvaa tena anu~n~naataa  bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa. tassaa gabbhinibhaava.m disvaa bhikkhuniyo  devadatta.m pucchi.msu. so ``assama.nii''ti aaha. puna dasabala.m  pucchi.msu. satthaa upaalitthera.m pa.ticchaapesi. thero  saavatthinagaravaasiini kulaani visaakha~nca upaasika.m pakkosaapetvaa  saraajikaaya parisaaya vinicchinanto ``pure laddho gabbho, pabbajjaa  arogaa''ti aaha. satthaa ``suvinicchita.m adhikara.na''nti therassa  saadhukaara.m adaasi.
text.4386: [03] saa bhikkhunii suva.n.nabimbasadisa.m putta.m vijaayi. ta.m raajaa  pasenadikosalo posesi. ``kassapo''ti cassa naama.m aka.msu.  aparabhaage ^a^M1.0413^ea^ ala"nkaritvaa satthu santika.m netvaa pabbaajesi. kumaarakaale  pabbajitattaa bhagavataa ``kassapa.m pakkosatha, ida.m phala.m vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa  kassapassa dethaa''ti vutte ``katarakassapassaa''ti.  ``kumaarakassapassaa''ti. eva.m gahitanaamattaa ra~n~no  posaavanikaputtattaa ca vu.d.dhakaalepi ^b^kumaarakassapo^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha.
text.4387: [03] so pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya vipassanaaya ceva kamma.m karoti,  buddhavacana~nca ugga.nhaati. atha tena saddhi.m pabbatamatthake sama.nadhamma.m  katvaa anaagaamii hutvaa suddhaavaase nibbatto ^a^V1.0352^ea^ mahaabrahmaa ``vipassanaaya  mukha.m dassetvaa maggaphalappattiyaa upaaya.m karissaamii''ti pa~ncadasa pa~nhe  abhisa"nkharitvaa andhavane vasantassa ^a^P2.0069^ea^ therassa  ``ime pa~nhe satthaara.m puccheyyaasii''ti aacikkhitvaa gato. so te  pa~nhe bhagavanta.m pucchi. bhagavaapissa byaakaasi. thero satthaaraa  kathitaniyaameneva te ugga.nhitvaa vipassana.m gabbha.m ga.nhaapetvaa arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.150-177)  --
text.44: [03] theriigaathaa pana ekanipaato ekuttaravasena yaava navanipaataati  navanipaato ekaadasanipaato, dvaadasanipaato, so.lasanipaato,  viisatinipaato, ti.msanipaato, cattaaliisanipaato, mahaanipaatoti  ^a^P1.0004^ea^ so.lasanipaatasa"ngahaa. tattha ekanipaate a.t.thaarasa  theriyo, a.t.thaaraseva gaathaa; dukanipaate dasa theriyo, viisati gaathaa;  tikanipaate a.t.tha theriyo, catuviisati gaathaa; catukkanipaate ekaa therii,  catasso gaathaa; pa~ncakanipaate dvaadasa theriyo sa.t.thi gaathaa; chakkanipaate  a.t.tha theriyo a.t.thacattaaliisa gaathaa; sattanipaate tisso theriyo,  ekaviisati gaathaa; a.t.tha nipaatato pa.t.thaaya yaava so.lasanipaataa ekekaa  theriyo ta.mta.mnipaataparimaa.naa gaathaa; viisatinipaate pa~nca theriyo,  a.t.thaarasasatagaathaa; ti.msanipaate ekaa therii, catutti.msa gaathaa;  cattaaliisanipaate ekaa therii, a.t.thacattaaliisa gaathaa; mahaanipaatepi ekaa  therii, pa~ncasattati gaathaa. evamettha nipaataana.m gaathaavaggaana.m gaathaana~nca  parimaa.na.m veditabba.m.

text.4447: [22] jaatimara.nasa.msaaro, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti.. --  gaathaadvaya.m abhaasi.
text.4448: [03] tattha ^b^aho^eb^ti acchariyatthe nipaato. ^b^buddhaa^eb^ti  sabba~n~nubuddhaa, gaaravavasena bahuvacana.m, aho acchariyaa sambuddhaati  attho. ^b^dhammaa^eb^ti pariyattidhammena saddhi.m nava lokuttaradhammaa.  ^b^aho no satthu sampadaa^eb^ti amhaaka.m satthu dasabalassa aho  sampattiyo. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yasmi.m satthari ^a^M1.0416^ea^ brahmacariyavaasena.  ^b^etaadisa.m dhamma.m, saavako sacchikaahitii^eb^ti etaadisa.m evaruupa.m  suvisuddhajjhaanaabhi~n~naaparivaara.m anavasesakilesakkhayaavaha.m santa.m pa.niita.m  anuttara.m dhamma.m saavakopi naama sacchikarissati, tasmaa  eva.mvidhagu.navisesaadhigamahetubhuutaa aho acchariyaa buddhaa bhagavanto,  acchariyaa dhammagu.naa, acchariyaa amhaaka.m satthu sampattiyoti  ratanattayassa gu.naadhimutti.m pavedesiiti. dhammasampattikittaneneva hi  sa"nghasuppa.tipatti kittitaa hotiiti.
text.4449: [03] eva.m saadhaara.navasena dassita.m dhammassa sacchikiriya.m idaani  attupanaayika.m katvaa dassento ^b^``asa"nkheyyesuu''^eb^ti gaathamaaha.  tattha ^b^asa"nkheyyesuu^eb^ti ga.nanapatha.m viitivattesu mahaakappesu.  ^b^sakkaayaa^eb^ti pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. te hi paramatthato  vijjamaanadhammasamuuhataaya ``sakkaayaa''ti vuccanti. ^b^ahuu^eb^ti  nivattanuupaayassa anadhigatattaa anapagataa ahesu.m. ^b^tesamaya.m  pacchimako carimoya.m samussayo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0070^ea^ yasmaa aya.m  sabbapacchimako, tato eva carimo, tasmaa ^b^jaatimara.na^eb^sahito  khandhaadipa.tipaa.tisa~n~nito ^b^sa.msaaro^eb^ idaani aayati.m  punabbhavaabhaavato ^b^punabbhavo natthi,^eb^ ayamantimaa jaatiiti attho.
text.4452: [03] ^b^yo have daharo bhikkhuu^eb^ti aayasmato dhammapaalattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto kenacideva kara.niiyena vananta.m upagato  satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ^a^V1.0355^ea^ pilakkhaphalamadaasi. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade satthari  parinibbute avantira.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^dhammapaalo^eb^ti  laddhanaamo vayappatto takkasila.m gantvaa sippa.m uggahetvaa pa.tinivattento  antaraamagge ekasmi.m vihaare a~n~natara.m thera.m disvaa tassa santike  dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ^a^M1.0417^ea^ vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no  ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.21-25) --
text.4458: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa samaapattisukhena viitinaamento ekadivasa.m  tasmi.m vihaare dve saama.nere rukkhagge pupphaani ocinante  aaruu.lhasaakhaaya bhaggaaya patante disvaa thero iddhaanubhaavena hatthena  gahetvaa arogeyeva bhuumiya.m .thapetvaa tesa.m saama.neraana.m dhamma.m desento --
text.4461: [22] jaagaro sa hi suttesu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
text.4464: [22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. --  imaa dve gaathaa abhaasi.
text.4465: [03] tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti aniyamavacana.m. ^b^have^eb^ti da.lhatthe  nipaato. ^b^daharo^eb^ti taru.no. bhikkhatiiti ^b^bhikkhu.  yu~njatii^eb^ti gha.tati vaayamati. ^b^jaagaro^eb^ti ^a^P2.0071^ea^  jaagara.nadhammasamannaagato. ^b^suttesuu^eb^ti supantesu. ida.m vutta.m hoti  ^b^yo bhikkhu daharo^eb^va samaano taru.no ``tathaaha.m pacchaa vu.d.dhakaale  jaanissaamii''ti acintetvaa buddhaana.m ^b^saasane^eb^ appamaadapa.tipattiya.m  ^b^yu~njati^eb^ samathavipassanaabhaavanaaya yoga.m karoti, so ^b^suttesu^eb^  avijjaaniddaaya suttesu pamattesu saddhaadijaagaradhammasamannaagamena  ^b^jaagaro,^eb^ tato eva attahitaparahitapaaripuuriyaa ^b^amogha.m^eb^  ava~njha.m ^b^tassa jiivita.m,^eb^ yasmaa ca etadeva.m, ^b^tasmaa saddha~nca^eb^  ``atthi kamma.m atthi kammavipaako''tiaadinayappavatta.m  kammaphalasaddha~nca, saddhuupanibandhattaa siilassa tadupanissaya.m  catupaarisuddhi^b^siila~nca^eb^ ^a^M1.0418^ea^, ``sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakhaato  dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho''ti eva.m pavattaratanattaya^b^ppasaada^eb^~nca  ^a^V1.0356^ea^, vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya pari~n~naadivasena  catusacca^b^dhammadassana^eb^~nca ^b^medhaavii^eb^ dhammojapa~n~naaya samannaagato  bhikkhu ^b^buddhaana.m saasana.m^eb^ ovaada.m anusi.t.thi.m anussaranto  aadittampi attano siisa.m ajjhupekkhitvaa ^b^anuyu~njetha,^eb^ tattha  anuyoga.m aatappa.m kareyyaati attho.
text.4468: [03] ^b^kassindriyaani samatha"ngataanii^eb^ti aayasmato  brahmaalittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto  vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa  paadaphala.m adaasi. satthaa anumodana.m vatvaa pakkaami. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the  braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^brahmaalii^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto  hetusampattiyaa codiyamaano sa.msaare sa~njaatasa.mvego taadisena  kalyaa.namittasannissayena buddhasaasane pabbajitvaa patiruupakamma.t.thaana.m  gahetvaa ara~n~ne viharanto ~naa.nassa paripaakagatattaa nacirasseva  vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.51.63-67) --
text.4474: [03] cha.labhi~n~no ^a^M1.0419^ea^ ^a^P2.0072^ea^ pana hutvaa maggasukhena  phalasukhena viitinaamento ekadivasa.m padhaanapariggaahakena therena tasmi.m  ara~n~naayatane bhikkhuu uddissa vutta.m padhaanaanuyoga.m parigga.nhanto --
text.4477: [22] pahiinamaanassa anaasavassa, devaapi kassa pihayanti  taadino..
text.448: [22] aha~nca pakkusaati ca, sabhiyo baahiyo tathaa..
text.4480: [22] pahiinamaanassa anaasavassa, devaapi mayha.m pihayanti  taadino''ti.. --
text.4482: [03] tassattho -- imasmi.m ara~n~naayatane vasantesu bhikkhuusu  ^b^kassa^eb^ bhikkhuno therassa vaa navassa vaa majjhimassa vaa chekena  ^b^saarathinaa sudantaa assaa^eb^ viya manaccha.t.thaani ^b^indriyaani  samatha.m^eb^ dantabhaava.m nibbisevanabhaava.m ^b^gataani^eb^. kassa navavidhampi  maana.m pahaaya .thitattaa ^b^pahiinamaanassa^eb^ catunnampi aasavaana.m abhaavena  ^b^anaasavassa^eb^ i.t.thaadiisu taadilakkha.nappattiyaa ^b^taadino devaapi  pihayanti^eb^ manussaapi sammaapa.tipattidassanaadinaa ca aadarena  patthentiiti.
text.4483: [03] tattha ca gaathaaya.m purima.d.dhena anaagaamimaggaadhigamo pu.t.tho,  anaagaaminopi hi indriyaani pahiinakaamaraagabyaapaadataaya samatha.m  nibbisevanata.m gataani honti. itarena arahattamaggapa.tilaabho, arahaa  hi ``pahiinamaano anaasavo taadii''ti ca vuccati.
text.4484: [03] athaayasmaa brahmaali padhaanapariggaahakena vutta.m  ^b^``kassindriyaanii''^eb^ti gaatha.m paccanubhaasi. tadattha.m  attuupanaayikavasena vissajjento ^b^``mayhindriyaanii''^eb^tiaadikaaya  dutiyagaathaaya a~n~na.m byaakaasi, tattha ^b^mayhindriyaanii^eb^ti mama  cakkhaadiini indriyaani. sesa.m vuttanayameva.
text.4487: [03] ^b^chavipaapaka^eb^ ^a^M1.0420^ea^ ^b^cittabhaddakaa^eb^ti aayasmato mogharaajattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro  padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  ekadivasa.m satthu ^a^P2.0073^ea^ santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m  eka.m bhikkhu.m luukhaciivaradharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m  aaka"nkhanto pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto  atthadassissa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.naana.m  vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato braahma.namaa.nave vijjaasippaani  sikkhaapento ekadivasa.m atthadassi.m bhagavanta.m bhikkhusa"nghaparivuta.m  gacchanta.m ^a^V1.0358^ea^ disvaa pasannamaanaso pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa sirasi  a~njali.m katvaa ``yaavataa ruupino sattaa''tiaadinaa chahi gaathaahi  abhitthavitvaa bhaajana.m puuretvaa madhu.m upanaamesi. satthaa madhu.m  pa.tiggahetvaa anumodana.m akaasi.
text.4488: [03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa  bhagavato kaale ka.t.thavaahanassa naama ra~n~no amacco hutvaa tena satthu  aanayanattha.m purisasahassena pesito satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa viisativassasahassaani sama.nadhamma.m katvaa  tato cuto eka.m buddhantara.m sugatiisuyeva parivattento imasmi.m buddhuppaade  braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^mogharaajaa^eb^ti laddhanaamo baavariibraahma.nassa  santike uggahitasippo sa.mvegajaato taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  taapasasahassaparivaaro ajitaadiihi saddhi.m satthu santika.m pesito tesa.m  pannarasamo hutvaa pa~nhe pucchitvaa pa~nhavissajjanapariyosaane arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.4.64-83) --

text.4500: [22] sabbe te tava ~naa.namhi, anto honti samogadhaa..

text.4528: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa satthaluukha.m suttaluukha.m rajanaluukhanti visesena  tividhenapi luukhena samannaagata.m pa.msukuula.m dhaaresi. tena na.m satthaa  luukhaciivaradharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. aparabhaage purimakammappaccayaa  parihaarassa akara.nato therassa sariire daddupii.lakaadiini uppajjitvaa  va.d.dhi.msu. so ``senaasana.m dussatii''ti hemantepi magadhakkhettesu  palaalasanthaaraani attharitvaa seti. ta.m ekadivasa.m upa.t.thaana.m  upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinna.m satthaa pa.tisanthaaravasena  ^b^``chavipaapakaa''^eb^tiaadinaa ^a^P2.0074^ea^ pa.thamagaathaaya  pucchi.
text.4529: [03] 207^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^chavipaapakaa^eb^ti daddukacchupii.lakaahi  bhinnacchavibhaavato hiinacchavika du.t.thacchavika ^a^V1.0360^ea^. ^b^cittabhaddakaa^eb^ti  anavasesakilesappahaanena brahmavihaarasevanaaya ca bhaddacitta sundaracitta.  ^b^mogharaajaa^eb^ti tassa aalapana.m. ^b^satata.m samaahito^eb^ti  aggaphalasamaadhinaa niccakaala.m abhi.nha.m samaahitamaanaso.  ^b^hemantikasiitakaalarattiyo^eb^ti hemantasamaye siitakaalarattiyo.  accantasa.myoge ceta.m upayogavacana.m. ``hemantikaa  siitakaalarattiyo''tipi paa.li. tattha ^b^hemantikaa^eb^ti hemantogadhaa  hemantapariyaapannaati attho. ^b^bhikkhu tva.m sii^eb^ti bhikkhu ko tva.m  asi, eva.mbhuuto paresu tava senaasana.m katvaa adentesu sa"nghika~nca  senaasana.m apavisanto. ^b^katha.m karissasii^eb^ti yathaavutte siitakaale  katha.m attabhaava.m pavattesiiti satthaa pucchi. eva.m pana pu.t.tho thero satthu  tamattha.m kathento --
text.4533: [03] tattha ^b^sampannasassaa^eb^ti nipphannasassaa. ^b^magadhaa^eb^ti  magadhara.t.tha.m vadati. magadhaa naama jaanapadino raajakumaaraa, tesa.m  nivaaso ekopi janapado ru.lhiivasena ``magadhaa''tveva bahuvacanena  vuccati. ^b^kevalaa^eb^ti anavasesaa. ^b^iti me suta^eb^nti eva.m  mayaa suta.m. tattha yo adi.t.tho padeso, tassa vasena sutanti vutta.m.  tena edise kaale magadhesu yattha katthaci mayaa vasitu.m sakkaati  dasseti. ^b^palaalacchannako seyya.m, yatha~n~ne sukhajiivino^eb^ti yathaa  a~n~ne sukhajiivino bhikkhuu senaasanasappaaya.m laddhaa sundarehi  atthara.napaavura.nehi sukhena sayanti, eva.m ahampi palaalasanthaarameva he.t.thaa  santharitvaa upari tiriya~nca palaalacchadaneneva chaaditasariirataaya  palaalacchannako seyya.m sayi.m, seyya.m kappesinti attano  yathaalaabhasantosa.m vibhaaveti.
text.4536: [03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0075^ea^ ^b^ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe  pare^eb^ti aayasmato visaakhassa pa~ncaalaputtassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti?  ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m  pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito cuddase kappe paccantagaame daliddakule  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m phalapariyesana.m carantehi tasmi.m  gaame manussehi saddhi.m ara~n~na.m gato tattha eka.m paccekabuddha.m disvaa  pasannamaanaso valliphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu  sa.msaranto imasmi.m ^a^V1.0361^ea^ buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the ma.n.dalikaraajakule nibbattitvaa  ^b^visaakho^eb^ti laddhanaamo pa~ncaalaraajadhiituyaa puttabhaavato pacchaa  ^b^pa~ncaalaputto^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so pitari mate rajja.m kaarento  satthari attano gaamasamiipagate satthu santika.m gantvaa ^a^M1.0424^ea^ dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa satthaaraa saddhi.m saavatthi.m gato vipassana.m  pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 1.39.31-36) --
text.4544: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa thero ~naatiina.m anukampaaya jaatibhuumi.m  agamaasi. tattha manussaa thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa kaalena kaala.m dhamma.m  su.nantaa ekadivasa.m ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato  dhammakathiko hotii''ti dhammakathikalakkha.na.m pucchi.msu. thero tesa.m  dhammakathikalakkha.na.m kathento --
text.4546: [21] ``na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare, na okkhipe  paaragata.m na eraye.
text.4547: [22] na cattava.n.na.m parisaasu byaahare, anuddhato sammitabhaa.ni  subbato..
text.4550: [22] sa.msevitabuddhasiilinaa, nibbaana.m na hi tena dullabha''nti..  --
text.4552: [03] tattha ^b^na ukkhipe^eb^ti attaana.m na ukkhipeyya, jaatiaadiihi  baahusaccaadiihi ca attukka.msana.m na kareyya. ^b^no ca parikkhipe  pare^eb^ti pare parapuggale teheva jaatiaadiihi no parikkhipe  paricchinditvaa na ^a^P2.0076^ea^ khipeyya gu.naparidha.msanavasena  ^a^M1.0425^ea^ vaa  na khipeyya. na okkhipe pare icceva.m sambandho. pare  ojjhaapanavasena ^b^na okkhipe^eb^ he.t.thato katvaa pare na  olokaapeyya, na ojjhaapeyyaati attho. ``na ukkhipe''ti keci  pa.thanti, so evattho. ^b^paaragata^eb^nti ^a^V1.0362^ea^ sa.msaarapaara.m viya vijjaaya  paara.m gata.m khii.naasava.m tevijja.m cha.labhi~n~na.m vaa ^b^na eraye^eb^ na gha.t.taye  na aasaadeyya. ^b^na cattava.n.na.m parisaasu byaahare^eb^ti attano va.n.na.m  gu.na.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nikaamayamaano khattiyaparisaadiisu na bhaaseyya.  ^b^anuddhato^eb^ti uddhaccarahito. uddhatassa hi vacana.m naadiyanti.  ^b^sammitabhaa.nii^eb^ti sammadeva mitabhaa.nii, kaalena saapadesa.m  pariyantavati.m atthasa~nhitameva vaaca.m bhaasanasiiloti attho. ito  a~n~nathaa vadantassa vacana.m agaha.niiya.m hoti. ^b^subbato^eb^ti  sundaravato siilasampanno. ``siyaa''ti kiriyaapada.m aanetvaa  yojetabba.m.
text.4553: [03] eva.m thero sa"nkhepeneva dhammakathikalakkha.na.m vatvaa tesa.m gu.naana.m  attani labbhamaanata.m adhimuccitvaa bhiyyosomattaaya abhippasanna.m  mahaajana.m ~natvaa ``eva.mvidhassa dhammakathikassa  vimuttaayatanasannissitassa na nibbaana.m dullabha.m, atha kho  sulabhamevaa''ti dassento ^b^``susukhumanipu.natthadassinaa''^eb^ti  dutiyagaathamaaha. tassattho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.
text.4556: [03] ^b^nadanti moraa susikhaa supekhu.naa^eb^ti aayasmato  cuu.lakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito  ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m  patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso chattapa.n.niphala.m adaasi.  so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  raajagahe braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^cuu.lako^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto  dhanapaaladamane satthari ^a^M1.0426^ea^ laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto  indasaalaguhaaya.m vasati, so ekadivasa.m guhaadvaare nisinno magadhakkhetta.m  olokesi. tasmi.m kha.ne paavusakaalamegho gambhiiramadhuranigghoso  satapa.talasahassapa.talo a~njana ^a^P2.0077^ea^ sikharasannikaaso  nabha.m puuretvaa pavassati, mayuurasa"nghaa ca meghagajjita.m sutvaa ha.t.thatu.t.thaa  kekaasadda.m mu~ncitvaa tattha tattha padese naccantaa vicaranti. therassapi  aavaasagabbhe meghavaataphassehi apagatadhammattaa passaddhakarajakaaye kallata.m  patte utusappaayalaabhena citta.m ekagga.m ahosi, kamma.t.thaanaviithi.m otari,  so ta.m ~natvaa kaalasampadaadikittanamukhena attaana.m bhaavanaaya ussaahento  --
text.4558: [21] ``nadanti ^a^V1.0363^ea^ moraa susikhaa supekhu.naa, suniilagiivaa  sumukhaa sugajjino.

text.4586: [03] ^b^taaha.m cittakali.m bruumii^eb^ti ta.m tasmaa pamattabhaavato cittakali.m  cittakaalaka.n.ni.m aha.m kathayaami. punapi ^b^ta.m bruumi^eb^ kathemi  ^b^cittadubbhaka.m^eb^ cittasa"nkhaatassa attano bahuupakaarassa santaanassa  anatthaavahanato cittadubbhi.m. ``cittadubbhagaa''tipi pa.thanti.  cittasa"nkhaataalakkhikaappapu~n~naati attho. kinti bruuhiiti ce?  aaha ^b^``satthaa te dullabho laddho, maanatthe ma.m niyojayii''^eb^ti.  kappaana.m asa"nkhyeyyampi naama buddhasu~n~no loko hoti, satthari  uppannepi manussattasaddhaapa.tilaabhaadayo dullabhaa eva, laddhesu ca tesu  satthaapi dullabhoyeva hoti. eva.m dullabho satthaa idaani tayaa laddho,  tasmi.m laddhe sampatipi anatthe ahite aayati~nca anatthaavahe dukkhaavahe  akusale ma.m maa niyojesiiti. eva.m thero attano citta.m ovadanto  eva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 1.37.16-19) --

text.4596: [03] ^b^sa.msara.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0430^ea^ ^b^diighamaddhaana^eb^nti aayasmato vajjitattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto ito pa~ncasa.t.thime kappe ekasmi.m paccantagaame  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto vanacarako hutvaa vicaranto ekadivasa.m  upasanta.m ^a^V1.0366^ea^ naama paccekabuddha.m pabbataguhaaya.m viharanta.m addasa. so tassa  upasama.m disvaa pasannamaanaso campakapupphena puuja.m akaasi. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the  ibbhakule nibbatto jaatadivasato pa.t.thaaya maatugaamahattha.m gato rodati.  brahmalokato kira cavitvaa idhaagato yasmaa maatugaamasamphassa.m na  sahati, tasmaa maatugaamasamphassavajjanato ^b^vajjito^eb^tveva naama.m jaata.m.  so vayappatto satthu yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho  pabbajitvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa tadaheva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena  vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.37.27-30) --

text.4611: [03] tattha ^a^M1.0431^ea^ ^b^sa.msara^eb^nti sa.msaranto, tasmi.m tasmi.m bhave  aadaananikkhepavasena aparaapara.m sandhaavanto. ^b^diighamaddhaana^eb^nti  cirakaala.m anaadimati sa.msaare aparimaa.nakaala.m. ^b^gatiisuu^eb^ti  sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m ^a^P2.0081^ea^ vasena sugatiduggatiisu.  ^b^parivattisa^eb^nti gha.tiiyanta.m viya paribbhamanto cavanupapajjanavasena  aparaapara.m parivatti.m. tassa pana parivattanassa kaara.namaaha  ^b^``apassa.m ariyasaccaani, andhabhuuto puthujjano''^eb^ti.  dukkhaadiini cattaari ariyasaccaani ~naa.nacakkhunaa apassanto  appa.tivijjhanto, tato eva avijjandhataaya andhabhuuto puthuuna.m  jananaadiihi kaara.nehi puthujjano honto gatiisu parivattisanti yojanaa,  tenevaaha bhagavaa --
text.4612: [02] ``catunna.m ^a^V1.0367^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaccaana.m ananubodhaa  appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva  tumhaaka~ncaa''ti (mahaava0 287; dii0 ni0 2.155; sa.m0 ni0   5.1091; netti0 114).
text.4613: [03] ^b^tassa^eb^ mayha.m vuttanayena pubbe puthujjanasseva sato idaani  satthaaraa dinnanayena ^b^appamattassa^eb^ appamaadapa.tipattiyaa  samathavipassanaabhaavana.m matthaka.m paapetvaa .thitassa. ^b^sa.msaaraa  vina.liikataa^eb^ti sa.msaranti sattaa etehiiti ``sa.msaaraa''ti laddhanaamaa  kammakilesaa aggamaggena samucchinnattaa vigatana.laa nimmuulaa kataa.  ^b^sabbaa gatii samucchinnaa^eb^ti eva.m kammakilesava.t.taana.m vina.liikatattaa  nirayaadikaa sabbaapi gatiyo sammadeva ucchinnaa viddha.msitaa, tato  eva ^b^natthi daani^eb^ aayati.m ^b^punabbhavo^eb^ti idameva ca therassa  a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti.
text.4616: [03] ^b^assatthe haritobhaase^eb^ti aayasmato sandhitattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto ito ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale  eko gopaalako ahosi. so satthari parinibbute a~n~natara.m thera.m  upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M1.0432^ea^ tassa santike buddhagu.napa.tisa.myutta.m dhamma.m sutvaa  pasannamaanaso ``kuhi.m bhagavaa''ti pucchitvaa parinibbutabhaava.m sutvaa  ``eva.m mahaanubhaavaa buddhaapi naama aniccataavasa.m gacchanti, aho  sa"nkhaaraa addhuvaa''ti aniccasa~n~na.m pa.tilabhi. ta.m thero bodhipuujaaya  ussaahesi. so kaalena kaala.m bodhirukkhasamiipa.m gantvaa ^a^P2.0082^ea^  vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa buddhagu.ne anussaranto bodhi.m vandati.  so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  kosalara.t.the ibbhakule nibbattitvaa ^b^sandhito^eb^ti laddhanaamo  vayappatto aniccataapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammakatha.m sutvaa sa.mvegajaato pabbajitvaa  vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no  ahosi. so attano pubbenivaasa.m anussaranto sikhissa bhagavato  kaale bodhivandana.m buddhaanussati.m aniccasa~n~naapa.tilaabha~nca anussaritvaa  tadupanissayena attano visesaadhigama.m pakaasento --
text.4622: [22] tassaa sa~n~naaya vaahasaa, patto me aasavakkhayo''ti..  --
text.4624: [03] tattha ^b^assatthe^eb^ti assattha.t.thaaniiye, yvaaya.m etarahi amhaaka.m  bhagavato bodhirukkho assattho, etassa .thaane tadaa sikhissa bhagavato  bodhirukkho pu.n.dariiko .thitoti so assattha.t.thaaniiyataaya  ``assatthe''ti vutta.m. sattaana.m assaasajananato vaa. apare pana  ``assattharukkhamuule nisiiditvaa tadaa buddhaanussatiyaa bhaavitattaa thero  `assatthe'ti avocaa''ti vadanti. ^b^haritobhaase^eb^ti haritehi  saarama.niva.n.nehi obhaasamaane. ^b^sa.mviruu.lhamhii^eb^ti su.t.thu viruu.lhe  suppati.t.thite, sughananicitapattapalaasapallavehi viruu.lhasa~nchanneti ca  vadanti. ^b^paadape^eb^ti rukkhe. ^b^eka.m buddhagata.m sa~n~na.m, alabhittha.m  patissato^eb^ti buddhaaramma.na.m ^a^M1.0433^ea^ aaramma.nassa ekajaatiyattaa eka.m ``itipi  so bhagavaa''tiaadinayappavatta.m buddhaanussatisahagata.m sa~n~na.m buddhagu.naana.m  patipatisara.nato patissato hutvaa alabhi.m.
text.4625: [01] kadaa pana saa sa~n~naa laddhaa, kiivataaya siddhaati aaha  ^b^``ekati.mse ito kappe''^eb^tiaadi. ito bhaddakappato uddha.m  aarohanavasena ekati.mse kappe. ^b^ya.m sa~n~na^eb^nti ya.m  buddhaanussatisahagata.m sa~n~na.m, ya.m vaa buddhaana.m aniccata.m disvaa tadanusaarena  sabbaasa"nkhaaresu tadaa aniccasa~n~na.m alabhi.m. ^b^tassaa sa~n~naaya  vaahasaa^eb^ti tassaa yathaavuttaaya sa~n~naaya kaara.nabhaavena ta.m upanissaya.m  katvaa. ^b^patto me aasavakkhayo^eb^ti idaani ^a^P2.0083^ea^  mayaa aasavaana.m khayo nirodho adhigatoti imaayeva ca imassa  therassa apadaanagaathaapi. yathaaha (apa0 thera 1.22.27-30) --
text.4636: [03] tikanipaate ^a^M1.0434^ea^ ^a^V1.0369^ea^ ^b^ayoni suddhimanvesa^eb^nti aayasmato  a"nga.nikabhaaradvaajattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito  ekati.mse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m  patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa a~njali.m pagga.nhi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade himavantasamiipe ukka.t.the naama  nagare vibhavasampannassa braahma.nassa gehe nibbattitvaa  ^b^a"nga.nikabhaaradvaajo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto vijjaasippesu  nipphatti.m gato nekkhammajjhaasayataaya paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  amara.m tapa.m caranto tattha tattha vicaranto sammaasambuddha.m janapadacaarika.m  caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa ta.m micchaatapa.m  pahaaya saasane pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.23.48-51) --

text.4659: [03] tassattho -- ito pubbe jaatimattena braahma.nabhaavato braahma.naana.m  sama~n~naaya ^b^brahmabandhu^eb^ naama ^b^aasi.m^eb^. baahitapaapattaa pana  ^b^idaani kho^eb^ arahattaadhigamena paramatthato ^b^braahma.no ca amhi^eb^.  ito pubbe bhavasa~ncayakaraana.m tissanna.m vedasa"nkhaataana.m vijjaana.m  ajjhayanena sama~n~naamattena tevijjo naama hutvaa idaani bhavakkhayakaraaya  vijjaaya vasena tissanna.m vijjaana.m adhigatattaa paramatthato ^b^tevijjo  ca amhi^eb^. tathaa ito pubbe bhavassaadagadhitaaya  nhaatakavatanipphattiyaa sama~n~naamattena nhaatako naama hutvaa idaani  a.t.tha"ngikamaggajalena suvikkhaalitakilesamalataaya paramatthato  ^b^nhaatako camhi^eb^. ito pubbe avimuttabhavassaadamantajjhaanena  vohaaramattato sottiyo naama hutvaa idaani  suvimuttabhavassaadadhammajjhaanena paramatthato ^b^sottiyo camhi^eb^.  ito pubbe appa.tinissa.t.thapaapadhammaana.m vedaana.m gatamattena vedaguu naama  hutvaa idaani vedasa"nkhaatena magga~naa.nena sa.msaaramahoghassa vedassa  catusaccassa ca paara.m gatattaa adhigatattaa ~naatattaa paramatthato ^b^vedaguu^eb^  jaatoti. ta.m sutvaa braahma.naa saasane u.laara.m pasaada.m pavedesu.m.

text.470: [03] ^b^yo siitavana^eb^nti aayasmato sambhuutattherassa gaathaa. kaa  uppatti? ito kira a.t.thaarasaadhikassa kappasatassa matthake atthadassii  naama sambuddho loke uppajjitvaa sadevaka.m loka.m sa.msaaramahoghato  taarento ekadivasa.m mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m ga"ngaatiira.m upagacchi.  tasmi.m kaale aya.m gahapatikule nibbatto tattha bhagavanta.m passitvaa  pasannamaanaso upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ``ki.m, bhante, paara.m  gantukaamatthaa''ti pucchi. bhagavaa ``gamissaamaa''ti avoca. so  taavadeva naavaasa"nghaa.ta.m ^a^M1.0056^ea^ yojetvaa upanesi. satthaa ta.m anukampanto saha  bhikkhusa"nghena naava.m abhiruhi. so sayampi abhiruyha sukheneva  paratiira.m sampaapetvaa bhagavanta.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca dutiyadivase mahaadaana.m  pavattetvaa anugantvaa pasannacitto vanditvaa nivatti. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa ito ^a^P1.0047^ea^  terasaadhikakappasatassa matthake khattiyakule nibbattitvaa raajaa ahosi  cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa. so satte sugatimagge pati.t.thaapetvaa  tato cuto ekanavutikappe vipassissa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa  dhutadhamme samaadaaya susaane vasanto sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. puna  kassapassa bhagavato kaalepi tassa saasane tiihi sahaayehi saddhi.m ^a^V1.0046^ea^   pabbajitvaa viisativassasahassaani sama.nadhamma.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m  devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.namahaasaalassa  putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa ``sambhuuto''ti naama.m aka.msu. so  vayappatto braahma.nasippesu nipphatti.m gato. bhuumijo jeyyaseno  abhiraadhanoti tiihi sahaayehi saddhi.m bhagavato santika.m gato  dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. ye sandhaaya vutta.m --

text.488: [03] athaayasmaa sambhuuto bhagavanta.m dassanaaya gacchante bhikkhuu disvaa  ``aavuso, mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatha, eva~nca  vadethaa''ti vatvaa dhammaadhikara.na.m attano satthu avihe.thitabhaava.m  pakaasento ^b^``yo siitavana''^eb^nti gaathamaaha. te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m  upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa sambhuutattherassa saasana.m sampavedentaa,  ``aayasmaa, bhante, sambhuuto bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca  vadatii''ti vatvaa ta.m gaatha.m aarocesu.m, ta.m sutvaa bhagavaa ``pa.n.dito,  bhikkhave, sambhuuto ^a^M1.0058^ea^ bhikkhu paccapaadi dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m  dhammaadhikara.na.m vihe.theti. vessava.nena tassattho mayha.m aarocitaa''ti  aaha.
text.4884: [03] tattha ^b^suyuddhenaa^eb^ti pubbabhaage tada"ngavikkhambhanappahaanavasena  kilesehi su.t.thu yujjhanena. ^b^suyi.t.thenaa^eb^ti antarantaraa  kalyaa.namittehi dinnasappaayadhammadaanena. ^b^sa"ngaamavijayena caa^eb^ti  samucchedappahaanavasena sabbaso kilesaabhisa"nkhaaranimmathanena  laddhasa"ngaamavijayena ca. ^b^brahmacariyaanuci.n.nenaa^eb^ti anuci.n.nena  aggamaggabrahmacariyena. ^b^evaaya.m sukhamedhatii^eb^ti eva.m vuttappakaarena  aya.m khujjasobhito nibbaanasukha.m phalasamaapattisukha~nca edhati,  anubhavatiiti attho.
text.4887: [03] ^b^yodha koci manussesuu^eb^ti aayasmato vaara.nattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani karonto ito dvaanavute kappe tissassa bhagavato uppattito  puretarameva ^a^P2.0094^ea^ braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa braahma.naana.m  vijjaasippesu paaraguu hutvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  catupa.n.naasasahassaana.m antevaasikaana.m mante vaacento vasati. tena ca  samayena tissassa bhagavato bodhisattabhuutassa tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa  carimabhave maatukucchi.m okkamanena mahaapathavikampo ahosi. ta.m  disvaa mahaajano bhiito sa.mviggo na.m isi.m upasa"nkamitvaa  pathavikampanakaara.na.m pucchi. so ``mahaabodhisatto maatukucchi.m  okkami, tenaaya.m pathavikampo, tasmaa maa bhaayathaa''ti buddhuppaadassa  pubbanimittabhaava.m kathetvaa samassaasesi, buddhaaramma.na~nca piiti.m  pa.tivedesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu ^a^M1.0453^ea^ sa.msaranto imasmi.m  ^a^V1.0385^ea^ buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^vaara.no^eb^ti  laddhanaamo vayappatto a~n~natarassa aara~n~nakassa therassa santike dhamma.m  sutvaa laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karoti. so ekadivasa.m  buddhupa.t.thaana.m gacchanto antaraamagge ahinakule a~n~nama~n~na.m kalaha.m katvaa  kaala"nkate disvaa ``ime sattaa a~n~nama~n~navirodhena jiivitakkhaya.m  pattaa''ti sa.mviggamaanaso hutvaa bhagavato santika.m gato, tassa bhagavaa  cittaacaara.m ~natvaa tadanuruupameva ovaada.m dento --
text.489: [03] 6^b^.^eb^ ya.m pana te bhikkhuu sambhuutattherena vutta.m  ^b^``yo siitavana''^eb^nti gaatha.m satthu nivedesu.m. tattha  ^b^siitavana^eb^nti eva.mnaamaka.m raajagahasamiipe mahanta.m bheravasusaanavana.m.  ^b^upagaa^eb^ti nivaasanavasena upagacchi. etena bhagavataa anu~n~naata.m  pabbajitaanuruupa.m nivaasana.t.thaana.m dasseti. ^b^bhikkhuu^eb^ti  sa.msaarabhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesataaya ca bhikkhu. ^b^eko^eb^ti  adutiyo, etena kaayaviveka.m dasseti. ^b^santusito^eb^ti santu.t.tho.  etena catupaccayasantosalakkha.na.m ariyava.msa.m dasseti.  ^b^samaahitatto^eb^ti upacaarappanaabhedena samaadhinaa samaahitacitto,  etena cittavivekabhaavanaamukhena bhaavanaaraama.m ^a^P1.0049^ea^  ariyava.msa.m dasseti. ^b^vijitaavii^eb^ti saasane sammaapa.tipajjantena  vijetabba.m kilesaga.na.m vijitvaa .thito, etena upadhiviveka.m dasseti.  bhayahetuuna.m kilesaana.m apagatattaa ^b^apetalomaha.mso,^eb^ etena  sammaapa.tipattiyaa phala.m dasseti. ^b^rakkha^eb^nti rakkhanto.  ^b^kaayagataasati^eb^nti kaayaaramma.na.m sati.m, kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m  paribruuhanavasena avissajjento. ^b^dhitimaa^eb^ti dhiiro, samaahitatta.m  vijitaavibhaavata.m vaa upaadaaya pa.tipattidassanameta.m. aya~nhettha  sa"nkhepattho -- so bhikkhu vivekasukhaanupekkhaaya eko siitavana.m  upaagami, upaagato ca lolabhaavaabhaavato santu.t.tho dhitimaa  kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m bhaavento tathaadhigata.m jhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa  aaraddhavipassana.m ^a^V1.0048^ea^ ussukkaapetvaa adhigatena aggamaggena samaahito  vijitaavii ca hutvaa katakiccataaya bhayahetuuna.m sabbaso apagatattaa  apetalomaha.mso jaatoti.

text.4897: [03] tattha ^b^yodha koci manussesuu^eb^ti idha manussesu yo koci  khattiyo vaa braahma.no vaa vesso vaa suddo vaa gaha.t.tho vaa pabbajito  vaa. manussaggaha.na~ncettha ukka.t.thasattanidassananti da.t.thabba.m.  ^b^parapaa.naani hi.msatii^eb^ti parasatte maareti vibaadhati ca.  ^b^asmaa lokaa^eb^ti idha lokato. ^b^paramhaa^eb^ti paralokato.  ^b^ubhayaa dha.msate^eb^ti ubhayato dha.msati, ubhayalokapariyaapannahitasukhato  parihaayatiiti attho. ^b^naro^eb^ti satto.

text.4899: [01] idaani ^a^M1.0454^ea^ ta.m sasambhaare samathavipassanaadhamme niyojento  ^b^``subhaasitassaa''^eb^tiaadinaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha  ^b^subhaasitassa sikkhethaa^eb^ti appicchakathaadibheda.m subhaasita.m  pariyattidhamma.m savanadhaara.naparipucchaadivasena sikkheyya.  ^b^sama.nuupaasanassa caa^eb^ti samitapaapaana.m sama.naana.m kalyaa.namittaana.m  upaasakaana.m kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa payirupaasana~nceva pa.tipattiyaa  tesa.m samiipacariya~nca ^a^V1.0386^ea^ sikkheyya. ^b^ekaasanassa ca raho  cittavuupasamassa caa^eb^ti ekassa asahaayassa kaayaviveka.m anubruuhantassa  raho kamma.t.thaanaanuyogavasena aasana.m nisajja.m sikkheyya. eva.m  kamma.t.thaana.m anuyu~njanto bhaavana~nca matthaka.m paapento samucchedavasena  kilesaana.m cittassa vuupasama~nca sikkheyya. yaahi  adhisiilasikkhaadiihi kilesaa accantameva vuupasantaa pahiinaa honti,  taa maggaphalasikkhaa sikkhantassa accantameva citta.m vuupasanta.m naama  hotiiti. gaathaapariyosaane vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.  tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.59-72) --
text.49: [03] aya.m pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale aayasmataa aanandena tesa.m theraana.m  thomanattha.m bhaasitaa gaathaa aadi. tattha ^b^siihaana^eb^nti siihasaddo  ``siiho, bhikkhave, migaraajaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0  4.33)  migaraaje aagato. ``atha kho siiho senaapati yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkamii''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0  5.34) pa~n~nattiya.m.  ``siihoti kho, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m ^a^V1.0005^ea^ adhivacana.m arahato  sammaasambuddhassaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0  5.99;  10.21)  tathaagate. tattha yathaa tathaagate sadisakappanaaya aagato, eva.m idhaapi  sadisakappanaavaseneva veditabbo, tasmaa ^b^siihaana.mvaa^eb^ti siihaana.m iva.  sandhivasena saralopo ``eva.msa te''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.22)  viya. tattha ^b^ivaa^eb^ti nipaatapada.m. ^b^su.naathaa^eb^ti aakhyaatapada.m.  itaraani naamapadaani. ^b^siihaana.mvaa^eb^ti ca sambandhe saamivacana.m.  kaama~ncettha sambandhii saruupato na vutto, atthato ^a^P1.0005^ea^  pana vuttova hoti. yathaa hi ``o.t.thasseva mukha.m etassaa''ti vutte  o.t.thassa mukha.m viya mukha.m etassaati ayamattho vutto eva hoti,  evamidhaapi ``siihaana.mvaa''ti vutte siihaana.m naado viyaati ayamattho  vutto eva hoti. tattha mukhasaddasannidhaana.m hotiiti ce, idhaapi  ``nadantaana''nti padasannidhaanato, tasmaa ^b^siihaana.mvaa^eb^ti  nidassanavacana.m. ^b^nadantaana^eb^nti tassa nidassitabbena  sambandhadassana.m. ^b^daa.thiina^eb^nti tabbisesana.m. ^b^girigabbhare^eb^ti  tassa pavatti.t.thaanadassana.m. ^b^su.naathaa^eb^ti savane niyojana.m.  ^b^bhaavitattaana^eb^nti sotabbassa pabhavadassana.m. ^b^gaathaa^eb^ti  sotabbavatthudassana.m. ^b^atthupanaayikaa^eb^ti tabbisesana.m.  kaama~ncettha ``siihaana.m nadantaana.m daa.thiina''nti pulli"ngavasena aagata.m,  li"nga.m pana parivattetvaa ``siihiina''ntiaadinaa itthili"ngavasenaapi  attho veditabbo. ekasesavasena vaa siihaa ca siihiyo ca siihaa,  tesa.m siihaanantiaadinaa ^a^M1.0006^ea^ saadhaara.naa hetaa tisso nidaanagaathaa  theragaathaana.m theriigaathaana~ncaati.

satthavaahaputtaa pa.thamaahaara.m ada.msuu''ti sutvaa attano sahaayakena  saddhi.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa svaatanaaya nimantetvaa  mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa patthana.m aka.msu -- ``ubhopi maya.m, bhante, anaagate  tumhaadisassa buddhassa pa.thamaahaaradaayakaa bhaveyyaamaa''ti. te ^a^P1.0050^ea^  tattha tattha bhave pu~n~nakamma.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msarantaa  kassapassa bhagavato kaale gopaalakase.t.thissa puttaa bhaataro hutvaa  nibbattaa. bahuuni vassaani bhikkhusa"ngha.m khiirabhojanena upa.t.thahi.msu.  amhaaka.m pana bhagavato kaale pokkharavatiinagare satthavaahassa puttaa  bhaataro hutvaa nibbattaa. tesu je.t.tho taphusso naama, kani.t.tho bhalliyo  naama, te pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani bha.n.dassa puuretvaa vaa.nijjaaya  gacchantaa bhagavati pa.thamaabhisambuddhe sattasattaaha.m  vimuttisukhadhammapaccavekkha.naahi viitinaametvaa a.t.thame sattaahe  raajaayatanamuule viharante raajaayatanassa aviduure mahaamaggena  atikkamanti, tesa.m tasmi.m samaye samepi bhuumibhaage akaddamodake  saka.taani nappavatti.msu, ``ki.m nu, kho, kaara.na''nti ca cintentaana.m  poraa.nasaalohitaa devataa rukkhavi.tapantare attaana.m dassentii aaha --  ``maadisaa, aya.m bhagavaa aciraabhisambuddho sattasattaaha.m anaahaaro  vimuttisukhaapa.tisa.mvedii idaani raajaayatanamuule nisinno, ta.m aahaarena  pa.timaanetha, yadassa tumhaaka.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. ta.m sutvaa  te u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentaa, ``aahaarasampaadana.m  papa~nca''nti ma~n~namaanaa mantha~nca madhupi.n.dika~nca bhagavato datvaa  dvevaacikasara.na.m gantvaa kesadhaatuyo labhitvaa agama.msu. te hi pa.thama.m  upaasakaa ahesu.m. atha bhagavati baaraa.nasi.m gantvaa dhammacakka.m pavattetvaa  anupubbena raajagahe viharante taphussabhalliyaa raajagaha.m upagataa ^a^M1.0060^ea^  bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. tesa.m bhagavaa dhamma.m  desesi. tesu taphusso ^a^V1.0049^ea^ sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaaya upaasakova ahosi.  bhalliyo pana pabbajitvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.66-70) --
text.4925: [03] ^b^ekopi^eb^ ^a^V1.0387^ea^ ^b^saddho medhaavii^eb^ti aayasmato vassikattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannacitto  pilakkhaphalaani adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu  sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kosalara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa  ^b^vassiko^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto satthu yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto aabaadhiko ahosi.  atha na.m ~naatakaa vejjaparidi.t.thena bhesajjavidhinaa upa.t.thahitvaa arogamaka.msu.  so tamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thito sa.mvegajaato bhaavana.m ussukkaapetvaa  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.47.40-44) --

text.4942: [03] tatthaaya.m ^a^V1.0388^ea^ pa.thamagaathaaya attho -- yo kammaphalasaddhaaya ca  ratanattayasaddhaaya ca vasena ^b^saddho,^eb^ tato eva  kammassakata~naa.naadiyogato ^b^medhaavii,^eb^ satthu ovaadadhamme  navalokuttaradhamme ca .thitattaa ^b^dhamma.t.tho,^eb^ aacaarasiilassa  maggasiilassa phalasiilassa ca vasena ^b^siilasampanno,^eb^ so  ^b^ekopi^eb^ yathaavuttaaya saddhaaya abhaavena ^b^assaddhaana.m idha^eb^  imasmi.m loke ``amhaaka.m ime''ti ~naatabba.t.thena ^b^~naatiina.m,^eb^ tathaa  pemabandhanena bandhana.t.thena ^b^``bandhuu''^eb^ti ca laddhanaamaana.m bandhavaana.m  ^b^atthaaya^eb^ hitaaya ^b^hotii^eb^ti.
text.4943: [03] eva.m ^a^M1.0457^ea^ saadhaara.nato vuttamattha.m attuupanaayika.m katvaa dassetu.m  ^b^``niggayhaa''^eb^tiaadinaa itaragaathaa vuttaa. tattha ^b^niggayha  anukampaaya, coditaa ~naatayo mayaa^eb^ti idaanipi duggataa kusala.m  akatvaa aayati.m parikkilesa.m puna maanubhavitthaati niggahetvaa ~naatayo  mayaa ovaditaa. ^b^~naatibandhavapemena^eb^ ``amhaaka.m aya.m bandhavo''ti  eva.m pavattena pemena mama ovaada.m atikkamitu.m asakkontaa ^b^kaara.m  katvaana bhikkhuusu^eb^ pasannacittaa hutvaa ciivaraadipaccayadaanena ceva  upa.t.thaanena ca bhikkhuusu sakkaarasammaana.m katvaa ^b^te abbhatiitaa  kaala"nkataa^eb^ hutvaa ima.m loka.m atikkantaa. puna ^b^te^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m.  ^b^tidiva.m sukha^eb^nti devalokapariyaapannasukha.m, sukha.m vaa i.t.tha.m  tidiva.m adhigataa. ``ke pana te''ti aaha. ``^b^bhaataro mayha.m  maataa ca, modanti kaamakaamino''^eb^ti. attanaa  yathaakaamitavatthukaamasama"ngino hutvaa abhiramantiiti attho.
text.4946: [03] ^b^kaalapabba"ngasa"nkaaso^eb^ti ^a^P2.0097^ea^ aayasmato  yasojattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto vipassissa  bhagavato kaale aaraamagopakakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m  vipassi.m bhagavanta.m aakaasena gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso labujaphala.m  adaasi.
text.4947: [03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  saavatthinagaradvaare keva.t.tagaame pa~ncakulasataje.t.thakassa keva.t.tassa putto hutvaa  nibbatti, ^b^yasojo^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto attano  sahaayehi keva.t.taputtehi saddhi.m macchagaha.nattha.m aciravatiya.m nadiya.m jaala.m  khipi. tattheko suva.n.nava.n.no mahaamaccho antojaala.m paavisi. ta.m  te ra~n~no pasenadissa dassesu.m ^a^V1.0389^ea^. raajaa ``imassa suva.n.nava.n.nassa  macchassa va.n.nakaara.na.m bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti maccha.m gaahaapetvaa bhagavato  ^a^M1.0458^ea^ dassesi. bhagavaa ``aya.m kassapassa sammaasambuddhassa saasane  osakkamaane pabbajitvaa micchaa pa.tipajjanto saasana.m osakkaapetvaa  niraye nibbatto eka.m buddhantara.m niraye paccitvaa tato cuto  aciravatiya.m maccho hutvaa nibbatto''ti vatvaa tassa bhaginiina~nca  niraye nibbattabhaava.m, tassa bhaatikattherassa parinibbutabhaava~nca teneva  kathaapetvaa imissaa a.t.thuppattiyaa ^b^kapilasutta.m^eb^ desesi.
text.4948: [03] satthu desana.m sutvaa yasojo sa.mvegajaato saddhi.m attano sahaayehi  bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa patiruupe .thaane vasanto ekadivasa.m  sapariso bhagavanta.m vanditu.m jetavana.m agamaasi. tassa aagamane  senaasanapa~n~naapanaadinaa vihaare uccaasaddamahaasaddo ahosi. ta.m sutvaa  ``bhagavaa saparisa.m yasoja.m pa.naamesii''ti (udaa0 23) sabba.m udaane  aagatanayena veditabba.m. pa.naamito pana aayasmaa yasojo kasaabhihato  bhaddo assaajaaniiyo viya sa.mviggamaanaso saddhi.m parisaaya vaggumudaaya  nadiyaa tiire vasanto gha.tento vaayamanto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa  antovasseyeva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0  thera 2.47.32-39) --
text.495: [21] ``ekati.mse ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
text.4960: [03] cha.labhi~n~na.m ^a^M1.0459^ea^ pana samaana.m saparisa.m aayasmanta.m yasoja.m satthaa  pakkositvaa aane~njasamaapattinaa pa.tisanthaaramakaasi. so sabbepi  ^a^P2.0098^ea^ dhuta"ngadhamme samaadaaya vattati. tenassa sariira.m  kisa.m ahosi luukha.m dubba.n.na.m, ta.m bhagavaa paramappicchataaya pasa.msanto --

text.4964: [03] tattha ^b^kaalapabba"ngasa"nkaaso^eb^ti ma.msuupacayavigamena  kisadusa.n.thitasariiraavayavataaya dantilataapabbasadisa"ngo, tenaaha  ^b^``kiso dhamanisanthato''^eb^ti. ^b^kiso^eb^ti  moneyyapa.tipadaapuura.nena kisasariiro. ^b^dhamanisanthato^eb^ti dhamaniihi  santhatagatto appama.msalohitataaya paaka.tiihi ka.n.darasiraahi vitatasariiro.  ^b^matta~n~nuu^eb^ti pariyesanapa.tiggaha.naparibhogavissajjanesu pamaa.na~n~nuu.  ^b^adiinamaanaso^eb^ti kosajjaadiihi anabhibhuutattaa aliinacitto  akusiitavutti. ^b^naro^eb^ti puriso, porisassa dhurassa vahanato  porisalakkha.nasampanno purisadhorayhoti adhippaayo.
text.4965: [03] eva.m thero satthaaraa pasa.t.tho pasa.t.thabhaavaanuruupa.m attano  adhivaasanakhantiviiriyaarambhavivekaabhiratikittanamukhena bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m  kathento --

text.4973: [03] tattha ^b^naago sa"ngaamasiisevaa^eb^ti yathaa naama aajaaneyyo  hatthinaago yuddhama.n.dale asisattitomaraadippahaare adhivaasetvaa parasena.m  viddha.mseti, eva.m bhikkhu ^b^ara~n~nasmi.m brahaavane^eb^ ara~n~naaniya.m  .da.msaadiparissaye ^b^sato^eb^ ^a^M1.0460^ea^ sampajaano adhivaaseyya, adhivaasetvaa ca  bhaavanaabalena maarabala.m vidhameyya.
text.4974: [01] ^b^yathaa brahmaa^eb^ti yathaa brahmaa ekako  cittappakoparahito jhaanasukhena niccameva sukhito viharati ^b^tathaa  eko^eb^ti bhikkhupi eko adutiyo vivekasukhamanubruuhento sukha.m  viharati. ekassa saama~n~nasukha.m pa.niitanti hi vutta.m. etena  ekavihaarii bhikkhu ``brahmasamo''ti ovaada.m deti. ^b^yathaa devo  tathaa duve^eb^ti yathaa devaana.m antarantaraa ^a^P2.0099^ea^  cittappakopopi siyaa, tathaa dvinna.m bhikkhuuna.m sahavaase gha.t.tanaapi  bhaveyyaati sadutiyavaasena bhikkhu ``devasamo''ti vutto. ^b^yathaa  gaamo tathaa tayo^eb^ti asmimeva paa.the ti.n.na.m bhikkhuuna.m sahavaaso  gaamavaasasadiso vivekavaaso na hotiiti adhippaayo ^a^V1.0391^ea^. ^b^kolaahala.m  tatuttari^eb^nti tato tayato upari ca bahuuna.m sa.mvaaso kolaahala.m  uccaasaddamahaasaddamahaajanasannipaatasadiso, tasmaa ekavihaarinaa  bhavitabbanti adhippaayoti.
text.4977: [03] ^b^ahu tuyha.m pure saddhaa^eb^ti aayasmato saa.timattiyattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  taalava.n.ta.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa  ^b^saa.timattiyo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto hetusampannataaya  aara~n~nakabhikkhuuna.m santike pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.38.43-47) --
text.498: [03] athekadivasa.m maaro bhalliyattherassa bhi.msaapanattha.m bhayaanaka.m ruupa.m  dassesi. so attano sabbabhayaatikkama.m pakaasento  ^b^``yopaanudii''^eb^ti gaathamabhaasi.
text.4983: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa bhikkhuu ovadati anusaasati bahuu ca  satte dhamma.m kathetvaa sara.nesu ca siilesu ca pati.t.thaapesi. a~n~natara~nca  kula.m assaddha.m appasanna.m saddha.m pasanna.m akaasi. tena tasmi.m kule  manussaa there abhippasannaa ahesu.m. tatthekaa daarikaa abhiruupaa  dassaniiyaa thera.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tha.m sakkacca.m bhojanena parivisati.  athekadivasa.m maaro ``eva.m imassa ayaso va.d.dhissati, appati.t.tho  bhavissatii''ti cintetvaa therassa ruupena gantvaa ta.m daarika.m hatthe  aggahesi. daarikaa ``naaya.m manussasamphasso''ti ca a~n~naasi,  hattha~nca mu~ncaapesi. ta.m disvaa gharajano there appasaada.m janesi.  punadivase thero ta.m kaara.na.m anaavajjento ta.m ghara.m agamaasi. tattha  manussaa anaadara.m aka.msu. thero ta.m kaara.na.m aavajjento maarassa  kiriya.m disvaa ``tassa giivaaya.m kukkuraku.napa.m pa.timu~ncatuu''ti  adhi.t.thahitvaa ^a^V1.0392^ea^ tassa mocanattha.m upagatena maarena atiitadivase katakiriya.m  ^a^P2.0100^ea^ kathaapetvaa ta.m tajjetvaa vissajjesi. ta.m disvaa  gharasaamiko ``khamatha, bhante, accaya''nti khamaapetvaa ``ajjatagge  ahameva, bhante, tumhe upa.t.thahaamii''ti aaha. thero tassa dhamma.m kathento  --

text.4986: [22] ya.m tuyha.m tuyhameveta.m, natthi duccarita.m mama..

text.499: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yopaanudii^eb^ti yo apaanudi khipi  pajahi viddha.msesi. ^b^maccuraajassaa^eb^ti ^b^maccu^eb^ naama mara.na.m  khandhaana.m bhedo, so eva ca sattaana.m attano vase anuvattaapanato  issara.t.thena ^b^raajaa^eb^ti maccuraajaa, tassa. ^b^sena^eb^nti  jaraarogaadi.m, saa hissa vasavattane a"ngabhaavato senaa naama, tena hesa  mahataa naanaavidhena vipulena ``mahaaseno''ti vuccati. yathaaha --  ``na hi no sa"ngara.m tena, mahaasenena maccunaa''ti (ma0 ni0  1.272; jaa0 2.22.121; netti0 103). atha vaa  gu.namaara.na.t.thena ``maccuu''ti idha devaputtamaaro adhippeto, tassa ca  sahaayabhaavuupagamanato kaamaadayo senaa. tathaa caaha --
text.4991: [21] ``paccati munino bhatta.m, thoka.m thoka.m kule kule.
text.4994: [03] tattha ^a^M1.0462^ea^ ^b^ahu tuyha.m pure saddhaa, saa te ajja na vijjatii^eb^ti,  upaasaka, ito pubbe tava mayi ``ayyo dhammacaarii  samacaarii''tiaadinaa saddhaa ahosi, saa saddhaa te tava ajja idaani  na upalabbhati. tasmaa ^b^ya.m tuyha.m tuyhameveta^eb^nti catupaccayadaana.m,  tuyhameva eta.m hotu, na tena mayha.m attho, sammaa pasannacittena hi daana.m  naama daatabbanti adhippaayo. atha vaa ^b^ya.m tuyha.m tuyhameveta^eb^nti  ya.m tava mayi ajja agaarava.m pavatta.m, ta.m tuyhameva, tassa phala.m tayaa eva  paccanubhavitabba.m, na mayaati attho. ^b^natthi duccarita.m mamaa^eb^ti  mama pana duccarita.m naama natthi maggeneva duccaritahetuuna.m kilesaana.m  samucchinnattaa.
text.4995: [03] ^b^aniccaa hi calaa saddhaa^eb^ti yasmaa pothujjanikaa saddhaa  aniccaa ekantikaa na hoti, tato eva calaa assapi.t.the .thapitakumbha.n.da.m  viya, thusaraasimhi nikhaatakhaa.nuka.m viya ca anava.t.thitaa. ^b^eva.m  di.t.thaa hi saa mayaa^eb^ti eva.m bhuutaa ca saa saddhaa mayaa tayi di.t.thaa  paccakkhato viditaa. ^b^rajjantipi virajjantii^eb^ti eva.m tassaa  anava.t.thitattaa eva ime sattaa kadaaci katthaci mittasanthavavasena  rajjanti sinehampi karonti, kadaaci virajjanti virattacittaa honti.  ^b^tattha ki.m jiyyate munii^eb^ti tasmi.m puthujjanaana.m rajjane virajjane  ca muni pabbajito ki.m jiyyati, kaa tassa haaniiti attho.
text.4996: [03] ``sace mama paccaye na ga.nhatha, katha.m tumhe yaapethaa''ti eva.m maa  cintayiiti dassento ^b^``paccatii''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. tassattho  ^b^munino^eb^ pabbajitassa ^b^bhatta.m^eb^ naama ^b^kule kule^eb^ anughara.m  divase divase ^a^V1.0393^ea^ ^b^thoka.m thoka.m^eb^ paccate, na ca tuyha.m eva gehe.  ^b^pi.n.dikaaya carissaami, atthi ja"nghabala.m mamaa^eb^ti atthi me  ja"nghabala.m, naaha.m obhaggaja"ngho na kha~njo na ca paadarogii, tasmaa  ^a^P2.0101^ea^ pi.n.dikaaya missakabhikkhaaya carissaami,  ``yathaapi bhamaro puppha''ntiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 49; netti0 123)  satthaaraa vuttanayena pi.n.daaya caritvaa yaapessaamiiti dasseti.
text.4999: [03] ^b^saddhaaya^eb^ ^a^M1.0463^ea^ ^b^abhinikkhammaa^eb^ti aayasmato upaalittherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale  ha.msavatiinagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthu dhamma.m su.nanto  satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m vinayadharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa  adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m  katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kappakagehe pa.tisandhi.m  ga.nhi, ^b^upaalii^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto anuruddhaadiina.m  channa.m khattiyaana.m pasaadako hutvaa tathaagate anupiyambavane viharante  pabbajanatthaaya nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa  pabbaji. tassa pabbajjaavidhaana.m paa.liya.m aagatameva (cuu.lava0 330).

text.5341: [03] ^b^su.naatha^eb^ ^a^V1.0406^ea^ ^b^~naatayo sabbe^eb^ti aayasmato abhibhuutattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto taadisena kalyaa.namittasannissayena saasane abhippasanno  ahosi. so satthari parinibbute tassa dhaatu.m gahetu.m mahaajane ussaaha.m  karonte saya.m sabbapa.thama.m gandhodakena citaka.m nibbaapesi. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade ve.thapuranagare  raajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^abhibhuuto^eb^ti laddhanaamo pitu accayena rajja.m  kaareti. tasmi~nca samaye bhagavaa janapadacaarika.m caranto anupubbena  ta.m nagara.m paapu.ni. tato so raajaa ``bhagavaa kira mama nagara.m  anuppatto''ti sutvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa dutiyadivase  mahaadaana.m pavattesi. bhagavaa bhuttaavii tassa ra~n~no ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m  anumodana.m karontoyeva vitthaarato dhamma.m desesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa  laddhappasaado rajja.m pahaaya pabbajitvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.11-15) --
text.5347: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukhena viharante tasmi.m tassa ~naatakaa  amaccaa paarisajjaa naagaraa jaanapadaati sabbe samaagantvaa, ``bhante,  kasmaa tva.m amhe anaathe katvaa pabbajito''ti paridevi.msu. thero te  ~naatipamukhe manusse paridevante disvaa tesa.m attano  pabbajjakaara.navibhaavanamukhena dhamma.m kathento --
text.5350: [22] dhamma.m vo desayissaami, dukkhaa jaati punappuna.m..
text.5356: [22] pahaaya jaatisa.msaara.m, dukkhassanta.m karissatii''ti.. --  tisso gaathaa abhaasi.
text.5357: [03] tattha ^b^su.naathaa^eb^ti nisaametha, idaani mayaa vuccamaana.m  ohitasotaa sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaarethaati attho. ^b^~naatayo^eb^ti  ~naatii pamukhe katvaa tesa.m sabbesa.m aalapana.m, tenaaha ^b^``sabbe  yaavantettha samaagataa''^eb^ti, yaavanto yattakaa ettha samaagame, etissa.m  vaa mama pabbajjaaya samaagataati attho.
text.5358: [01] idaani ya.m sandhaaya ``su.naathaa''ti savanaa.nattikavacana.m  kata.m, ta.m ^b^``dhamma.m vo desayissaamii''^eb^ti pa.tijaanitvaa  ^b^``dukkhaa jaati punappuna''^eb^ntiaadinaa desetu.m aarabhi. tattha  ^b^dukkhaa jaati punappuna^eb^nti jaati naamesaa  gabbhokkantimuulakaadibhedassa jaraadibhedassa ca anekavihitassa  dukkhassa adhi.t.thaanabhaavato dukkhaa. saa punappuna.m pavattamaanaa ativiya  dukkhaa.
text.5359: [01] tassaa ^a^M1.0480^ea^ pana jaatiyaa samatikkamanattha.m ussaaho  kara.niiyoti dassento aaha ^b^``aarambhathaa^eb^''tiaadi. tattha  ^b^aarambhathaa^eb^ti aarambhadhaatusa"nkhaata.m viiriya.m karotha.  ^b^nikkamathaa^eb^ti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattaa nikkamadhaatusa"nkhaata.m  taduttari.m viiriya.m karotha. ^b^yu~njatha buddhasaasane^eb^ti yasmaa  siilasa.mvaro indriyesu guttadvaarataa bhojane matta~n~nutaa satisampaja~n~nanti  imesu dhammesu pati.t.thitaana.m jaagariyaanuyogavasena aarambhanikkamadhaatuyo  sampajjanti, tasmaa tathaabhuutaa samathavipassanaasa"nkhaate  adhisiilasikkhaadisa"nkhaate vaa bhagavato saasane yuttappayuttaa hotha.  ^b^dhunaatha maccuno sena.m, na.laagaara.mva ku~njaro^eb^ti eva.m pa.tipajjantaa ca  tedhaatuissarassa maccuraajassa vasa.m satte netiiti tassa senaasa"nkhaata.m  abala.m dubbala.m yathaa naama thaamabaluupapanno ku~njaro na.lehi kata.m agaara.m  kha.neneva viddha.mseti, evameva kilesaga.na.m dhunaatha vidhamatha viddha.msethaati  attho.
text.5360: [03] eva.m pana buddhasaasane ussaaha.m karontassa eka.msiko  jaatidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento ^b^``yo  imasmi''^eb^ntiaadinaa tatiya.m gaathamaaha. ta.m suvi~n~neyyameva.
text.5363: [03] ^b^sa.msara^eb^nti ^a^V1.0408^ea^ ^a^P2.0106^ea^ aayasmato gotamattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha  tattha bhave pu~n~naani karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute tassa  citaka.m devamanussesu puujentesu a.t.thahi campakapupphehi citaka.m puujesi.  so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^gotamo^eb^ti gottavaseneva  abhilakkhitanaamo vayappatto satthu ~naatisamaagame pa.tiladdhasaddho  pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena  vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.6-10) --
text.5369: [03] cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasa.m  ~naatakehi ``kasmaa, bhante, amhe pahaaya pabbajito''ti pu.t.tho sa.msaare  attanaa anubhuutadukkha~nceva idaani adhigata.m nibbaanasukha~nca pakaasento  --
text.537: [21] ``na ma.m mittaa amittaa vaa, hi.msanti sabbapaa.nino.
text.5372: [22] dukkhamamhipi tiracchaanayoniya.m, nekadhaa hi vusita.m  cira.m mayaa..

text.5380: [03] tattha ^b^sa.msara^eb^nti anaadimati sa.msaare sa.msaranto  kammakilesehi pa~ncasu gatiisu cavanupapaatavasena aparaapara.m sa.msarantoti  attho. ^b^hii^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^niraya.m agacchissa^eb^nti  sa~njiivaadika.m a.t.thavidha.m mahaaniraya.m, kukku.laadika.m so.lasavidha.m  ussadaniraya~nca pa.tisandhivasena upagacchi.m ^a^V1.0409^ea^. ^b^``punappuna''^eb^nti  ida.m idhaapi aanetabba.m ^a^P2.0107^ea^. ^b^petaloka^eb^nti  pettivisaya.m, khuppipaasaadibheda.m petattabhaavanti ^a^M1.0482^ea^ attho. ^b^agama^eb^nti  pa.tisandhivasena upagacchi.m upapajji.m. ^b^punappuna^eb^nti aparaapara.m.  ^b^dukkhamamhipii^eb^ti a~n~nama~n~na.m tikhi.nakasaapatodaabhighaataadidukkhehi  dussahaayapi. li"ngavipallaasena heta.m vutta.m ``dukkhamamhipii''ti.  ^b^tiracchaanayoniya^eb^nti migapakkhiaadibhedaaya tiracchaanayoniya.m.  ^b^nekadhaa hii^eb^ti o.t.thago.nagadrabhaadivasena ceva  kaakabalaakakulalaadivasena ca anekappakaara.m anekavaara~nca ^b^cira.m^eb^  diighamaddhaana.m ^b^mayaa vusita.m^eb^ nicca.m utrastamaanasataadivasena dukkha.m  anubhuuta.m. tiracchaanayoniya.m nibbattasatto mahaamuu.lhataaya ciratara.m  tattheva aparaapara.m parivattatiiti dassanattha.m idha ``cira''nti vutta.m.
text.5381: [03] ^b^maanusopi ca bhavobhiraadhito^eb^ti manussattabhaavopi mayaa  taadisena kusalakammunaa samavaayena abhiraadhito saadhito adhigato.  kaa.nakacchapopamasuttamettha (ma0 ni0 3.252; sa.m0 ni0   5.1117) udaaharitabba.m. ^b^saggakaayamagama.m saki.m saki^eb^nti  saggagatisa"nkhaata.m kaamaavacaradevakaaya.m saki.m saki.m kadaaci kadaaci  upapajjanavasena agacchi.m. ^b^ruupadhaatusuu^eb^ti  puthujjanabhavaggapariyosaanesu ruupabhavesu ^b^aruupadhaatusuu^eb^ti aruupabhavesu.  ^b^nevasa~n~nisu asa~n~nisu.t.thita^eb^nti ruupaaruupadhaatuusu ca na kevala.m  sa~n~niisu eva, atha kho nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niisu asa~n~niisu ca upapajja  .thita.m mayaati aanetvaa yojetabba.m. nevasa~n~niggaha.nena hettha  nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niibhavo gahito. yadipime dve bhavaa  ruupaaruupadhaatuggaha.neneva gayhanti, ye pana ito baahirakaa tattha  niccasa~n~nino bhavavimokkhasa~n~nino ca, tesa.m tassaa sa~n~naaya  micchaabhaavadassanattha.m visu.m gahitaati da.t.thabba.m.
text.5382: [03] eva.m dviihi gaathaahi bhavamuulassa anupacchinnattaa anaadimati  sa.msaare attano va.t.tadukkhaanubhava.m dassetvaa idaani tadupacchedena  viva.t.tasukhaanubhava.m dassento ^b^``sambhavaa''^eb^tiaadinaa tatiya.m  gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^sambhavaa^eb^ti bhavaa. kaamabhavaadayo eva hi  hetupaccayasamavaayena bhavantiiti idha sambhavaati vuttaa.  ^b^suviditaa^eb^ti vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya su.t.thu viditaa.  ^b^asaarakaa^eb^tiaadi tesa.m viditaakaaradassana.m. tattha  ^b^asaarakaa^eb^ti niccasaaraadisaararahitaa. ^b^sa"nkhataa^eb^ti samecca  sambhuyya paccayehi ^a^M1.0483^ea^ kataa. ^b^pacalitaa^eb^ti sa"nkhatattaa eva  uppaadajaraadiihi pakaarato calitaa anava.t.thitaa. ^b^saderitaa^eb^ti  sadaa sabbakaala.m bha"ngena eritaa, ittaraa bha"ngagaamino pabha"ngunoti attho.  ^b^ta.m viditvaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0108^ea^ ^b^mahamattasambhava^eb^nti ta.m  yathaavutta.m sa"nkhatasabhaava.m attasambhava.m attani sambhuuta.m attaayatta.m  issaraadivasena aparaayatta.m pari~n~naabhisamayavasena aha.m viditvaa  tappa.tipakkhabhuuta.m ^b^santimeva^eb^ nibbaanameva maggapa~n~naasatiyaa  ^b^satimaa^eb^ ^a^V1.0410^ea^ hutvaa ^b^samajjhaga.m^eb^ adhigacchi.m ariyamaggabhaavanaaya  anuppattoti. eva.m thero ~naatakaana.m dhammadesanaamukhena a~n~na.m byaakaasi.
text.5385: [03] ^b^yo pubbe kara.niiyaanii^eb^ti aayasmato haaritattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapuujaaya  kayiramaanaaya gandhena puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule  nibbattitvaa ^b^haarito^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto jaatimaana.m nissaaya  a~n~ne vasalavaadena samudaacarati. so bhikkhuuna.m santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m  sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattaa vasalasamudaacaara.m na  vissajji. athekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa sa~njaatasa.mvego  vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa attano cittappavatti.m upaparikkhanto  maanuddhaccaviggahitata.m disvaa ta.m pahaaya vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.63-67) --
text.5391: [03] arahaa ^a^M1.0484^ea^ pana hutvaa vimuttisukha.m anubhavanto ^b^``yo pubbe  kara.niiyaanii''^eb^tiaadinaa tiihi gaathaahi bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanamukhena  a~n~na.m byaakaasi. taasa.m attho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.
text.5394: [03] ^b^paapamitte^eb^ti ^a^V1.0411^ea^ ^a^P2.0109^ea^ aayasmato vimalattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale  kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari parinibbute  saadhukii.lanadivasesu viitivattesu satthu sariira.m gahetvaa upaasakesu  jhaapana.t.thaana.m gacchantesu satthu gu.ne aavajjitvaa pasannamaanaso  sumanapupphehi puujamakaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu  sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa  ^b^vimalo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto somamittatthera.m nissaaya saasane  pabbajitvaa teneva ussaahito vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.58-62) --
text.54: [01] javopi siihassa a~n~nehi asaadhaara.no, tathaa parakkamo.  tathaa hi so usabhasatampi la"nghitvaa vanamahi.msaadiisu nipatati,  potakopi samaano pabhinnamadaanampi mattavaravaara.naana.m pa.timaana.m  bhinditvaa ^a^M1.0007^ea^ dantaka.liira.mva khaadati. etesa.m pana ariyamaggajavo  iddhijavo ca a~n~nehi asaadhaara.no, sammappadhaanaparakkamo ca  niratisayo. tasmaa ^b^siihaana.mvaa^eb^ti siihasadisaana.m viya.  siihassa cettha hiinuupamataa da.t.thabbaa, accantavisi.t.thassa sahanaadiatthassa  theresveva labbhanato.

text.5412: [03] tattha ^b^paapamitte^eb^ti akalyaa.namitte asappurise hiinaviiriye.  ^b^vivajjetvaa^eb^ti ta.m abhajanavasena duurato vajjetvaa.  ^b^bhajeyyuttamapuggala^eb^nti sappurisa.m pa.n.dita.m kalyaa.namitta.m  ovaadaanusaasaniigaha.navasena ^a^V1.0412^ea^ seveyya. ^b^ovaade cassa ti.t.theyyaa^eb^ti  assa kalyaa.namittassa ovaade anusi.t.thiya.m yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjanavasena  ti.t.theyya. ^b^patthento^eb^ti aaka"nkhanto. ^b^acala.m sukha^eb^nti  nibbaanasukha.m phalasukha~nca. tampi hi akuppabhaavato ``acala''nti  vuccati. sesa.m vuttatthameva.
text.5418: [03] ^b^ala"nkataa^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ aayasmato naagasamaalattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto gimhasamaye suuriyaatapasantattaaya ^a^V2.0002^ea^ bhuumiyaa  gacchanta.m satthaara.m ^a^P2.0110^ea^ disvaa pasannamaanaso chatta.m  adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m  buddhuppaade sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^naagasamaalo^eb^ti laddhanaamo  vayappatto ~naatisamaagame pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ki~nci kaala.m  bhagavato upa.t.thaako ahosi. so ekadivasa.m nagara.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho  ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m a~n~natara.m naccaki.m mahaapathe tuuriyesu vajjantesu naccanti.m  disvaa, ``aya.m cittakiriyavaayodhaatuvipphaaravasena karajakaayassa tathaa  tathaa parivatti, aho aniccaa sa"nkhaaraa''ti khayavaya.m pa.t.thapetvaa  vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.46.37-48) --
