text.6395: [03] tattha ^a^P2.0158^ea^ ^b^yo^eb^ti khattiyaadiisu catuusu  parisaasu yo koci. ^b^ve^eb^ti byatta.m. ^b^garuuna^eb^nti  siilaadigarugu.nayuttaana.m pa.n.ditaana.m. ^b^vacana~n~nuu^eb^ti tesa.m  anusaasaniivacana.m jaananto, yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjamaano pa.tipajjitvaa ca  tassa phala.m jaanantoti attho. ^b^dhiiro^eb^ti dhitisampanno.  ^b^vase ca tamhi janayetha pema^eb^nti tasmi.m garuuna.m vacane ovaade  vaseyya yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjeyya, pa.tipajjitvaa ``iminaa vataaha.m  ovaadena ima.m jaatiaadidukkha.m viitivatto''ti tattha janayetha pema.m  gaarava.m uppaadeyya. ida~nhi dvaya.m ``garuuna.m vacana~n~nu dhiiro''ti  padadvayena vuttassevatthassa paaka.takara.na.m. ^b^so^eb^ti yo garuuna.m  vacana~n~nuu dhiiro, so yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipattiyaa tattha ^b^bhattimaa^eb^ ca  naama hoti, jiivitahetupi tassa anatikkamanato ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ ca  naama hoti. ^b^~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assaa^eb^ti tathaa  pa.tipajjanto ca taaya eva pa.tipattiyaa catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m jaananahetu  ^a^V2.0066^ea^ lokiyalokuttaradhammesu vijjaattayaadivasena ``tevijjo, cha.labhi~n~no,  pa.tisambhidaapatto''ti visesi visesavaa siyaati attho.
text.6396: [03] ^b^ya^eb^nti ya.m puggala.m pa.tipattiyaa antaraayakara.nato  ^b^``aapadaa''^eb^ti laddhavohaaraa sotu.nhakhuppipaasaadipaaka.taparissayaa  ceva raagaadipa.ticchannaparissayaa ca ^b^uppatitaa^eb^ uppannaa,  ^b^u.laaraa^eb^ balavantopi ^b^nakkhambhayante^eb^ na ki~nci caalenti.  kasmaa? ^b^pa.tisa"nkhayanta^eb^nti pa.tisa"nkhaayamaana.m pa.tisa"nkhaanabale  .thitanti attho. ^b^so^eb^ti yo da.lhataraahi aapadaahipi  akkhambhaniiyo, so ^b^thaamavaa^eb^ dhitimaa da.lhaparakkamo naama hoti.  anavasesasa.mkilesapakkhassa abhibhavanakapa~n~naabalasama"ngitaaya  ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ ca naama hoti. tathaabhuuto ca ^b^~natvaa ca dhammesu  visesi assaa^eb^ti ta.m vuttatthameva.
text.6397: [03] ^b^samuddova^eb^ ^a^M2.0076^ea^ ^b^.thito^eb^ti samuddo viya .thitasabhaavo. yathaa hi  caturaasiitiyojanasahassagambhiire sinerupaadasamiipe mahaasamuddo a.t.thahipi  disaahi u.t.thitehi pakativaatehi ani~njanato ^b^.thito anejo^eb^  gambhiiro ca, eva.m kilesavaatehi titthiyavaadavaatehi ca akampaniiyato  ^b^.thito anejo^eb^. gambhiirassa anupacita~naa.nasambhaarehi  aladdhagaadhassa nipu.nassa sukhumassa pa.ticcasamuppaadaadiatthassa  pa.tivijjhanena ^b^gambhiirapa~n~no nipu.natthadassii. asa.mhaariyo naama  ca hoti pa.n.dito^eb^ so taadiso puggalo kilesehi devaputtamaaraadiisu  vaa kenaci asa.mhaariyataaya asa.mhaariyo naama hoti, yathaavuttena atthena  ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ ca naama hoti. sesa.m vuttanayameva.
text.6398: [03] ^b^bahussuto^eb^ti pariyattibaahusaccavasena bahussuto,  suttageyyaadi bahu.m suta.m etassaati bahussuto. tameva dhamma.m  suva.n.nabhaajane pakkhittasiihavasa.m viya avinassantameva dhaaretiiti  ^b^dhammadharo^eb^ ^a^P2.0159^ea^ ca hoti. ^b^dhammassa hoti  anudhammacaarii^eb^ti yathaasutassa yathaapariyattassa dhammassa atthama~n~naaya  dhammama~n~naaya navalokuttaradhammassa anuruupa.m dhamma.m  pubbabhaagapa.tipadaasa"nkhaata.m catupaarisuddhisiiladhuta"ngaasubhakamma.t.thaanaadibheda.m  carati pa.tipajjatiiti anudhammacaarii hoti, ``ajja ajjevaa''ti  pa.tivedha.m aaka"nkhanto vicarati. ^b^so taadiso naama ca hoti  pa.n.dito^eb^ti yo puggalo ya.m garu.m nissaaya bahussuto dhammadharo  dhammassa ca anudhammacaarii hoti. so ca ^b^taadiso^eb^ tena garunaa  sadiso pa.n.dito naama hoti pa.tipattiyaa sadisabhaavato. tathaabhuuto  pana so ^b^~natvaa ca dhammesu visesi assa,^eb^ ta.m vuttattha.mva.
text.6399: [03] ^b^attha~nca yo jaanaati bhaasitassaa^eb^ti yo puggalo  sammaasambuddhena bhaasitassa pariyattidhammassa ^a^V2.0067^ea^ attha.m jaanaati.  jaananto pana ``idha siila.m vutta.m, idha samaadhi, idha pa~n~naa''ti tattha  tattha yathaavutta.m ^b^attha~nca ~natvaana tathaa karoti^eb^ yathaa satthaaraa  anusi.t.tha.m, tathaa pa.tipajjati. ^b^atthantaro naama sa hoti  pa.n.dito^eb^ti so evaruupo puggalo atthantaro atthakaara.naa  siilaadiatthajaananamattameva upanissaya.m katvaa pa.n.dito hoti. sesa.m  vuttanayameva.
text.64: [03] saavakaa pana satthu sabrahmacaarino vaa catusaccakamma.t.thaanakatha.m  sutvaa tasmi.myeva kha.ne kaalantare vaa tajja.m pa.tipatti.m anuti.t.thantaa  gha.tentaa vaayamantaa vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa, yadi vaa pa.tipadaaya  va.d.dhantiyaa, saccaani pa.tivijjhantaa ^a^M1.0011^ea^ attano  abhiniihaaraanuruupasiddhiaggasaavakabhuumiyaa vaa kevala.m vaa  aggamaggakkha.ne saavakasambodhi.m adhigacchanti naama. tato para.m  saavakabuddhaa naama honti sadevake loke aggadakkhi.neyyaa. eva.m taava  abhisamayato paccekasambodhi saavakasambodhi ca veditabbaa.
text.6400: [03] ettha ^a^M2.0077^ea^ ca pa.thamagaathaaya ``yo ve garuuna''ntiaadinaa  saddhuupanissayo visesabhaavo vutto, dutiyagaathaaya ``ya.m aapadaa''ti  aadinaa viiriyuupanissayo, tatiyagaathaaya ``yo ve samuddova  .thito''tiaadinaa samaadhuupanissayo, catutthagaathaaya  ``bahussuto''tiaadinaa satuupanissayo, pa~ncamagaathaaya ``attha~nca yo  jaanaatii''tiaadinaa pa~n~nuupanissayo visesabhaavo vuttoti veditabbo.
text.6405: [03] chakkanipaate ^a^M2.0078^ea^ ^a^V2.0068^ea^ ^b^disvaana paa.tihiiraanii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  uruvelakassapattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto  padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa, vayappatto satthu  santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m mahaaparisaana.m agga.t.thaane  .thapenta.m disvaa, sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa mahaadaana.m datvaa  pa.nidhaanamakaasi. bhagavaa cassa anantaraayata.m disvaa, ``anaagate  gotamabuddhassa saasane mahaaparisaana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi.
text.6406: [03] so ^a^P2.0160^ea^ tattha yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato  cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito dvaanavutikappamatthake phussassa  bhagavato vemaatikakani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti. a~n~nepissa dve  kani.t.thabhaataro ahesu.m. te tayopi buddhappamukha.m sa"ngha.m paramaaya puujaaya  puujetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m  bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule bhaataro hutvaa,  anukkamena nibbattaa gottavasena tayopi kassapaa eva naama jaataa. te  vayappattaa tayo vede ugga.nhi.msu. tesa.m je.t.thabhaatikassa pa~nca  maa.navakasataani parivaaro, majjhimassa tii.ni, kani.t.thassa dve. te  attano ganthe saara.m olokentaa di.t.thadhammikameva attha.m disvaa pabbajja.m  rocesu.m. tesu je.t.thabhaataa attano parivaarena saddhi.m uruvela.m gantvaa  isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ^b^uruvelakassapo^eb^ naama jaato  mahaaga"ngaanadiiva"nke pabbajito ^b^nadiikassapo^eb^ naama jaato, gayaasiise  pabbajito ^b^gayaakassapo^eb^ naama jaato.
text.6407: [03] eva.m tesu isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa tattha tattha vasantesu bahuuna.m  divasaana.m accayena amhaaka.m bodhisatto mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa,  pa.tividdhasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.no anukkamena dhammacakka.m pavattetvaa,  pa~ncavaggiyatthere arahatte pati.t.thaapetvaa yasappamukhe pa~ncapa~n~naasa sahaayake  vinetvaa sa.t.thi arahante ``caratha, bhikkhave, caarika''nti vissajjetvaa,  bhaddavaggiye vinetvaa uruvelakassapassa ^a^V2.0069^ea^ vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa vasanatthaaya  agyaagaara.m pavisitvaa ^a^M2.0079^ea^, tattha katanaagadamana.m aadi.m katvaa  a.d.dhu.d.dhasahassehi paa.tihaariyehi uruvelakassapa.m saparisa.m vinetvaa  pabbaajesi. tassa pabbajitabhaava.m ~natvaa itarepi dve bhaataro saparisaa  aagantvaa satthu santike pabbaji.msu. sabbeva ehibhikkhuu  iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa ahesu.m.
text.6408: [03] satthaa ta.m sama.nasahassa.m aadaaya gayaasiisa.m gantvaa pi.t.thipaasaa.ne  nisinno ^b^aadittapariyaayadesanaaya^eb^ sabbe arahatte pati.t.thaapesi.  tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.251-295) --

text.6462: [22] nibbute tamhi lokagge, puuja.m katvaa yathaabala.m..
text.647: [03] 14^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^upajjhaayo^eb^ti vajjaavajja.m  upanijjhaayati hitesita.m paccupa.t.thapetvaa ~naa.nacakkhunaa pekkhatiiti  upajjhaayo. ^b^ma^eb^nti attaana.m vadati. ^b^avacaa^eb^ti abhaasi.  ^b^ito gacchaama siivakaa^eb^ti vuttaakaaradassana.m, sivaka, ito  gaamantato ara~n~na.t.thaanameva ehi gacchaama, tadeva amhaaka.m vasanayogganti  ^a^M1.0076^ea^ adhippaayo. eva.m pana upajjhaayena vutto sivako bhadro assaajaaniiyo  viya kasaabhihato sa~njaatasa.mvego hutvaa ara~n~nameva gantukaamata.m pavedento  --
text.6470: [22] bahudhaa sa.msito santo, di.t.thi.m hitvaana paapika.m..

text.648: [21] ``gaame ^a^V1.0063^ea^ me vasati kaayo, ara~n~na.m me gata.m mano.

text.6494: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa siihanaada.m  nadanto --
text.65: [03] tadatthato pana yathaa mahaabodhisattaana.m he.t.thimaparicchedena cattaari  asa"nkhyeyyaani kappaana.m satasahassa~nca bodhisambhaarasambhara.na.m  icchitabba.m majjhimaparicchedena a.t.tha ^a^P1.0011^ea^ asa"nkhyeyyaani  kappaana.m satasahassa~nca, uparimaparicchedena so.lasa asa"nkhyeyyaani  kappaana.m satasahassa~nca ete ca bhedaa  pa~n~naadhikasaddhaadhikaviiriyaadhikavasena veditabbaa. pa~n~naadhikaana~nhi  saddhaa mandaa hoti pa~n~naa tikkhaa, tato ca upaayakosallassa  visadanipu.nabhaavena nacirasseva paaramiyo paaripuuri.m gacchanti.  saddhaadhikaana.m pa~n~naa majjhimaa hotiiti tesa.m naatisiigha.m naatisa.nika.m  paaramiyo paaripuuri.m gacchanti. viiriyaadhikaana.m pana pa~n~naa mandaa  hotiiti tesa.m cireneva paaramiyo paaripuuri.m gacchanti. na eva.m  paccekabodhisattaana.m. tesa~nhi satipi pa~n~naadhikabhaave dve  asa"nkhyeyyaani kappaana.m satasahassa~nca bodhisambhaarasambhara.na.m  icchitabba.m, na tato ora.m. saddhaadhikaviiriyaadhikaapi vuttaparicchedato  para.m katipaye eva kappe atikkamitvaa paccekasambodhi.m abhisambujjhanti,  na tatiya.m asa"nkhyeyyanti. saavakabodhisattaana.m pana yesa.m  aggasaavakabhaavaaya abhiniihaaro, tesa.m eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m kappaana.m  satasahassa~nca sambhaarasambhara.na.m icchitabba.m. yesa.m mahaasaavakabhaavaaya,  tesa.m kappaana.m satasahassameva, tathaa buddhassa maataapituuna.m upa.t.thaakassa  puttassa ca. tattha yathaa --
text.650: [03] tassattho -- yasmaa idaani yadipi me ida.m sariira.m gaamante  .thita.m, ajjhaasayo pana ara~n~nameva gato, tasmaa semaanakopi gacchaami  gela~n~nena .thaananisajjaagamanesu asamatthataaya sayaanopi iminaa  sayitaakaarena sariisapo viya sariisapanto, etha, bhante, ara~n~nameva  gacchaama, kasmaa? ^b^natthi sa"ngo vijaanata^eb^nti, yasmaa  dhammasabhaavaa kaamesu sa.msaare ca aadiinava.m, nekkhamme nibbaane ca  aanisa.msa.m yaathaavato jaanantassa na katthaci sa"ngo, tasmaa ekapadeneva  upajjhaayassa aa.naa anu.thitaati, tadapadesena a~n~na.m byaakaasi.
text.6500: [22] tato me aasi sa.mvego, abbhuto lomaha.msano..
text.6514: [01] tattha ^b^disvaana paa.tihiiraanii^eb^ti naagaraajadamanaadiini  a.d.dhu.d.dhasahassaani paa.tihaariyaani disvaa. ``paa.tihiira.m, paa.tihera.m,  paa.tihaariya''nti hi atthato eka.m, bya~njanameva naana.m.  ^b^yasassino''^eb^ti ``itipi so bhagavaa''tiaadinaa sadevake loke  yathaabhucca.m pattha.takittisaddassa. ^b^na taavaaha.m pa.nipati^eb^nti yaava ma.m  bhagavaa ``neva kho tva.m, kassapa, arahaa, naapi arahattamagga.m samaapanno,  saapi te pa.tipadaa natthi, yaaya tva.m arahaa vaa assa, arahattamagga.m vaa  samaapanno''ti na tajjesi, taava aha.m na pa.nipaatana.m akaasi.m.  ki.mkaara.naa? ^b^issaamaanena va~ncito,^eb^ ``imassa mayi saavakatta.m  upagate mama laabhasakkaaro parihaayissati, imassa eva va.d.dhissatii''ti  eva.m parasampattiasahanalakkha.naaya issaaya ceva, ``aha.m ga.napaamokkho  bahujanasammato''ti eva.m abbhunnatilakkha.nena maanena ca va~ncito,  palambhito hutvaati attho.
text.6515: [03] ^b^mama sa"nkappama~n~naayaa^eb^ti mayha.m micchaasa"nkappa.m jaanitvaa, ya.m  ya.m bhagavaa uttari manussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dasseti, ta.m ta.m disvaa  ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo''ti cintetvaapi ``na  tveva kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti eva.m pavatta.m micchaavitakka.m jaanantopi  ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamento ajjhupekkhitvaa pacchaa nera~njaraaya majjhe  samantato udaka.m ussaaretvaa re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkamitvaa tena  aabhatanaavaaya .thito tadaapi ``mahiddhiko''tiaadika.m cintetvaa puna  ``na tveva kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti pavattita.m micchaasa"nkappa.m  ~natvaati attho. ^b^codesi narasaarathii^eb^ti tadaa me ^a^V2.0073^ea^ ~naa.naparipaaka.m  ~natvaa ``neva kho tva.m arahaa''tiaadinaa purisadammasaarathi satthaa ma.m  codesi nigga.nhi. ^b^tato me aasi sa.mvego, abbhuto  lomaha.msano^eb^ti tato yathaavuttacodanaahetu ettaka.m kaala.m abhuutapubbataaya  ^b^abbhuto^eb^ lomaha.msanavasena pavattiyaa ^b^lomaha.msano^eb^  ``anarahaava samaano `arahaa'ti ^a^M2.0084^ea^ ma~n~ni''nti ^b^sa.mvego^eb^ sahottappo  ~naa.nuppaado mayha.m ahosi.
text.6516: [03] ^b^ja.tilabhuutassaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0162^ea^ taapasabhuutassa.  ^b^siddhii^eb^ti laabhasakkaarasamiddhi. ^b^parittikaa^eb^ti appamattikaa.  ^b^taaha^eb^nti ta.m aha.m. ^b^tadaa^eb^ti bhagavato codanaaya  sa.mveguppattikaale. ^b^niraakatvaa^eb^ti apanetvaa cha.d.detvaa, anapekkho  hutvaati attho. ^b^``iddhii^eb^ti bhaavanaamayaiddhii''ti vadanti.  tadayutta.m tadaa tassa ajhaanalaabhiibhaavato. tathaa hi vutta.m  ``kaamadhaatupurakkhato''ti.
text.6517: [03] ^b^ya~n~nena santu.t.tho^eb^ti ``ya~n~na.m yajitvaa saggasukha.m  anubhavissaami, alamettaavataa''ti ya~n~nayajanena santu.t.tho  ni.t.thitakiccasa~n~nii. ^b^kaamadhaatupurakkhato^eb^ti kaamasugati.m aarabbha  uppannata.nho ya~n~nayajanena kaamaloka.m purakkhatvaa .thito. so ce  ya~n~no paa.naatipaatapa.tisa.myutto hoti, na tena sugati.m sakkaa laddhu.m. na  hi akusalassa i.t.tho kanto vipaako nibbattati. yaa pana tattha  daanaadikusalacetanaa, taaya sati paccayasamavaaye sugati.m gaccheyya.  ^b^pacchaa^eb^ti taapasapabbajjaato pacchaa satthu ovaadena taapasaladdhi.m  pahaaya catusaccakamma.t.thaanaanuyogakaale. ^b^samuuhani^eb^nti vipassana.m  ussukkaapetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa raaga~nca dosa~nca moha~nca anavasesato  samugghaatesi.m.
text.6518: [03] yasmaa panaaya.m thero ariyamaggena raagaadayo samuuhanantoyeva  cha.labhi~n~no ahosi, tasmaa ta.m attano cha.labhi~n~nabhaava.m dassento  ^b^``pubbenivaasa.m jaanaamii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^pubbenivaasa.m  jaanaamii^eb^ti attano paresa~nca pubbenivaasa.m atiitaasu jaatiisu  nibbattakkhandhe khandhapa.tibaddhe ca pubbenivaasa~naa.nena hatthatale aamalaka.m  viya paccakkhato jaanaami bujjhaami. ^b^dibbacakkhu  visodhita^eb^nti dibbacakkhu~naa.na.m visodhita.m, pakaticakkhunaa aapaathagata.m  pakatiruupa.m viya dibba.m maanusampi duura.m tiro.t.thita.m atisukhuma~nca ruupa.m  vibhaavetu.m samattha~naa.na.m bhaavanaaya mayaa visuddha.m katvaa pa.tiladdhanti  attho. ^b^iddhimaa^eb^ti adhi.t.thaaniddhivikubbaniddhiaadiihi iddhiihi  iddhimaa, iddhividha~naa.nalaabhiiti attho. saraagaadibhedassa paresa.m  cittassa jaananato ^b^paracitta~n~nuu,^eb^ cetopariya~naa.nalaabhiiti vutta.m  hoti. ^b^dibbasota~nca paapu.ni^eb^nti dibbasota~naa.na~nca pa.tilabhi.m.
text.6519: [03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ^b^me attho anuppatto, sabbasa.myojanakkhayo^eb^ti yo  sabbesa.m sa.myojanaana.m khayabhuuto khayena ^a^V2.0074^ea^ vaa laddhabbo, so sadattho  paramattho ca mayaa ariyamaggaadhigamena adhigatoti. evametaaya  gaathaaya therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m ahosiiti veditabbo.
text.6522: [03] ^b^atihitaa^eb^ ^a^P2.0163^ea^ ^b^viihii^eb^tiaadikaa  aayasmato tekicchakaarittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto ito  ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patvaa vejjasatthe nipphatti.m gato. vipassissa bhagavato  upa.t.thaaka.m asoka.m naama thera.m byaadhita.m arogamakaasi, a~n~nesa~nca sattaana.m  rogaabhibhuutaana.m anukampaaya bhesajja.m sa.mvidahi.
text.6523: [03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  subuddhassa naama braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. tassa  tikicchakehi gabbhakaale parissaya.m apaharitvaa paripaalitataaya  ^b^tekicchakaarii^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so attano kulaanuruupaani  vijjaa.t.thaanaani sippaani ca sikkhanto va.d.dhati. tadaa caa.nakko  subuddhassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m kiriyaasu upaayakosalla~nca disvaa, ``aya.m  imasmi.m raajakule pati.t.tha.m labhanto ma.m abhibhaveyyaa''ti issaapakato  ra~n~naa candaguttena ta.m bandhanaagaare khipaapesi. tekicchakaarii pitu  bandhanaagaarappavesana.m sutvaa bhiito palaayitvaa saa.navaasittherassa santika.m  gantvaa attano sa.mvegakaara.na.m therassa kathetvaa pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m  gahetvaa abbhokaasiko nesajjiko ca hutvaa viharati, siitu.nha.m  aga.nento ^a^M2.0086^ea^ sama.nadhammameva karoti, visesato  brahmavihaarabhaavanamanuyu~njati. ta.m disvaa maaro paapimaa ``na imassa  mama visaya.m atikkamitu.m dassaamii''ti vikkhepa.m kaatukaamo sassaana.m  nipphattikaale khettagopakava.n.nena therassa santika.m gantvaa ta.m  nippa.n.dento --
text.6526: [22] na ca labhe pi.n.da.m, kathamaha.m kassa''nti.. -- aaha.  ta.m sutvaa thero --
text.6528: [21] ``buddhamappameyya.m ^a^V2.0075^ea^ anussara pasanno, piitiyaa phu.tasariiro  hohisi satatamudaggo..
text.653: [03] ^b^pa~nca^eb^ ^a^P1.0065^ea^ ^b^chinde pa~nca jahe^eb^ti  aayasmato ku.n.dadhaanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? so kira  padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe uppanno vayappatto  he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaaraa eka.m  bhikkhu.m pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m disvaa ta.m  .thaanantara.m patthetvaa tadanuruupa.m pu~n~na.m karonto vicari. so ekadivasa.m  padumuttarassa bhagavato nirodhasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya nisinnassa  manosilaacu.n.napi~njara.m mahanta.m kadaliphalaka.n.nika.m upanesi, ta.m bhagavaa  pa.tiggahetvaa paribhu~nji. so tena pu~n~nakammena ekaadasakkhattu.m devesu  devarajja.m kaaresi. catuviisativaare raajaa ahosi cakkavattii. eva.m  so punappuna.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto  kassapabuddhakaale bhummadevataa hutvaa nibbatti. diighaayukabuddhaana~nca  ^a^M1.0077^ea^ naama  na anvaddhamaasiko uposatho hoti. tathaa hi vipassissa bhagavato  chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi. kassapadasabalo pana  cha.t.the cha.t.the maase paatimokkha.m osaaresi. tassa paatimokkhassa  osaara.nakaale disaavaasikaa dve sahaayakaa bhikkhuu ``uposatha.m  karissaamaa''ti gacchanti.
text.6535: [22] maa siitena pareto viha~n~nittho, pavisa tva.m vihaara.m  phusitagga.la''nti.. --
text.6538: [21] ``phusissa.m catasso appama~n~naayo, taahi ca sukhito  viharissa.m.
text.6539: [22] naaha.m siitena viha~n~nissa.m, ani~njito viharanto''ti..  -- aaha.
text.654: [03] aya.m bhummadevataa cintesi -- ``imesa.m dvinna.m bhikkhuuna.m metti  ativiya da.lhaa, ki.m nu kho, bhedake sati bhijjeyya, na  bhijjeyyaa''ti, saa tesa.m okaasa.m olokayamaanaa tesa.m aviduureneva  gacchati. atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattaciivara.m datvaa  sariirava.la~njanattha.m udakaphaasuka.t.thaana.m ^a^V1.0064^ea^ gantvaa dhotahatthapaado hutvaa  gumbasamiipato nikkhamati bhummadevataa tassa therassa pacchato  uttamaruupaa itthii hutvaa kese vidhunitvaa sa.mvidhaaya sambandhantii viya  ^a^P1.0066^ea^ pi.t.thiya.m pa.msu.m pu~nchamaanaa viya saa.taka.m sa.mvidhaaya  nivaasayamaanaa viya ca hutvaa therassa padaanupadikaa hutvaa gumbato  nikkhantaa. ekamante .thito sahaayakatthero ta.m kaara.na.m disvaava  domanassajaato ``na.t.tho daani me iminaa bhikkhunaa saddhi.m  diigharattaanugato sineho, sacaaha.m eva.mvidhabhaava.m jaaneyya.m, ettaka.m addhaana.m  iminaa saddhi.m vissaasa.m na kareyya''nti cintetvaa aagacchantassevassa,  ``handaavuso, tuyha.m pattaciivara.m, taadisena paapena saddhi.m ekamagga.m  naagacchaamii''ti aaha. ta.m katha.m sutvaa tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadaya.m  tikhi.nasatti.m gahetvaa viddha.m viya ahosi. tato na.m aaha --  ``aavuso, ki.m naameta.m vadasi, aha.m ettaka.m kaala.m dukka.tamattampi  aapatti.m na jaanaami. tva.m pana ma.m ajja `paapo'ti vadasi, ki.m te  di.t.tha''nti. ``ki.m a~n~nena di.t.thena, ki.m tva.m eva.mvidhena  ala"nkatapa.tiyattena maatugaamena saddhi.m eka.t.thaane hutvaa nikkhanto''ti.  ``nattheta.m, aavuso, mayha.m, naaha.m evaruupa.m maatugaama.m passaamii''ti.  tassa yaavatatiya.m kathentassaapi itaro thero katha.m asaddahitvaa attanaa  di.t.thakaara.na.myeva bhuutatta.m katvaa ga.nhanto tena saddhi.m ekamaggena agantvaa  a~n~nena ^a^M1.0078^ea^ maggena satthu santika.m gato. itaropi bhikkhu a~n~nena  maggena satthu santika.myeva gato.
text.6540: [03] tattha ^b^atihitaa viihii^eb^ti viihayo ko.t.thaagaara.m atinetvaa  .thapitaa, tattha pa.tisaamitaa khalato vaa ghara.m upaniitaati attho.  viihiggaha.nena cettha itarampi dha~n~na.m sa"nga.nhaati. saalii pana yebhuyyena  viihito ^a^M2.0087^ea^ pacchaa paccantiiti aaha. ^b^khalagataa saalii^eb^ti khala.m  dha~n~nakara.na.t.thaana.m gataa, tattha raasivasena maddanacaavanaadivasena .thitaati  attho. padhaanadha~n~nabhaavadassanattha~ncettha saaliina.m visu.m gaha.na.m,  ubhayenapi gaame, gaamato bahi ca dha~n~na.m paripu.n.na.m .thitanti dasseti.  ^b^na ca labhe pi.n.da^eb^nti eva.m sulabhadha~n~ne subhikkhakaale aha.m  pi.n.damattampi na labhaami. idaani ^b^kathamaha.m kassa^eb^nti aha.m katha.m  karissaami, katha.m jiivissaamiiti parihaasake.li.m akaasi.
text.6541: [03] ta.m sutvaa thero ``aya.m varaako attanaa attano pavatti.m mayha.m  pakaasesi, mayaa pana attanaava attaa ovaditabbo, na mayaa ki~nci  kathetabba''nti vatthuttayaanussatiya.m attaana.m niyojento  ^b^``buddhamappameyya''^eb^ntiaadinaa tisso gaathaa abhaasi. tattha  ^b^buddhamappameyya.m anussara pasanno^eb^ti savaasanaaya avijjaaniddaaya  accantavigamena, buddhiyaa ca vikasitabhaavena buddha.m bhagavanta.m  pamaa.nakaraana.m raagaadikilesaana.m abhaavaa aparimaa.nagu.nasama"ngitaaya  appameyyapu~n~nakkhettataaya ca appameyya.m. okappanalakkha.nena  abhippasaadena pasanno, pasannamaanaso ``itipi so bhagavaa araha.m  sammaasambuddho''tiaadinaa (ma0 ni0 1.74; sa.m0 ni0   5.997) anussara anu anu buddhaaramma.na.m sati.m pavattehi, piitiyaa  phu.tasariiro hohisi. ^b^satatamudaggo^eb^ti anussarantova  phara.nalakkha.naaya piitiyaa satata.m sabbadaa phu.tasariiro  piitisamu.t.thaanapa.niitaruupehi ajjhottha.tasariiro ubbegapiitiyaa ^a^P2.0165^ea^  udaggo kaaya.m udagga.m katvaa aakaasa.m la"nghitu.m samattho ca  bhaveyyaasi, buddhaanussatiyaa buddhaaramma.na.m u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m  pa.tisa.mvedeyyaasi. yato siitu.nhehi viya jighacchaapipaasaahipi  anabhibhuuto hohisiiti attho.
text.6542: [03] ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ^a^V2.0076^ea^ ariya.m lokuttaradhamma.m. ^b^sa"ngha^eb^nti ariya.m  paramatthasa"ngha.m. sesa.m vuttanayameva. ^b^anussaraa^eb^ti panettha  ``svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo''tiaadinaa dhamma.m, ``suppa.tipanno  bhagavato saavakasa"ngho''tiaadinaa sa"ngha.m anussaraati yojetabba.m.
text.6543: [03] eva.m therena ratanattayagu.naanussara.ne niyojanavasena attani  ovadite puna maaro vivekavaasato na.m vivecetukaamo hitesiibhaava.m ^a^M2.0088^ea^ viya  dassento ^b^``abbhokaase viharasii''^eb^ti pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha.  tassattho -- tva.m, bhikkhu, ^b^abbhokaase^eb^ kenaci apa.ticchanne  viva.ta"nga.ne ^b^viharasi^eb^ iriyaapathe kappesi. ^b^hemantikaa^eb^  himapaatasamaye pariyaapannaa imaa siitaa rattiyo vattanti. tasmaa  siitena ^b^pareto^eb^ abhibhuuto hutvaa ^b^maa viha~n~nittho^eb^ vighaata.m maa  aapajji maa kilami. ^b^phusitagga.la.m^eb^ pihitakavaa.ta.m senaasana.m  pavisa, eva.m te sukhavihaaro bhavissatiiti.
text.6544: [03] ta.m sutvaa thero ``na mayha.m senaasanapariyesanaaya payojana.m,  etthevaaha.m sukhavihaarii''ti dassento ^b^``phusissa''^eb^ntiaadinaa  cha.t.tha.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^phusissa.m catasso appama~n~naayo^eb^ti  appamaa.nagocarataaya ``appama~n~naa''ti laddhavohaare cattaaro brahmavihaare  phusissa.m phusissaami, kaalena kaala.m samaapajjissaami. ^b^taahi ca  sukhito viharissa^eb^nti taahi appama~n~naahi sukhito sa~njaatasukho  hutvaa viharissa.m cattaaropi iriyaapathe kappessaamiiti. tena mayha.m  sabbakaale sukhameva, na dukkha.m. ^b^yato naaha.m siitena viha~n~nissa.m^eb^  antara.t.thakepi himapaatasamaye aha.m siitena na kilamissaami, tasmaa  ^b^ani~njito viharanto^eb^ cittassa i~njitakaara.naana.m byaapaadaadiina.m  suppahiinattaa paccayuppanni~njanaaya ca abhaavato samaapattisukheneva sukhito  viharissaamiiti. eva.m thero ima.m gaatha.m vadantoyeva vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa  arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.18.39-44) --
text.655: [01] tato bhikkhusa"nghassa uposathaagaara.m pavisanavelaaya so  bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m uposathagge sa~njaanitvaa, ``imasmi.m uposathagge  evaruupo naama paapabhikkhu atthi, naaha.m tena saddhi.m uposatha.m  karissaamii''ti nikkhamitvaa bahi a.t.thaasi. atha bhummadevataa  ``bhaariya.m mayaa kamma.m kata''nti mahallakaupaasakava.n.nena tassa santika.m  gantvaa ``kasmaa, bhante, ayyo imasmi.m .thaane .thito''ti aaha.  ``upaasaka, ima.m uposathagga.m eko paapabhikkhu pavi.t.tho, `naaha.m ^a^P1.0067^ea^  tena saddhi.m uposatha.m karomii'ti bahi .thitomhii''ti.  ``bhante, maa eva.m ga.nhatha, parisuddhasiilo esa bhikkhu. tumhehi  di.t.thamaatugaamo naama aha.m, mayaa tumhaaka.m viima.msanatthaaya `da.lhaa nu kho  imesa.m theraana.m metti, no da.lhaa'ti bhijjanaabhijjanabhaava.m olokentena  ta.m kamma.m kata''nti. ``ko pana, tva.m sappurisaa''ti? ``aha.m ekaa  bhummadevataa, bhante''ti devaputto kathento dibbaanubhaavena .thatvaa therassa  paadesu nipatitvaa ``mayha.m, bhante, khamatha, eta.m dosa.m thero na  jaanaati, uposatha.m karothaa''ti thera.m yaacitvaa uposathagga.m pavesesi.  so thero uposatha.m taava eka.t.thaane akaasi, mittasanthavavasena pana puna  tena saddhi.m na eka.t.thaane ahosiiti. imassa therassa kamma.m na  kathiiyati, cuditakatthero pana aparaapara.m vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto  arahatta.m paapu.ni.
text.6556: [03] ettha ca bindusaarara~n~no kaale imassa therassa uppannattaa  tatiyasa"ngiitiya.m imaa gaathaa sa"ngiitaati veditabbaa.
text.6559: [01] ^b^yassa sabrahmacaariisuu^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  mahaanaagattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto  kakusandhassa bhagavato kaale ^a^P2.0166^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m kakusandha.m bhagavanta.m ara~n~na.m ajjhogaahetvaa  a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule jhaanasukhena nisinna.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  tassa daa.limaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu  sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saakete madhuvaase.t.thassa naama braahma.nassa  putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^mahaanaago^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so  vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavati saakete a~njanavane viharante aayasmato  gavampatittherassa paa.tihaariya.m disvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho therasseva santike  pabbajitvaa tassovaade .thatvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.1-7) --
text.656: [03] bhummadevataa ^a^V1.0065^ea^ tassa kammassa nissandena eka.m buddhantara.m  apaayabhayato na muccittha. sace pana kismi~nci kaale manussatta.m  aagacchati, a~n~nena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari patati.  so amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti.  ``dhaanamaa.navo''tissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto tayo vede  ugga.nhitvaa mahallakakaale satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho  pabbaji, tassa upasampannadivasato pa.t.thaaya ekaa ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa itthii  tasmi.m gaama.m ^a^M1.0079^ea^ pavisante saddhi.myeva gaama.m pavisati, nikkhamante  nikkhamati. vihaara.m pavisantepi saddhi.m pavisati, ti.t.thantepi  ti.t.thatiiti eva.m niccaanubandhaa pa~n~naayati. thero ta.m na passati.  tassa puna purimakammanissandena saa a~n~nesa.m upa.t.thaati. gaame yaagu.m  bhikkha~nca dadamaanaa itthiyo ``bhante, aya.m eko yaaguu.lu"nko  tumhaaka.m, eko imissaa amhaaka.m sahaayikaayaa''ti parihaasa.m karonti.  therassa mahatii vihesaa hoti. vihaaragatampi na.m saama.neraa ceva  daharaa bhikkhuu ca parivaaretvaa ``dhaano ko.n.do jaato''ti parihaasa.m  karonti. athassa teneva ^a^P1.0068^ea^ kaara.nena  ^b^ku.n.dadhaanatthero^eb^ti naama.m jaata.m. so u.t.thaaya samu.t.thaaya tehi  kariyamaana.m ke.li.m sahitu.m asakkonto ummaada.m gahetvaa ``tumhe ko.n.daa,  tumhaaka.m upajjhaayo ko.n.do, aacariyo ko.n.do''ti vadati. atha na.m  satthu aarocesu.m ``ku.n.dadhaano, bhante, daharasaama.nerehi saddhi.m eva.m  pharusavaaca.m vadatii''ti. satthaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m,  dhaana, saama.nerehi saddhi.m pharusavaaca.m vadasii''ti vatvaa tena ``sacca.m  bhagavaa''ti vutte ``kasmaa eva.m vadesii''ti aaha. ``bhante, nibaddha.m  vihesa.m asahanto eva.m kathemii''ti. ``tva.m pubbe katakamma.m  yaavajjadivasaa jiiraapetu.m na sakkosi, puna evaruupa.m pharusa.m maavadii  bhikkhuu''ti vatvaa aaha --
text.6569: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa vimuttisukhena viharanto thero chabbaggiye  bhikkhuu sabrahmacaariisu gaarava.m akatvaa viharante disvaa tesa.m  ovaadadaanavasena --
text.6575: [22] na viruuhati saddhamme, khette biija.mva puutika.m..
text.658: [22] dukkhaa hi saarambhakathaa, pa.tida.n.daa phuseyyu ta.m..
text.6581: [22] na vihaayati saddhammaa, maccho bavhodake yathaa..
text.6584: [22] so viruuhati saddhamme, khette biija.mva bhaddaka.m..
text.6589: [03] tattha ^b^sabrahmacaariisuu^eb^ti samaana.m brahma.m siilaadidhamma.m  carantiiti sabrahmacaarino, siiladi.t.thisaama~n~nagataa sahadhammikaa, tesu.  ^b^gaaravo^eb^ti garubhaavo siilaadigu.nanimitta.m garukara.na.m.  ^b^nuupalabbhatii^eb^ti na vijjati na pavattati, na upati.t.thatiiti attho.  ^b^nibbaanaa^eb^ti kilesaana.m nibbaapanato kilesakkhayaati attho.  ^b^dhammaraajassaa^eb^ti satthuno. satthaa hi sadevaka.m loka.m yathaaraha.m  lokiyalokuttarena dhammena ra~njeti tosetiiti ^b^dhammaraajaa^eb^. ettha  ca ``dhammaraajassa saasane''ti iminaa nibbaana.m naama dhammaraajasseva  saasane ^a^P2.0167^ea^, na a~n~nattha. tattha yo sabrahmacaariisu ^a^M2.0091^ea^  gaaravarahito, so yathaa nibbaanaa aarakaa hoti, tathaa dhammaraajassa  saasanatopi aarakaa hotiiti dasseti. ^b^bavhodake^eb^ti bahuudake.  ^b^santike hoti nibbaana^eb^nti nibbaana.m tassa santike samiipe eva  hoti. sesa.m vuttanayameva. imaa eva ca therassa a~n~naabyaakara.nagaathaa  ahesu.m.
text.6592: [03] ^b^kullo sivathika^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato kullattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu ^a^V2.0079^ea^ kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m ku.tumbiyakule  nibbattitvaa ^b^kullo^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santike  dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so ca raagacaritattaa  tibbaraagajaatiko hoti. tenassa abhikkha.na.m kilesaa citta.m  pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. athassa satthaa cittaacaara.m ~natvaa asubhakamma.t.thaana.m  datvaa, ``kulla, tayaa abhi.nha.m susaane caarikaa caritabbaa''ti aaha.  so susaana.m pavisitvaa uddhumaatakaadiini taani taani asubhaani disvaa  ta.m muhutta.m asubhamanasikaara.m uppaadetvaa susaanato nikkhantamattova  kaamaraagena abhibhuyyati. puna bhagavaa tassa ta.m pavatti.m ~natvaa  ekadivasa.m tassa susaana.t.thaana.m gatakaale eka.m taru.nitthiruupa.m adhunaa mata.m  avina.t.thacchavi.m nimminitvaa dasseti. tassa ta.m di.t.thamattassa  jiivamaanavisabhaagavatthusmi.m viya sahasaa raago uppajjati. atha na.m  satthaa tassa pekkhantasseva navahi va.namukhehi paggharamaanaasuci.m  kimikulaakula.m ativiya biibhaccha.m duggandha.m jeguccha.m pa.tikkuula.m katvaa  dassesi. so ta.m pekkhanto virattacitto hutvaa a.t.thaasi. athassa  bhagavaa obhaasa.m pharitvaa sati.m janento --
text.6595: [25] aaha ^a^M2.0092^ea^. ta.m sutvaa thero sammadeva sariirasabhaava.m  upadhaarento asubhasa~n~na.m pa.tilabhitvaa tattha pa.thama.m jhaana.m nibbattetvaa ta.m  paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.nitvaa attano pa.tipatti.m  paccavekkhitvaa --
text.660: [22] esa pattosi nibbaana.m, saarambho te na vijjatii''ti..  (dha0 pa0 133-134).
text.6605: [21] ``yathaa ida.m tathaa eta.m, yathaa eta.m tathaa ida.m.
text.6606: [22] yathaa adho tathaa uddha.m, yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho..

text.661: [03] ima~nca pana tassa therassa maatugaamena saddhi.m vicara.nabhaava.m  kosalara~n~nopi kathayi.msu. raajaa ``gacchatha, bha.ne, viima.msathaa''ti  pesetvaa sayampi mandeneva parivaarena therassa vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa  ekamante olokento a.t.thaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne thero suucikamma.m  karonto nisinno hoti, saapi itthii aviduure .thaane .thitaa viya  pa~n~naayati. raajaa disvaa ``atthida.m kaara.na''nti tassaa ^a^V1.0066^ea^ .thita.t.thaana.m  agamaasi. saa tasmi.m aagacchante therassa vasanapa.n.nasaala.m pavi.t.thaa  viya ahosi. raajaapi taaya saddhi.m tameva pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa  sabbattha olokento adisvaa ^a^M1.0080^ea^ ``naaya.m maatugaamo, therassa eko  kammavipaako''ti sa~n~na.m katvaa pa.thama.m therassa samiipena gacchantopi thera.m  avanditvaa tassa kaara.nassa abhuutabhaava.m ~natvaa aagamma thera.m vanditvaa  ekamanta.m nisinno ``kacci, bhante, pi.n.dakena na kilamathaa''ti  pucchi. thero ``va.t.tati, mahaaraajaa''ti aaha. ``jaanaamaha.m, bhante,  ayyassa katha.m, evaruupena parikkilesena saddhi.m carantaana.m tumhaaka.m ke  naama pasiidissanti, ito pa.t.thaaya vo katthaci gamanakicca.m natthi, aha.m  ^a^P1.0069^ea^ catuuhi paccayehi tumhe upa.t.thahissaami, tumhe yoniso  manasikaare maa pamajjitthaa''ti nibaddhabhikkha.m pa.t.thapesi. thero raajaana.m  upatthambhaka.m labhitvaa bhojanasappaayena ekaggacitto hutvaa vipassana.m  va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tato pa.t.thaaya saa itthii antaradhaayi.
text.6614: [03] tattha ^a^V2.0080^ea^ ^b^kullo^eb^ti attaanameva thero para.m viya katvaa vadati.
text.6615: [03] ^b^aatura^eb^nti naanappakaarehi dukkhehi abhi.nha.m pa.tipii.lita.m.  ^b^asuci^eb^nti sucirahita.m jeguccha.m pa.tikkuula.m. ^b^puuti^eb^nti  duggandha.m. ^b^passaa^eb^ti sabhaavato olokehi. ^b^kullaa^eb^ti  ovaadakaale bhagavaa thera.m aalapati. udaanakaale pana thero sayameva  attaana.m vadati. ^b^samussaya^eb^nti sariira.m. ^b^uggharanta^eb^nti uddha.m  va.namukhehi asuci.m savanta.m. ^b^paggharanta^eb^nti adho va.namukhehi  samantato ca asuci.m savanta.m. ^b^baalaana.m abhinandita^eb^nti baalehi  andhaputhujjanehi di.t.thita.nhaabhinandanaahi ``aha.m mama''nti abhinivissa  nandita.m.
text.6616: [03] ^b^dhammaadaasa^eb^nti dhammamaya.m aadaasa.m. yathaa hi sattaa  adaasena attano mukhe kaaye vaa gu.nadose passanti, eva.m yogaavacaro  yena attabhaave ^a^M2.0093^ea^ sa.mkilesavodaanadhamme yaathaavato passati, ta.m  vipassanaa~naa.na.m idha ``dhammaadaasa''nti vutta.m. ta.m ~naa.nadassanassa  magga~naa.nasa"nkhaatassa dhammacakkhussa adhigamaaya attano santaane  uppaadetvaa. ^b^paccavekkhi.m ima.m kaaya^eb^nti ima.m karajakaaya.m  niccasaaraadivirahato ^b^tuccha.m^eb^ attaparasantaanaana.m vibhaagato  ^b^santarabaahira.m^eb^ ~naa.nacakkhunaa patiavekkhi.m passi.m.
text.6617: [03] yathaa pana paccavekkhi.m, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``yathaa ida''^eb^ntiaadi  vutta.m. tattha ^b^yathaa ida.m tathaa eta^eb^nti yathaa ida.m mayha.m  sariirasa"nkhaata.m asubha.m aayuusmaavi~n~naa.naana.m anapagamaa naanaavidha.m  maayopama.m kiriya.m dasseti, tathaava eta.m matasariira.m pubbe tesa.m dhammaana.m  anapagamaa ahosi. yathaa eta.m etarahi matasariira.m tesa.m dhammaana.m  apagamaa na ki~nci kiriya.m dasseti, tathaa ida.m mama sariirampi tesa.m  dhammaana.m apagamaa nassatevaati. yathaa ca ida.m mama sariira.m etarahi  susaane na mata.m na sayita.m, na uddhumaatakaadibhaava.m upagata.m, tathaa eta.m  etarahi matasariirampi pubbe ^a^P2.0169^ea^ ahosi. yathaa paneta.m  etarahi matasariira.m susaane sayita.m uddhumaatakaadibhaava.m upagata.m, tathaa ida.m  mama sariirampi bhavissati. atha vaa yathaa ida.m mama sariira.m asuci  duggandha.m jeguccha.m pa.tikkuula.m anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa, tathaa eta.m  matasariirampi. yathaa vaa eta.m matasariira.m asuciaadisabhaava~nceva  aniccaadisabhaava~nca, tathaa ida.m mama sariirampi. ^b^yathaa adho tathaa  uddha^eb^nti yathaa naabhito adho he.t.thaa aya.m kaayo asuci duggandho  jeguccho pa.tikkuulo anicco dukkho anattaa ca, tathaa uddha.m naabhito  upari asuciaadisabhaavo ca. ^b^yathaa uddha.m tathaa adho^eb^ti yathaa  ca naabhito, uddha.m asuciaadisabhaavo, tathaa adho naabhito he.t.thaapi.
text.6618: [03] ^b^yathaa^eb^ ^a^V2.0081^ea^ ^b^divaa tathaa ratti^eb^nti yathaa aya.m kaayo divaa  ``akkhimhaa akkhiguuthako''tiaadinaa (su0 ni0 199) asuci  paggharati, tathaa rattimpi. ^b^yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa^eb^ti yathaa ca  ratti.m aya.m kaayo asuci paggharati, tathaa divaapi, nayimassa  kaalavibhaagena a~n~nathaabhaavoti attho. ^b^yathaa pure tathaa pacchaa^eb^ti  yathaa aya.m kaayo pure pubbe taru.nakaale asuci duggandho jeguccho  pa.tikkuulo, tathaa ca pacchaa ji.n.nakaale. yathaa ca pacchaa ji.n.nakaale  asuciaadisabhaavo, tathaa pure taru.nakaalepi ^a^M2.0094^ea^. yathaa vaa pure  atiitakaale savi~n~naa.nakaale asuciaadisabhaavo ca aniccaadisabhaavo  ca, tathaa pacchaa anaagatakaale avi~n~naa.nakaaleti evampettha attho  veditabbo.
text.6619: [03] ^b^pa~nca"ngikena turiyenaa^eb^ti ``aatata.m vitata.m aatatavitata.m  ghana.m susiira''nti eva.m pa~nca"ngikena pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagatena  turiyena paricariyamaanassa kaamasukhasama"ngino issarajanassa  ^b^taadisii^eb^ tathaaruupaa ^b^rati^eb^ sukhassaado na hoti. ^b^yathaa  ekaggacittassa, sammaa dhamma.m vipassato^eb^ti samathavipassana.m yuganaddha.m  katvaa indriyaana.m ekarasabhaavena viithipa.tipannaaya vipassanaaya khandhaana.m  udayabbaya.m passantassa yogaavacarassa yaadisaa dhammarati, tassaa  kalampi kaamarati na upetiiti. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
text.662: [03] tadaa mahaasubhaddaa ugganagare micchaadi.t.thikakule vasamaanaa  ``satthaa ma.m anukampatuu''ti uposatha.m adhi.t.thaaya niraamagandhaa hutvaa  uparipaasaadatale .thitaa ``imaani pupphaani antare a.t.thatvaa dasabalassa  matthake vitaana.m hutvaa ti.t.thantu, dasabalo imaaya sa~n~naaya sve pa~ncahi  bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhatuu''ti saccakiriya.m katvaa a.t.tha  sumanapupphamu.t.thiyo vissajjesi. pupphaani gantvaa dhammadesanaavelaaya  satthu matthake vitaana.m hutvaa a.t.tha.msu. satthaa ta.m sumanapupphavitaana.m  disvaa citteneva subhaddaaya bhikkha.m adhivaasetvaa punadivase aru.ne  u.t.thite aanandatthera.m aaha -- ``aananda, maya.m ajja duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m  gamissaama, puthujjanaana.m adatvaa ariyaana.myeva salaaka.m dehii''ti. thero  bhikkhuuna.m aarocesi -- ``aavuso, satthaa ajja duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m  gamissati, puthujjanaa maa ga.nhantu, ariyaava salaaka.m ga.nhantuu''ti.  ku.n.dadhaanatthero ``aahara, aavuso salaaka''nti pa.thama.myeva hattha.m  pasaaresi. aanando ``satthaa taadisaana.m bhikkhuuna.m salaaka.m na  daapeti, ariyaana.myeva daapetii''ti vitakka.m uppaadetvaa gantvaa satthu  aarocesi. satthaa ``aaharaapentassa salaaka.m dehii''ti aaha. thero  cintesi -- ``sace ku.n.dadhaanassa salaakaa daatu.m na yuttaa, atha satthaa  pa.tibaaheyya, bhavissati ettha kaara.na''nti ``ku.n.dadhaanassa aananda, satthaa ma.m jaanaati, maadisa.m bhikkhu.m pa.thama.m  salaaka.m ga.nhanta.m na satthaa nivaaretii''ti hattha.m pasaaretvaa salaaka.m ga.nhi.  satthaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m
