text.710: [03] ^b^middhii^eb^ ^a^M1.0085^ea^ ^b^yadaa^eb^ti aayasmato daasakattherassa  gaathaa. kaa  uppatti? so kira ito ekanavute kappe anuppanne tathaagate ajitassa  naama paccekabuddhassa gandhamaadanato manussapatha.m otaritvaa a~n~natarasmi.m  gaame pi.n.daaya carantassa manoramaani ambaphalaani adaasi. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapassa bhagavato kaale saasane  pabbajitvaa viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m pu~n~na.m akaasi. eva.m  kusalakammappasuto hutvaa sugatito ^a^P1.0073^ea^ sugati.m  upagacchanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kulagehe nibbatti.  ^b^daasako^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so anaathapi.n.dikena gahapatinaa  vihaarapa.tijagganakamme .thapito sakkacca.m vihaara.m pa.tijagganto abhi.nha.m  buddhadassanena dhammassavanena ca pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. keci pana  bha.nanti -- ``aya.m kassapassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vayappatto a~n~natara.m khii.naasavatthera.m upa.t.thahanto ki~nci kamma.m  kaaraapetukaamo thera.m aa.naapesi. so tena kammena amhaaka.m bhagavato  kaale saavatthiya.m anaathapi.n.dikassa daasiyaa kucchimhi nibbatto  vayappatto se.t.thinaa vihaarapa.tijaggane .thapito vuttanayeneva pa.tiladdhasaddho  ahosi. mahaase.t.thi tassa siilaacaara.m ajjhaasaya~nca ~natvaa bhujissa.m  katvaa `yathaasukha.m pabbajaa'ti aaha. ta.m bhikkhuu pabbaajesu''nti.  so pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya kusiito hiinaviiriyo hutvaa na ki~nci  vattapa.tivatta.m karoti, kuto sama.nadhamma.m, kevala.m yaavadattha.m bhu~njitvaa  niddaabahulo viharati. dhammassavanakaalepi eka.m ko.na.m pavisitvaa  parisapariyante nisinno ghurughurupassaasii niddaayateva. athassa bhagavaa  pubbuupanissaya.m oloketvaa sa.mvegajananattha.m ^b^``middhii yadaa hoti  mahagghaso caa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.
text.7100: [22] anoggatasmi.m suuriyasmi.m, tato citta.m vimucci me..
text.7103: [22] ehi bhaddaati ma.m aaha, saa me aasuupasampadaa..
text.7108: [03] tattha ^b^vatacariyaahii^eb^ti, ``eva.m katvaa putta.m labhissathaa''ti  vutta.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m vacana.m sutvaa, khiira.m paayitvaa,  anasanaadivatacara.nehi. ^b^aayaacanaahii^eb^ti devataayaacanaahi  satthuaayaacanaaya ca, idameva cettha kaara.na.m, itara.m thero maataapituuna.m  pa.tipattidassanattha~nceva kicchaladdhabhaavadassanattha~nca vadati.
text.711: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^middhii^eb^ti thinamiddhaabhibhuuto, ya~nhi  middha.m abhibhavati, ta.m thinampi abhibhavateva. ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m  kaale. ^b^mahagghaso^eb^ti mahaabhojano,  aaharahatthakaala.msaa.takatatthava.t.takakaakamaasakabhuttavamitakaana.m ^a^V1.0071^ea^ a~n~nataro  viya. ^b^niddaayitaa^eb^ti supanasiilo. ^b^samparivattasaayii^eb^ti  samparivattaka.m samparivattaka.m nipajjitvaa ubhayenapi seyyasukha.m passasukha.m  middhasukha.m ^a^M1.0086^ea^ anuyuttoti dasseti. ^b^nivaapapu.t.tho^eb^ti ku.n.dakaadinaa  suukarabhattena pu.t.tho bharito. gharasuukaro hi baalakaalato pa.t.thaaya  posiyamaano thuulasariirakaale gehaa bahi nikkhamitu.m alabhanto  he.t.thaama~ncaadiisu ^a^P1.0074^ea^ samparivattetvaa samparivattetvaa  sayateva. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yadaa puriso middhii ca hoti  mahagghaso ca nivaapapu.t.tho mahaavaraaho viya a~n~nena iriyaapathena yaapetu.m  asakkonto niddaayanasiilo samparivattasaayii, tadaa so ``anicca.m  dukkha.m anattaa''ti tii.ni lakkha.naani manasikaatu.m na sakkoti. tesa.m  amanasikaaraa mandapa~n~no punappuna.m gabbha.m upeti, gabbhaavaasato na  parimuccatevaati. ta.m sutvaa daasakatthero sa.mvegajaato vipassana.m  pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 2.51.74, 80-84) --
text.7111: [03] ^b^hessatyaajaaniyo aya^eb^nti aya.m daarako mama saasane  aajaaniiyo bhavissati. tasmaa khippa.m ajjeva pabbaajehiiti eta.m  ^b^abravi,^eb^ aaha.
text.7112: [03] ^b^pabbaajetvaanaa^eb^ti aanandattherena pabbaajetvaa.  ^b^vihaara^eb^nti gandhaku.ti.m. ^b^anoggatasmi.m suuriyasmi^eb^nti  suuriye anattha"ngateyeva. ^b^tato citta.m vimucci me^eb^ti tato  vipassanaarambhato para.m na cireneva kha.nena sabbaasavehi me citta.m  vimucci, khii.naasavo ahosi.m.
text.7113: [03] ^b^tato^eb^ti mama aasavakkhayato pacchaa. ^b^niraakatvaa^eb^ti  attanaa samaapanna.m phalasamaapatti.m appetvaa tato vu.t.thaaya. tenaaha  ^b^``pa.tisallaanavu.t.thito''^eb^ti. ^b^saa me aasuupasampadaa^eb^ti yaa ma.m  uddissa ``ehi, bhaddaa''ti satthu vaacaa pavattaa, saa eva me mayha.m  upasampadaa aasi. eva.m ^b^jaatiyaa sattavassena, laddhaa me  upasampadaa^eb^ti saatisaya.m satthaaraa attano kata.m anuggaha.m saasanassa ca  niyyaanikata.m dasseti. tenaaha ^b^``aho dhammasudhammataa''^eb^ti.
text.7114: [03] ettha ca ``citta.m vimucci me''ti khii.naasavabhaava.m pakaasetvaapi  puna ^b^``tisso vijjaa anuppattaa''^eb^ti lokiyaabhi~n~nekadesadassana.m  cha.labhi~n~nabhaavavibhaavanattha.m. tenaaha apadaane ``cha.labhi~n~naa  sacchikataa''ti.
text.7117: [03] ^b^disvaa^eb^ ^a^V2.0117^ea^ ^a^P2.0201^ea^  ^b^paasaadachaayaaya^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato sopaakattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule  nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.naana.m vijjaasippesu nipphatti.m gato  kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa  ekasmi.m ^a^M2.0136^ea^ pabbate viharati. satthaa aasannamara.na.m ta.m ~natvaa tassa  santika.m agamaasi. so bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannacitto u.laara.m  piitisomanassa.m pavedento pupphamaya.m aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa adaasi. satthaa  tattha nisiiditvaa, aniccataapa.tisa.myutta.m dhammi.m katha.m kathetvaa tassa  passantasseva aakaasena agamaasi. so pubbe gahita.m niccaggaaha.m  pahaaya aniccasa~n~na.m hadaye .thapetvaa, kaala"nkatvaa, devaloke uppajitvaa,  aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto, imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe  sopaakayoniya.m nibbatti. so jaatiaagatena ^b^sopaako^eb^ti naamena  pa~n~naayi. keci pana ``vaa.nijakule nibbatto, `sopaako'ti pana  naamamatta''nti vadanti. ta.m apadaanapaa.liyaa virujjhati ``pacchime  bhave sampatte, sopaakayonupaagami''nti vacanato.
text.7118: [03] tassa catumaasajaatassa pitaa kaalamakaasi, cuu.lapitaa posesi.  anukkamena sattavassiko jaato. ekadivasa.m cuu.lapitaa ``attano  puttena kalaha.m karotii''ti kujjhitvaa, ta.m susaana.m netvaa, dve hatthe  rajjuyaa ekato bandhitvaa, taaya eva rajjuyaa matamanussassa sariire  gaa.lha.m bandhitvaa gato ``si"ngaalaadayo khaadantuu''ti.  pacchimabhavikataaya daarakassa pu~n~naphalena saya.m maaretu.m na visahi,  si"ngaalaadayopi na abhibhavi.msu. daarako a.d.dharattasamaye eva.m  vippalapati --
text.7119: [21] ``kaa gati me agatissa, ko vaa bandhu abandhuno.
text.7121: [03] satthaa taaya velaaya veneyyabandhave olokento daarakassa  hadayabbhantare pajjalanta.m arahattuupanissaya.m disvaa obhaasa.m pharitvaa sati.m  janetvaa evamaaha --
text.7124: [03] daarako buddhaanubhaavena chinnabandhano gaathaapariyosaane sotaapanno  hutvaa gandhaku.tisammukhe a.t.thaasi. tassa maataa putta.m apassantii  cuu.lapitara.m pucchitvaa tenassa pavattiyaa akathitaaya tattha tattha ^a^P2.0202^ea^  gantvaa vicinantii ^a^M2.0137^ea^ ``buddhaa kira atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m  jaananti, ya.mnuunaaha.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa mama puttassa pavatti.m  jaaneyya''nti satthu santika.m agamaasi. satthaa, iddhiyaa ta.m  pa.ticchaadetvaa, ``bhante, mama putta.m na passaami, apica bhagavaa tassa  pavatti.m jaanaatii''ti taaya pu.t.tho --
text.7125: [21] ``na santi puttaa taa.naaya, na pitaa naapi bandhavaa.
text.7127: [25] dhamma.m kathesi. ta.m sutvaa saa sotaapannaa ahosi.  daarako arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.2.112-123) --
text.7129: [22] siddhattho naama bhagavaa, aagacchi mama santika.m..
text.7139: [22] ekaaha.m bhaavayitvaana, tattha kaala.m kato aha.m..
text.7149: [22] ta.m sa~n~na.m bhaavayantassa, patto me aasavakkhayo..
text.7151: [03] atha bhagavaa iddhi.m pa.tisa.mhari. saapi putta.m disvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho  tassa khii.naasavabhaava.m sutvaa pabbaajetvaa gataa. so satthaara.m  gandhaku.ticchaayaaya.m ca"nkamanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa, vanditvaa anuca"nkami.  tassa bhagavaa upasampada.m anujaanitukaamo ``eka.m naama  ki''ntiaadinaa dasa pa~nhe pucchi. sopi satthu adhippaaya.m ga.nhanto  sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nena sa.msandento ``sabbe sattaa aahaara.t.thitikaa''tiaadinaa  (khu0 paa0 4.1) te pa~nhe vissajjesi. teneva te kumaarapa~nhaa naama  jaataa. satthaa tassa pa~nhabyaakara.nena aaraadhitacitto upasampada.m  anujaani. tena saa pa~nhabyaakara.nuupasampadaa naama jaataa. tassima.m  attano pavatti.m pakaasetvaa thero a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
text.7159: [21] ``tato pa~nhe apucchi ma.m, pa~nhaana.m kovido viduu.
text.716: [21] ``ekanavute ito kappe, ya.m phala.m adadi.m tadaa.
text.7160: [22] acchambhii ca abhiito ca, byaakaasi.m satthuno aha.m..
text.7170: [22] esaa ceva te sopaaka, bhavatu upasampadaa'''..
text.7173: [22] dhaaremi antima.m deha.m, aho dhammasudhammataa''ti.. --  imaa gaathaa abhaasi.
text.7175: [03] ^b^sa.mharitvaana paa.nayo^eb^ti ubho hatthe kamalamaku.laakaarena  sa"ngate katvaa, a~njali.m paggahetvaati attho. ^b^anuca"nkamissa^eb^nti  ca"nkamantassa satthuno anupacchato anugamanavasena ca"nkami.m.  ^b^viraja^eb^nti vigataraagaadiraja.m.
text.7176: [03] ^b^pa~nhe^eb^ti kumaarapa~nhe. ^b^viduu^eb^ti veditabba.m viditavaa,  sabba~n~nuuti attho. ``satthaa ma.m pucchatii''ti uppajjanakassa  chambhitattassa bhayassa ca setughaatena pahiinattaa ^b^acchambhii^eb^ ca  ^b^abhiito^eb^ ca byaakaasi.
text.7177: [03] ^b^yesaaya^eb^nti yesa.m a"ngamagadhaana.m aya.m sopaako.  ^b^paccaya^eb^nti gilaanapaccaya.m. ^b^saamiici^eb^nti  maggadaanabiijanaadisaamiicikiriya.m.
text.7178: [03] ^b^ajjadagge^eb^ti da-kaaro padasandhikaro, ajja agge aadi.m  katvaa, ajja pa.t.thaaya. ``ajjatagge''tipi paa.li, ajjata.m aadi.m  katvaati attho. ^b^dassanaayopasa"nkamaa^eb^ti ``hiinajacco, vayasaa  taru.nataro''ti vaa acintetvaa dassanaaya ma.m upasa"nkama. ^b^esaa  cevaa^eb^ti yaa tassa mama sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nena saddhi.m sa.msandetvaa kataa  pa~nhavissajjanaa. esaayeva te bhavatu upasampadaa iti ca abraviiti  yojanaa. ``laddhaa me upasampadaa''tipi paa.li. ye pana ``laddhaana  upasampada''ntipi pa.thanti, tesa.m ^b^sattavassenaa^eb^ti sattamena  vassenaati attho, sattavassena vaa hutvaati vacanaseso. ya.m panettha  avutta.m, ta.m suvi~n~neyyameva.
text.7181: [03] ^b^sare^eb^ ^a^M2.0140^ea^ ^b^hatthehii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato sarabha"ngattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave  viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe  a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa putto hutvaa nibbatti,  ^b^anabhilakkhito^eb^tissa kulava.msaagata.m naama.m ahosi. so  vayappatto kaame pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa sarati.naani ^a^V2.0121^ea^ sayameva  bha~njitvaa pa.n.nasaala.m katvaa vasati. tato pa.t.thaaya ^b^sarabha"ngo^eb^tissa  sama~n~naa ahosi. atha bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento tassa  arahattuupanissaya.m disvaa, tattha gantvaa, dhamma.m desesi. so  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva  arahatta.m patvaa tattheva vasati. athassa taapasakaale kataa pa.n.nasaalaa  ji.n.naa paluggaa ahosi. ta.m disvaa ^a^P2.0204^ea^ manussaa  ``kissa, bhante, ima.m ku.tika.m na pa.tisa"nkharothaa''ti aaha.msu. thero  ``ku.tikaa yathaa taapasakaale kataa, idaani tathaa kaatu.m na sakkaa''ti  ta.m sabba.m pakaasento --
text.7184: [22] tena me sarabha"ngoti, naama.m sammutiyaa ahu..
text.7186: [21] ``na mayha.m kappate ajja, sare hatthehi bha~njitu.m.
text.7187: [22] sikkhaapadaa no pa~n~nattaa, gotamena yasassinaa''ti..  -- dve gaathaa abhaasi.
text.7188: [03] tattha ^b^sare hatthehi bha~njitvaa^eb^ti, pubbe taapasakaale  sarati.naani mama hatthehi chinditvaa ti.naku.ti.m katvaa ^b^acchisa.m^eb^  vasi.m, nisiidi~nceva nipajji~nca. ^b^tenaa^eb^ti ku.tikara.nattha.m saraana.m  bha~njanena. ^b^sammutiyaa^eb^ti anvatthasammutiyaa sarabha"ngoti, naama.m  ahu ahosi.
text.7189: [03] ^b^na mayha.m kappate ajjaa^eb^ti ajja idaani upasampannassa mayha.m  ^b^sare^eb^ sarati.ne hatthehi bha~njitu.m na kappate na va.t.tati. kasmaa?  ^b^sikkhaapadaa no pa~n~nattaa, gotamena yasassinaa^eb^ti. tena ya.m  amhaaka.m satthaaraa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, ta.m maya.m jiivitahetunaapi  naatikkamaamaati dasseti.
text.719: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa thero imaaya gaathaaya ma.m bhagavaa ovadi,  ``aya.m gaathaa mayha.m a"nkusabhuutaa''ti tameva gaatha.m paccudaahaasi. tayida.m  therassa parivattaahaaranayena a~n~naabyaakara.na.m jaata.m.
text.7190: [03] eva.m ^a^M2.0141^ea^ ekena pakaarena ti.naku.tikaaya apa.tisa"nkhara.ne kaara.na.m  dassetvaa idaani aparenapi pariyaayena na.m dassento --
text.7193: [22] soya.m rogo di.t.tho, vacanakarenaatidevassaa''ti.. --  ima.m gaathamaaha.
text.7194: [03] tattha ^b^sakala^eb^nti sabba.m. ^b^samatta^eb^nti sampu.n.na.m,  sabbabhaagato anavasesanti attho. ^b^roga^eb^nti  dukkhadukkhataadivasena rujana.t.thena rogabhuuta.m upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncaka.m  sandhaaya vadati. ^b^naaddasa.m pubbe^eb^ti ^a^V2.0122^ea^ satthu ovaadapa.tilaabhato pubbe  na addakkhi.m. ^b^soya.m rogo di.t.tho, vacanakarenaatidevassaa^eb^ti  sammutidevaa upapattidevaa visuddhidevaati sabbepi deve attano  siilaadigu.nehi atikkamitvaa .thitattaa atidevassa sammaasambuddhassa  ovaadapa.tikarena sarabha"ngena so aya.m khandhapa~ncakasa"nkhaato rogo  vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya maggapa~n~naaya pa~ncakkhandhato di.t.tho,  pari~n~naatoti attho. etena eva.m attabhaavaku.tikaayampi anapekkho  baahira.m ti.naku.tika.m katha.m pa.tisa"nkharissatiiti dasseti.
text.7195: [03] idaani ya.m magga.m pa.tipajjantena mayaa aya.m attabhaavarogo  yaathaavato di.t.tho, svaaya.m maggo sabbabuddhasaadhaara.no. yena nesa.m  ovaadadhammopi majjhe bhinnasuva.n.nasadiso yatthaaha.m pati.t.thaaya  dukkhakkhaya.m pattoti ^a^P2.0205^ea^ eva.m attano arahattapa.tipatti.m  byaakaronto --
text.7197: [21] ``yeneva maggena gato vipassii, yeneva maggena sikhii  ca vessabhuu.
text.7198: [22] kakusandhako.naagamano ca kassapo, tena~njasena agamaasi  gotamo..
text.72: [25] ime pa~nca dhamme samodhaanetvaa kataabhiniihaaraana.m  paccekabodhisattaana.m ``adhikaaro chandataa''ti dva"ngasamannaagataaya  patthanaaya vasena katapa.nidhaanaana.m saavakabodhisattaana~nca tattha tattha  vuttakaalapariccheda.m asampatvaa antaraa eva paccekasambodhiyaa  yathaavuttasaavakasambodhiyaa ca adhigamo natthi. kasmaa? ~naa.nassa  aparipaccanato. imesampi hi yathaa mahaabodhisattaana.m daanaadipaaramiihi  paribruuhitaa pa~n~naapaaramii anukkamena gabbha.m ga.nhantii paripaaka.m gacchantii  buddha~naa.na.m paripuureti, eva.m daanaadiihi paribruuhitaa anupubbena yathaaraha.m  gabbha.m ga.nhantii paripaaka.m gacchantii paccekabodhi~naa.na.m saavakabodhi~naa.na~nca  paripuureti. daanaparicayena hete tattha tattha bhave alobhajjhaasayataaya  sabbattha asa"ngamaanasaa anapekkhacittaa hutvaa, siilaparicayena  susa.mvutakaayavaacataaya suparisuddhakaayavaciikammantaa parisuddhaajiivaa  indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhojane matta~n~nuno hutvaa jaagariyaanuyogena citta.m  samaadahanti, svaaya.m tesa.m jaagariyaanuyogo gatapaccaagatikavattavasena  veditabbo.
text.7207: [27] bhedaa imassa kaayassa, jiivitassa ca sa"nkhayaa.
text.7210: [03] tattha ^b^yeneva maggenaa^eb^ti yeneva sapubbabhaagena ariyena  a.t.tha"ngikena maggena. ^b^gato^eb^ti pa.tipanno nibbaana.m adhigato.  ^b^vipassii^eb^ti vipassii sammaasambuddho. ^b^kakusandhaa^eb^ti  avibhattiko niddeso. ``kakusandhako.naagamanaa''tipi paa.tho.  ^b^tena~njasenaa^eb^ti teneva a~njasena ariyamaggena.
text.7211: [03] ^b^anaadaanaa^eb^ti anupaadaanaa appa.tisandhikaa vaa.  ^b^khayogadhaa^eb^ti nibbaanogadhaa nibbaanapati.t.thaa. ^b^yehaaya.m desito  dhammo^eb^ti yehi sattahi sammaasambuddhehi aya.m saasanadhammo desito  pavedito. ^b^dhammabhuutehii^eb^ti dhammakaayataaya dhammasabhaavehi,  navalokuttaradhammato vaa bhuutehi jaatehi, dhamma.m vaa pattehi.  ^b^taadibhii^eb^ti, i.t.thaadiisu taadibhaavappattehi.
text.7212: [03] ^b^``cattaari^eb^ ^a^V2.0123^ea^ ^b^ariyasaccaanii''^eb^tiaadinaa tehi desita.m dhamma.m  dasseti. tattha ^b^cattaarii^eb^ti ga.nanaparicchedo.  ^b^ariyasaccaanii^eb^ti paricchinnadhammadassana.m. vacanatthato pana  ariyaani ca avitatha.t.thena saccaani caati ariyasaccaani, ariyassa  vaa bhagavato saccaani tena desitattaa, ariyabhaavakaraani vaa saccaaniiti  ariyasaccaani. kucchitabhaavato tucchabhaavato ca ^b^dukkha.m,^eb^  upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncaka.m. ta.m dukkha.m samudeti etasmaati ^b^samudayo,^eb^  ta.nhaa. kilese maarento gacchati, nibbaanatthikehi maggiiyatiiti vaa  ^b^maggo,^eb^ sammaadi.t.thiaadayo a.t.tha dhammaa. sa.msaaracaarakasa"nkhaato  natthi ettha rodho, etasmi.m vaa adhigate puggalassa rodhaabhaavo hoti,  nirujjhati dukkhametthaati vaa ^b^nirodho,^eb^ nibbaana.m. tenaaha  ``dukkhasa"nkhayo''ti. ayamettha ^a^P2.0206^ea^ sa"nkhepo,  vitthaaro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
text.7213: [03] ^b^yasmi^eb^nti yasmi.m nirodhe nibbaane adhigate.  ^b^nivattate^eb^ti ariyamaggabhaavanaaya sati ^b^anantaka.m^eb^ apariyanta.m  imasmi.m sa.msaare jaatiaadidukkha.m na pavattati ucchijjati, so  nirodhoti aya.m dhammabhuutehi sammaasambuddhehi desito ^a^M2.0143^ea^ dhammoti yojanaa.  ^b^``bhedaa''^eb^tiaadinaa ``rogo di.t.tho''ti dukkhapari~n~naaya  suucita.m attano arahattappatti.m saruupato dasseti. ``yasmi.m nibbattate  dukkha''nti pana paa.the sakalagaathaaya tatthaaya.m yojanaa -- ^b^yasmi.m^eb^  khandhaadipa.tipaa.tisa~n~nite sa.msaare ida.m anantaka.m jaatiaadidukkha.m  nibbatta.m, so ito dukkhappattito a~n~no punappuna.m bhavanabhaavato  punabbhavo. imassa jiivitindriyassa sa"nkhayaa kaayasa"nkhaatassa  khandhapa~ncakassa bhedaa vinaasaa uddha.m natthi, tasmaa sabbadhi sabbehi  kilesehi sabbehi bhavehi su.t.thu vimutto visa.myutto amhiiti.
text.7218: [03] a.t.thakanipaate ^a^M2.0144^ea^ ^a^V2.0124^ea^ ^b^kamma.m bahuka^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato  mahaakaccaayanattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale gahapatimahaasaalakule  nibbattitvaa vuddhippatto, ekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto  satthaaraa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajantaana.m agga.t.thaane  .thapiyamaana.m eka.m bhikkhu.m disvaa, sayampi ta.m .thaana.m patthento pa.nidhaana.m  katvaa, daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa, devamanussesu sa.msaranto sumedhassa  bhagavato kaale vijjaadharo hutvaa aakaasena gacchanto satthaara.m  himavantapabbate ekasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m disvaa pasannamaanaso  ka.nikaarapupphehi puuja.m akaasi.
text.7219: [03] so tena pu~n~nakammena aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva parivattento  kassapadasabalassa kaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulaghare nibbattitvaa parinibbute  bhagavati suva.n.nacetiyakara.na.t.thaane satasahassagghanikaaya suva.n.ni.t.thakaaya  puuja.m katvaa, ``bhagavaa mayha.m nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane sariira.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m  hotuu''ti patthana.m akaasi.
text.722: [03] ^b^ahu buddhassa daayaado^eb^ti si"ngaalakapituttherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? so kira ito catunavute kappe satara.msi.m naama  paccekasambuddha.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa attano  hatthagata.m taalaphala.m adaasi. tena pu~n~nakammena devaloke nibbatto  aparaapara.m ^a^M1.0087^ea^ pu~n~naani katvaa ^a^V1.0072^ea^ sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto  kassapassa bhagavato  kaale manussayoniya.m nibbatto saasane pa.tiladdhasaddho hutvaa pabbajitvaa  a.t.thikasa~n~na.m bhaavesi. puna imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kulagehe  nibbattitvaa vayappatto daarapariggaha.m katvaa eka.m putta.m labhitvaa tassa  ``si"ngaalako''ti naama.m akaasi. tena ^a^P1.0075^ea^ na.m  ^b^si"ngaalakapitaa^eb^ti voharanti. so aparabhaage gharabandhana.m pahaaya  saasane pabbaji. tassa bhagavaa ajjhaasaya.m olokento  a.t.thikasa~n~naakamma.t.thaana.m adaasi. so ta.m gahetvaa bhaggesu viharati  susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane, athassa tasmi.m vane adhivatthaa devataa  ussaahajananattha.m ``bhaavanaaphala.m nacirasseva hatthagata.m karissatii''ti  imamattha.m a~n~naapadesena vibhaaventii ^b^``ahu buddhassa daayaado''^eb^ti  gaatha.m abhaasi.
text.7220: [03] tato yaavajiiva.m kusalakamma.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu  sa.msaritvaa ^a^P2.0207^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade ujjeniya.m ra~n~no  ca.n.dapajjotassa purohitagehe nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase maataa  ``mayha.m putto suva.n.nava.n.no, attano naama.m gahetvaa aagato''ti  ^b^ka~ncanamaa.navo^eb^ tveva naama.m akaasi. so vu.d.dhimanvaaya tayo  vede uggahetvaa pitu accayena purohita.t.thaana.m labhi. so gottavasena  ^b^kaccaayano^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. ta.m raajaa ca.n.dapajjoto buddhuppaada.m  sutvaa, ``aacariya, tva.m tattha gantvaa satthaara.m idhaanehii''ti pesesi.  so atta.t.thamo satthu santika.m upagato. tassa satthaa dhamma.m deseti.  desanaapariyosaane so sattahi janehi saddhi.m saha pa.tisambhidaahi  arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.54.1-27) --
text.723: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ahuu^eb^ti hoti, vattamaanatthe hi ida.m  atiitakaalavacana.m. ^b^buddhassaa^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhassa.  ^b^daayaado^eb^ti dhammadaayaado navavidhassa lokuttaradhammadaayassa  attano sammaapa.tipattiyaa aadaayako ga.nhanako. atha vaa ^b^ahuu^eb^ti  ahosi. eva.mnaamassa buddhassa daayaadabhaave koci vibandho idaaneva  bhavissatiiti adhippaayo. tenaaha ^b^``ma~n~neha.m kaamaraaga.m so,  khippameva vahissatii''^eb^ti. ^b^bhesaka.laavane^eb^ti bhesakena naama  yakkhena labhitattaa pariggahitattaa, bhesaka.laana.m vaa ka.t.thaadiina.m bahulataaya  ``bhesaka.laavana''nti laddhanaame ara~n~ne. tassa bhikkhuno buddhassa  daayaadabhaave kaara.na.m vadanto ^b^``kevala.m a.t.thisa~n~naaya, apharii pathavi.m  ima''^eb^nti aaha. tattha ^b^kevala^eb^nti sakala.m anavasesa.m.  ^b^a.t.thisa~n~naayaa^eb^ti a.t.thikabhaavanaaya. ^b^apharii^eb^ti ``a.t.thii''ti  adhimuccanavasena patthari. ^b^pathavi^eb^nti attabhaavapathavi.m.  attabhaavo hi idha ``pathavii''ti vutto ``ko ima.m pathavi.m  viccessatii''tiaadiisu viya. ^b^ma~n~neha^eb^nti ma~n~ne aha.m.  ``ma~n~naaha''ntipi paa.tho. ^b^so^eb^ti so bhikkhu.  ^b^khippameva^eb^ nacirasseva kaamaraaga.m pahissati pajahissatiiti ma~n~ne.  kasmaa? a.t.thikasa~n~naaya kaamaraagassa ujupa.tipakkhabhaavato. ida.m  vutta.m hoti -- yo ekasmi.m padese laddhaaya atthikasa~n~naaya sakala.m  attano sabbesa.m vaa attabhaava.m ^a^M1.0088^ea^ ``a.t.thii''tveva pharitvaa .thito, so  bhikkhu ta.m a.t.thikajhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassanto nacireneva  anaagaamimaggena kaamaraaga.m ^a^P1.0076^ea^, sabba.m vaa kaamana.t.thena  ``kaamo'', ra~njana.t.thena ``raago''ti ca laddhanaama.m ta.nha.m aggamaggena  pajahissatiiti. ima.m gaatha.m sutvaa so thero ``aya.m devataa mayha.m  ussaahajananattha.m evamaahaa''ti appa.tivaanaviiriya.m adhi.t.thaaya vipassana.m  va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.51.85-90) --

text.7270: [03] atha satthaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaaresi. te  taavadeva dva"ngulamattakesamassukaa iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa  viya ahesu.m. eva.m thero sadattha.m nipphaadetvaa, ``bhante, raajaa  pajjoto tumhaaka.m ^a^M2.0147^ea^ paade vanditu.m dhamma~nca sotu.m icchatii''ti satthu  aarocesi. satthaa, ``tva.myeva, bhikkhu, tattha gaccha, tayi gatepi  raajaa pasiidissatii''ti aaha. thero satthu aa.naaya atta.t.thamo tattha  gantvaa raajaana.m pasaadetvaa avantiisu saasana.m pati.t.thaapetvaa puna satthu  santikameva gato. so ekadivasa.m sambahule bhikkhuu sama.nadhamma.m  pahaaya kammaaraame sa"nga.nikaaraame rasata.nhaanugate ca pamaadavihaarino  disvaa tesa.m ovaadavasena --
text.7272: [21] ``kamma.m bahuka.m na kaaraye, parivajjeyya jana.m na  uyyame.
text.7273: [22] so ussukko rasaanugiddho, attha.m ri~ncati yo  sukhaadhivaaho..
text.7275: [21] ``pa"nkoti hi na.m avedayu.m, yaaya.m vandanapuujanaa  kulesu.
text.7276: [22] sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m, sakkaaro kaapurisena dujjaho''ti..  --
text.7278: [03] tattha ^a^V2.0127^ea^ ^a^P2.0208^ea^ ^b^kamma.m bahuka.m na kaaraye^eb^ti  navaavaasakaaraapanaadi.m sama.nadhammakara.nassa paribandhabhuuta.m mahanta.m navakamma.m  na pa.t.thapeyya, khuddaka.m appasamaarambha.m kha.n.daphullapa.tisa"nkhara.naadi.m satthu  vacanapa.tipuujanattha.m kaatabbameva. ^b^parivajjeyya jana^eb^nti  ga.nasa"nga.nikavasena jana.m vivajjeyya. jananti vaa yaadisa.m sa.msevato  bhajato payirupaasato kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, akusalaa dhammaa  abhiva.d.dhanti, taadisa.m akalyaa.namittabhuuta.m jana.m parivajjeyya. ^b^na  uyyame^eb^ti, paccayuppaadanattha.m kulasa"nga.nhanavasena na vaayameyya, yasmaa  ^b^so ussukko rasaanugiddho, attha.m ri~ncati yo sukhaadhivaaho^eb^ti  yo rasaanugiddho rasata.nhaavasiko bhikkhu paccayuppaadanapasuto, so  kulasa"nga.nhanattha.m ussukko, tesu sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu  dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu attanaa yoga.m aapajjati, yo  sukhaadhivaaho samathavipassanaamaggaphalanibbaanasukhaavaho siilaadiattho,  ta.m ri~ncati pajahati eka.msena attaana.m tato vivecetiiti attho.
text.7279: [03] eva.m pa.thamagaathaaya ``kammaaraamata.m sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m paccayagedha~nca  vajjethaa''ti ovaditvaa idaani sakkaaraabhilaasa.m garahanto dutiya.m  gaathamaaha. tassattho -- yaa aya.m bhikkhaaya upagataana.m pabbajitaana.m  kulesu gehavaasiihi gu.nasambhaavanaaya kariiyamaanaa vandanaa puujanaa ca,  yasmaa ta.m ^a^M2.0148^ea^ abhaavitattaana.m osiidaapana.t.thena malinabhaavakara.na.t.thena ca  ^b^pa"nko^eb^ kaddamoti buddhaadayo ariyaa ^b^pavedayu.m^eb^ abbha~n~na.msu  pavedesu.m vaa, yasmaa ca apari~n~naatakkhandhaana.m andhaputhujjanaana.m  sakkaaraabhilaasa.m duvi~n~neyyasabhaavataaya pii.laajananato anto tudanato  duruddhara.nato ca ^b^sukhuma.m salla.m durubbaha.m^eb^ pavedayu.m, tato eva sakkaaro  kaapurisena ^b^dujjaho^eb^ duppajaheyyo tassa pahaanapa.tipattiyaa  appa.tipajjanato. sakkaaraabhilaasappahaanena hi sakkaaro pahiino hoti,  tasmaa tassa pahaanaaya aayogo kara.niiyoti dasseti --
text.7282: [22] attanaa ta.m na seveyya, kammabandhuu hi maatiyaa..
text.7284: [21] ``na pare vacanaa coro, na pare vacanaa muni.
text.7285: [22] attaa ca na.m yathaa vedi, devaapi na.m tathaa viduu..
text.7288: [22] ye ca tattha vijaananti, tato sammanti medhagaa..
text.7291: [22] pa~n~naaya ca alaabhena, vittavaapi na jiivati..
text.7294: [22] na ca di.t.tha.m suta.m dhiiro, sabba.m ujjhitumarahati..
text.7299: [25] imaa cha gaathaa ra~n~no pajjotassa ovaadavasena abhaasi.  so kira braahma.ne saddahitvaa pasughaataya~n~na.m kaareti, kamma.m  asodhetvaava acore corasa~n~naaya da.n.desi, a.t.takara.ne ca assaamike  saamike karoti, saamike ca assaamike. tato na.m thero vivecetu.m  ^b^``na parassaa''^eb^tiaadinaa cha gaathaa abhaasi.
text.73: [03] eva.m pana pa.tipajjantaana.m adhikaarasampattiyaa appakasireneva a.t.tha  samaapattiyo pa~ncaabhi~n~naa cha.labhi~n~naa adhi.t.thaanabhuutaa pubbabhaagavipassanaa  ca hatthagataayeva honti. viiriyaadayo pana tadantogadhaa eva. ya~nhi  paccekabodhiyaa saavakabodhiyaa vaa atthaaya daanaadipu~n~nasambhara.ne  abbhussahana.m, ida.m viiriya.m. ya.m tadanuparodhassa sahana.m, aya.m khanti.  ya.m daanasiilaadisamaadaanaavisa.mvaadana.m, ida.m sacca.m. sabbatthameva  acalasamaadhaanaadhi.t.thaana.m, ida.m adhi.t.thaana.m ^a^V1.0011^ea^. yaa daanasiilaadiina.m  pavatti.t.thaanabhuutesu sattesu hitesitaa, aya.m mettaa. ya.m sattaana.m  katavippakaaresu ajjhupekkhana.m, aya.m ^a^M1.0013^ea^ upekkhaati. eva.m ^a^P1.0013^ea^  daanasiilabhaavanaasu siilasamaadhipa~n~naasu ca sijjhamaanaasu  viiriyaadayo siddhaa eva honti. saayeva paccekabodhiatthaaya  saavakabodhiatthaaya ca daanaadipa.tipadaa tesa.m bodhisattaana.m santaanassa  bhaavanato paribhaavanato bhaavanaa naama. visesato daanasiilaadiihi  svaabhisa"nkhate santaane pavattaa samathavipassanaapa.tipadaa, yato te  bodhisattaa pubbayogaavacarasamudaagamasampannaa honti. tenaaha bhagavaa --
text.7300: [03] tattha ^a^M2.0149^ea^ ^b^na parassupanidhaaya, kamma.m maccassa paapaka^eb^nti parassa  maccassa sattassa upanidhaaya uddissa kaara.na.m katvaa paapaka.m  vadhabandhaadikamma.m na seveyya, parena na kaaraapeyyaati attho.  ^b^attanaa ta.m na seveyyaa^eb^ti attanaapi ta.m paapaka.m na kareyya.  kasmaa? ^b^kammabandhuu hi maatiyaa^eb^ ime maatiyaa maccaa  kammadaayaadaa, tasmaa attanaa ca ki~nci paapakamma.m na kareyya, parenapi  na kaaraapeyyaati attho.
text.7301: [03] ^b^na pare vacanaa coro^eb^ti attanaa coriya.m akatvaa paravacanaa  parassa vacanamattena coro naama na hoti, tathaa ^b^na pare vacanaa  muni^eb^ parassa vacanamattena muni suvisuddhakaayavaciimanosamaacaaro na  hoti. ettha hi ^b^pare^eb^ti vibhattialopa.m katvaa niddeso. keci  pana ``paresanti vattabbe pareti sa.m-kaaralopa.m katvaa niddi.t.tha''nti  vadanti. ^b^attaa ca na.m yathaa vedii^eb^ti na.m satta.m tassa attaa citta.m  yathaa ``aha.m parisuddho, aparisuddho vaa''ti yaathaavato avedi jaanaati.  ^b^devaapi na.m tathaa viduu^eb^ti visuddhidevaa, upapattidevaa ca tathaa  viduu vidanti jaananti, tasmaa saya.m taadisaa devaa ca pamaa.na.m  suddhaasuddhaana.m suddhaasuddhabhaavajaanane, na ye keci icchaadosaparetaa  sattaati adhippaayo.
text.7302: [03] ^b^pare^eb^ti pa.n.dite .thapetvaa tato a~n~ne,  kusalaakusalasaavajjaanavajja.m kamma.m kammaphala.m kaayassa asubhata.m  sa"nkhaaraana.m aniccata.m ajaanantaa idha pare naama. te ^b^mayamettha^eb^  imasmi.m jiivaloke ^b^yamaama^eb^ uparamaama, ``satata.m samita.m maccu  santika.m gacchaamaa''ti na jaananti. ^b^ye ca tattha vijaanantii^eb^ti  ye ca tattha pa.n.ditaa ``maya.m maccu samiipa.m gacchaamaa''ti vijaananti.  ^b^tato sammanti medhagaa^eb^ti eva~nhi te jaanantaa medhagaana.m  paravihi.msanaana.m vuupasamaaya pa.tipajjanti, attanaa ^a^V2.0129^ea^ pare ca a~n~ne na  medhanti na baadhentiiti attho. tva.m pana jiivitanimitta.m acore core  karontopi da.n.danena saamike assaamike karontopi dhanajaaniyaa  baadhasi pa~n~naavekallato. tathaa ^a^P2.0210^ea^ akarontopi  ^b^jiivate vaapi sappa~n~no, api vittaparikkhayo^eb^ parikkhii.nadhanopi  sappa~n~najaatiko itariitarasantosena santu.t.tho anavajjaaya jiivikaaya  jiivatiyeva. tassa hi jiivita.m naama. tenaaha bhagavaa --  ``pa~n~naajiivi.m jiivitamaahu se.t.tha''nti (sa.m0 ni0  1.73, 246;  su0 ni0 184). dummedhapuggalo pana pa~n~naaya ^a^M2.0150^ea^ ca alaabhena  di.t.thadhammika.m samparaayika~nca attha.m viraadhento vittavaapi na jiivati  garahaadipavattiyaa jiivanto naama na hoti, anupaaya~n~nutaaya yathaadhigata.m  dhana.m naasento jiivitampi sandhaaretu.m na sakkotiyeva.
text.7303: [03] imaa kira catassopi gaathaa thero supinantena ra~n~no kathesi.  raajaa supina.m disvaa thera.m namassantoyeva pabujjhitvaa pabhaataaya rattiyaa  thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa attanaa di.t.thaniyaamena supina.m kathesi.  ta.m sutvaa thero taa gaathaa paccunubhaasitvaa ^b^``sabba.m  su.naatii''^eb^tiaadinaa dviihi gaathaahi raajaana.m ovadi. tattha  ^b^sabba.m su.naati sotenaa^eb^ti idha sotabba.m sadda.m aapaathagata.m sabba.m  subhaasita.m dubbhaasita~nca abadhiro sotena su.naati. tathaa sabba.m ruupa.m  sundara.m asundarampi cakkhunaa anandho passati, ayamindriyaana.m  sabhaavo. tattha pana ^b^na ca di.t.tha.m suta.m dhiiro, sabba.m ujjhitu^eb^nti  ca nidassanamattameta.m. ya~nhi ta.m di.t.tha.m suta.m vaa, na ta.m sabba.m dhiiro  sappa~n~no ujjhitu.m pariccajitu.m gahetu.m vaa arahati. gu.naagu.na.m pana  tattha upaparikkhitvaa ujjhitabbameva ujjhitu.m gahetabba~nca gahetu.m  arahati, tasmaa ^b^cakkhumaassa yathaa andho^eb^ cakkhumaapi samaano  ujjhitabbe di.t.the andho yathaa assa apassanto viya bhaveyya, tathaa  ujjhitabbe sute sotavaapi badhiro yathaa assa asu.nanto viya bhaveyya.  ^b^pa~n~navaassa yathaa muugo^eb^ti vicaara.napa~n~naaya pa~n~navaa  vacanakusalopi avattabbe muugo viya bhaveyya. ^b^balavaa^eb^  thaamasampannopi akattabbe dubbaloriva, rakaaro padasandhikaro,  asamattho viya bhaveyya. ^b^atha atthe samuppanne, sayetha  matasaayika^eb^nti attanaa kaatabbakicce uppanne upa.t.thite matasaayika.m  sayetha, matasaayika.m sayitvaapi ta.m kicca.m tiiretabbameva, na viraadhetabba.m.  atha vaa ^b^atha atthe samuppanne^eb^ti attanaa akara.niiye atthe  kicce uppanne upa.t.thite matasaayika.m sayetha, matasaayika.m sayitvaapi ta.m  na kaatabbameva. na hi pa.n.dito ayutta.m kaatumarahatiiti eva.m therena  ovadito raajaa akattabba.m pahaaya kaatabbeyeva yuttappayutto ahosiiti.
text.7306: [03] ^b^akkodhano^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0151^ea^ ^a^V2.0130^ea^ ^a^P2.0211^ea^ aayasmato  sirimittattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa  imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe mahaddhanaku.tumbikassa putto hutvaa nibbatti,  ^b^sirimitto^eb^ti laddhanaamo. tassa kira maataa siriguttassa  bhaginii. tassa vatthu ^b^dhammapadava.n.nanaaya.m^eb^ (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0  1.garahadinnavatthu) aagatameva. so siriguttassa bhaagineyyo  sirimitto vayappatto satthu dhanapaaladamane laddhappasaado pabbajitvaa  vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m patto. ekadivasa.m  paatimokkha.m uddisitu.m aasana.m abhiruhitvaa cittabiijani.m gahetvaa  nisinno bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m kathesi. kathento ca u.laaratare gu.ne  vibhajitvaa dassento --
text.7309: [22] sa ve taadisako bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
text.731: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa taaya devataaya vuttavacana.m patimaanento tameva  gaatha.m udaanavasena abhaasi. tadevassa therassa a~n~naabyaakara.na.m  ahosiiti.
text.7312: [22] guttadvaaro sadaa bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
text.7315: [22] kalyaa.nasiilo so bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
text.7318: [22] kalyaa.namitto so bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
text.7321: [22] kalyaa.napa~n~no so bhikkhu, eva.m pecca na socati..
text.7327: [22] adaliddoti ta.m aahu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..
text.7330: [22] anuyu~njetha medhaavii, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. --  imaa gaathaa abhaasi.
text.7331: [01] tattha ^b^akkodhano^eb^ti akujjhanasiilo. upa.t.thite hi  kodhuppattinimitte adhivaasanakhantiya.m .thatvaa ^a^V2.0131^ea^ kopassa anuppaadako.  ^b^anupanaahii^eb^ti na upanaahako, parehi kata.m aparaadha.m pa.ticca  ``akkocchi ma.m avadhi ma.m, ajini ma.m ahaasi me''tiaadinaa (dha0  pa0 3; mahaava0 464; ma0 ni0 3.237) kodhassa  anupanayhanasiilo. santadosapa.ticchaadanalakkha.naaya maayaaya abhaavato  ^b^amaayo^eb^. pisu.navaacaavirahitato ^b^rittapesu.no, sa ve  taadisako bhikkhuu^eb^ti so tathaaruupo tathaajaatiko  yathaavuttagu.nasamannaagato bhikkhu ^a^P2.0212^ea^. eva.m  yathaavuttapa.tipattiyaa ^b^pecca^eb^ paraloke na socati sokanimittassa  abhaavato. cakkhudvaaraadayo kaayadvaaraadayo ca guttaa pihitaa sa.mvutaa  etassaati ^b^guttadvaaro. kalyaa.nasiilo^eb^ti sundarasiilo  suvisuddhasiilo. ^b^kalyaa.namitto^eb^ti --
text.7333: [22] gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa, no ca.t.thaane niyojaye''ti..  (a0 ni0  7.37) --
text.7334: [25] eva.m vibhaavitalakkha.no kalyaa.namitto etassaati  kalyaa.namitto. ^b^kalyaa.napa~n~no^eb^ti sundarapa~n~no. yadipi pa~n~naa  naama asundaraa natthi, niyyaanikaaya pana pa~n~naaya vasena eva.m vutta.m
text.7335: [03] evamettha kodhaadiina.m vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca  akkodhanaadimukhena, puggalaadhi.t.thaanaaya gaathaaya sammaapa.tipatti.m dassetvaa  idaani nipphattitalokuttarasaddhaadike uddharitvaa puggalaadhi.t.thaanaaya eva  gaathaaya sammaapa.tipatti.m dassento ^b^``yassa saddhaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha.  tassattho -- ^b^yassa^eb^ puggalassa ^b^tathaagate^eb^ sammaasambuddhe  ``itipi so bhagavaa''tiaadinayappavattaa maggenaagatasaddhaa, tato eva  ^b^acalaa^eb^ avikampaa su.t.thu pati.t.thitaa. ``atthii''ti, pada.m aanetvaa  sambandhitabba.m. ^b^ariyakanta^eb^nti ariyaana.m kanta.m piyaayita.m  bhavantarepi avijahanato. ^b^pasa.msita^eb^nti buddhaadiihi pasa.t.tha.m,  va.n.nita.m thomita.m atthiiti yojanaa. ta.m paneta.m siila.m gaha.t.thasiila.m  pabbajitasiilanti ^a^M2.0153^ea^ duvidha.m. tattha gaha.t.thasiila.m naama  pa~ncasikkhaapadasiila.m, ya.m gaha.t.thena rakkhitu.m sakkaa. pabbajitasiila.m  naama dasasikkhaapadasiila.m upaadaaya sabba.m catupaarisuddhisiila.m, tayida.m  sabbampi akha.n.daadibhaavena aparaama.t.thataaya ``kalyaa.na''nti veditabba.m.
text.7336: [03] ^b^sa"nghe pasaado yassatthii^eb^ti ``suppa.tipanno bhagavato  saavakasa"ngho''tiaadinaa ariyasa"nghe pasaado saddhaa yassa puggalassa  atthi acalo suppati.t.thitoti aanetvaa yojetabba.m. ^b^ujubhuuta~nca  dassana^eb^nti di.t.thiva"nkaabhaavato kilesava"nkaabhaavato ca ujubhuuta.m.  aku.tila.m ajimha.m kammassakataadassana~nceva  sappaccayanaamaruupadassana~ncaati duvidhampi dassana.m yassa atthi acala.m  suppati.t.thitanti ^a^V2.0132^ea^ yojanaa. ^b^adaliddoti ta.m aahu^eb^ saddhaadhana.m,  siiladhana.m, sutadhana.m, caagadhana.m, pa~n~naadhananti imesa.m suvisuddhaana.m dhanaana.m  atthitaaya ``adaliddo''ti ta.m taadisa.m puggala.m buddhaadayo ariyaa aahu.  ^b^amogha.m tassa jiivita.m^eb^ tassa tathaaruupassa jiivita.m  di.t.thadhammikaadiatthaadhigamena amogha.m ava~njha.m saphalamevaati aahuuti  attho.
text.7337: [03] ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0213^ea^, yasmaa  yathaavuttasaddhaadigu.nasamannaagato puggalo ``adaliddo amoghajiivito''ti  vuccati, tasmaa ahampi tathaaruupo bhaveyyanti. ^b^saddha~nca...pe0...  saasana^eb^nti ``sabbapaapassa akara.na''ntiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 183;  dii0 ni0 2.90) vutta.m buddhaana.m saasana.m anussaranto kulaputto  vuttappabheda.m saddha~nceva siila~nca dhammadassanahetuka.m dhamme sunicchayaa  vimokkhabhuuta.m pasaada~nca anuyu~njeyya va.d.dheyyaati.
text.7338: [03] eva.m thero bhikkhuuna.m dhammadesanaamukhena attani vijjamaane gu.ne  pakaasento a~n~na.m byaakaasi.
text.734: [01] ^b^udaka~nhi nayantii^eb^ti aayasmato kulattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? aya.m kira thero pubbepi viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m kusala.m  upacinitvaa adhikaarasampanno vipassi.m bhagavanta.m aakaase gacchanta.m  disvaa pasannamaanaso naa.likeraphala.m daatukaamo a.t.thaasi. satthaa tassa  citta.m ~natvaa otaritvaa pa.tigga.nhi. so ativiya pasannacitto hutvaa  teneva saddhaapa.tilaabhena satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci, satthaa  a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m ^a^M1.0089^ea^ aa.naapesi -- ``ima.m purisa.m pabbaajehii''ti. so  pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado sama.nadhamma.m katvaa tato cuto chapi  buddhantaraani devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m  braahma.nakule nibbatti. ^b^kulo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so  vayappatto saasane laddhappasaado bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa  vikkhepabahulataaya visesa.m nibbattetu.m naasakkhi. athekadivasa.m gaama.m  pi.n.daaya pavisanto antaraamagge bhuumi.m kha.nitvaa ^a^P1.0077^ea^  udakavaahaka.m katvaa icchiticchita.t.thaane udaka.m nente purise disvaa ta.m  sallakkhetvaa gaama.m pavi.t.tho a~n~natara.m usukaara.m usuda.n.daka.m usuyante  pakkhipitvaa akkhiko.tiyaa oloketvaa uju.m karonta.m disvaa tampi  sallakkhetvaa gacchanto purato gantvaa araneminaabhiaadike rathacakkaavayave  tacchante tacchake disvaa tampi sallakkhetvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa  katabhattakicco pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa divaavihaare nisinno attanaa  di.t.thanimittaani upamaabhaavena gahetvaa attano cittadamane upanento  ``acetana.m udakampi manussaa icchikicchita.t.thaana.m nayanti tathaa  acetana.m va"nkampi sarada.n.da.m upaayena namento uju.m karonti ^a^V1.0074^ea^, tathaa  acetana.m ka.t.thaka.li"ngaraadi.m tacchakaa nemiaadivasena va"nka.m uju~nca  karonti. atha kasmaa aha.m sakacitta.m uju.m na karissaamii''ti  cintetvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa gha.tento vaayamanto nacirasseva arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.91-99) --
text.7341: [03] ^b^yadaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0154^ea^ ^b^pa.thamamaddakkhi^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato  mahaapanthakattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa  bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare vibhavasampanno ku.tumbiyo hutvaa ekadivasa.m  satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m  sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m  patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa,  ``bhante, ya.m bhikkhu.m tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake --  `sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalaana.m aya.m mama saasane aggo'ti etadagge .thapayittha,  ahampi imassa adhikaarakammassa balena so bhikkhu viya anaagate  ekassa buddhassa saasane aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi.  kani.t.thabhaataa panassa tatheva bhagavati adhikaarakamma.m katvaa manomayassa  kaayassaabhinimmaana.m cetoviva.t.takosallanti dvinna.m a"ngaana.m vasena  vuttanayeneva pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. bhagavaa dvinnampi patthana.m anantaraayena  samijjhanabhaava.m disvaa ``anaagate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamassa  naama sammaasambuddhassa saasane tumhaaka.m patthanaa samijjhissatii''ti  byaakaasi.
text.7342: [03] te ^a^V2.0133^ea^ ubhopi janaa tattha yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto  devaloke nibbatti.msu. tattha mahaapanthakassa antaraakata.m kalyaa.nadhamma.m  na kathiiyati. cuu.lapanthako pana kassapassa bhagavato saasane  pabbajitvaa viisati vassasahassaani odaatakasi.nakamma.m katvaa devapure  nibbatti. apadaane pana ``cuu.lapanthako padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale  taapaso hutvaa himavante vasanto tattha bhagavanta.m disvaa pupphacchattena  puuja.m akaasii''ti aagata.m. tesa.m devamanussesu ^a^P2.0214^ea^  sa.msarantaana.myeva kappasatasahassa.m atikkanta.m. atha amhaaka.m satthaa  abhisambodhi.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko raajagaha.m upanissaaya ve.luvane  mahaavihaare viharati.
text.7343: [03] tena ca samayena raajagahe dhanase.t.thissa dhiitaa attano daasena  saddhi.m santhava.m katvaa ~naatakehi bhiitaa hatthasaara.m gahetvaa tena saddhi.m  palaayitvaa a~n~nattha vasantii ta.m pa.ticca gabbha.m labhitvaa paripakkagabbhaa  ``~naatighara.m ^a^M2.0155^ea^ gantvaa vijaayissaamii''ti gacchantii antaraamaggeyeva putta.m  vijaayitvaa saaminaa nivattitaa pubbe vasita.t.thaane vasantii puttassa  panthe jaatattaa ^b^panthako^eb^ti, naama.m akaasi. tasmi.m aadhaavitvaa  vidhaavitvaa vicara.nakaale tameva pa.ticca dutiya.m gabbha.m pa.tilabhitvaa  paripakkagabbhaa pubbe vuttanayeneva antaraamagge putta.m vijaayitvaa saaminaa  nivattitaa je.t.thaputtassa ^b^mahaapanthako^eb^ti kani.t.thassa  ^b^cuu.lapanthako^eb^ti naama.m katvaa yathaavasita.t.thaaneyeva vasantii anukkamena  daarakesu va.d.dhantesu tehi, ``amma, ayyakakula.m no dassehii''ti  nibundhiyamaanaa daarake maataapituuna.m santika.m pesesi. tato pa.t.thaaya  daarakaa dhanase.t.thino gehe va.d.dhanti. tesu cuu.lapanthako atidaharo.  mahaapanthako pana ayyakena saddhi.m bhagavato santika.m gato satthaara.m  disvaa saha dassanena pa.tiladdhasaddho dhamma.m sutvaa upanissayasampannataaya  pabbajitukaamo hutvaa pitaamaha.m aapucchi. so satthu tamattha.m  aarocetvaa ta.m pabbaajesi. so pabbajitvaa bahu.m buddhavacana.m ugga.nhitvaa  paripu.n.navasso upasampajjitvaa yonisomanasikaare kamma.m karonto  visesato catunna.m aruupajjhaanaana.m laabhii hutvaa tato vu.t.thaaya vipassana.m  ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. iti so sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalaana.m aggo  jaato. so jhaanasukhena phalasukhena viitinaamento ekadivasa.m attano  pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa adhigatasampatti.m pa.ticca sa~njaatasomanasso  siihanaada.m nadanto --
text.7346: [22] tato me ahu sa.mvego, passitvaa purisuttama.m..
text.7361: [22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
text.7367: [22] sabba.m ta.nha.m visosetvaa, palla"nkena upaavisi''nti..  -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.
text.7368: [01] tattha ^b^yadaa^eb^ti yasmi.m kaale. ^b^pa.thama^eb^nti  aadito. ^b^addakkhi^eb^nti passi.m, ^b^satthaara^eb^nti, bhagavanta.m.  ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti nibbhaya.m. aya~nhettha attho -- sabbesa.m bhayahetuuna.m  bodhimuuleyeva pahiinattaa kutocipi bhayaabhaavato ^b^akutobhaya.m^eb^  nibbhaya.m, catuvesaarajjavisaarada.m di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi  veneyyaana.m yathaarahamanusaasanato ^b^satthaara.m^eb^ sammaasambuddha.m mayha.m  pitaamahena saddhi.m gantvaa yaaya velaaya sabbapa.thama.m passi.m, ta.m  ^b^purisuttama.m^eb^ sadevake loke aggapuggala.m passitvaa tato dassanahetu  ^b^tato^eb^ dassanato pacchaa ``ettaka.m kaala.m satthaara.m da.t.thu.m dhamma~nca  sotu.m naalattha''nti mayha.m ^b^sa.mvego ahu^eb^ sahottappa.m ~naa.na.m uppajji.  uppannasa.mvego panaaha.m eva.m cintesinti dasseti ^b^siri.m hatthehii^eb^ti  gaathaaya. tassattho -- ^b^yo^eb^ vibhavatthiko puriso ``upa.t.thaayiko  hutvaa tava santike vasissaamii''ti saviggaha.m siri.m sayane upagata.m  hatthehi ca paadehi ca ko.t.tento ^b^pa.naameyya^eb^ niihareyya, ^b^so^eb^  tathaaruupo alakkhikapuriso etaadisa.m ^b^satthaara.m^eb^ sammaasambuddha.m  ^b^aaraadhetvaa^eb^ imasmi.m navame kha.ne pa.tilabhitvaa ^b^viraadhaye^eb^  tassa ovaadaakara.nena ta.m virajjheyya, aha.m paneva.m na karomiiti  adhippaayo. tenaaha ^b^``tadaaha.m...pe0... anagaariya''^eb^nti.  tattha ^b^cha.d.dayi^eb^nti, pajahi.m. ``cha.d.diya''ntipi paa.tho. nanu  aya.m thero daarapariggaha.m akatvaava pabbajito, so kasmaa ``puttadaara~nca ^a^M2.0157^ea^  cha.d.dayi''nti avocaati? yathaa naama puriso anibbattaphalameva rukkha.m  chindanto acchinne tato laddhaphalehi parihiino naama hoti.  eva.msampadamida.m da.t.thabba.m.
text.7369: [03] ^b^sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno^eb^ti yaa adhisiilasikkhaa, taaya  ca, yattha bhikkhuu saha jiivanti, ekajiivikaa ^a^V2.0135^ea^ sabhaagavuttino honti,  tena bhagavataa pa~n~nattasikkhaapadasa"nkhaatena saajiivena ca samannaagato  sikkhanabhaavena ^a^P2.0216^ea^ sama"ngiibhuuto, sikkha.m paripuurento  saajiiva~nca aviitikkamanto hutvaa tadubhaya.m sampaadentoti attho. tena  suvisuddhe paatimokkhe siile pati.t.thitabhaava.m dasseti. ^b^indriyesu  susa.mvuto^eb^ti manaccha.t.thesu indriyesu su.t.thu sa.mvuto. ruupaadivisayesu  uppajjanakaana.m abhijjhaadiina.m pavattinivaara.navasena satikavaa.tena  supihitacakkhaadidvaaroti attho. eva.m  paatimokkhasa.mvaraindriyasa.mvarasiilasampattidassanena itarasiilampi atthato  dassitameva hotiiti thero attano catupaarisuddhisiilasampada.m dassetvaa  ^b^``namassamaano sambuddha''^eb^nti iminaa  buddhaanussatibhaavanaanuyogamaaha. ^b^vihaasi.m aparaajito^eb^ti  kilesamaaraadiihi aparaajito eva hutvaa vihari.m, yaava arahattappatti,  taava tehi anabhibhuuto, a~n~nadatthu te abhibhavanto eva vihaasinti  attho.
text.7370: [03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmaa, yasmaa suvisuddhasiilo satthari  abhippasanno kilesaabhibhavanapa.tipattiya~nca .thito, tasmaa.  ^b^pa.nidhii^eb^ti pa.nidhaana.m. ^b^tato^eb^ vaa cittaabhiniihaaro.  ^b^aasii^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^cetaso abhipatthito^eb^ti, mama cittena  icchito. kiidiso pana soti aaha ^b^``na nisiide muhuttampi,  ta.nhaasalle anuuhate''^eb^ti. ``aggamaggasa.n.daasena mama hadayato  ta.nhaasalle anuddha.te muhuttampi na nisiide, nisajja.m na kappeyya''nti  eva.m me cittaabhiniihaaro ahosiiti attho.
text.7371: [03] eva.m pana citta.m adhi.t.thaaya bhaavana.m bhaavayitvaa .thaanaca"nkameheva ratti.m  viitinaamento aruupasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya jhaana"ngamukhena vipassana.m  pa.t.thapetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^``tassa me''^eb^tiaadi.  ^b^niruupadhii^eb^ti kilesupadhiaadiina.m abhaavena nirupadhi.  ^b^ratyaavivasaane^eb^ti rattibhaagassa vigamane ^a^M2.0158^ea^ vibhaataaya rattiyaa.  ^b^suuriyuggamana.m patii^eb^ti suuriyuggamana.m lakkha.na.m katvaa. ^b^sabba.m  ta.nha^eb^nti kaamata.nhaadibheda.m sabba.m ta.nhaasota.m aggamaggena  ^b^visosetvaa^eb^ sukkhaapetvaa ``ta.nhaasalle anuuhate na nisiide''ti,  pa.ti~n~naaya mocitattaa. ^b^palla"nkena upaavisi^eb^nti palla"nka.m  aabhujitvaa nisiidinti. sesa.m uttaanatthameva.
text.7376: [03] navakanipaate ^a^M2.0159^ea^ ^a^V2.0136^ea^ ^b^yadaa dukkha^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato  bhuutattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro  tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto siddhatthassa  bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^a^P2.0217^ea^  ^b^seno^eb^ti laddhanaamo vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa  pasannamaanaso ``usabha.m pavara''ntiaadinaa catuuhi gaathaahi abhitthavi.
text.7377: [03] so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade  saaketanagarassa dvaaragaame mahaavibhavassa se.t.thissa putto hutvaa nibbatti.  tassa kira se.t.thino jaataa jaataa daarakaa baddhaaghaatena ekena  yakkhena khaaditaa, imassa pana pacchimabhavikattaa bhuutaa aarakkha.m  ga.nhi.msu. yakkho pana vessava.nassa upa.t.thaana.m gato, puna naagamaasi.  naamakara.nadivase cassa ``eva.m kate amanussaa anukampantaa  parihareyyu''nti ^b^bhuuto^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so pana attano  pu~n~nabalena anantaraayo va.d.dhi, tassa ``tayo paasaadaa  ahesu''ntiaadi sabba.m yasassa kulaputtassa vibhavakittane viya  veditabba.m. so vi~n~nuta.m patto satthari saakete vasante upaasakehi  saddhi.m vihaara.m gato. satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho  pabbajitvaa ajakara.niyaa naama nadiyaa tiire le.ne vasanto vipassana.m  pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^  (apa0 thera 1.7.20-28) --
text.7381: [22] tatheva jhaana.m buddhassa, ko disvaa nappasiidati..
text.7383: [22] tatheva siila.m buddhassa, ko disvaa nappasiidati..
text.7395: [01] arahatta.m pana patvaa aparena samayena ~naatiina.m anukampaaya  saaketa.m gantvaa katipaaha.m tehi upa.t.thiyamaano a~njanavane vasitvaa puna  attanaa vasita.t.thaanameva gantukaamo gamanaakaara.m dassesi. ~naatakaa  ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, tumhepi na kilamissatha, mayampi pu~n~nena  va.d.dhissaamaa''ti thera.m yaaci.msu. thero attano vivekaabhirati.m tattha ca  phaasuvihaara.m pakaasento --
text.7397: [21] ``yadaa dukkha.m jaraamara.nanti pa.n.dito, aviddasuu yattha  sitaa puthujjanaa.
text.7398: [22] dukkha.m pari~n~naaya satova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m  na vindati..
text.74: [02] ``pa~ncime, aananda, aanisa.msaa pubbayogaavacare.  katame pa~nca? idhaananda, pubbayogaavacaro di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m  aaraadheti, no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacca a~n~na.m aaraadheti, atha  mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti, atha devaputto samaano a~n~na.m aaraadheti,  atha buddhaana.m sammukhiibhaave khippaabhi~n~no hoti, atha pacchime kaale  paccekasambuddho hotii''ti (su0 ni0 a.t.tha0  1.khaggavisaa.nasuttava.n.nanaa).
text.7401: [22] ta.nha.m pahantvaana satova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na  vindati..
text.7404: [22] pa~n~naaya passitva satova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m  na vindati..
text.7406: [21] ``yadaa ^a^P2.0218^ea^ asoka.m viraja.m asa"nkhata.m,  santa.m pada.m sabbakilesasodhana.m.
text.7407: [22] bhaaveti sa~n~nojanabandhanacchida.m, tato rati.m paramatara.m na  vindati..
text.7409: [21] ``yadaa nabhe gajjati meghadundubhi, dhaaraakulaa vihagapathe  samantato.
text.7410: [22] bhikkhuu ca pabbhaaragatova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m  na vindati..
text.7413: [22] tiire nisinno sumanova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m  na vindati..
text.7415: [21] ``yadaa nisiithe rahitamhi kaanane, deve ga.lantamhi  nadanti daa.thino.
text.7416: [22] bhikkhuu ca pabbhaaragatova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m  na vindati..
text.7419: [22] viitaddaro viitakhilova jhaayati, tato rati.m paramatara.m na  vindati..
text.7424: [22] tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindatii''ti.. -- imaa gaathaa  abhaasi.
text.7425: [03] tatthaaya.m ^a^M2.0162^ea^ padayojanaamukhena pa.thamagaathaaya atthava.n.nanaa -- khandhaana.m  paripaako ^b^jaraa^eb^. bhedo ^b^mara.na.m^eb^. jaraamara.nasiisena cettha  jaraamara.navanto dhammaa gahitaa. ``tayida.m jaraamara.na.m dukkha''nti  ^b^aviddasuu^eb^ yathaabhuuta.m ajaanantaa ^b^puthujjanaa yattha^eb^ yasmi.m  upaadaanakkhandhapa~ncake ^b^sitaa^eb^ pa.tibandhaa alliinaa, ta.m ``ida.m  dukkha.m, ettaka.m dukkha.m, na ito bhiyyo''ti vipassanaapa~n~naasahitaaya  maggapa~n~naaya parijaanitvaa, idha imasmi.m saasane ^b^sato^eb^  sampajaano, ^b^pa.n.dito^eb^ bhikkhu, ^b^yadaa^eb^ yasmi.m kaale  lakkha.nuupanijjhaanena jhaayati. ^b^tato^eb^ vipassanaaratito  maggaphalaratito ca ^b^paramatara.m^eb^ uttamatara.m rati.m ^b^na vindati^eb^  nappa.tilabhati. tenaaha bhagavaa --
text.7430: [03] eva.m ^a^P2.0219^ea^ pari~n~naabhisamayamukhena vivekarati.m  dassetvaa idaani pahaanaabhisamayaadimukhenapi ta.m dassetu.m dutiyaadikaa  tisso gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^dukkhassaavahani^eb^nti dukkhassa  aayati.m pavatti.m, dukkhassa nipphattikanti attho. ^b^visattika^eb^nti  ta.nha.m. saa hi visataati visattikaa, visaalaati visattikaa,  visa.taati visattikaa, visakkatiiti visattikaa, visa.m haratiiti  visattikaa, visa.mvaadikaati visattikaa, visamuulaati visattikaa,  visaphalaati visattikaa, visaparibhogaati visattikaa, visaalaa vaa  pana saa ta.nhaa ruupe sadde gandhe rase pho.t.thabbe dhamme kule ^a^V2.0139^ea^ ga.ne  vittha.taati visattikaati vuccati.  ^b^papa~ncasa"nghaatadukhaadhivaahini^eb^nti sattasantaana.m sa.msaare papa~ncenti  vitthaarentiiti papa~ncaa, raagaadayo maanaadayo ca. te eva  pavattidukkhassa sa"nghaata.t.thena sa"nghaataa, sadarathapari.laahasabhaavattaa  dukkha~ncaati papa~ncasa"nghaatadukha.m, tassa adhivaahato nibbattanato  papa~ncasa"nghaatadukhaadhivaahinii. ta.m ta.nha.m ^b^pahantvaanaa^eb^ti  ariyamaggena samucchinditvaa.
text.7431: [03] ^b^siva^eb^nti ^a^M2.0163^ea^ khema.m, akhemakaraana.m kilesaana.m samucchindanena  tehi anupaddutanti attho. sammaadi.t.thiaadiina.m vasena dvicatura"ngo hutvaa  ariye nibbaana.m gametiiti ^b^dvecatura"ngagaamina.m,^eb^ gaathaasukhattha~ncettha  vibhattialopo katoti da.t.thabba.m. ruupuupapattimaggaadiisu sabbesu maggesu  uttamattaa ^b^magguttama.m^eb^. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``maggaana.t.tha"ngiko  se.t.tho''tiaadi (dha0 pa0 273). sabbehi kilesamalehi sattaana.m  sodhanato ^b^sabbakilesasodhana.m. pa~n~naaya passitvaa^eb^ti  pa.tivedhapa~n~naaya bhaavanaabhisamayavasena abhisamecca.
text.7432: [03] sokahetuuna.m abhaavato puggalassa ca sokaabhaavahetuto natthi ettha  sokoti ^b^asoka.m^eb^. tathaa vigataraagaadirajattaa ^b^viraja.m^eb^. na  kenaci paccayena sa"nkhatanti ^b^asa"nkhata.m^eb^. sabbesa.m kilesaana.m  sabbassa ca dukkhassa vuupasamabhaavato, sa.msaaradukkhadditehi pajjitabbato  adhigantabbato ca ^b^santa.m pada.m^eb^. sabbehi kilesamalehi  sattasantaanassa sodhananimittato ^b^sabbakilesasodhana.m. bhaavetii^eb^ti  sacchikiriyaabhisamayavasena abhisameti. bahukkhattu~nhi nibbaana.m  aarabbha sacchikiriyaabhisamaya.m pavattentassa aalambake  labbhamaanavisesaka.m aalambitabbe aaropetvaa eva.m vutta.m.  sa.myojanasa"nkhaataana.m bandhanaana.m chedanato ^b^sa.myojanabandhanacchida.m^eb^.  nimitta~nhettha kattubhaavena upacaarita.m, yathaa ariyabhaavakaraani saccaani  ariyasaccaaniiti. yathaa purimagaathaasu yadaa jhaayati, tadaa ^a^P2.0220^ea^  tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindatiiti yojanaa. eva.m idha  yadaa bhaaveti, tadaa tato rati.m paramatara.m na vindatiiti yojanaa.
text.7433: [03] eva.m thero catuuhi gaathaahi attaana.m anupanetvaava  catusaccapa.tivedhakittanena a~n~na.m byaakaritvaa idaani attanaa  vasita.t.thaanassa vivittabhaavena phaasuta.m dassento ^b^``yadaa  nabhe''^eb^tiaadikaa gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^b^nabhe^eb^ti aakaase.  siniddhagambhiiranigghosataaya meghoyeva dundubhi ^b^meghadundubhi^eb^.  samantato paggharantiihi dhaaraahi aakulaati ^b^dhaaraakulaa^eb^. vihagaana.m  pakkhiina.m gamanamaggattaa ^b^vihagapathe^eb^ nabheti yojanaa.  ^b^tato^eb^ti jhaanaratito.
text.7434: [03] ^b^kusumaakulaana^eb^nti ^a^M2.0164^ea^ taruuhi ga.litakusumehi samohitaana.m.  ^b^vicittavaaneyyava.ta.msakaana^eb^nti vane jaatattaa ^a^V2.0140^ea^ vaaneyyaani  vanapupphaani, vicittaani vaaneyyaani va.ta.msakaani etaasanti  vicittavaaneyyava.ta.msakaa nadiyo, taasa.m naanaavidhavanapupphava.ta.msakaananti  attho. uttarimanussadhammavasena sundaro mano etassaati  ^b^sumano^eb^ jhaayati.
text.7435: [01] ^b^nisiithe^eb^ti rattiya.m. ^b^rahitamhii^eb^ti,  janasambaadhavirahite vivitte. ^b^deve^eb^ti meghe. ^b^ga.lantamhii^eb^ti  vu.t.thidhaaraayo paggharante vassante. ^b^daa.thino^eb^ti siihabyagghaadayo  pa.tipakkhasattaa. te hi daa.thaavudhaati ``daa.thino''ti vuccanti,  ^b^nadanti daa.thino^eb^ti idampi janavivekadassanatthameva gahita.m.
text.7436: [03] ^b^vitakke uparundhiyattano^eb^ti attasantaanapariyaapannataaya  attano kaamavitakkaadike micchaavitakke pa.tipakkhabalena nisedhetvaa.  attanoti vaa ida.m vindatiiti iminaa yojetabba.m ``tato rati.m  paramatara.m attanaa na vindatii''ti. ^b^nagantare^eb^ti pabbatantare.  ^b^nagavivara^eb^nti pabbataguha.m pabbhaara.m vaa. ^b^samassito^eb^ti  nissito upagato. ^b^viitaddaro^eb^ti vigatakilesadaratho.  ^b^viitakhilo^eb^ti pahiinacetokhilo.
text.7437: [03] ^b^sukhii^eb^ti jhaanaadisukhena sukhito.  ^b^malakhilasokanaasano^eb^ti raagaadiina.m malaana.m pa~ncanna~nca  cetokhilaana.m ~naativiyogaadihetukassa sokassa ca pahaayako.  ^b^niragga.lo^eb^ti, agga.la.m vuccati avijjaa  nibbaanapurapavesanivaara.nato, tadabhaavato niragga.lo.  ^b^nibbanatho^eb^ti nita.nho. ^b^visallo^eb^ti, vigataraagaadisallo.  ^b^sabbaasave^eb^ti, kaamaasavaadike sabbepi aasave.  ^b^byantikato^eb^ti byantikataavii ariyamaggena vigatante katvaa .thito  di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarattha.m yadaa jhaayati, tato jhaanaratito paramatara.m rati.m  na vindatiiti yojanaa. eva.m pana vatvaa thero ajakara.niitiirameva  gato.
text.7442: [03] dasakanipaate ^a^M2.0165^ea^ ^a^V2.0141^ea^ ^a^P2.0221^ea^ ^b^a"ngaarino^eb^tiaadikaa  aayasmato kaa.ludaayittherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi  padumuttarabuddhassa kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu  dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m kulappasaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane  .thapenta.m disvaa tajja.m abhiniihaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi.
text.7443: [03] so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m  bodhisattassa maatukucchiya.m pa.tisandhiggaha.nadivase kapilavatthusmi.myeva  amaccagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. bodhisattena saddhi.m ekadivasa.myeva  jaatoti ta.mdivasa.myeva na.m dukuulacumba.te nipajjaapetvaa bodhisattassa  upa.t.thaana.m nayi.msu. bodhisattena hi saddhi.m bodhirukkho, raahulamaataa,  cattaaro nidhii, aarohaniyahatthii, assaka.n.dako, channo kaa.ludaayiiti  ime satta ekadivasa.myeva jaatattaa sahajaataa naama ahesu.m. athassa  naamaggaha.nadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jaatattaa  ^b^udaayii^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu, thoka.m kaa.ladhaatukattaa pana  ^b^kaa.ludaayii^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so bodhisattena saddhi.m kumaarakii.la.m  kii.lanto vuddhi.m agamaasi.
text.7444: [03] aparabhaage lokanaathe mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa anukkamena  sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakke raajagaha.m upanissaaya ve.luvane  viharante suddhodanamahaaraajaa ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa purisasahassaparivaara.m eka.m  amacca.m ``putta.m me idhaanehii''ti pesesi. so dhammadesanaavelaaya satthu  santika.m gantvaa parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m sutvaa sapariso arahatta.m  paapu.ni. atha ne satthaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaareti.  sabbe ta"nkha.na.myeva iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya ahesu.m.  arahatta.m pattato pa.t.thaaya pana ariyaa majjhattaava honti, tasmaa ra~n~naa  pahitasaasana.m dasabalassa na kathesi. raajaa ``neva gatabalako.t.thako  aagacchati, na saasana.m suyyatii''ti aparampi amacca.m purisasahassena ^a^M2.0166^ea^  pesesi ^a^V2.0142^ea^. tasmimpi tathaa pa.tipanne aparanti eva.m navahi amaccehi  saddhi.m nava purisasahassaani pesesi sabbe arahatta.m patvaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.
text.7445: [03] atha raajaa cintesi -- ``ettakaa janaa mayi sinehaabhaavena  dasabalassa idhaagamanatthaaya na ki~nci kathayi.msu, aya.m kho pana  udaayii dasabalena samavayo sahapa.msukii.liko, mayi ca sinehavaa, ima.m  pesessaamii''ti ta.m pakkosaapetvaa, ``taata, tva.m purisasahassaparivaaro  raajagaha.m gantvaa dasabala.m aanehii''ti vatvaa pesesi. so pana  gacchanto ``sacaaha.m, deva, pabbajitu.m labhissaami, evaaha.m bhagavanta.m  idhaanessaamii''ti ^a^P2.0222^ea^ vatvaa ``ya.m ki~nci katvaa mama  putta.m dassehii''ti vutto raajagaha.m gantvaa satthu dhammadesanaavelaaya  parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m sutvaa saparivaaro arahatta.m patvaa  ehibhikkhubhaave pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.4.48-63) --
text.7453: [22] sudukkara.m kata.m tena, yo me puppha.m adaasida.m..
text.7463: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.7471: [22] udaayii naama naamena, hessati satthu saavako..
text.7472: [21] ``raago doso ca moho ca, maano makkho ca dha.msito.

text.748: [03] eva.m yaani nimittaani a"nkuse katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa  arahatta.m paapu.ni, tehi saddhi.m attano cittadamana.m sa.msanditvaa a~n~na.m  byaakaronto ^b^``udaka~nhi nayanti nettikaa''^eb^ti gaatha.m abhaasi.
text.7480: [22] te accimantova pabhaasayanti, samayo mahaaviira  bhaagiirasaana.m..

text.749: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^udaka.m hii^eb^ti ^b^hi^eb^-saddo  nipaatamatta.m. ^b^nayantii^eb^ti pathaviyaa ta.m ta.m thala.t.thaana.m kha.nitvaa  ninna.t.thaana.m puuretvaa maatika.m vaa katvaa rukkhado.ni.m vaa .thapetvaa attano  icchiticchita.t.thaana.m nenti. tathaa te nentiiti ^b^nettikaa.  tejana^eb^nti ka.n.da.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- nettikaa attano ruciyaa  icchiticchita.t.thaana.m udaka.m ^b^nayanti, usukaaraa^eb^pi taapetvaa tejana.m  ^b^namayanti^eb^ uju.m karonti. namanavasena ^b^tacchakaa^eb^  nemiaadiina.m atthaaya tacchantaa ^b^daaru.m namayanti^eb^ attano ruciyaa  uju.m vaa va"nka.m vaa karonti. eva.m ettaka.m aaramma.na.m ^a^P1.0078^ea^  katvaa ^b^subbataa^eb^ yathaasamaadinnena ^a^V1.0075^ea^ siilaadinaa sundaravataa dhiiraa  sotaapattimaggaadiina.m uppaadentaa ^b^attaana.m damenti,^eb^ arahatta.m pana  pattesu ekantadantaa naama hontiiti.

text.7512: [03] tattha ^b^a"ngaarino^eb^ti a"ngaaraani viyaati a"ngaaraani,  rattapavaa.lava.n.naani rukkhaana.m pupphapallavaani, taani etesa.m santiiti  a"ngaarino, atilohitakusumakisalayehi a"ngaaravu.t.thisa.mpariki.n.naa  viyaati attho. ^b^idaanii^eb^ti imasmi.m kaale. ^b^dumaa^eb^ti  rukkhaa. bhadanteti, bhadda.m ante etassaati bhadanteti ekassa  dakaarassa lopa.m katvaa vuccati, gu.navisesayutto, gu.navisesayuttaana~nca  aggabhuuto satthaa. tasmaa bhadanteti satthu aalapana.m.  paccattavacana~nceta.m ekaaranta.m ``suka.te pa.tikamme sukhe dukkhepi  ce''tiaadiisu viya. idha pana sambodhanatthe da.t.thabba.m. tena vutta.m  ``bhadanteti aalapana''nti. ``bhaddasaddasamaanattha.m padantarameka''nti  keci. phalaani esantiiti ^b^phalesino^eb^. acetanepi hi  sacetanakiriyamaaropetvaa voharanti, yathaa kula.m patitukaamanti, phalaani  gahetumaaraddhaa sampattiphalagaha.nakaalaati attho. ^b^chadana.m  vippahaayaa^eb^ti puraa.napa.n.naani pajahitvaa sampannapa.n.dupalaasaati attho.  ^b^te^eb^ti dumaa. ^b^accimantova pabhaasayantii^eb^ti diipasikhaavanto  viya jalitaaggii viya vaa obhaasayanti sabbaa disaati adhippaayo.  ^b^samayo^eb^ti kaalo, ``anuggahaayaa''ti vacanaseso.  ^b^mahaaviiraa^eb^ti mahaavikkanta. ^b^bhaagii rasaana^eb^nti attharasaadiina.m  bhaagii. vutta~nheta.m dhammasenaapatinaa -- ``bhaagii vaa bhagavaa  attharasassa dhammarasassaa''tiaadi (cuu.lani0 ajitamaa.navapucchaaniddesa  2). mahaaviira, bhaagiiti ca idampi dvaya.m sambodhanavacana.m da.t.thabba.m.  bhaagiirathaananti pana paa.the bhagiiratho naama ^a^P2.0224^ea^  aadiraajaa. tabba.msajaatataaya saakiyaa bhaagiirathaa, tesa.m bhaagiirathaana.m  upakaaratthanti adhippaayo.
text.7513: [03] ^b^dumaanii^eb^ti li"ngavipallaasena vutta.m, dumaa rukkhaati attho.  ^b^samantato sabbadisaa pavantii^eb^ti, samantato sabbabhaagato  sabbadisaasu ca phullaani, tathaa phullattaa eva sabbadisaa pavanti gandha.m  vissajjenti. ^b^aasamaanaa^eb^ti aasiisantaa ^a^M2.0170^ea^ gahitukaamaa. eva.m  rukkhasobhaaya gamanamaggassa ^a^V2.0145^ea^ raama.neyyata.m dassetvaa idaani  ^b^``nevaatisiita''^eb^ntiaadinaa utusampatti.m dasseti.  ^b^sukhaa^eb^ti naatisiitanaatiu.nhabhaaveneva sukhaa i.t.thaa. ^b^utu  addhaniyaa^eb^ti addhaanagamanayoggaa utu. ^b^passantu ta.m saakiyaa  ko.liyaa ca, pacchaamukha.m rohiniya.m taranta^eb^nti rohinii naama nadii  saakiyako.liyajanapadaana.m antare uttaradisato dakkhi.namukhaa sandati,  raajagaha.m cassaa puratthimadakkhi.naaya disaaya, tasmaa raajagahato  kapilavatthu.m gantu.m ta.m nadi.m tarantaa pacchaamukhaa hutvaa taranti. tenaaha  ``passantu ta.m...pe0... taranta''nti. ``bhagavanta.m pacchaamukha.m  rohini.m naama nadi.m atikkamanta.m saakiyako.liyajanapadavaasino  passantuu''ti kapilavatthugamanaaya bhagavanta.m aayaacanto ussaaheti.
text.7514: [03] idaani attano patthana.m upamaahi pakaasento ^b^``aasaaya  kasate''^eb^ti gaathamaaha. ^b^aasaaya kasate khetta^eb^nti kassako  kasanto khetta.m phalaasaaya kasati. ^b^biija.m aasaaya vappatii^eb^ti  kasitvaa ca vapantena phalaasaaya eva biija.m vappati nikkhipiiyati.  ^b^aasaaya vaa.nijaa yantii^eb^ti dhanahaarakaa vaa.nijaa dhanaasaaya samudda.m  taritu.m desa.m upagantu.m samudda.m naavaaya yanti gacchanti. ^b^yaaya  aasaaya ti.t.thaamii^eb^ti eva.m ahampi yaaya aasaaya patthanaaya bhagavaa  tumhaaka.m kapilapuragamanapatthanaaya idha ti.t.thaami. saa me aasaa  samijjhatu, tumhehi ``kapilavatthu gantabba''nti vadati, aasaaya  sadisataaya cettha kattukamyataachanda.m aasaati aaha.
text.7515: [03] gamanamaggasa.mva.n.nanaadinaa anekavaara.m yaacanaaya kaara.na.m dassetu.m  ^b^``punappuna''^eb^ntiaadi vutta.m. tassattho -- saki.m vuttamattena vappe  asampajjamaane kassakaa ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ dutiyampi tatiyampi biija.m  vapanti. pajjunno ^b^devaraajaa^eb^pi ekavaarameva avassitvaa  ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ kaalena kaala.m vassati. kassakaapi ekavaarameva  akasitvaa sassasampattiattha.m pa.msu.m kaddama.m vaa mudu.m kaatu.m khetta.m punappuna.m  kasanti. ekavaarameva dha~n~na.m sa"ngaha.m katvaa ^a^P2.0225^ea^  ``alamettaavataa''ti aparitussanato ko.t.thaagaaraadiisu pa.tisaamanavasena  manussehi upaniiyamaana.m punappuna.m saaliaadi^b^dha~n~na.m^eb^ ra.t.tha.m ^b^upeti^eb^  upagacchati.
text.7516: [03] ^b^yaacanakaa^eb^pi ^a^M2.0171^ea^ yaacantaa punappuna.m kulaani ^b^caranti^eb^  upagacchanti, na ekavaarameva, yaacitaa pana tesa.m punappuna.m daanapatii  dadanti, na saki.myeva. tathaa pana deyyadhamma.m punappuna.m daanapatii  ^b^daditvaa^eb^ daanamaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinitvaa ^b^punappuna.m^eb^ aparaapara.m  ^b^saggamupenti .thaana.m^eb^ pa.tisandhivasena devaloka.m upagacchanti.  tasmaa ahampi punappuna.m yaacaami bhagavaa mayha.m manoratha.m matthaka.m  paapehiiti adhippaayo.
text.7517: [03] idaani ^a^V2.0146^ea^ yadattha.m satthaara.m kapilavatthugamana.m yaacati, ta.m dassetu.m  ^b^``viiro have''^eb^tigaathamaaha. tassattho -- ^b^viiro^eb^ viiriyavaa  mahaavikkanto ^b^bhuuripa~n~no^eb^ mahaapa~n~no puriso ^b^yasmi.m^eb^ kule  ^b^jaayati^eb^ nibbattati, tattha ^b^have^eb^ eka.msena ^b^sattayuga.m^eb^  sattapurisayuga.m yaavasattama.m pitaamahayuga.m sammaapa.tipattiyaa ^b^puneti^eb^  sodhetiiti lokavaado ativaado a~n~nesu. bhagavaa pana sabbesa.m devaana.m  uttamadevataaya ^b^devadevo^eb^ paapanivaara.nena kalyaa.napati.t.thaapanena tato  parampi sodhetu.m ^b^sakkati^eb^ sakkotiiti ma~n~naami aha.m. kasmaa?  ^b^tayaa hi jaato muni saccanaamo^eb^ yasmaa tayaa satthaaraa ariyaaya  jaatiyaa jaato munibhaavo, muni vaa samaano attahitaparahitaana.m  idhalokaparalokaana~nca munana.t.thena ``munii''ti avitathanaamo, monavaa  vaa muni, ``sama.no pabbajito isii''ti avitathanaamo tayaa jaato.  tasmaa sattaana.m ekantahitapa.tilaabhahetubhaavato bhagavaa tava tattha gamana.m  yaacaamaati attho.
text.7518: [03] idaani ``sattayuga''nti vutte pituyuga.m dassetu.m ^b^``suddhodano  naamaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. suddha.m odana.m jiivana.m etassaati  ^b^suddhodano^eb^. buddhapitaa hi eka.msato  suvisuddhakaayavaciimanosamaacaaro suvisuddhaajiivo hoti tathaa  abhiniihaarasampannattaa. ^b^maayanaamaa^eb^ti  kularuupasiilaacaaraadisampattiyaa ~naatimittaadiihi ``maa yaahii''ti  vattabbagu.nataaya ``maayaa''ti laddhanaamaa. ^b^parihariyaa^eb^ti dhaaretvaa.  ^b^kaayassa bhedaa^eb^ti sadevakassa lokassa cetiyasadisassa  attano kaayassa vinaasato uddha.m. ^b^tidivamhii^eb^ti tusitadevaloke.
text.7519: [03] ^b^saa^eb^ti maayaadevii. ^b^gotamii^eb^ti gottena ta.m kitteti.  ^b^dibbehi kaamehii^eb^ti, tusitabhavanapariyaapannehi dibbehi  vatthukaamehi. ^b^sama"ngibhuutaa^eb^ti samannaagataa. ^b^kaamagu.nehii^eb^ti  kaamako.t.thaasehi, ``kaamehii''ti vatvaa ^a^M2.0172^ea^ puna ``kaamagu.nehii''ti vacanena  anekabhaagehi vatthukaamehi paricaariyatiiti diipeti. ^b^tehii^eb^ti  yasmi.m devanikaaye nibbatti, tehi tusitadevaga.nehi, tehi vaa  kaamagu.nehi. ``sama"ngibhuutaa parivaaritaa''ti ca ^a^P2.0226^ea^  itthili"nganiddeso purimattabhaavasiddha.m itthibhaava.m, devataabhaava.m vaa sandhaaya  kato, devuupapatti pana purisabhaaveneva jaataa.
text.752: [03] ^b^mara.ne me bhaya.m natthii^eb^ti aayasmato ajitattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? so kira ekanavute kappe vipassi.m bhagavanta.m  passitvaa pasannacitto kapitthaphala.m adaasi. tato parampi ta.m ta.m pu~n~na.m  katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m kappe anuppanne eva amhaaka.m  satthari saavatthiya.m mahaakosalara~n~no aggaasaniyassa braahma.nassa putto  hutvaa nibbatti. tassa ^b^ajito^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. tasmi~nca  samaye ^a^M1.0091^ea^ saavatthivaasii baavarii naama braahma.no tiihi mahaapurisalakkha.nehi  samannaagato ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu saavatthito nikkhamitvaa  taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa godhaavariitiire kapitthaaraame vasati. atha  ajito tassa santike pabbajito atthakaamaaya devataaya coditena  baavarinaa satthu santika.m pesito tissametteyyaadiihi saddhi.m bhagavanta.m  upasa"nkamitvaa manasaava pa~nhe pucchitvaa tesu vissajjitesu pasannacitto  satthu santike pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa  arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  2.52.7-11) --
text.7520: [03] eva.m therena yaacito bhagavaa tattha gamane bahuuna.m visesaadhigama.m  disvaa viisatisahassa khii.naasavaparivuto raajagahato  aturitacaarikaavasena kapilavatthugaamimagga.m pa.tipajji. thero iddhiyaa  kapilavatthu.m gantvaa ra~n~no purato aakaase .thito adi.t.thapubba.m vesa.m  disvaa ra~n~naa ``kosi ^a^V2.0147^ea^ tva''nti pucchito, ``sace amaccaputta.m tayaa  bhagavato santika.m pesita.m ma.m na jaanaasi, eva.m pana jaanaahii''ti  dassento --
text.7522: [22] pitupitaa mayha.m tuva.msi sakka, dhammena me gotama  ayyakosii''ti.. --
text.7524: [03] tattha ^b^buddhassa puttomhii^eb^ti, sabba~n~nubuddhassa ure jaatataaya  orasaputto amhi. ^b^asayhasaahino^eb^ti, abhisambodhito pubbe  .thapetvaa mahaabodhisatta.m a~n~nehi sahitu.m vahitu.m asakku.neyyattaa asayhassa  sakalassa bodhisambhaarassa mahaakaaru.nikaadhikaarassa ca sahanato  vahanato, tato parampi a~n~nehi sahitu.m abhibhavitu.m asakku.neyyattaa  asayhaana.m pa~ncanna.m maaraana.m sahanato abhibhavanato,  aasayaanusayacaritaadhimuttiaadivibhaagaavabodhanena yathaaraha.m veneyyaana.m  di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi anusaasaniisa"nkhaatassa a~n~nehi  asayhassa buddhakiccassa ca sahanato, tattha vaa saadhukaariibhaavato  asayhasaahino. ^b^a"ngiirasassaa^eb^ti a"ngiikatasiilaadisampattikassa.  ``a"ngama"ngehi nicchara.nakaobhaasassaa''ti apare. keci pana  ``a"ngiiraso, siddhatthoti dve ^a^M2.0173^ea^ naamaani pitaraayeva gahitaanii''ti  vadanti. ^b^appa.timassaa^eb^ti anuupamassa. i.t.thaani.t.thesu  taadilakkha.nappattiyaa ^b^taadino. pitupitaa mayha.m tuva.msii^eb^ti  ariyajaativasena mayha.m pitu sammaasambuddhassa lokavohaarena tva.m pitaa  asi. ^b^sakkaa^eb^ti jaativasena raajaana.m aalapati.  ^b^dhammenaa^eb^ti sabhaavena ariyajaati lokiyajaatiiti dvinna.m jaatiina.m  sabhaavasamodhaanena ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti raajaana.m gottena aalapati.  ^b^ayyakosii^eb^ti pitaamaho asi. ettha ca ``buddhassa  puttomhii''tiaadi.m vadanto thero a~n~na.m byaakaasi.
text.7525: [03] eva.m ^a^P2.0227^ea^ pana attaana.m jaanaapetvaa ha.t.thatu.t.thena  ra~n~naa mahaarahe palla"nke nisiidaapetvaa attano pa.tiyaaditassa  naanaggarasassa bhojanassa patta.m puuretvaa dinne gamanaakaara.m dasseti.  ``kasmaa gantukaamattha, bhu~njathaa''ti ca vutte, ``satthu santika.m gantvaa  bhu~njissaamii''ti. ``kaha.m pana satthaa''ti?  ``viisatisahassabhikkhuparivaaro tumhaaka.m dassanatthaaya magga.m  pa.tipanno''ti. ``tumhe ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa yaava mama putto  ima.m nagara.m sampaapu.naati, taavassa itova pi.n.dapaata.m harathaa''ti. thero  bhattakicca.m katvaa ra~n~no parisaaya ca dhamma.m kathetvaa satthu aagamanato  puretarameva sakala.m raajanivesana.m ratanattaye abhippasanna.m karonto sabbesa.m  passantaana.myeva satthu aaharitabbabhattapu.n.na.m patta.m aakaase vissajjetvaa  sayampi vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ^a^V2.0148^ea^ pi.n.dapaata.m upanetvaa satthu hatthe .thapesi.  satthaa ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~nji. eva.m sa.t.thiyojana.m magga.m divase divase  yojana.m gacchantassa satthu raajagehatova bhatta.m aaharitvaa adaasi. atha  na.m bhagavaa ``mayha.m pitu mahaaraajassa sakalanivesana.m pasaadesii''ti  kulappasaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.
text.7528: [03] ^b^purato^eb^ ^a^M2.0174^ea^ ^b^pacchato vaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  ekavihaariyattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapadasabalassa  kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa vivekavaasa.m vasi.
text.7529: [03] so tena pu~n~nakammena eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m buddhuppaade bhagavati parinibbute dhammaasokara~n~no kani.t.thabhaataa  hutvaa nibbatti. asokamahaaraajaa kira satthu parinibbaanato dvinna.m  vassasataana.m upari a.t.thaarasame vasse sakalajambudiipe ekarajjaabhiseka.m  patvaa attano kani.t.tha.m tissakumaara.m oparajje .thapetvaa ekena upaayena ta.m  saasane abhippasanna.m akaasi. so ekadivasa.m migava.m gato ara~n~ne  yonakamahaadhammarakkhitatthera.m hatthinaagena saalasaakha.m gahetvaa  biijiyamaana.m nisinna.m disvaa sa~njaatapasaado ``aho vataahampi aya.m  mahaathero viya pabbajitvaa ara~n~ne vihareyya''nti cintesi. thero  ^a^P2.0228^ea^ tassa cittaacaara.m ~natvaa tassa passantasseva  aakaasa.m abbhuggantvaa asokaaraame pokkhara.niyaa abhijjamaane udake  .thatvaa ciivara~nca uttaraasa"nga~nca aakaase olaggetvaa nhaayitu.m aarabhi.  kumaaro therassa aanubhaava.m disvaa abhippasanno ara~n~nato nivattitvaa  raajageha.m gantvaa ``pabbajissaamii''ti ra~n~no aarocesi. raajaa ta.m  anekappakaara.m yaacitvaa pabbajjaadhippaaya.m nivattetu.m naasakkhi. so  upaasako hutvaa pabbajjaasukha.m patthento --
text.7531: [21] ``purato pacchato vaapi, aparo ce na vijjati.
text.7532: [22] atiiva phaasu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane..
text.7549: [03] tattha ^b^purato pacchato vaa^eb^ti attano purato vaa pacchato  vaa, ^b^vaa^eb^-saddassa vikappatthattaa passato vaa ^b^aparo^eb^ a~n~no  jano na vijjati ce, ^b^atiiva^eb^ ativiya ^b^phaasu^eb^ cittasukha.m  bhavati. ekavihaariibhaavena ^b^ekassa^eb^ asahaayassa. ^b^vane  vasato^eb^ti ciraparicitena vivekajjhaasayena aaka.d.dhiyamaanahadayo so  rattindiva.m mahaajanaparivutassa vasato sa"nga.nikavihaara.m nibbindanto  vivekasukha~nca bahu.m ma~n~nanto vadati.
text.7550: [03] ^b^handaa^eb^ti vossaggatthe nipaato, tena idaani kariiyamaanassa  ara~n~nagamanassa nicchitabhaavamaaha. ^b^eko gamissaamii^eb^ti  ``su~n~naagaare kho, gahapati, tathaagataa abhiramantii''tiaadivacanato  (cuu.lava0 306) buddhehi va.n.nita.m pasa.t.tha.m ara~n~na.m eko asahaayo  gamissaami vaasaadhippaayena upagacchaami. yasmaa ^b^ekavihaarissa^eb^  .thaanaadiisu asahaayabhaavena ekavihaarissa nibbaana.m pa.tipesitacittataaya  ^b^pahitattassa^eb^ adhisiilasikkhaadikaa tisso sikkhaa sikkhato  bhikkhuno ara~n~na.m ^b^phaasu^eb^ i.t.tha.m sukhaavahanti attho.
text.7551: [03] ^b^yogii-piitikara^eb^nti yogiina.m bhaavanaaya yuttappayuttaana.m  appasaddaadibhaavena jhaanavipassanaadipiiti.m aavahanato yogii-piitikara.m.  visabhaagaaramma.naabhaavena pa.tisallaanasaaruppataaya ^b^ramma.m.  mattaku~njarasevita^eb^nti ^a^P2.0229^ea^ mattavaravaara.navicarita.m,  iminaapi brahaara~n~nabhaavena janaviveka.myeva dasseti. ^b^atthavasii^eb^ti  idha atthoti sama.nadhammo adhippeto. ``katha.m nu kho so me  bhaveyyaa''ti tassa vasa.m gato.
text.7552: [03] ^b^supupphite^eb^ti ^a^M2.0176^ea^ ^a^V2.0150^ea^ su.t.thu pupphite. ^b^siitavane^eb^ti  chaayuudakasampattiyaa siite vane. ubhayenapi tassa rama.niiyata.myeva  vibhaaveti. ^b^girikandare^eb^ti giriina.m abbhantare kandare. kanti  hi udaka.m, tena daarita.m ninna.t.thaana.m kandara.m naama. taadise siitale  girikandare ghammaparitaapa.m vinodetvaa attano gattaani parisi~ncitvaa  nhaayitvaa ca"nkamissaami ekakoti katthaci anaayattavuttita.m dasseti.
text.7553: [03] ^b^ekaakiyo^eb^ti ekaakii asahaayo. ^b^adutiyo^eb^ti  ta.nhaasa"nkhaatadutiyaabhaavena adutiyo. ta.nhaa hi purisassa sabbadaa  avijahana.t.thena dutiyaa naama. tenaaha bhagavaa -- ``ta.nhaadutiyo  puriso, diighamaddhaana sa.msara''nti (itivu0 15, 105).
text.7554: [03] ^b^eva.m me kattukaamassaa^eb^ti ``handa eko  gamissaamii''tiaadinaa vuttavidhinaa ara~n~na.m gantvaa bhaavanaabhiyoga.m  kattukaamassa me. ^b^adhippaayo samijjhatuu^eb^ti ``kadaaha.m  viharissaami, katakicco anaasavo''ti eva.m pavatto manoratho ijjhatu  siddhi.m paapu.naatu. arahattappatti ca yasmaa na aayaacanamattena  sijjhati, naapi a~n~nena saadhetabbaa, tasmaa aaha  ^b^``saadhayissaamaha.myeva, naa~n~no a~n~nassa kaarako''^eb^ti.
text.7555: [03] eva.m uparaajassa pabbajjaaya da.lhanicchayata.m ~natvaa raajaa  asokaaraamagamaniiya.m magga.m ala"nkaaraapetvaa kumaara.m sabbaala"nkaaravibhuusita.m  mahatiyaa senaaya mahaccaraajaanubhaavena vihaara.m nesi. kumaaro  padhaanaghara.m gantvaa mahaadhammarakkhitattherassa santike pabbaji,  anekasataa manussaa ta.m anupabbaji.msu. ra~n~no bhaagineyyo  sa"nghamittaaya saamiko aggibrahmaapi tameva anupabbaji. so  pabbajitvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho attanaa kaatabba.m pakaasento --
text.7566: [03] tattha ^b^esa bandhaami sannaaha^eb^nti esaaha.m viiriyasa"nkhaata.m  sannaaha.m bandhaami, kaaye ca ^a^V2.0151^ea^ jiivite ca nirapekkho viiriyasannaahena  sannayhaami. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa naama suuro puriso paccatthike  paccupa.t.thite ^a^P2.0230^ea^ ta.m jetukaamo a~n~na.m kicca.m pahaaya  kavacapa.timuccanaadinaa yuddhaaya sannayhati, yuddhabhuumi~nca gantvaa  paccatthike ajetvaa tato na nivattati, evamahampi kilesapaccatthike  jetu.m aadittampi siisa.m cela~nca ajjhupekkhitvaa  catubbidhasammappadhaanaviiriyasannaaha.m sannayhaami, kilese ajetvaa  kilesavijayayogga.m viveka.t.thaana.m na vissajjemiiti. tena vutta.m  ^b^``pavisissaami kaanana.m na tato nikkhamissaami, appatto  aasavakkhaya''^eb^nti.
text.7567: [03] ^b^``maalute upavaayante''^eb^tiaadinaa ara~n~na.t.thaanassa  kamma.t.thaanabhaavanaayogyata.m vadati, ramissaami nuuna giribbajeti yojanaa.  pabbataparikkhepe abhiramissaami ma~n~neti anaagatattha.m parikappento  vadati. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyameva.
text.7568: [03] eva.m vatvaa thero ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karonto  upajjhaayena saddhi.m kali"ngara.t.tha.m agamaasi. tatthassa paade  cammikaabaadho uppajji, ta.m disvaa eko vejjo ``sappi.m, bhante,  pariyesatha, tikicchissaami na''nti aaha. thero sappipariyesana.m  akatvaa vipassanaaya eva kamma.m karoti, rogo va.d.dhati, vejjo therassa  tattha appossukkata.m disvaa sayameva sappi.m pariyesitvaa thera.m aroga.m  akaasi. so arogo hutvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.1-12) --

text.759: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^mara.ne^eb^ti mara.nanimitta.m mara.nahetu.  ^b^me^eb^ti mayha.m, bhaya.m natthi ucchinnabhavamuulataaya parikkhii.najaatikattaa  ^a^P1.0079^ea^. anucchinnabhavamuulaana~nhi ``kiidisii nu kho  mayha.m aayati.m uppattii''ti mara.nato bhaya.m bhaveyya. ^b^nikantii^eb^ti  apekkhaa ta.nhaa, saa natthi jiivite suparimadditasa"nkhaarataaya ^a^V1.0076^ea^  upaadaanakkhandhaana.m dukkhaasaarakaadibhaavena su.t.thu upa.t.thahanato. eva.mbhuuto  caaha.m ^b^sandeha.m^eb^ sariira.m, saka.m vaa deha.m dehasa"nkhaata.m dukkhabhaara.m  ^b^nikkhipissaami^eb^ cha.d.dessaami, nikkhipanto ca ```iminaa  sariirakena saadhetabba.m saadhita.m, idaani ta.m eka.msena cha.d.daniiyamevaa'ti  pa~n~naavepullappattiyaa ^b^sampajaano^eb^ sativepullappattiyaa ^b^pa.tissato^eb^  nikkhipissaamii''ti. ima.m pana gaatha.m vatvaa thero jhaana.m  samaapajjitvaa tadanantara.m parinibbaayiiti.
