text.7595: [03] ^b^anaagata.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0179^ea^ ^b^yo pa.tikacca passatii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  mahaakappinattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira  padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulaghare nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto  satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuovaadakaana.m  agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m ^a^P2.0231^ea^ disvaa tajja.m adhikaarakamma.m katvaa  ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi.
text.7596: [03] so tattha yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto  kassapasammaasambuddhakaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m  patto purisasahassaga.naje.t.thako hutvaa gabbhasahassapa.tima.n.dita.m mahanta.m  parive.na.m kaaraapesi. te sabbepi janaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa ta.m ^a^V2.0153^ea^  upaasaka.m je.t.thaka.m katvaa saputtadaaraa devaloke nibbattitvaa eka.m buddhantara.m  devamanussesu sa.msari.msu. tesu ga.naje.t.thako amhaaka.m satthu nibbattito  puretarameva paccantadese kukku.tanaamake nagare raajagehe nibbatti, tassa  ^b^kappino^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. sesapurisaa tasmi.myeva nagare  amaccakule nibbatti.msu. kappinakumaaro pitu accayena chatta.m  ussaapetvaa mahaakappinaraajaa naama jaato. so sutavittakataaya paatova  catuuhi dvaarehi siigha.m duute pesesi -- ``yattha bahussute passatha, tato  nivattitvaa mayha.m aarocethaa''ti.
text.7597: [03] tena ca samayena amhaaka.m satthaa loke uppajjitvaa saavatthi.m  upanissaaya viharati. tasmi.m kaale saavatthivaasino vaa.nijaa  saavatthiya.m u.t.thaanakabha.n.da.m gahetvaa ta.m nagara.m gantvaa bha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa  ``raajaana.m passissaamaa''ti pa.n.naakaarahatthaa ra~n~no aarocaapesu.m. te  raajaa pakkosaapetvaa niyyaaditapa.n.naakaare vanditvaa .thite ``kuto  aagatatthaa''ti pucchi. ``saavatthito, devaa''ti. ``kacci vo ra.t.tha.m  subhikkha.m, dhammiko raajaa''ti? ``aama, devaa''ti. ``kiidiso  dhammo tumhaaka.m dese idaani pavattatii''ti? ``ta.m, deva, na sakkaa  ucchi.t.thamukhehi kathetu''nti. raajaa suva.n.nabhi"ngaarena udaka.m daapesi.  te mukha.m vikkhaaletvaa dasabalaabhimukhaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa, ``deva,  amhaaka.m dese buddharatana.m naama uppanna''nti ^a^M2.0180^ea^ aaha.msu. ra~n~no  ``buddho''ti vacane sutamatteyeva sakalasariira.m pharamaanaa piiti uppajji.  tato ``buddhoti, taataa, vadethaa''ti aaha. ``buddhoti, deva,  vadaamaa''ti. eva.m tikkhattu.m vadaapetvaa ``buddhoti pada.m  aparimaa.na''nti tasmi.myeva pade pasanno satasahassa.m datvaa ``apara.m  vadethaa''ti pucchi. ``deva, loke dhammaratana.m naama uppanna''nti.  tampi ^a^P2.0232^ea^ sutvaa tatheva satasahassa.m datvaa ``apara.m  vadethaa''ti pucchi. ``deva, sa"ngharatana.m naama uppanna''nti. tampi  sutvaa tatheva satasahassa.m datvaa ``buddhassa bhagavato santike  pabbajissaamii''ti tatova nikkhami. amaccaapi tatheva nikkhami.msu.  so amaccasahassena saddhi.m ga"ngaatiira.m patvaa ``sace satthaa  sammaasambuddho, imesa.m assaana.m khuramattampi maa temetuu''ti saccaadhi.t.thaana.m  katvaa udakapi.t.theneva puura.m ga"ngaanadi.m atikkamitvaa aparampi  a.d.dhayojanavitthaara.m nadi.m tatheva atikkamitvaa tatiya.m candabhaaga.m naama  mahaanadi.m patvaa tampi taaya eva saccakiriyaaya atikkami.
text.7598: [03] satthaapi ta.mdivasa.m paccuusasamaya.myeva mahaakaru.naasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya  loka.m volokento ``ajja mahaakappino tiyojanasatika.m rajja.m pahaaya  amaccasahassaparivaaro mama santike pabbajitu.m aagamissatii''ti disvaa  ``mayaa tesa.m paccuggamana.m kaatu.m yutta''nti paatova sariirapa.tijaggana.m  katvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m  pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto ^a^V2.0154^ea^ sayameva aakaasena gantvaa candabhaagaaya nadiyaa tiire  tesa.m uttara.natitthassaabhimukha.t.thaane mahaanigrodhamuule palla"nkena nisinno  chabba.n.nabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi. te tena titthena uttarantaa  buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vidhaavantiyo olokento bhagavanta.m  disvaa ``ya.m satthaara.m uddissa maya.m aagataa, addhaa so eso''ti  dassaneneva ni.t.tha.m gantvaa di.t.tha.t.thaanato pa.t.thaaya onamitvaa  paramanipaccaakaara.m karontaa bhagavanta.m upasa"nkami.msu. raajaa bhagavato  gopphakesu gahetvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi saddhi.m  amaccasahassena. satthaa tesa.m dhamma.m desesi. desanaapariyosaane  saddhi.m parisaaya arahatte pati.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0  thera 2.54.66-107) --
text.76: [03] ettha ca ``siihaana.mvaa''ti iminaa theraana.m  siihasamaanavuttitaadassanena attano pa.tipakkhehi anabhibhavaniiyata.m, te  ca abhibhuyya pavatti.m dasseti. ``siihaana.mva nadantaana.m...pe0...  gaathaa''ti iminaa theragaathaana.m siihanaadasadisataadassanena taasa.m  paravaadehi anabhibhavaniiyata.m, te ca abhibhavitvaa pavatti.m dasseti.  ``bhaavitattaana''nti iminaa tadubhayassa kaara.na.m vibhaaveti.  bhaavitattabhaavena theraa idha siihasadisaa vuttaa, tesa~nca gaathaa  siihanaadasadisiyo. ``atthuupanaayikaa''ti iminaa abhibhavane  payojana.m dasseti. tattha theraana.m pa.tipakkho naama sa.mkilesadhammo,  tadabhibhavo tada"ngivikkhambhanappahaanehi saddhi.m samucchedappahaana.m. tasmi.m  sati pa.tipassaddhiippahaana.m nissara.nappahaana~nca siddhameva hoti, yato te  bhaavitattaati ^a^M1.0014^ea^ vuccanti. maggakkha.ne hi ariyaa appamaadabhaavana.m  bhaaventi naama, aggaphalakkha.nato pa.t.thaaya bhaavitattaa naamaati ^a^P1.0014^ea^  vuttovaayamattho.

text.764: [03] ^b^naaha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0092^ea^ ^a^V1.0077^ea^ ^b^bhayassa bhaayaamii^eb^ti aayasmato  nigrodhattherassa gaathaa.  kaa uppatti? aya.m kira ito a.t.thaarase kappasate  braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto kaamesu aadiinava.m nekkhamme  ca aanisa.msa.m disvaa gharabandhana.m pahaaya ara~n~naayatana.m pavisitvaa  a~n~natarasmi.m saalavane pa.n.nasaala.m katvaa taapasapabbaja.m pabbajitvaa  vanamuulaphalaahaaro vasati. tena samayena piyadassii naama  sammaasambuddho loke uppajjitvaa sadevakassa lokassa dhammaamatavassena  kilesasantaapa.m nibbaapento ekadivasa.m taapase anukampaaya ta.m saalavana.m  pavisitvaa nirodhasamaapatti.m samaapanno. taapaso vanamuulaphalatthaaya  gacchanto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso pupphitasaalada.n.dasaakhaayo  gahetvaa saalama.n.dapa.m katvaa ta.m sabbatthakameva saalapupphehi sa~nchaadetvaa  bhagavanta.m vanditvaa piitisomanassavaseneva aahaaratthaayapi agantvaa  namassamaano a.t.thaasi. satthaa nirodhato vu.t.thaaya tassa anukampaaya  ``bhikkhusa"ngho aagacchatuu''ti cintesi, ``bhikkhusa"nghepi ^a^P1.0080^ea^  citta.m pasaadessatii''ti. taavadeva bhikkhusa"ngho aagato.  so bhikkhusa"nghampi disvaa pasannamaanaso vanditvaa a~njali.m paggayha  a.t.thaasi. satthaa sitassa paatukara.naapadesena tassa bhaavini.m sampatti.m  pakaasento dhamma.m kathetvaa pakkaami saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. so tena  pu~n~nakammena devamanussesuyeva sa.msaranto viva.t.tuupanissaya.m bahu.m kusala.m  upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.namahaasaalakule  nibbatti, ^b^nigrodho^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so  jetavanapa.tiggaha.nadivase buddhaanubhaavadassanena sa~njaatappasaado pabbajitvaa  vipassana.m aarabhitvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. tena vutta.m  ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.49.190-220) --

text.7678: [03] arahatta.m ^a^M2.0184^ea^ patvaa pana te sabbeva satthaara.m pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. satthaa  te ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti aaha. saa eva tesa.m pabbajjaa upasampadaa  ca ahosi. satthaa ta.m bhikkhusahassa.m aadaaya aakaasena jetavana.m  agamaasi. athekadivasa.m bhagavaa tassantevaasike bhikkhuu aaha --  ``kacci, bhikkhave, kappino bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m desetii''ti? ``na,  bhagavaa, deseti ^a^V2.0157^ea^. appossukko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaramanuyutto viharati,  ovaadamattampi na detii''ti. satthaa ^a^P2.0233^ea^ thera.m  pakkosaapetvaa -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, kappina, antevaasikaana.m  ovaadamattampi na desii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``braahma.na,  maa eva.m kari, ajja pa.t.thaaya upagataana.m dhamma.m desehii''ti. ``saadhu,  bhante''ti thero satthu vacana.m sirasaa sampa.ticchitvaa ekovaadeneva  sama.nasahassa.m arahatte pati.t.thaapesi. tena na.m satthaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa attano  saavake there .thaanantare .thapento bhikkhuovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi.  athekadivasa.m thero bhikkhuniyo ovadanto --

text.77: [03] tesu tada"ngappahaanena nesa.m siilasampadaa dassitaa,  vikkhambhanappahaanena samaadhisampadaa, samucchedappahaanena pa~n~naasampadaa,  itarena taasa.m phala.m dassita.m. siilena ca tesa.m pa.tipattiyaa  aadikalyaa.nataa ^a^V1.0012^ea^ dassitaa, ``ko caadi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? siila~nca  suvisuddha.m'' (sa.m0 ni0  5.369), ``siile pati.t.thaaya'' (sa.m0 ni0   1.23; visuddhi0 1.1), ``sabbapaapassa akara.na''nti (dha0 pa0  183; dii0 ni0 2.90) ca vacanato siila.m pa.tipattiyaa  aadikalyaa.na.mva avippa.tisaaraadigu.naavahattaa. samaadhinaa  majjhekalyaa.nataa dassitaa, ``citta.m bhaavaya.m'', ``kusalassa  upasampadaa''ti ca vacanato samaadhipa.tipattiyaa majjhekalyaa.nova,  iddhividhaadigu.naavahattaa. pa~n~naaya pariyosaanakalyaa.nataa dassitaa,  ``sacittapariyodapana.m'' (dha0 pa0 183; dii0 ni0 2.90),  ``pa~n~na.m bhaavaya''nti (sa.m0 ni0  1.23; visuddhi0 1.1) ca  vacanato pa~n~naa pa.tipattiyaa pariyosaana.mva, pa~n~nuttarato kusalaana.m  dhammaana.m saava kalyaa.naa i.t.thaani.t.thesu taadibhaavaavahattaa.

text.7708: [21] ``tasmaa hi iccheyya kule vasante, medhaavino ceva  bahussute ca.
text.7709: [22] yesa~nhi pa~n~naavibhavena kicca.m, taranti naavaaya nadi.mva  pu.n.na''nti.. --
text.7711: [03] tattha ^a^V2.0158^ea^ ^a^P2.0234^ea^ ^b^anaagata^eb^nti na aagata.m,  avindanti, attho. ^b^pa.tikaccaa^eb^ti putetara.myeva. ^b^passatii^eb^ti  oloketi. ^b^attha^eb^nti kicca.m. ^b^ta.m dvaya^eb^nti hitaahita.m.  ^b^viddesino^eb^ti amittaa. ^b^hitesino^eb^ti mittaa.  ^b^randha^eb^nti chidda.m. ^b^samekkhamaanaa^eb^ti gavesantaa. ida.m vutta.m  hoti -- yo puggalo attano hitaavaha.m ahitaavaha.m tadubhaya~nca attha.m  kicca.m anaagata.m asampatta.m puretara.myeva pa~n~naacakkhunaa aha.m viya passati  viima.msati vicaareti, tassa amittaa vaa ahitajjhaasayena mittaa vaa  hitajjhaasayena randha.m gavesantaa na passanti, taadiso pa~n~navaa puggalo  acchiddavutti, tasmaa tumhehi tathaaruupehi bhavitabbanti.
text.7712: [03] idaani aanaapaanasatibhaavanaaya gu.na.m dassento tattha taani  yojetu.m ^b^``aanaapaanasatii yassaa''^eb^ti dutiya.m gaathamaaha. tattha  ^b^aana^eb^nti ^a^M2.0186^ea^ assaaso. ^b^apaana^eb^nti passaaso.  assaasapassaasanimittaaramma.naa sati aanaapaanasati. satisiisena  cettha ta.msampayuttasamaadhibhaavanaa adhippetaa. ^b^yassaa^eb^ti, yassa  yogino. ^b^paripu.n.naa subhaavitaa^eb^ti catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m  so.lasanna~nca aakaaraana.m paaripuuriyaa sabbaso pu.n.naa sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m  vijjaavimuttiina~nca paaripuuriyaa su.t.thu bhaavitaa va.d.dhitaa. ^b^anupubba.m  paricitaa, yathaa buddhena desitaa^eb^ti ``so satova  assasatii''tiaadinaa (dii0 ni0 2.374; ma0 ni0 1.107)  yathaa bhagavataa desitaa, tathaa anupubba.m anukkamena paricitaa aasevitaa  bhaavitaa. ^b^soma.m loka.m pabhaaseti, abbhaa muttova candimaa^eb^ti so  yogaavacaro yathaa abbhaadiupakkilesaa vimutto cando candaalokena ima.m  okaasaloka.m pabhaaseti, eva.m avijjaadiupakkilesavimutto ~naa.naalokena  attasantaanapatita.m parasantaanapatita~nca sa"nkhaaraloka.m pabhaaseti  pakaaseti. tasmaa tumhehi aanaapaanasatibhaavanaa bhaavetabbaati  adhippaayo.
text.7713: [03] idaani attaana.m nidassana.m katvaa bhaavanaabhiyogassa saphalata.m  dassento ^b^``odaata.m vata me citta''^eb^nti tatiya.m gaathamaaha.  tassattho -- niivara.namalavigamato ^b^odaata.m^eb^ suddha.m vata mama citta.m.  yathaa pamaa.nakaraa raagaadayo pahiinaa, appamaa.na~nca nibbaana.m paccakkha.m  kata.m ahosi, tathaa bhaavitattaa ^b^appamaa.na.m subhaavita.m,^eb^ tato eva  catusacca.m ^b^nibbiddha.m^eb^ pa.tivijjhita.m, sakalasa.mkilesapakkhato  ^b^paggahita~nca^eb^ hutvaa dukkhaadikaa pubbantaadikaa ca disaa obhaasate  tattha viti.n.naka"nkhattaa sabbadhammesu vigatasammohattaa ca. tasmaa  tumhehipi eva.m citta.m bhaavetabbanti dasseti.
text.7714: [03] yathaa bhaavanaamayaa pa~n~naa cittamalavisodhanaadinaa purisassa  bahupakaaraa, eva.m itaraapiiti dassento ^a^V2.0159^ea^ ^b^``jiivate vaapi  sappa~n~no''^eb^ti catutthagaathamaaha. tassattho -- parikkhii.nadhanopi  sappa~n~najaatiko itariitarasantosena santu.t.tho anavajjaaya jiivikaaya  jiivatiyeva. tassa hi jiivita.m jiivita.m naama. tenaaha bhagavaa --  ``pa~n~naajiivi.m jiivitamaahu se.t.tha''nti (sa.m0 ni0  1.73, 246;  su0 ni0 184). dummedhapuggalo pana pa~n~naaya alaabhena ^a^P2.0235^ea^  di.t.thadhammika.m samparaayika~nca attha.m ^a^M2.0187^ea^ viraadhento vittavaapi na  jiivati, garahaadippattiyaa jiivanto naama na tassa hoti,  anupaaya~n~nutaaya vaa yathaadhigata.m dhana.m naasento jiivitampi sandhaaretu.m na  sakkotiyeva, tasmaa paarihaariyapa~n~naapi tumhehi appamattehi  sampaadetabbaati adhippaayo.
text.7715: [03] idaani pa~n~naaya aanisa.mse dassetu.m ^b^``pa~n~naa  sutavinicchinii''^eb^ti pa~ncama.m gaathamaaha. tattha ^b^pa~n~naa  sutavinicchinii^eb^ti pa~n~naa naamesaa sutassa vinicchayinii, yathaasute  sotapathamaagate atthe ``aya.m akusalo, aya.m kusalo, aya.m saavajjo,  aya.m anavajjo''tiaadinaa vinicchayajananii.  ^b^kittisilokavaddhanii^eb^ti kittiyaa sammukhaa pasa.msaaya silokassa  pattha.tayasabhaavassa vaddhanii, pa~n~navatoyeva hi kittiaadayo vi~n~nuuna.m  paasa.msabhaavato. ^b^pa~n~naasahito^eb^ti paarihaariyapa~n~naaya,  vipassanaapa~n~naaya ca yutto. ^b^api dukkhesu sukhaani vindatii^eb^ti  ekantadukkhasabhaavesu khandhaayatanaadiisu sammaapa.tipattiyaa  yathaabhuutasabhaavaavabodhena niraamisaanipi sukhaani pa.tilabhati.
text.7716: [03] idaani taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m aniccataapa.tisa.myutta.m dhiirabhaavaavaha.m  dhamma.m kathento ^b^``naaya.m ajjatano dhammo''^eb^tiaadinaa sesagaathaa  abhaasi. tatraaya.m sa"nkhepattho -- yvaaya.m sattaana.m jaayanamiiyanasabhaavo,  aya.m dhammo ^b^ajjatano^eb^ adhunaagato na hoti, abhi.nhapavattikataaya  na acchariyo, abbhutapubbataabhaavato naapi ^b^abbhuto^eb^. tasmaa  ^b^yattha jaayetha miiyetha^eb^, yasmi.m loke satto jaayeyya, so eka.msena  miiyetha, tattha ^b^ki.m viya?^eb^ ki.m naama abbhuta.m siyaa?  sabhaavikattaa mara.nassa -- na hi kha.nikamara.nassa ki~nci kaara.na.m  atthi. yato ^b^anantara~nhi jaatassa, jiivitaa mara.na.m dhuva.m^eb^  jaatassa jaatisamanantara.m jiivitato mara.na.m ekantika.m uppannaana.m  khandhaana.m eka.msena bhijjanato. yo panettha jiivatiiti lokavohaaro,  so tadupaadaanassa anekapaccayaayattataaya anekantiko, yasmaa etadeva.m,  tasmaa ^b^jaataa marantiidha, eva.mdhammaa hi paa.nino^eb^ti aya.m sattaana.m  pakati, yadida.m jaataana.m mara.nanti jaatiyaa mara.naanubandhanata.m aaha.
text.7717: [03] idaani ^a^M2.0188^ea^ yasmaa taasu bhikkhuniisu kaaci sokabandhitacittaapi  atthi, tasmaa taasa.m sokavinodana.m kaatu.m ^b^``na  hetadatthaayaa^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^na hetadatthaaya matassa  hotii^eb^ti ya.m matassa ^a^V2.0160^ea^ ^b^jiivitattha.m^eb^ jiivitanimitta.m  ^b^paraporisaana.m^eb^ parapuggalaana.m ru.n.na.m, eta.m tassa matassa sattassa  jiivitattha.m taava ti.t.thatu, kassacipi atthaaya na hoti, ye pana  rudanti, tesampi ^b^matamhi^eb^ matapuggalanimitta.m ru.n.na.m, ^b^na yaso  na lokya.m^eb^ yasaavaha.m visuddhaavaha~nca na hoti ^a^P2.0236^ea^.  ^b^na va.n.nita.m sama.nabraahma.nehii^eb^ti vi~n~nuppasa.t.thampi na hoti, atha  kho vi~n~nugarahitamevaati attho.
text.7718: [03] na kevalameteva ye rudato aadiinavaa, atha kho imepiiti  dassento ^b^``cakkhu.m sariira.m upahantii''^eb^ti gaatha.m vatvaa tato para.m  sokaadianatthapa.tibaahanattha.m kalyaa.namittapayirupaasanaaya.m taa niyojento  ^b^``tasmaa''^eb^tiaadinaa osaanagaathamaaha. tattha ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti  yasmaa ru.n.na.m rudantassa puggalassa cakkhu.m sariira~nca ^b^upahanti^eb^  vibaadhati, tena ru.n.nena va.n.no bala.m mati ca ^b^nihiiyati^eb^  parihaayati, ^b^tassa^eb^ rudantassa puggalassa ^b^disaa^eb^ sapattaa  ^b^aanandino^eb^ pamodavanto piitivanto bhavanti. hitesino mittaa  dukkhii dukkhitaa bhavanti tasmaa dhammojapa~n~naaya samannaagatattaa  ^b^medhaavino^eb^ di.t.thadhammikaadiatthasannissitassa baahusaccassa  paaripuuriyaa ^b^bahussute,^eb^ attano kule vasante ^b^iccheyya^eb^  paa.tika"nkheyya kuluupake kareyya. ^b^yesa^eb^nti yesa.m medhaaviina.m  bahussutaana.m pa.n.ditaana.m ^b^pa~n~naavibhavena^eb^ pa~n~naabalena yathaa mahoghassa  pu.n.na.m nadi.m naavaaya taranti, eva.m kulaputtaa attano atthakicca.m  ^b^taranti^eb^ paara.m paapu.nanti. te iccheyya kule vasanteti yojanaa.
text.7719: [03] eva.m thero taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m dhamma.m kathetvaa vissajjesi. taa  therassa ovaade .thatvaa soka.m vinodetvaa yoniso pa.tipajjantiyo  sadattha.m paripuuresu.m.
text.7722: [03] ^b^dandhaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0189^ea^ ^b^mayha.m gatii^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato cuu.lapanthakattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? yadettha a.t.thuppattivasena vattabba.m, ta.m  a.t.thakanipaate mahaapanthakavatthusmi.m (theragaa0 a.t.tha0  2.mahaapanthakattheragaathaava.n.nanaa) vuttameva. aya.m pana viseso --  mahaapanthakatthero arahatta.m patvaa aggaphalasukhena viitinaamento cintesi  -- ``katha.m nu kho sakkaa cuu.lapanthakampi imasmi.m sukhe pati.t.thapetu''nti?  so attano ayyaka.m dhanase.t.thi.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaha -- ``sace,  mahaase.t.thi, anujaanaatha ^a^V2.0161^ea^, aha.m cuu.lapanthaka.m pabbaajeyya''nti.  ``pabbaajetha, bhante''ti. thero ta.m pabbaajesi. so dasasu siilesu  pati.t.thito bhaatu santike --
text.7723: [21] ``paduma.m yathaa kokanada.m sugandha.m, paato siyaa  phullamaviitagandha.m.
text.7724: [22] a"ngiirasa.m passa virocamaana.m,  tapantamaadiccamivantalikkhe''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0  1.123; a0  ni0  5.195) --
text.7725: [25] gaatha.m ^a^P2.0237^ea^ ugga.nhanto catuuhi maasehi  gahetu.m naasakkhi, gahitagahita.m pada.m hadaye na ti.t.thati. atha na.m  mahaapanthako aaha -- ``panthaka, tva.m imasmi.m saasane abhabbo, catuuhi  maasehi ekagaathampi gahetu.m na sakkosi. pabbajitakicca.m pana tva.m katha.m  matthaka.m paapessasi? nikkhama ito''ti. so therena pa.naamito  dvaarako.t.thakasamiipe rodamaano a.t.thaasi.
text.7726: [03] tena ca samayena satthaa jiivakambavane viharati. atha jiivako  purisa.m pesesi, ``pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m satthaara.m nimantehii''ti.  tena ca samayena aayasmaa mahaapanthako bhattuddesako hoti. so  ``pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m bhikkha.m pa.ticchatha, bhante''ti vutto  ``cuu.lapanthaka.m .thapetvaa sesaana.m pa.ticchaamii''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa  cuu.lapanthako bhiyyosomattaaya domanassappatto ahosi. satthaa tassa  cittakkheda.m ~natvaa, ``cuu.lapanthako mayaa katena upaayena  bujjhissatii''ti tassa aviduure .thaane attaana.m dassetvaa ``ki.m,  panthaka, rodasii''ti pucchi. ``bhaataa ma.m, bhante, pa.naametii''ti aaha.  ``panthaka, maa cintayi, mama saasane tuyha.m pabbajjaa, ehi, ima.m  gahetvaa `rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na'nti manasi karohii''ti iddhiyaa suddha.m  co.lakkha.n.da.m abhisa"nkharitvaa adaasi. so satthaaraa ^a^M2.0190^ea^ dinna.m  co.lakkha.n.da.m ``rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na''nti hatthena parimajjanto  nisiidi. tassa ta.m parimajjantassa kili.t.thadhaatuka.m jaata.m, puna  parimajjantassa ukkhaliparipu~nchanasadisa.m jaata.m. so ~naa.nassa  paripakkattaa eva.m cintesi -- ``ida.m co.lakkha.n.da.m pakatiyaa parisuddha.m,  ima.m upaadi.n.nakasariira.m nissaaya kili.t.tha.m a~n~nathaa jaata.m, tasmaa  anicca.m yathaapeta.m, eva.m cittampii''ti khayavaya.m pa.t.thapetvaa tasmi.myeva  nimitte jhaanaani nibbattetvaa jhaanapaadaka.m vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa saha  pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera  1.2.35-54) --
text.7728: [22] ga.namhaa vuupaka.t.tho so, himavante vasii tadaa..
text.7743: [21] ``ya.m ya.m yoni.m sa.msarati, devatta.m atha maanusa.m.
text.7746: [22] gotamo naama gottena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.7753: [21] ``dandhaa mayha.m gatii aasi, paribhuuto pure ahu.m.
text.7754: [22] bhaataa ca ma.m pa.naamesi, gaccha daani saka.m ghara.m..
text.7762: [22] tattha citta.m vimucci me, arahatta.m apaapu.ni.m..
text.7766: [03] arahattamaggenevassa tepi.taka.m pa~ncaabhi~n~naa ca aagami.msu. satthaa  ekena uunehi pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m gantvaa jiivakassa nivesane  pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. cuu.lapanthako pana attano bhikkhaaya  appa.ticchitattaa eva na gato. jiivako yaagu.m daatu.m aarabhi, satthaa  patta.m hatthena pidahi. ``kasmaa, bhante, na ga.nhathaa''ti vutte --  ``vihaare eko bhikkhu atthi, jiivakaa''ti. so purisa.m pahi.ni,  ``gaccha, bha.ne, vihaare nisinna.m ayya.m gahetvaa ^a^M2.0192^ea^ ehii''ti.  cuu.lapanthakattheropi ruupena kiriyaaya ca ekampi ekena asadisa.m  bhikkhusahassa.m nimminitvaa nisiidi. so puriso vihaare bhikkhuuna.m  bahubhaava.m disvaa gantvaa jiivakassa kathesi -- ``imasmaa  bhikkhusa"nghaa vihaare bhikkhusa"ngho bahutaro, pakkositabba.m ayya.m na  jaanaamii''ti. jiivako satthaara.m pa.tipucchi -- ``konaamo, bhante,  vihaare nisinno bhikkhuu''ti? ``cuu.lapanthako naama, jiivakaa''ti.  ``gaccha ^a^P2.0238^ea^, bha.ne, `cuu.lapanthako naama kataro'ti  pucchitvaa ta.m aanehii''ti. so vihaara.m gantvaa ``cuu.lapanthako naama  kataro, bhante''ti pucchi. ``aha.m cuu.lapanthako'',``aha.m  cuu.lapanthako''ti ekapahaareneva bhikkhusahassampi kathesi. so  punaagantvaa ta.m pavatti.m jiivakassa aarocesi. jiivako  pa.tividdhasaccattaa ``iddhimaa ma~n~ne, ayyo''ti nayato ~natvaa ``gaccha,  bha.ne, pa.thama.m kathanakamayyameva `tumhe satthaa pakkosatii'ti vatvaa  ciivaraka.n.ne ga.nhaa''ti aaha. so vihaara.m gantvaa tathaa akaasi,  taavadeva nimmitabhikkhuu antaradhaayi.msu. so thera.m gahetvaa agamaasi.
text.7767: [03] satthaa tasmi.m kha.ne yaagu~nca khajjakaadibheda~nca pa.tigga.nhi.  dasabale bhattakicca.m katvaa vihaara.m gate dhammasabhaaya.m kathaa udapaadi --  ``aho buddhaana.m aanubhaavo, yatra hi naama cattaaro maase ekagaatha.m  gahetu.m asakkontampi lahukena kha.neneva eva.m mahiddhika.m aka.msuu''ti.  satthaa tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m kathaasallaapa.m sutvaa aagantvaa buddhaasane nisajja,  ``ki.m vadetha, bhikkhave''ti pucchitvaa, ``ima.m naama, bhante''ti vutte,  ``bhikkhave, cuu.lapanthakena idaani mayha.m ovaade .thatvaa lokuttaradaayajja.m  laddha.m, pubbe pana lokiyadaayajja''nti vatvaa tehi yaacito  cuu.lase.t.thijaataka.m (jaa0 1.1.4) kathesi. aparabhaage ta.m satthaa  ariyaga.naparivuto dhammaasane nisinno manomaya.m kaaya.m ^a^V2.0164^ea^  abhinimminantaana.m bhikkhuuna.m cetoviva.t.takusalaana~nca agga.t.thaane .thapesi.  so aparena samayena bhikkhuuhi ``tathaa dandhadhaatukena katha.m tayaa  saccaani pa.tividdhaanii''ti pu.t.tho bhaatu pa.naamanato pa.t.thaaya attano  pa.tipatti.m pakaasento --
text.7769: [21] ``dandhaa mayha.m gatii aasi, paribhuuto pure aha.m.
text.7770: [22] bhaataa ca ma.m pa.naamesi, gaccha daani tuva.m ghara.m..
text.7785: [22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..
text.7794: [22] nisinna.m ma.m viditvaana, attha satthaa pa.tiggahi..
text.7799: [03] tattha ^b^dandhaa^eb^ti, mandaa, catuppadika.m gaatha.m catuuhi maasehi  gahetu.m asamatthabhaavena dubbalaa. ^b^gatii^eb^ti ~naa.nagati.  ^b^aasii^eb^ti, ahosi. ^b^paribhuuto^eb^ti, tato eva ``mu.t.thassati  asampajaano''ti hii.lito. ^b^pure^eb^ti, pubbe puthujjanakaale.  ^b^bhaataa caa^eb^ti samuccayattho ca-saddo, na kevala.m paribhuutova, atha  kho bhaataapi ma.m ^b^pa.naamesi,^eb^ ``panthaka, tva.m duppa~n~no ahetuko  ma~n~ne, tasmaa pabbajitakicca.m ^a^V2.0165^ea^ matthaka.m paapetu.m asamattho  ^a^M2.0194^ea^, na imassa saasanassa anucchaviko, gaccha daani  tuyha.m ayyakaghara''nti nikka.d.dhesi. ^b^bhaataa^eb^ti, bhaataraa.
text.7800: [03] ^b^ko.t.thake^eb^ti, dvaarako.t.thakasamiipe. ^b^dummano^eb^ti,  domanassito. ^b^saasanasmi.m apekkhavaa^eb^ti, sammaasambuddhassa  saasane saapekkho avibbhamitukaamo.
text.7801: [03] ^b^bhagavaa tattha aagacchii^eb^ti, mahaakaru.naasa~ncoditamaanaso ma.m  anugga.nhanto bhagavaa yatthaaha.m .thito, tattha aagacchi. aagantvaa ca,  ``panthaka, aha.m te satthaa, na mahaapanthako, ma.m uddissa tava  pabbajjaa''ti samassaasento ^b^siisa.m mayha.m paraamasi^eb^  jaalaabandhanamudutalunapii.navaraayata"ngulisamupasobhitena  vikasitapadumasassiriikena cakka"nkitena hatthatalena ``idaaniyeva mama  putto bhavissatii''ti diipento mayha.m siisa.m paraamasi. ^b^baahaaya ma.m  gahetvaanaa^eb^ti, ``kasmaa tva.m, idha ti.t.thasii''ti candanagandhagandhinaa  attano hatthena ma.m bhuje gahetvaa antosa"nghaaraama.m pavesesi.  ^b^paadaasi^eb^ ^a^P2.0240^ea^ ^b^paadapu~nchani^eb^nti paadapu~nchani.m  katvaa paadaasi ``rajohara.nanti manasi karohii''ti adaasiiti attho.  ``adaasii''ti ``paadapu~nchani''nti ca pa.thanti. keci pana  ^b^``paadapu~nchani''^eb^nti paadapu~nchanaco.lakkha.n.da.m paadaasii''ti vadanti.  tadayutta.m iddhiyaa abhisa"nkharitvaa co.lakkha.n.dassa dinnattaa.  ^b^eta.m suddha.m adhi.t.thehi, ekamanta.m svadhi.t.thita^eb^nti, eta.m suddha.m  co.lakkha.n.da.m ``rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na''nti manasikaarena svadhi.t.thita.m  katvaa ekamanta.m ekamante vivitte gandhaku.tipamukhe nisinno adhi.t.thehi  tathaa citta.m samaahita.m katvaa pavattehi.
text.7802: [03] ^b^tassaaha.m vacana.m sutvaa^eb^ti, tassa bhagavato vacana.m ovaada.m  aha.m sutvaa tasmi.m ^b^saasane^eb^ ovaade ^b^rato^eb^ abhirato hutvaa  ^b^vihaasi.m^eb^ yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajji.m. pa.tipajjanto ca ^b^samaadhi.m  pa.tipaadesi.m, uttamatthassa pattiyaa^eb^ti, uttamattho naama arahatta.m, tassa  adhigamaaya kasi.naparikammavasena ruupajjhaanaani nibbattetvaa  jhaanapaadaka.m vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa aggamaggasamaadhi.m  sampaadesinti attho. ettha hi samaadhiiti upacaarasamaadhito pa.t.thaaya  yaava catutthamaggasamaadhi, taava samaadhisaama~n~nena gahito,  aggaphalasamaadhi pana uttamatthaggaha.nena, saatisaya.m cevaaya.m  samaadhikusalo, tasmaa ``samaadhi.m pa.tipaadesi''nti aaha.  samaadhikusalataaya ^a^M2.0195^ea^ hi ayamaayasmaa cetoviva.t.takusalo naama jaato,  mahaapanthakatthero pana vipassanaakusalataaya sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalo naama.  eko cettha samaadhilakkha.ne cheko, eko vipassanaalakkha.ne, eko  samaadhigaa.lho, eko vipassanaagaa.lho eko a"ngasa.mkhitte cheko, eko  aaramma.nasa.mkhitte, eko a"ngavavatthaane, eko aaramma.navavatthaaneti  va.n.nenti. apica cuu.lapanthakatthero ^a^V2.0166^ea^ saatisaya.m catunna.m  ruupaavacarajjhaanaana.m laabhitaaya cetoviva.t.takusalo vutto, mahaapanthakatthero  saatisaya.m catunna.m aruupaavacarajjhaanaana.m laabhitaaya sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalo.  pa.thamo vaa ruupaavacarajjhaanalaabhii hutvaa jhaana"ngehi vu.t.thaaya arahatta.m  pattoti cetoviva.t.takusalo, itaro aruupaavacarajjhaanalaabhii hutvaa  jhaana"ngehi vu.t.thaaya arahatta.m pattoti sa~n~naaviva.t.takusalo. manomaya.m pana  kaaya.m nibbattento a~n~ne tayo vaa cattaaro vaa nibbattanti, na bahuke,  ekasadiseyeva ca katvaa nibbattenti, ekavidhameva kamma.m kurumaane.  aya.m pana thero ekaavajjanena sama.nasahassa.m maapesi, dvepi na kaayena  ekasadise akaasi, na ekavidha.m kamma.m kurumaane. tasmaa manomaya.m  kaaya.m abhinimminantaana.m aggo naama jaato.
text.7803: [03] idaani ^a^P2.0241^ea^ attano adhigatavisesa.m dassetu.m  ^b^``pubbenivaasa.m jaanaamii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. kaama~ncaaya.m thero  cha.labhi~n~no, yaa pana abhi~n~naa aasavakkhaya~naa.naadhigamassa bahuupakaaraa,  ta.m dassanattha.m ^b^``pubbenivaasa.m jaanaami, dibbacakkhu  visodhita''^eb^nti vatvaa ^b^``tisso vijjaa anuppattaa''^eb^ti vutta.m.  pubbenivaasayathaakammupagaanaagata.msa~naa.naani hi vipassanaacaarassa  bahuupakaaraani, na tathaa itara~naa.naani.
text.7804: [03] ^b^sahassakkhattu^eb^nti sahassa.m. ``sahassavaara''nti keci  vadanti. ekaavajjanena pana thero sahasse manomaye kaaye nimmini,  na vaarena. te ca kho a~n~nama~n~namasadise vividha~nca kamma.m karonte.  ``ki.m pana saavakaanampi evaruupa.m iddhinimmaana.m sambhavatii''ti?  na sambhavati sabbesa.m, abhiniihaarasampattiyaa pana ayameva thero  evamakaasi, tathaa hesa iminaa a"ngena etadagge .thapito. ^b^panthako  nisiidii^eb^ti attaanameva para.m viya vadati. ^b^ambavane^eb^ti,  ambavane jiivakena ^a^M2.0196^ea^ katavihaare. ^b^vehaasaadupasa"nkami^eb^nti  ^b^vehaasaa^eb^ti kara.ne nissakkavacana.m, vehaasenaati attho,  ^b^da^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro. ^b^athaa^eb^ti, mama nisajjaaya pacchaa.  ^b^pa.tiggahii^eb^ti dakkhi.nodaka.m pa.tigga.nhi. ^b^aayaago  sabbalokassaa^eb^ti, sabbassa sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhi.neyyataaya  deyyadhamma.m aanetvaa yajitabba.t.thaanabhuuto. ^b^aahutiina.m pa.tiggaho^eb^ti,  mahaaphalabhaavakara.nena dakkhi.naahutiina.m pa.tigga.nhako. ^b^pa.tigga.nhittha  dakkhi.na^eb^nti jiivakena upaniita.m yaagukhajjaadibheda.m dakkhi.na.m  pa.tiggahesi.
text.7805: [03] atha kho bhagavaa katabhattakicco aayasmanta.m cuu.lapanthaka.m  aa.naapesi -- ``anumodana.m karohii''ti. so sineru.m gahetvaa  mahaasamudda.m manthento viya pabhinnapa.tisambhidaappattataaya tepi.taka.m  buddhavacana.m sa"nkhobhento satthu ajjhaasaya.m ga.nhanto anumodana.m akaasi.  tathaa upanissayasampannopi ^a^V2.0167^ea^ caayamaayasmaa tathaaruupaaya  kammapilotikaaya paribaadhito catuppadika.m gaatha.m catuuhipi maasehi  gahetu.m naasakkhi. ta.m panassa upanissayasampatti.m oloketvaa satthaa  pubbacariyaanuruupa.m yonisomanasikaare niyojesi. tathaa hi bhagavaa  tadaa jiivakassa nivesane nisinno eva ``cuu.lapanthakassa citta.m  samaahita.m, viithipa.tipannaa vipassanaa''ti ~natvaa yathaanisinnova attaana.m  dassetvaa, ``panthaka, yadipaaya.m pilotikaa sa.mkili.t.thaa rajaanuki.n.naa,  ito pana a~n~no eva ariyassa vinaye sa.mkileso rajo caati  dassento --
text.7806: [21] ``raago rajo na ca pana re.nu vuccati, raagasseta.m  adhivacana.m rajoti.
text.7807: [22] eta.m ^a^P2.0242^ea^ raja.m vippajahitvaa bhikkhavo,  viharanti te viitarajassa saasane..
text.7810: [25] imaa tisso obhaasagaathaa abhaasi. gaathaapariyosaane  cuu.lapanthako abhi~n~naapa.tisambhidaaparivaara.m arahatta.m paapu.niiti.
text.7813: [03] ^b^naanaakulamalasampu.n.no^eb^tiaadikaa ^a^M2.0197^ea^ aayasmato kappattherassa  gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha  bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale vibhavasampanne  kule nibbattitvaa pitu accayena vi~n~nuta.m patto  naanaaviraagava.n.navicittehi vatthehi anekavidhehi aabhara.nehi  naanaavidhehi ma.niratanehi bahuvidhehi pupphadaamamaalaadiihi ca kapparukkha.m  naama ala"nkaritvaa tena satthu thuupa.m puujesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena  devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the ma.n.dalikaraajakule  nibbattitvaa pitu accayena rajje pati.t.thito kaamesu ativiya ratto  giddho hutvaa viharati. ta.m satthaa mahaakaru.naasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya loka.m  volokento ~naa.najaale pa~n~naayamaana.m disvaa, ``ki.m nu kho  bhavissatii''ti aavajjento, ``esa mama santike asubhakatha.m sutvaa  kaamesu virattacitto hutvaa pabbajitvaa arahatta.m paapu.nissatii''ti ~natvaa  aakaasena tattha gantvaa --
text.7844: [25] imaahi gaathaahi tassa asubhakatha.m kathesi. so satthu  sammukhaa anekaakaaravokaara.m yaathaavato sariirasabhaavavibhaavana.m asubhakatha.m  sutvaa sakena kaayena a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano  sa.mviggahadayo satthaara.m vanditvaa, ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato  santike pabbajja''nti pabbajja.m yaaci. satthaa samiipe .thitama~n~natara.m  bhikkhu.m aa.naapesi -- ``gaccha, bhikkhu, ima.m pabbaajetvaa  upasampaadetvaa aanehii''ti. so ta.m tacapa~ncakakamma.t.thaana.m datvaa  pabbaajesi. so khuraggeyeva saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni.  tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 tera 1.4.102-107) --
text.785: [21] ``ko nu kho bhagavaa hetu, sitakammassa satthuno.
text.7850: [22] tamhaa dussa.m gahetvaana, nivaasema maya.m sadaa..
text.7853: [21] ``ito ca sattame kappe, suce.laa a.t.tha khattiyaa.
text.7856: [03] arahatta.m ^a^M2.0199^ea^ pana patvaa laddhuupasampado satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa  vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno a~n~na.m byaakaronto taa eva gaathaa abhaasi.  teneva taa theragaathaa naama jaataa.
text.7857: [03] tattha ^b^naanaakulamalasampu.n.no^eb^ti, naanaakulehi naanaabhaagehi  malehi sampu.n.no, kesalomaadinaanaavidhaasuciko.t.thaasabharitoti attho.  ^b^mahaaukkaarasambhavo^eb^ti, ukkaaro vuccati vaccakuupa.m. yattakavayaa  maataa, tattaka.m kaala.m kaarapariseditavaccakuupasadisataaya maatu kucchi idha  ``mahaaukkaaro''ti adhippeto. so kucchi sambhavo uppatti.t.thaana.m  etassaati mahaaukkaarasambhavo. ^b^candanika.mvaa^eb^ti candanika.m naama  ucchi.t.thodakagabbhamalaadiina.m cha.d.dana.t.thaana.m, ya.m ja.n.numatta.m asucibharitampi  hoti, taadisanti attho. ^b^paripakka^eb^nti, pari.nata.m puraa.na.m. tena  yathaa ca.n.daalagaamadvaare nidaaghasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante udakena  samupabyuu.lhamuttakariisaa.t.thicammanhaarukha.n.dakhe.lasi"nghaa.nikaadinaanaaku.napabharita.m  kaddamodakaalu.lita.m ^a^P2.0244^ea^ katipayadivasaatikkamena sa.mjaata  kimikulaakula.m suuriyaatapasantaapakuthita.m upari phe.napubbu.lakaani mu~ncanta.m  abhiniilava.n.na.m paramaduggandha.m jeguccha.m candanikaavaa.ta.m neva upagantu.m, na  da.t.thu.m araharuupa.m hutvaa ti.t.thati, tathaaruupoya.m kaayoti dasseti. sadaa  dukkhataamuulayogato asucipagghara.nato uppaadajaraamara.nehi  uddhumaayanaparipaccanabhijjanasabhaavattaa ca mahanto ga.n.do viyaati  ^b^mahaaga.n.do^eb^. sabbatthakameva dukkhavedanaanubaddhattaa ga.n.daana.m sahanato  asucivissandanato ca mahanto va.no viyaati ^b^mahaava.no guuthakuupena  gaa.lito^eb^ti, vaccakuupena vacceneva vaa bharito.  ``guuthakuupanigaa.lhito''tipi paa.li, vaccakuupato nikkhantoti attho.  ^b^aapopagghara.no kaayo, sadaa sandati puutika^eb^nti, aya.m kaayo  aapodhaatuyaa sadaa pagghara.nasiilo, ta~nca kho pittasemhasedamuttaadika.m  puutika.m asuci.myeva sandati, na kadaaci sucinti attho.
text.7858: [03] ^b^sa.t.thika.n.darasambandho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0170^ea^, giivaaya uparimabhaagato pa.t.thaaya  sariira.m vinaddhamaanaa sariirassa purimapacchimadakkhi.navaamapassesu pacceka.m  pa~nca pa~nca katvaa viisati, hatthapaade vinaddhamaanaa tesa.m  purimapacchimapassesu pa~nca pa~nca katvaa cattaaliisaati ^a^M2.0200^ea^ sa.t.thiyaa ka.n.darehi  mahaanhaaruuhi sabbaso baddho vinaddhoti sa.t.thika.n.darasambandho.  ^b^ma.msalepanalepito^eb^ti, ma.msasa"nkhaatena lepanena litto,  navama.msapesisataanulittoti attho. ^b^cammaka~ncukasannaddho^eb^ti,  cammasa"nkhaatena ka~ncukena sabbaso onaddho pariyonaddho paricchinno.  ^b^puutikaayo^eb^ti, sabbaso puutigandhiko kaayo.  ^b^niratthako^eb^ti, nippayojano. a~n~nesa~nhi paa.niina.m kaayo  cammaadiviniyogena siyaa sappayojano, na tathaa manussakaayoti.  ^b^a.t.thisa"nghaatagha.tito^eb^ti, atirekatisataana.m a.t.thiina.m sa"nghaatena  gha.tito sambandho. ^b^nhaarusuttanibandhano^eb^ti, suttasadisehi navahi  nhaarusatehi nibandhito. ^b^nekesa.m sa.mgatiibhaavaa^eb^ti,  catumahaabhuutajiivitindriyaassaasapassaasavi~n~naa.naadiina.m samavaayasambandhena  suttamerakasamavaayena yanta.m viya .thaanaadiiriyaapatha.m kappeti.
text.7859: [03] ^b^dhuvappayaato mara.naayaa^eb^ti, mara.nassa atthaaya ekantagamano,  nibbattito pa.t.thaaya mara.na.m pati pavatto. tato eva maccuraajassa  mara.nassa ^a^P2.0245^ea^ santike .thito. ^b^idheva  cha.d.dayitvaanaa^eb^ti, imasmi.myeva loke kaaya.m cha.d.detvaa,  yathaarucita.t.thaanagaamii aya.m satto, tasmaa ``pahaaya gamaniiyo aya.m  kaayo''ti evampi sa"ngo na kaatabboti dasseti.
text.7860: [03] ^b^avijjaaya nivuto^eb^ti, avijjaaniivara.nena nivuto  pa.ticchaaditaadiinavo, a~n~nathaa ko ettha sa"nga.m janeyyaati adhippaayo.  ^b^catuganthenaa^eb^ti, abhijjhaakaayaganthaadinaa catubbidhena ganthena  ganthito, ganthaniyabhaavena vinaddhito. ^b^oghasa.msiidano^eb^ti,  oghaniyabhaavena kaamoghaadiisu catuusu oghesu sa.msiidanako.  appahiinabhaavena santaane anu anu sentiiti anusayaa, kaamaraagaadayo  anusayaa. tesa.m jaalena otthato abhibhuutoti  ^b^anusayaajaalamotthato^eb^. makaaro padasandhikaro, gaathaasukhattha.m  diigha.m katvaa vutta.m. kaamacchandaadinaa pa~ncavidhena niivara.nena yutto  adhimuttoti ^b^pa~ncaniivara.ne yutto,^eb^ kara.natthe bhummavacana.m.
text.7861: [03] kaamavitakkaadinaa ^a^M2.0201^ea^ micchaavitakkena samappito samassitoti  ^b^vitakkena samappito. ta.nhaamuulenaanugato^eb^ti, ta.nhaasa"nkhaatena  bhavamuulena anubaddho. ^b^mohacchaadanachaadito^eb^ti, sammohasa"nkhaatena  aavara.nena paligu.n.thito. sabbameta.m savi~n~naa.naka.m karajakaaya.m sandhaaya  vadati. savi~n~naa.nako hi attabhaavo ``ucchinnabhavanettiko,  bhikkhave, tathaagatassa kaayo ti.t.thati, aya~nceva kaayo bahiddhaa ca  naamaruupa''ntiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.1.147) kaayoti vuccati,  ^b^evaaya.m vattate kaayo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0171^ea^ eva.m ``naanaakulamalasampu.n.no''tiaadinaa  ``avijjaaya nivuto''tiaadinaa ca vuttappakaarena aya.m kaayo vattati,  vattanto ca ^b^kammayantena^eb^ sukatadukka.tena kammasa"nkhaatena yantena  ^b^yantito^eb^ sa"ngha.tito. yathaa vaa khemanta.m gantu.m na sakkoti,  tathaa sa"nkhobhito sugatiduggatiisu vattati paribbhamati. ^b^sampatti  ca vipatyantaa^eb^ti yaa ettha sampatti, saa vipattipariyosaanaa.  sabba~nhi yobbana.m jaraapariyosaana.m, sabba.m aarogya.m byaadhipariyosaana.m,  sabba.m jiivita.m mara.napariyosaana.m, sabbo samaagamo viyogapariyosaano.  tenaaha ^b^``naanaabhaavo vipajjatii''^eb^ti. ^b^naanaabhaavo^eb^ti,  vinaabhaavo vippayogo, so kadaaci vippayu~njakassa vasena, kadaaci  vippayu~njitabbassa vasenaati vividha.m pajjati paapu.niiyati.
text.7862: [03] ^b^yema.m kaaya.m mamaayantii^eb^ti ye andhabaalaa puthujjanaa eva.m  asubha.m anicca.m adhuva.m dukkha.m asaara.m ima.m kaaya.m ``mama ida''nti  ga.nhantaa mamaayanti chandaraaga.m uppaadenti, te jaatiaadiihi  nirayaadiihi ca ^b^ghora.m^eb^ bhayaanaka.m apa.n.ditehi abhiramitabbato  ka.tasisa"nkhaata.m sa.msaara.m punappuna.m jananamara.naadiihi va.d.dhenti, tenaaha  ^b^``aadiyanti punabbhava''^eb^nti.
text.7863: [03] ^b^yema.m kaaya.m vivajjenti, guuthalitta.mva pannaga^eb^nti yathaa naama  ^a^P2.0246^ea^ puriso sukhakaamo jiivitukaamo guuthagata.m  aasiivisa.m disvaa jigucchaniyataaya vaa sappa.tibhayataaya vaa vivajjeti  na alliiyati, evameva.m ye pa.n.ditaa kulaputtaa asucibhaavena jeguccha.m  aniccaadibhaavena sappa.tibhaya.m ima.m kaaya.m vivajjenti chandaraagappahaanena  pajahanti. te bhavamuula.m avijja.m bhavata.nha~nca vamitvaa cha.d.detvaa  accantameva pahaaya tato eva sabbaso anaasavaa saupaadisesaaya  anupaadisesaaya ca nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayissantiiti.
text.7866: [03] ^b^vivitta.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0202^ea^ ^b^appanigghosa^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato  upasenattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? aya.m kira padumuttarassa  bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto satthu  santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.namaano satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m  samantapaasaadikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa  ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto  imasmi.m ^a^V2.0172^ea^ buddhuppaade naalakagaame ruupasaariibraahma.niyaa kucchimhi nibbatti,  ^b^upaseno^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto tayo vede  uggahetvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa  upasampadaaya ekavassiko ``ariyagabbha.m va.d.dhemii''ti eka.m kulaputta.m  attano santike upasampaadetvaa tena saddhi.m satthu santika.m gato.  satthaaraa cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihaarikabhaava.m  sutvaa, ``atilahu.m kho tva.m, moghapurisa, baahullaaya aavatto''ti  (mahaava0 75) garahito. ``idaanaaha.m yadipi parisa.m nissaaya  satthaaraa garahito, parisa.myeva pana nissaaya satthu paasa.msopi  bhavissaamii''ti vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m  paapu.ni. tena vutta.m ^b^apadaane^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.86-96) --

text.7888: [03] arahatta.m pana patvaa sayampi sabbe dhuta"ngadhamme samaadaaya vattati,  a~n~nepi tadatthaaya samaadapeti ^a^V2.0173^ea^, tena na.m bhagavaa samantapaasaadikaana.m  agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so aparena samayena kosambiya.m kalahe ^a^P2.0247^ea^  uppanne bhikkhusa"nghe ca dvidhaabhuute ekena bhikkhunaa ta.m  kalaha.m parivajjitukaamena ``etarahi kho kalaho uppanno, sa"ngho  dvidhaabhuuto, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti pu.t.tho vivekavaasato  pa.t.thaaya tassa pa.tipatti.m kathento --
text.7894: [22] tato sa"nghaa.tika.m katvaa, luukha.m dhaareyya ciivara.m..
text.7899: [21] ``luukhenapi vaa santusse, naa~n~na.m patthe rasa.m bahu.m.
text.79: [22] eva.m nindaapasa.msaasu, na sami~njanti pa.n.ditaa''ti..  (dha0 pa0 81) --
text.790: [22] devaloke manusse vaa, okaasova na sammati..
text.7900: [22] rasesu anugiddhassa, jhaane na ramatii mano..
text.7905: [21] ``yathaa ^a^M2.0204^ea^ ja.lo va muugo va, attaana.m dassaye tathaa.
text.7914: [22] na ca appatvaa dukkhanta.m, vissaasa.m eyya pa.n.dito..
text.7919: [03] tattha ^b^vivitta^eb^nti, janavivitta.m su~n~na.m ara~n~naadi.m.  ^b^appanigghosa^eb^nti, nissadda.m saddasa"ngha.t.tanarahita.m.  ^b^vaa.lamiganisevita^eb^nti, siihabyagghadiipivaa.lamigehi carita.m.  iminaapi janaviveka.myeva dasseti pantasenaasanabhaavadiipanato.  ^b^senaasana^eb^nti, sayitu.m aasayitu~nca yuttabhaavena ^a^V2.0174^ea^ vasana.t.thaana.m idha  senaasananti adhippeta.m. ^b^pa.tisallaanakaara.naa^eb^ti,  pa.tisallaananimitta.m, naanaaramma.nato nivattetvaa kamma.t.thaaneyeva cittassa  pa.ti pa.ti sammadeva alliiyanattha.m.
text.7920: [03] eva.m bhaavanaanuruupa.m senaasana.m niddisanto senaasane santosa.m  dassetvaa idaani ciivaraadiisupi ta.m dassetu.m  ^b^``sa.mkaarapu~njaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^a^P2.0248^ea^  ^b^sa.mkaarapu~njaa^eb^ti sa.mkaaraana.m pu~nja.m sa.mkaarapu~nja.m, tato kacavara.t.thaanaa.  ^b^aahatvaa^eb^ti aaharitvaa. ^b^tato^eb^ti tathaa aaha.taco.lakkha.n.dehi.  kara.ne hi ida.m nissakkavacana.m ^b^luukha^eb^nti  satthaluukharajanaluukhaadinaa luukha.m ava.n.naama.t.tha.m. ^b^dhaareyyaa^eb^ti  nivaasanaadivasena parihareyya, etena ciivarasantosa.m vadati.
text.7921: [03] ^b^niica mana.m karitvaanaa^eb^ti ``antamida.m, bhikkhave,  jiivikaana''ntiaadika.m (itivu0 91; sa.m0 ni0  3.80)  sugatovaada.m anussaritvaa nihatamaanadappa.m citta.m katvaa.  ^b^sapadaana^eb^nti gharesu ^a^M2.0205^ea^ avakha.n.darahita.m; anugharanti attho. tenaaha  ^b^``kulaa kula''^eb^nti. ^b^kulaa kula^eb^nti kulato kula.m,  kulaanupubbiyaa gharapa.tipaa.tiyaati attho. ^b^pi.n.dikaayaa^eb^ti  missakabhikkhaaya, iminaa pi.n.dapaatasantosa.m vadati.  ^b^guttadvaaro^eb^ti supihitacakkhaadidvaaro. ^b^susa.mvuto^eb^ti  hatthakukkuccaadiina.m abhaavena su.t.thu sa.mvuto.
text.7922: [03] ^b^luukhenapi vaa^eb^ti apisaddo samuccaye, vaa-saddo vikappe.  ubhayenapi luukhenapi appenapi yena kenaci sulabhena itariitarena  ^b^santusse^eb^ sama.m sammaa tusseyya. tenaaha ^b^``naa~n~na.m patthe rasa.m  bahu''^eb^nti. ^b^naa~n~na.m patthe rasa.m bahu^eb^nti attanaa yathaaladdhato  a~n~na.m madhuraadirasa.m bahu.m pa.niita~nca na pattheyya na piheyya, iminaa  gilaanapaccayepi santoso dassito hoti. rasesu gedhavaara.nattha.m pana  kaara.na.m vadanto ^b^rasesu anugiddhassa, jhaane na ramatii mano''^eb^ti  aaha. indriyasa.mvarampi aparipuurentassa kuto  vikkhittacittasamaadhaananti adhippaayo.
text.7923: [03] eva.m catuusu paccayesu sallekhapa.tipatti.m dassetvaa idaani  avasi.t.thakathaavatthuuni dassetu.m ^b^``appiccho cevaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m.  tattha ^b^appiccho^eb^ti, aniccho catuusu paccayesu icchaarahito, tena  catubbidhapaccayesu ta.nhuppaadavikkhambhanamaaha. ^b^santu.t.tho^eb^ti, catuusu  paccayesu yathaalaabhasantosaadinaa santu.t.tho. yo hi --
text.7926: [03] ^b^pavivitto^eb^ti ^a^V2.0175^ea^ ga.nasa"nga.nika.m pahaaya kaayena pavivitto  vuupaka.t.tho. cittavivekaadike hi parato vakkhati. ^b^vase^eb^ti  sabbattha yojetabba.m. moneyyadhammasamannaagamena ^b^muni.  asa.msa.t.tho^eb^ti dassanasavanasamullapanasambhogakaayasa.msaggaana.m abhaavena  ^a^P2.0249^ea^ asa.msa.t.tho yathaavuttasa.msaggarahito. ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti,  gaha.t.thehi anaagaarehi caati ubhayehipi asa.msa.t.tho. kara.ne hi ida.m  paccattavacana.m.
text.7927: [03] ^b^attaana.m dassaye tathaa^eb^ti aja.lo amuugopi samaano yathaa  ja.lo vaa muugo vaa, tathaa attaana.m dasseyya, etena paagabbiyappahaanamaaha.  ^b^ja.lo va muugo vaa^eb^ti ca gaathaasukhattha.m rassatta.m kata.m,  samuccayattho ca ^a^M2.0206^ea^ vaasaddo. ^b^naativela.m sambhaaseyyaa^eb^ti ativela.m  atikkantapamaa.na.m na bhaaseyya, mattabhaa.nii assaati attho.  ^b^sa"nghamajjhamhii^eb^ti bhikkhusa"nghe, janasamuuhe vaa.
text.7928: [03] ^b^na so upavade ka~ncii^eb^ti so yathaavuttapa.tipattiko bhikkhu  hiina.m vaa majjhima.m vaa ukka.t.tha.m vaa ya.mki~nci na vaacaaya upavadeyya.  ^b^upaghaata.m vivajjaye^eb^ti kaayena upaghaata.m parivihe.thana.m vajjeyya.  ^b^sa.mvuto paatimokkhasmi^eb^nti paatimokkhamhi paatimokkhasa.mvarasiile  sa.mvuto assa, paatimokkhasa.mvarena pihitakaayavaaco siyaati attho.  ^b^matta~n~nuu cassa bhojane^eb^ti pariyesanapa.tiggaha.naparibhogavissajjanesu  bhojane pamaa.na~n~nuu siyaa.
text.7929: [03] ^b^suggahiitanimittassaa^eb^ti ``eva.m me manasi karoto citta.m  samaahita.m ahosii''ti tadaakaara.m sallakkhento su.t.thu gahitasamaadhinimitto  assa. ``suggahiitanimitto so''tipi paa.tho, so yogiiti attho.  ^b^cittassuppaadakovido^eb^ti eva.m bhaavayato citta.m liina.m hoti,  ``eva.m uddhata''nti liinassa uddhatassa ca cittassa uppattikaara.ne  kusalo assa. liine hi citte dhammavicayaviiriyapiitisambojjha"ngaa  bhaavetabbaa, uddhate passaddhisamaadhiupekkhaasambojjha"ngaa.  satisambojjha"ngo pana sabbattha icchitabbo. tenaaha bhagavaa --  ``yasmi~nca kho, bhikkhave, samaye liina.m citta.m hoti, kaalo tasmi.m  samaye dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa bhaavanaayaa''tiaadi (sa.m0 ni0   5.234). ^b^samatha.m anuyu~njeyyaa^eb^ti samathabhaavana.m bhaaveyya,  anuppanna.m samaadhi.m uppaadeyya, uppanna~nca yaava vasiibhaavappatti, taava  va.d.dheyya byuuheyyaati attho. ^b^kaalena ca vipassana^eb^nti yathaaladdha.m  samaadhi.m nikantiyaa apariyaadaanena haanabhaagiya.m .thitibhaagiya.m vaa  akatvaa nibbedhabhaagiya.mva katvaa kaalena vipassana~nca anuyu~njeyya.  atha vaa ^b^kaalena ca vipassana^eb^nti samatha.m anuyu~njanto tassa  thiriibhuutakaale sa"nkoca.m anaapajjitvaa ariyamaggaadhigamaaya vipassana.m  anuyu~njeyya. yathaaha --
text.7932: [03] tena ^a^M2.0207^ea^ ^a^P2.0250^ea^ vutta.m --  ^b^``viiriyasaataccasampanno''^eb^tiaadi. satatabhaavo ^b^saatacca.m,^eb^  viiriyassa saatacca.m, tena sampanno samannaagato, satatapavattaviiriyo,  niccapaggahitaviiriyoti attho. ^b^yuttayogo sadaa siyaa^eb^ti  sabbakaala.m bhaavanaanuyutto siyaa. ^b^dukkhanta^eb^nti va.t.tadukkhassa  anta.m pariyosaana.m nirodha.m nibbaana.m appatvaa vissaasa.m ^b^na eyya^eb^  na gaccheyya. ``aha.m parisuddhasiilo jhaanalaabhii abhi~n~naalaabhii  vipassana.m matthaka.m paapetvaa .thito''ti vaa vissa.t.tho na bhaveyyaati attho.
text.7933: [03] ^b^eva.m viharamaanassaa^eb^ti, eva.m vivittasenaasanasevanaadinaa  vipassanaavasena yuttayogataapariyosaanena vidhinaa viharantassa.  ^b^suddhikaamassaa^eb^ti, ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m accantavisuddhi.m nibbaana.m  arahatta~nca icchantassa. sa.msaare bhayassa ikkhato ^b^bhikkhuno,^eb^  kaamaasavaadayo sabbe ^b^aasavaa khiiyanti^eb^ khaya.m abbhattha.m gacchanti,  tesa.m khayagamaneneva saupaadisesaanupaadisesapabheda.m duvidhampi nibbaana.m  ^b^adhigacchati^eb^ paapu.naati.
text.7934: [03] eva.m thero tassa bhikkhuno ovaadadaanaapadesena attanaa  tathaapa.tipannabhaava.m diipento a~n~na.m byaakaasi.
text.7937: [03] ^b^vijaaneyya saka.m attha^eb^ntiaadikaa aayasmato aparassa  gotamattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa  amhaaka.m bhagavato uppattito puretarameva saavatthiya.m udiccabraahma.nakule  nibbattitvaa vayappatto ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu hutvaa, vaadamagga.m uggahetvaa  attano vaadassa upari uttari.m vadanta.m alabhanto tehi tehi  viggaahikakatha.m anuyutto vicarati. atha amhaaka.m bhagavaa loke  uppajjitvaa ^a^V2.0177^ea^ pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena yasaadike veneyye vinetvaa  anaathapi.n.dikassa abhiyaacanaaya saavatthi.m upagacchi. tadaa satthu  jetavanapa.tiggahe pa.tiladdhasaddho satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m sutvaa  pabbajja.m yaaci. satthaa ^a^M2.0208^ea^ a~n~natara.m pi.n.dacaarika.m bhikkhu.m aa.naapesi --  ``bhikkhu, ima.m pabbaajehii''ti. so tena pabbaajiyamaano khuraggeyeva  arahatta.m paapu.nitvaa kosalajanapada.m gantvaa tattha cira.m vasitvaa puna  saavatthi.m paccaagami. ta.m bahuu ~naatakaa braahma.namahaasaalaa upasa"nkamitvaa  payirupaasitvaa nisinnaa ``imasmi.m loke ^a^P2.0251^ea^ bahuu  sama.nabraahma.naa sa.msaare suddhivaadaa, tesu katamesa.m nu kho vaado  niyyaaniko, katha.m pa.tipajjanto sa.msaarato sujjhatii''ti pucchi.msu.  thero tesa.m tamattha.m pakaasento --
text.7942: [21] ``mitta.m idha ca kalyaa.na.m, sikkhaa vipula.m samaadaana.m.
text.7943: [22] sussuusaa ca garuuna.m, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
text.7946: [22] sa"nghe ca cittiikaaro, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
text.7949: [22] cittassa ca sa.n.thapana.m, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
text.7952: [22] adhicitte ca aayogo, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
text.7961: [22] lokamhi ca anabhirati.m, eta.m sama.nassa patiruupa.m..
text.7969: [03] tattha ^a^V2.0178^ea^ ^b^vijaaneyya saka.m attha^eb^nti, vi~n~nuujaatiko puriso  attano attha.m yaathaavato vicaaretvaa jaaneyya. vicaarento ca  ^b^avalokeyyaatha paavacana.m^eb^ idha loke puthusama.nabraahma.nehi  sammaasambuddhena ca pavutta.m paavacana.m, samayo. tattha ya.m niyyaanika.m, ta.m  olokeyya pa~n~naacakkhunaa passeyya. ime hi naanaatitthiyaa  sama.nabraahma.naa anicce ``nicca''nti, anattani ``attaa''ti,  asuddhimagga~nca ``suddhimaggo''ti micchaabhinivesino a~n~nama~n~na~nca  viruddhavaadaa, tasmaa nesa.m vaado aniyyaaniko. sammaasambuddho pana  ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa, santa.m  nibbaana''nti sayambhuu~naa.nena yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naaya pavedeti, tasmaa  ``tassa ^a^P2.0252^ea^ vaado niyyaaniko''ti satthu  saasanamahantata.m olokeyyaati attho. ^b^ya~ncettha assa patiruupa.m,  saama~n~na.m ajjhuupagatassaa^eb^ti, saama~n~na.m sama.nabhaava.m pabbajja.m upagatassa  kulaputtassa ya.m ettha saasane pabbajitabhaave vaa patiruupa.m yuttaruupa.m  saaruppa.m assa siyaa, tampi apalokeyya.
text.7970: [03] ki.m pana tanti aaha ^b^``mitta.m idha ca kalyaa.na''^eb^ntiaadi.  imasmi.m saasane kalyaa.namitta.m seviyamaana.m sama.nassa patiruupanti  yojanaa. esa nayo itaresupi. kalyaa.namitta~nhi nissaaya  akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti, suddhamattaana.m pariharati.  ^b^sikkhaa vipula.m samaadaana^eb^nti vipula.m sikkhaasamaadaana.m, mahatiyaa  nibbaanaavahaaya adhisiilaadisikkhaaya anu.t.thaananti attho.  ^b^sussuusaa ca garuuna^eb^nti garuuna.m aacariyupajjhaayaadiina.m  kalyaa.namittaana.m ovaadassa sotukamyataa paaricariyaa ca.  ^b^eta^eb^nti kalyaa.namittasevanaadi.
text.7971: [03] ^b^buddhesu sagaaravataa^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhesu ``sammaasambuddho  bhagavaa''ti gaaravayogo garucittiikaaro. ^b^dhamme apaciti  yathaabhuuta^eb^nti ariyadhamme yaathaavato ^a^M2.0210^ea^ apacaayana.m aadarena abhipuujana.m.  ^b^sa"nghe^eb^ti ariyasa"nghe. ^b^cittiikaaro^eb^ti sakkaaro sammaanana.m.  ^b^eta^eb^nti ratanattayagarukara.na.m.
text.7972: [03] ^b^aacaaragocare yutto^eb^ti kaayikavaacasikaviitikkamanasa"nkhaata.m  anaacaara.m, pi.n.dapaataadiina.m atthaaya upasa"nkamitu.m ayutta.t.thaanabhuuta.m  vesiyaadiagocara~nca pahaaya kaayikavaacasikaaviitikkamanasa"nkhaatena  aacaarena pi.n.dapaataadiina.m atthaaya upasa"nkamitu.m yutta.t.thaanabhuutena gocarena  ca yutto sampanno, sampannaaacaaragocaroti attho. ^b^aajiivo  sodhito^eb^ti ve.ludaanaadi.m buddhapa.tiku.t.tha.m anesana.m pahaaya anavajjuppaade  paccaye sevantassa aajiivo sodhito hoti suvisuddho, sodhitattaa eva  ^b^agaarayho^eb^ vi~n~nuuhi. ^b^cittassa ca sa.n.thapana^eb^nti yathaa  cakkhaadidvaarehi ruupaadiaaramma.nesu abhijjhaadayo nappavattanti, eva.m  di.t.the di.t.thamattaadivasena cittassa ^a^V2.0179^ea^ sammaa .thapana.m. ^b^eta^eb^nti  aacaaragocarasampatti aajiivapaarisuddhi indriyesu guttadvaarataati eta.m taya.m.
text.7973: [03] ^b^caaritta^eb^nti caritvaa paripuuretabbasiila.m. ^b^vaaritta^eb^nti  viratiyaa akara.nena paripuuretabbasiila.m. ^b^iriyaapathiya.m  pasaadaniya^eb^nti paresa.m pasaadaavaha.m aakappasampattinimitta.m  iriyaapathanissita.m sampaja~n~na.m. ^b^adhicitte ca aayogo^eb^ti  samathavipassanaasu anuyogo bhaavanaa.
text.7975: [03] ^b^siila^eb^nti catupaarisuddhisiila.m. he.t.thaa hi bhinditvaa vutta.m,  idha abhinditvaa ^a^P2.0253^ea^ vadati. ^b^baahusacca^eb^nti  bahussutabhaavo. so hi bhaavanaanuyogassa bahukaaro,  bojjha"ngakosallaanuttarasiitibhaavaadhicittayuttataadiisu sammaa  pavicayabahulassa samathavipassanaanuyogo sampajjati. ^b^dhammaana.m  pavicayo yathaabhuuta^eb^nti ruupaaruupadhammaana.m avipariitasalakkha.nato  saama~n~nalakkha.nato ca pariviima.msaa. iminaa  adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanamaaha. ^b^saccaana.m abhisamayo^eb^ti  dukkhaadiina.m ariyasaccaana.m pari~n~naabhisamayaadivasena pa.tivedho.
text.7976: [03] svaaya.m saccaabhisamayo yathaa hoti, ta.m dassetu.m  ^b^``bhaaveyyaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^bhaaveyya ca anicca^eb^nti  ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''tiaadinaa (dha0 pa0 277)  avibhaagato ^a^M2.0211^ea^ ``ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna''ntiaadinaa  (vibha0 2; sa.m0 ni0  3.49) vibhaagato vaa sabbasa"nkhaaresu  aniccasa~n~na.m bhaaveyya uppaadeyya ceva va.d.dheyya caati attho.  ^b^anattasa~n~na^eb^nti, ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti pavatta.m anattasa~n~na~nca  bhaaveyyaati yojanaa. eva.m sesesupi. ^b^asubhasa~n~na^eb^nti,  karajakaaye sabbasmimpi vaa tebhuumakasa"nkhaare kilesaasucipagghara.nato  ``asubhaa''ti pavattasa~n~na.m. dukkhasa~n~naaparivaaraa hi aya.m, eteneva  cettha dukkhasa~n~naapi gahitaati veditabba.m. ^b^lokamhi ca  anabhirati^eb^nti sabbaloke tebhuumakesu sa"nkhaaresu anaabhiratisa~n~na.m.  etena aadiinavaanupassana.m nibbidaanupassana~nca vadati.
text.7977: [03] eva.m pana vipassanaabhaavana.m anuyutto ta.m ussukkaapento ime dhamme  va.d.dheyyaati dassento ^b^``bhaaveyya ca bojjha"nge''^eb^ti gaathamaaha.  tassattho -- bodhiyaa satiaadisattavidhadhammasaamaggiyaa, bodhissa vaa  ta.msama"ngino puggalassa a"ngaati bojjha"ngaa, satiaadayo dhammaa. te  satiaadike sattabojjha"nge, chandaaadiini cattaari iddhipaadaani,  saddhaadiini pa~ncindriyaani, saddhaadiiniyeva pa~nca ^a^V2.0180^ea^ balaani,  sammaadi.t.thiaadiina.m vasena a.t.tha"ngaariyamagga~nca. ca-saddena  satipa.t.thaanaani sammappadhaanaani ca gahitaaniiti sabbepi sattati.msappabhede  bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhaaveyya uppaadeyya ceva va.d.dheyya ca. tattha  yadetesa.m pa.thamamaggakkha.ne uppaadana.m, uparimaggakkha.ne ca va.d.dhana.m, eta.m  ^b^sama.nassa^eb^ bhikkhuno saaruppanti.
text.7978: [03] eva.m bodhipakkhiyasattati.msadhamme bhaavento yathaa maggasacca.m  bhaavanaabhisamayavasena abhisameti, eva.m samudayasacca.m  pahaanaabhisamayavasena, nirodhasacca.m sacchikiriyaabhisamayavasena  abhisametiiti dassento ^b^``ta.nha.m pajaheyyaa''^eb^ti osaanagaathamaaha.  tattha ^b^ta.nha.m pajaheyyaa^eb^ti, kaamata.nhaadipabheda.m sabba.m ta.nha.m  ariyamaggena anavasesato samucchindeyya, mona.m vuccati ~naa.na.m, tena  ^a^P2.0254^ea^ samannaagatattaa ^b^muni. samuulake aasave  padaaleyyaa^eb^ti kaamaraagaanusayaadisamuulake kaamaasavaadike sabbepi  aasave bhindeyya samucchindeyya. ^b^vihareyya vippamutto^eb^ti eva.m  sabbaso kilesaana.m pahiinattaa sabbadhi vimutto sabbuupadhipa.tinissagga.m  ^a^M2.0212^ea^ nirodha.m nibbaana.m sacchikatvaa vihareyya. ^b^eta^eb^nti yadeta.m  vihara.na.m, eta.m sama.nassa samitapaapassa bhikkhuno patiruupa.m saaruppanti  attho.
text.7979: [03] eva.m thero sama.nasaaruppapa.tipattikittanamukhena saasanassa  niyyaanikabhaava.m tabbilomato baahirakasamayassa aniyyaanikata~nca  vibhaavesi. ta.m sutvaa te braahma.namahaasaalaa saasane abhippasannaa  sara.naadiisu pati.t.thahi.msu.
text.7984: [03] ekaadasanipaate ^a^M2.0213^ea^ ^a^V2.0181^ea^ ^b^ki.m tavattho vane taataa^eb^tiaadikaa  aayasmato sa.mkiccattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi  purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m  upacinitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.namahaasaalakule  pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tasmi.m kucchigateyeva maataa byaadhitaa hutvaa  kaalamakaasi. tassaa susaana.m netvaa jhaapiyamaanaaya gabbhaasayo na  jhaayi. manussaa suulehi kucchi.m vijjhantaa daarakassa akkhiko.ti.m  pahari.msu. te ta.m vijjhitvaa a"ngaarehi pa.ticchaadetvaa pakkami.msu.  kucchipadesopi jhaayi, a"ngaaramatthake pana suva.n.nabimbasadiso daarako  padumagabbhe nipanno viya ahosi. pacchimabhavikasattassa hi  sinerunaa otthariyamaanassapi arahatta.m appatvaa jiivitakkhayo naama  natthi.
text.7985: [03] punadivase aa.laahana.t.thaana.m gataa manussaa tathaanipanna.m daaraka.m  disvaa acchariyabbhutacittajaataa daaraka.m aadaaya gaama.m pavisitvaa  nemittake pucchi.msu. nemittakaa ``sace aya.m daarako agaara.m  ajjhaavasissati, yaava sattamaa kulapariva.t.taa duggataa bhavissanti.  sace pabbajissati, pa~ncahi sama.nasatehi parivuto vicarissatii''ti  aaha.msu. ~naatakaa ``hotu, va.d.dhitakaale amhaaka.m ayyassa  saariputtattherassa santike ta.m pabbaajessaamaa''ti vatvaa sa"nkunaa  chinnakkhiko.titaaya ^b^sa.mkicco^eb^ti vadantaa aparabhaage  ^b^sa.mkicco^eb^ti vohari.msu. so sattavassikakaale attano  gabbhagatasseva maatu mara.na.m, gabbhe ca attano ^a^P2.0255^ea^  pavatti.m sutvaa sa.mvegajaato ``pabbajissaamii''ti aaha. ~naatakaa  ``saadhu, taataa''ti dhammasenaapatissa santika.m netvaa, ``bhante, ima.m  pabbaajethaa''ti ada.msu. thero ta.m tacapa~ncakakamma.t.thaana.m datvaa pabbaajesi.  so khuraggeyeva saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m patvaa ti.msamattehi  bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m ara~n~ne viharanto ce corahatthato mocetvaa sayampi te  core dametvaa pabbaajetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m vihaare bahuuhi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m  viharanto ^a^M2.0214^ea^ te vivaadapasute disvaa ``a~n~nattha gacchaamii''ti bhikkhuu  aapucchi. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaaro pana ^b^dhammapadavatthumhi^eb^  (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 1.sa"nkiccasaama.neravatthu) ^a^V2.0182^ea^ aagatanayeneva veditabbo.  atha na.m a~n~nataro upaasako upa.t.thaatukaamo aasanna.t.thaane vaasa.m yaacanto  --
text.7988: [22] verambhaa rama.niiyaa te, paviveko hi jhaayina''nti..  --

text.8019: [22] kaala~nca pa.tika"nkhaami, sampajaano patissato''ti..  -- imaa gaathaa abhaasi.
text.8020: [01] tattha ^b^ki.m tavattho vane^eb^ti ^b^ki^eb^nti  li"ngavipallaasena vutta.m. vane ko tavattho, ki.m payojananti attho.  ^b^taataa^eb^ti daharasaama.nerataaya na.m attano putta.t.thaane .thapetvaa aalapati.  ^b^ujjuhaanova paavuse^eb^ti ^a^P2.0256^ea^ ujjuhaano kira  naama eko pabbato, so pana gahanasa~nchanno bahuso.n.dikandaro, taha.m  taha.m sandamaanasalilo ^a^V2.0183^ea^, vassakaale asappaayo, tasmaa ujjuhaano vaa  pabbato etarahi paavusakaale tava kimatthiyoti attho. keci panettha  ``ujjuhaano naama eko saku.no siita.m na sahati, vassakaale vanagumbe  niliino acchatii''ti vadanti. tesa.m matena ujjuhaanassa viya  saku.nassa paavusakaale ko tava attho vaneti? ^b^verambhaa rama.niiyaa  te^eb^ti verambhavaataa vaayantaa ki.m te rama.niiyaati yojanaa. keci  ``verambhaa naama ekaa pabbataguhaa, pabbhaaro''ti ca vadanti. ta~nca  .thaana.m gamanaagamanayutta.m janasambaadharahita.m chaayuudakasampanna~nca, tasmaa  verambhaa rama.niiyaa, vane vasitu.m yuttaruupaa. kasmaa? ^b^paviveko  hi jhaayina.m^eb^ yasmaa taadisaana.m jhaayiina.m yattha katthaci pavivekoyeva  icchitabbo, tasmaa ``duura.m ara~n~na.t.thaana.m agantvaa verambhaaya.m vasa,  taataa''ti vadati. aya~nhettha adhippaayo -- yasmaa jhaayiina.m  pavivekakkhame nivaasaphaasuke senaasane laddheyeva jhaanaadayo  sampajjanti, na aladdhe, tasmaa na evaruupe siitakaale yattha katthaci  vane vasitu.m sakkaa, guhaapabbhaaraadiisu pana sakkaati.
text.8021: [03] eva.m upaasakena vutte thero vanaadayo eva ma.m ramentiiti dassento  ^b^``yathaa abbhaanii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tassattho -- yathaa paavuse  kaale abbhaani valaahakaani verambhavaato ^b^nudati^eb^ khipati  niiharati, evameva me citta.m vivekapa.tisa~n~nutaa sa~n~naa abhikiranti  viveka.t.thaana.myeva aaka.d.dhanti.
text.8022: [01] ki~nca ^a^M2.0216^ea^? ^b^apa.n.daro^eb^ kaa.lava.n.no, ^b^a.n.dasambhavo^eb^  a.n.dajo kaako, ^b^siivathikaaya^eb^ susaana.t.thaane, ^b^niketacaariko^eb^  tameva nivaasana.t.thaana.m katvaa vicara.nako ^b^uppaadayateva me sati.m,  sandehasmi.m viraaganissita^eb^nti, kaayasmi.m viraaguupasa.mhita.m  kaayagataasatikamma.t.thaana.m mayha.m uppaadayatiyeva. ekadivasa.m kira thero  kaakena khajjamaana.m manussaku.napa.m passitvaa asubhasa~n~na.m pa.tilabhi, ta.m  sandhaaya evamaaha. tena kaaye sabbaso chandaraagassa natthitaaya  vaneyeva vasitukaamomhiiti dasseti. ^b^ya~ncaa^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo  samuccayattho, tena a~n~nampi mama ara~n~navaasakaara.na.m su.naahiiti dasseti.  ^b^ya.m^eb^ pabbajita.m mettaavihaaritaaya alobhaniyaparikkhaarataaya ca  rakkhitabbassa abhaavato ^b^a~n~ne^eb^ sevakaadayo na rakkhanti.  ^b^yo^eb^ ca pabbajito ^b^a~n~ne^eb^ kenaci ki~ncanapalibodhabhuute na  rakkhati taadisaana.myeva abhaavato. ^b^sa ve bhikkhu sukha.m  setii^eb^ti, so bhikkhu samucchinnakilesakaamataaya sabbaso vatthukaamesu  ^b^anapekkhavaa^eb^ apekkhaarahito yattha katthaci ^a^P2.0257^ea^  sukha.m seti. tassa anusa"nkitaparisa"nkitaabhaavato ara~n~namhi gaamamhi  sadisamevaati attho.
text.8023: [03] idaani ^a^V2.0184^ea^ pabbatavanaadiina.m rama.niiyata.m vasitapubbata~nca dassetu.m  ^b^``acchodikaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^vasita.m me^eb^ti,  vu.t.thapubba.m mayaa. ^b^vaa.lamiganisevite^eb^ti, siihabyagghaadiihi  vaa.lamigehi upasevite vane.
text.8024: [03] ^b^sa"nkappa.m naabhijaanaamii^eb^ti, ime ye keci paa.nino sattaa  ususattiaadiihi pahara.nehi ^b^ha~n~nantu^eb^ maariyantu mu.t.thippahaaraadiihi  ^b^vajjhantu^eb^ baadhiiyantu, a~n~nena vaa yena kenaci aakaarena dukkha.m  ^b^pappontu^eb^ paapu.nantuuti; eva.m ^b^dosasa.mhita.m^eb^ pa.tighasa.myutta.m tato  eva ^b^anariya.m^eb^ byaapaadavihi.msaadippabheda.m paapasa"nkappa.m uppaadita.m  naabhijaanaami, micchaavitakko na uppannapubboti mettaavihaarita.m dasseti.
text.8025: [03] idaani ^b^``parici.n.no''^eb^tiaadinaa attano katakiccata.m  dasseti. tattha ^b^parici.n.no^eb^ti upaasito  ovaadaanusaasaniikara.navasena. ^b^ohito^eb^ti orohito.  ^b^garuko bhaaro^eb^ti garutaro khandhabhaaro.
text.8026: [01] ^b^naabhinandaami^eb^ ^a^M2.0217^ea^ ^b^mara.na^eb^nti ``katha.m nu kho me mara.na.m  siyaa''ti mara.na.m na icchaami. ^b^naabhinandaami jiivita^eb^nti  ``katha.m nu kho aha.m cira.m jiiveyya''nti jiivitampi na icchaami.  etena mara.ne jiivite ca samaanacittata.m dasseti. ^b^kaala~nca  pa.tika"nkhaamii^eb^ti parinibbaanakaala.mva aagamemi. ^b^nibbisa^eb^nti  nibbisanto, bhatiyaa kamma.m karonto. ^b^bhatako yathaa^eb^ti yathaa  bhatako parassa kamma.m karonto kammasiddhi.m anabhinandantopi kamma.m  karontova divasakkhaya.m udikkhati, eva.m ahampi jiivita.m  anabhinandantopi attabhaavassa yaapanena mara.na.m anabhinandantopi  pariyosaanakaala.m pa.tika"nkhaamiiti. sesa.m vuttanayameva.
text.8031: [03] dvaadasakanipaate ^a^M2.0218^ea^ ^a^V2.0185^ea^ ^b^siilamevaa^eb^tiaadikaa aayasmato  siilavattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu  kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinitvaa  imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe bimbisaarara~n~no putto hutvaa nibbatti,  ^b^siilavaa^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. ta.m vayappatta.m raajaa ajaatasattu  maaretukaamo ca.n.da.m mattahatthi.m aaropetvaa naanaavidhehi upaayehi  upakkamantopi maaretu.m naasakkhi pacchimabhavikassa arahatta.m appatvaa  antaraa jiivitantaraayaabhaavato. tassa pavatti.m ^a^P2.0258^ea^  disvaa bhagavaa mahaamoggallaanatthera.m aa.naapesi -- ``siilavakumaara.m  aanehii''ti. thero iddhibalena saddhi.m hatthinaa ta.m aanesi. kumaaro  hatthito oruyha bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. bhagavaa  tassa ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m dhamma.m desesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa  pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva  arahatta.m patvaa kosalara.t.the vasati. atha na.m ajaatasattu ``maarethaa''ti  purise aa.naapesi. te therassa santika.m gantvaa .thitaa therena kathita.m  dhammakatha.m sutvaa sa~njaatasa.mvegaa pasannacittaa hutvaa pabbaji.msu. thero  tesa.m --
text.804: [22] gotamo naama naamena, satthaa loke bhavissati..
text.8043: [22] va.n.na.m kitti.m pasa.msa~nca, sadaa labhati siilavaa..
text.8055: [22] siila.m vilepana.m se.t.tha.m, yena vaati disodisa.m..

text.8069: [03] tattha ^b^siilamevidha sikkhetha, asmi.m loke^eb^ti  ^b^idhaa^eb^ti, nipaatamatta.m, imasmi.m sattaloke atthakaamo kulaputto  caarittavaarittaadibheda.m aadito siilameva sikkheyya, sikkhanto ca na.m  ^b^susikkhita.m^eb^ akha.n.daadibhaavaapaadanena su.t.thu sikkhita.m suparisuddha.m  paripu.n.na~nca katvaa sikkheyya. ^b^asmi.m^eb^ ^a^P2.0259^ea^  ^b^loke^eb^ti vaa imasmi.m sa"nkhaaraloke sikkhitabbadhammesu siila.m  aadito sikkheyya. di.t.thisampattiyaapi siilassa pati.t.thaabhaavato aaha  ^b^``siila.m hii''^eb^tiaadi. tattha ^b^hii^eb^ti kaara.navacana.m. yasmaa  siila.m ^b^sevita.m^eb^ paricita.m rakkhita.m ^a^M2.0220^ea^ manussasampatti, dibbasampatti,  nibbaanasampattiiti eta.m ^b^sabbasampatti.m^eb^ ta.msama"ngino sattassa  ^b^upanaameti^eb^ aavahati.
text.8070: [03] siila.m sabbasampatti.m upanaametiiti sa"nkhepato vuttamattha.m  vitthaarato dassento ^b^``siila.m rakkheyyaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha  ^b^rakkheyyaa^eb^ti gopeyya. paa.naatipaataadito hi viramanto  vattapa.tivatta~nca puurento pa.tipakkhaabhibhavanato ta.m rakkhati naama.  ^b^medhaavii^eb^ti pa~n~navaa, ida.m tassa rakkhanupaayadassana.m ~naa.nabalena  hissa samaadaana.m avikopana~nca hoti. ^b^patthayaano^eb^ti icchanto.  ^b^tayo sukhe^eb^ti ^a^V2.0187^ea^ tii.ni sukhaani. sukhanimitta.m vaa  ``sukha''nti adhippeta.m. ^b^pasa.msa^eb^nti kitti.m, vi~n~nuuhi vaa  pasa.msana.m. ^b^vittilaabha^eb^nti tu.t.thilaabha.m. ``vittalaabha''nti ca  pa.thanti, dhanalaabhanti attho. siilavaa hi appamattataaya mahanta.m  bhogakkhandha.m adhigacchati. ^b^peccaa^eb^ti kaala"nkatvaa. ^b^sagge  pamodana^eb^nti devaloke i.t.thehi kaamagu.nehi, modana~nca patthayamaanoti  sambandho. idhaloke pasa.msa.m vittilaabha.m paraloke dibbasampattiyaa  modana~nca icchanto siila.m rakkheyyaati yojanaa.
text.8071: [03] ^b^sa~n~namenaa^eb^ti kaayaadiina.m sa.myamena. sa.myato hi  kaayaduccaritaadiihi ka~nci avihe.thento abhayadaana.m dadanto  piyamanaapataaya mittaani ganthati. ^b^dha.msate^eb^ti apeti.  ^b^paapamaacara^eb^nti paa.naatipaataadipaapakamma.m karonto. dussiila~nhi  puggala.m atthakaamaa sattaa na bhajanti, a~n~nadatthu parivajjenti.
text.8072: [03] ^b^ava.n.na^eb^nti agu.na.m, sammukhaa garaha.m vaa.  ^b^akitti^eb^nti, ayasa.m asiloka.m. ^b^va.n.na^eb^nti gu.na.m.  ^b^kitti^eb^nti siloka.m pattha.tayasata.m. ^b^pasa.msa^eb^nti sammukhaa  thomana.m.
text.8073: [03] ^b^aadii^eb^ti muula.m. siila~nhi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadi.  yathaaha -- ``tasmaatiha tva.m, bhikkhu, aadimeva visodhehi kusalesu  dhammesu. ko caadi kusalaana.m dhammaana.m? siila~nca suvisuddha''nti  (sa.m0 ni0  5.369). ^b^pati.t.thaa^eb^ti adhi.t.thaana.m. siila~nhi  sabbesa.m uttarimanussadhammaana.m pati.t.thaa. tenaaha -- ``siile  pati.t.thaayaa''tiaadi (sa.m0 ni0  1.23; 192; pe.tako0 22; mi0  pa0 2.1.9). ^b^kalyaa.naana~nca maatuka^eb^nti samathavipassanaadiina.m  kalyaa.nadhammaana.m maatubhuuta.m ^a^M2.0221^ea^, janakanti, attho. ^b^pamukha.m  sabbadhammaana^eb^nti, sabbesa.m paamojjaadiina.m anavajjadhammaana.m pamukha.m  mukhabhuuta.m, pavattidvaaranti attho. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti aadibhaavaadito.  ^b^visodhaye^eb^ti akkha.n.daadibhaavena sampaadeyya.
text.8074: [03] ^b^velaa^eb^ti duccaritehi anatikkamaniiya.t.thena velaa, siimaati  attho ^a^P2.0260^ea^. velaayati vaa dussilya.m calayati  viddha.msetiiti velaa. sa.mvara.m siila.m kaayaduccaritaadiina.m uppattidvaarassa  pidahanato. ^b^abhihaasana^eb^nti tosana.m avippa.tisaarahetutaaya  cittassaabhippamodanato. ^b^tittha~nca sabbabuddhaana^eb^nti saavakabuddhaa,  paccekabuddhaa, sammaasambuddhaati sabbesa.m buddhaana.m kilesamalappavaahane  nibbaanamahaasamuddaavagaaha.ne ca titthabhuuta~nca.
text.8075: [03] ^b^siila.m bala.m appa.tima^eb^nti maarasenappamaddane asadisa.m bala.m  senaathaamo ca. ^b^aavudhamuttama^eb^nti sa.mkilesadhammaana.m ^a^V2.0188^ea^ chedane uttama.m  pahara.na.m. gu.nasariiropasobhana.t.thena ^b^aabhara.na.m. se.t.tha^eb^nti sabbakaala.m  uttama.m dabba~nca. sapaa.naparittaanato ^b^kavacamabbhuta.m^eb^.  ``abbhida''nti ca pa.thanti, abhejjanti attho.
text.8076: [03] apaayamahoghaatikkamane sa.msaaramahoghaatikkamane ca kilesehi  asa.msiidana.t.thena ^b^setu. mahesakkho^eb^ti mahabbalo. ^b^gandho  anuttaro^eb^ti pa.tivaata.m sabbadisaasu vaayanato anuttaro gandho  sabbajanamanoharattaa. tenaaha ^b^``yena vaati disodisa''^eb^nti yena  siilagandhena ta.msama"ngii disodisa.m sabbaa disaa vaayati.  ``disodisaa''tipi paa.li, dasa disaati attho.
text.8077: [03] ^b^sambalamevagga^eb^nti sambala.m naama pu.tabhatta.m. yathaa pu.tabhatta.m  gahetvaa magga.m gacchanto puriso antaraamagge jighacchaadukkhena na  kilamati, eva.m siilasampannopi suddha.m siilasambala.m gahetvaa  sa.msaarakantaara.m pa.tipanno gatagata.t.thaane na kilamatiiti siila.m agga.m  sambala.m naama. tathaa ^b^siila.m paatheyyamuttama.m^eb^ coraadiihi  asaadhaara.nattaa tattha tattha icchitabbasampattinipphaadanato ca.  atikkaamento ta.m ta.m .thaana.m yathicchita.t.thaana.m vaa vaaheti sampaapetiiti  ^b^ativaaho, yaana.m^eb^. kenaci anupadduta.m hutvaa  icchita.t.thaanappattihetutaaya ^a^M2.0222^ea^ siila.m se.t.tha.m ativaaho. ^b^yenaa^eb^ti yena  ativaahena ^b^yaati disodisa^eb^nti agati.m gati~ncaapi ta.m ta.m disa.m  sukheneva gacchati.
text.8078: [03] ^b^idheva ninda.m labhatii^eb^ti idhalokepi ^b^dummano^eb^  raagaadiihi duusitacitto ``dussiilo paapadhammo''ti ninda.m garaha.m  labhati. ^b^pecca^eb^ paralokepi apaaye ``purisattakali  avajaataa''tiaadinaa yamapurisaadiihi ca ninda.m labhati. na kevala.m  nindameva labhati, atha kho ^b^sabbattha dummano baalo^eb^ idhaloke  duccaritacara.nena duusitacitto paraloke kammakaara.naadivasena  dukkhuppattiyaati sabbattha baalo dummano hoti. katha.m? ^b^siilesu  asamaahito^eb^ sammaa siilesu na .thapitacitto appati.t.thitacitto.
text.8079: [03] ^b^idheva kitti.m labhatii^eb^ti idhalokepi sumano ``sappuriso  siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo''ti kitti.m labhati. ^b^pecca^eb^ paralokepi  sagge ``aya.m sappuriso siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo. tathaa hi devaana.m  sahabyata.m upapanno''tiaadinaa kitti.m labhati. na kevala.m kittimeva  labhati, atha kho ^a^P2.0261^ea^ ^b^dhiiro^eb^ dhitisampanno  ^b^siilesu su.t.thu samaahito^eb^ appitacitto supati.t.thitacitto sabbattha  idhaloke sucaritacara.nena, paraloke sampattipa.tilaabhena ^b^sumano^eb^  somanassappatto hoti. ^b^siilameva idha agga^eb^nti duvidha.m siila.m  lokiya.m lokuttaranti. tattha lokiya.m taava kaamaloke  khattiyamahaasaalaadiisu, devaloke brahmaloke ca upapattivisesa.m aavahati,  laabhiibhaavaadikassa ca kaara.na.m ^a^V2.0189^ea^ hoti. lokuttara.m pana sakalampi  va.t.tadukkha.m atikkaametiiti siila.m aggameva. tathaa hi vutta.m --
text.8082: [02] aaka"nkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu -- ``laabhii assa.m  ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti (ma0 ni0  1.65), ``siilesvevassa paripuurakaarii''ti (ma0 ni0 1.65),  ``ijjhati, bhikkhave, siilavato cetopa.nidhi visuddhattaa''ti (a0  ni0  8.35; dii0 ni0 3.337) ca.
text.8083: [03] lokuttarasiilassa ^a^M2.0223^ea^ pana sabbaso pahiinapa.tipakkhassa sattamabhavato  pa.t.thaaya sa.msaaradukkha.m vinivattentassa aggabhaave vattabbameva natthi.  ^b^pa~n~navaa pana uttamo^eb^ti ``pa~n~navaa pana puggalo uttamo paramo  se.t.thoyevaa''ti puggalaadhi.t.thaanena pa~n~naaya eva se.t.thabhaava.m vadati. idaani  siilapa~n~naana.m se.t.thabhaava.m kiccato dassento ^b^``siilapa~n~naa.nato  jaya''^eb^nti aaha. ^b^jaya^eb^nti ca li"ngavipallaaso da.t.thabbo, ahuuti  vaa vacanaseso. tattha pajaanana.t.thena pa~n~naa.na.m, siilato pa~n~naa.nato ca  pa.tipakkhajayo. na hi siilena vinaa pa~n~naa sambhavati, pa~n~naaya ca  vinaa siila.m kiccakara.m, a~n~nama~n~nopakaaraka~nceta.m. vutta~nhi  ``siilaparidhotaa pa~n~naa, pa~n~naaparidhota.m siila''nti (dii0 ni0  1.317) ^b^manussesu ca devesuu^eb^ti ida.m nesa.m .thaanavisesadassana.m.  tattha hi taani savisesaani vattanti, samaadhi panettha siilapakkhiko  pa~n~naaya adhi.t.thaanabhaavato, pa~n~naapakkhiko vaa bhaavetabbato  siilaadhi.t.thaanato ca.

text.8087: [03] ^b^niice^eb^ ^a^P2.0262^ea^ ^b^kulamhii^eb^tiaadikaa  aayasmato suniitattherassa gaathaa. kaa uppatti? ayampi  purimabuddhesu ^a^V2.0190^ea^ kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinitvaa  devamanussesu sa.msaranto buddhassa su~n~nakaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa  vayappatto baalajanehi saddhi.m kii.laapasuto hutvaa vicaranto eka.m  paccekabuddha.m gaame pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa, ``ki.m tuyha.m sabbaso  va.nitasariirassa viya sakala.m kaaya.m pa.ticchaadetvaa bhikkhaacara.nena, nanu  naama kasivaa.nijjaadiihi jiivikaa kappetabbaa? taani ce kaatu.m na  sakkosi, ghare ghare muttakariisaadiini niiharanto pacchaa vatthusodhanena  jiivaahii''ti akkosi. so tena kammena niraye paccitvaa tasseva  kammassa vipaakaavasesena manussalokepi bahuuni jaatisataani  ^a^M2.0224^ea^ pupphacha.d.dakakule nibbattitvaa tathaa jiivika.m kappesi. imasmi~nca  buddhuppaade pupphacha.d.dakakule eva nibbatto ukkaarasodhanakammena jiivika.m  kappeti ghaasacchaadanamattampi alabhanto.
text.8088: [03] atha bhagavaa pacchimayaame buddhaaci.n.na.m mahaakaru.naasamaapatti.m  samaapajjitvaa tato vu.t.thaaya buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento suniitassa  hadayabbhantare gha.te padiipa.m viya pajjalanta.m arahattuupanissaya.m disvaa  vibhaataaya rattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya  bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho. yassa.m viithiya.m  suniito ukkaarasodhanakamma.m karoti, ta.m viithi.m pa.tipajji. suniitopi  tattha tattha vighaasuccaarasa"nkaaraadika.m raasi.m katvaa pi.takesu pakkhipitvaa  kaajenaadaaya pariharanto bhikkhusa"nghaparivuta.m satthaara.m aagacchanta.m disvaa  saarajjamaano sambhamaakulahadayo gamanamagga.m niliiyanokaasa~nca  alabhanto kaaja.m bhittipasse .thapetvaa ekena passena anupavisanto viya  bhitti.m alliino pa~njaliko a.t.thaasi. ``bhittichiddena apakkamitukaamo  ahosii''tipi vadanti.
text.8089: [03] satthaa tassa samiipa.m patvaa ``aya.m attano kusalamuulasa~ncodita.m  upagata.m ma.m saarajjamaano jaatiyaa kammassa ca nihiinataaya  sammukhiibhaavampi lajjati, handassa vesaarajja.m uppaadessaamii''ti  karaviikarutama~njunaa sakalanagaraninnaadavara-gambhiirena brahmassarena  ``suniitaa''ti aalapitvaa ``ki.m imaaya dukkhajiivikaaya pabbajitu.m  sakkhissatii''ti aaha. suniito tena satthu vacanena amatena viya  abhisitto u.laara.m piitisomanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedento ``bhagavaa, sace  maadisaapi idha pabbajja.m labhanti, kasmaaha.m na pabbajissaami, pabbaajetha  ma.m bhagavaa''ti aaha ^a^P2.0263^ea^. satthaa ``ehi,  bhikkhuu''ti aaha. so taavadeva ehibhikkhubhaavena pabbajja.m  upasampada~nca labhitvaa iddhimayapattaciivaradharo vassasa.t.thikatthero viya  hutvaa satthu santike a.t.thaasi. bhagavaa ta.m vihaara.m netvaa kamma.t.thaana.m  aacikkhi. so pa.thama.m a.t.tha samaapattiyo, pa~nca ca abhi~n~naayo  nibbattetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. ta.m sakkaadayo  devaa brahmaano ca upasa"nkamitvaa namassi.msu. tena vutta.m --
text.8090: [21] ``taa ^a^M2.0225^ea^ ^a^V2.0191^ea^ devataa sattasataa u.laaraa, brahmaa ca indo  upasa"nkamitvaa.
text.8092: [03] bhagavaa ta.myeva devasa"nghapurakkhata.m disvaa sita.m katvaa pasa.msanto  ``tapena brahmacariyenaa''ti gaathaaya dhamma.m desesi. atha na.m sambahulaa  bhikkhuu siihanaada.m nadaapetukaamaa, ``aavuso suniita, kasmaa kulaa tva.m  pabbajito, katha.m vaa pabbajito, katha~nca saccaani pa.tivijjhii''ti  pucchi.msu. so ta.m sabba.m pakaasento --
text.8098: [22] niica.m mana.m karitvaana, vandissa.m bahuka.m jana.m..
text.81: [03] tathaa siilasampadaaya tevijjabhaavo dassito. siilasampatti~nhi  nissaaya tisso vijjaa paapu.nanti. samaadhisampadaaya  cha.labhi~n~naabhaavo. samaadhisampatti~nhi nissaaya cha.labhi~n~naa paapu.nanti.  pa~n~naasampadaaya pabhinnapa.tisambhidaabhaavo. pa~n~naasampada~nhi nissaaya  catasso pa.tisambhidaa paapu.nanti. iminaa tesa.m theraana.m keci tevijjaa,  keci cha.labhi~n~naa, keci pa.tisambhidaapattaati ayamattho dassitoti  veditabba.m.

text.8130: [03] tattha ^b^niice^eb^ti laamake sabbanihiine. uccaniicabhaavo hi  naama sattaana.m upaadaayupaadaaya, aya.m pana sabbanihiine pukkusakule  uppannata.m dassento ^b^``niice kulamhi jaato''^eb^ti aaha. tena vutta.m  -- ``niiceti laamake sabbanihiine''ti. ^b^daliddo^eb^ti duggato,  daliddaapi keci kadaaci ghaasacchaadanassa laabhino, akasiravuttino  honti, aha.m pana sabbakaala.m kasiravuttitaaya hiino uddhana.m  upa.t.thapitaukkhaliko dassanayutta.m thevakampi apassi.m yevaati dassento  ^b^``appabhojano''^eb^ti aaha. niicakulikaa daliddaapi keci  aniicakammaajiivaa honti, mayha.m pana na tathaati dassento aaha  ^b^``hiinakamma.m mama.m aasii''^eb^ti. kiidisanti ce? ^b^ahosi.m  pupphacha.d.dako,^eb^ hatthavikalassa hatthavaati viya upacaaravasenaaya.m imassa  sama~n~naa ahosi yadida.m ``pupphacha.d.dako''ti.  milaatapupphasantharava.n.nataaya vaa ukkaarabhuumiyaa eva.m vutto.
text.8131: [03] ^b^jigucchito^eb^ti jaatiyaa ceva kammunaa ca hii.lito.  ^b^manussaana^eb^nti manussehi. ^b^paribhuuto^eb^ti ava~n~naato.  ^b^vambhito^eb^ti khu.msito. ^b^niica.m mana.m karitvaanaa^eb^ti a~n~ne  manusse sineru.m viya ukkhipitvaa tesa.m paadapa.msutopi attaana.m nihiina.m  katvaa pavattiyaa niica.m nihiina.m mana.m katvaa. ^b^vandissa.m^eb^  ^a^M2.0227^ea^ ^b^bahuka.m jana^eb^nti puthumahaajana.m di.t.thadi.t.thakaale vandi.m sirasi  a~njali.m karonto pa.naami.m.
text.8132: [03] ^b^athaa^eb^ti adhikaarantaradiipane nipaato.  ^b^addasaasi^eb^nti addakkhi.m. ^b^magadhaana^eb^nti magadhaa naama  jaanapadino raajakumaaraa, tesa.m nivaaso ekopi janapado ru.lhiyaa  ``magadhaana''nti vutto, magadhajanapadassaati attho. ^b^puruttama^eb^nti  uttama.m nagara.m.
text.8133: [03] ^b^byaabha"ngi^eb^nti kaaja.m. ^b^pabbajja.m ahamaayaaci^eb^nti,  ``suniita, pabbajitu.m sakkhissasii''ti satthaaraa okaase kate aha.m  pabbajja.m ayaaci.m. ^b^aasuupasampadaa^eb^ti ``ehi, bhikkhuu''ti satthu  vacanamattena aasi upasampadaa. ^b^yathaa ma.m ovadii^eb^ti ``eva.m  samathapubba"ngama.m vipassana.m bhaavehii''ti yathaa ma.m ovadi, tathaa satthuno  vacana.m ^b^akaasi.m^eb^ pa.tipajji.m. ^b^rattiyaa^eb^tiaadi tassaa  pa.tipattiyaa rasadassana.m. tattha pubbenivaasa~naa.na.m ^a^P2.0265^ea^  anaagata.msa~naa.na~nca bahukiccanti ``^b^pa.thama.m yaama.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0193^ea^ ^b^majjhima.m  yaama''^eb^nti accantasa.myogavasena upayogavacana.m vutta.m. na tathaa  aasavakkhaya~naa.na.m ekaabhisamayavasena pavattanatoti ^b^``pacchime  yaame''^eb^ti bhummavasena vuttanti da.t.thabba.m. ^b^indo^eb^ti sakko  devaraajaa. ^b^brahmaa^eb^ti mahaabrahmaa. indabrahmaggaha.nena a~n~nesa.m  kaamadevaana.m brahmuuna~nca aagamana.m vuttamevaati da.t.thabba.m. ukka.t.thaniddeso hesa  yathaa ``raajaa aagato''ti. ^b^namassi.msuu^eb^ti kaayena vaacaaya ca  namakkaara.m aka.msu.
text.8134: [01] tattha kaayena kata.m namakkaara.m dassento  ^b^``pa~njalii''^eb^ti vatvaa vaacaaya kata.m dassetu.m ^b^``namo  te''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. ^b^devasa"nghapurakkhata^eb^nti devaggaha.nena  upapattidevabhaavato brahmaanopi gahitaa. ^b^sita.m paatukaritvaanaa^eb^ti  attano ovaadassa mahapphalata.m devabrahmuuna~nca gu.nasampatti.m nissaaya  satthaa sita.m paatvaakaasi. paatukaronto ca na a~n~ne viya dante  vida.mseti, mukhaadhaana.m pana thoka.m vivarati, tattakena ca  abhibhuutadibbaphalikamuttarasmiyo avahasitataarakaasasimariiciyo  susukkadaa.thasambhavaa ghanarasmiyo nikkhamitvaa tikkhattu.m satthu mukha.m  padakkhi.na.m karonti, ta.m disvaa pacchato gacchantaapi satthaa sita.m  paatvaakaasiiti sa~njaananti.
text.8135: [03] ^b^tapenaa^eb^ti ^a^M2.0228^ea^ indriyasa.mvarena, ``dhutadhammasamaadaanenaa''ti  keci. ^b^sa.myamenaa^eb^ti siilena. ^b^damenaa^eb^ti pa~n~naaya.  ^b^brahmacariyenaa^eb^ti avasi.t.thase.t.thacariyaaya. ^b^etenaa^eb^ti  yathaavuttena tapaadinaa. ^b^braahma.no hoti^eb^ baahitapaapabhaavato.  ^b^eta^eb^nti tapaadi yathaavutta.m. ^b^braahma.namuttama^eb^nti uttama.m  braahma.na.m, braahma.nesu vaa uttama.m sabbase.t.tha.m, ahuuti vacanaseso.  ^b^braahma.na^eb^nti vaa brahma~n~namaaha, eva.m uttama.m brahma~n~na.m, na jaccaadiiti  adhippaayo. na hi jaatikulapadesagottasampattiaadayo ariyabhaavassa  kaara.na.m, adhisiilasikkhaadayo eva pana kaara.na.m. tenaaha --
